1b1(rnying rgyud): glu / mAnan na nadrug ma nam nas/ bag+sa sumangs nan du
1b2(rnying rgyud): byu sa sa sa
1b3(rnying rgyud): du ga rdul // swA na skye na sa
1b4(rnying rgyud): 'i shes du tshan / [ред]/ ra ba dzu na// snang ba na ba ba sa / rdzu ba na g+sa
1b5(rnying rgyud): sa pa ma par dag sa mas da// don 'i rigs tshul da / sa rgya
2a1(rnying rgyud): ngas reg pa nyid kyi don bstan to// ga gas/ yangs pa stacwa myi bdag nyid/ sdang ba rten pa'i u/ d+da thabs ne// ra she / rang spangs pa'o/
2a2(rnying rgyud): des spras shing rang snang gi gzhal las khang dang banas pa'o// rang gi 'od kyi yul dang bcas pa'o// thog ma med pa'i thugs rje dang bcas pa'o// 'di skad bdag
2a3(rnying rgyud): gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma byung / ma rtogs pa'i sems can ma byung ba'i sngon rol na/ rig parang byung gi ye shes nyid gzhi las ma g.yos te/ rkyen med pa'i snang
2a4(rnying rgyud): ba gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// gzhi nyid btam de nas yang rig pa'i ye shes ma nyid kyis/ rang rang gi 'dug tshul gyi gnas lugs 'di gsungs so// kye sdar ba chen po yangs
2a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i klong de ni/ ma g.yos pa chos kyi zhu chen po las/ ma 'khrul pa'i sangs rgyas chen por bzhugs so// ngo bo'i sku ma 'gags par gnas te/ de nyid/ ngo bo mi 'gyur/ thabs pa shes rtogs gsang
2b1(rnying rgyud): pa na sang la ma g.yas maM g.ya rig pa nyid ma brgyad pa/ snang ba thams cad dus gcig la rdzogs pa/ ye shes thams cad skad cig la rdzogs pa/ su thams cad smin par gnas pa/ 'od kyi sdang ba thams cad ma bsgribs par gsalar
2b2(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs kyi snang ba la/ snang ba thabs kyis ma bsgribs pa/ ngo bo ka dag rang bzhin kun thab thugs rje kun khrab gsum/ rgyam chad par lhun grub cings nas yongs su rdzogs pa chen po/ bde gshegs nyid po/ ka dag gi ngos nas ngo bo'i
2b3(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs chen po rig pa de yang / sru ltar gnas pa mkhyen pa'i cha nas sems can la sdang pA la kha mig rna bar dod pa ni stong pa'i chanas ci yang mi bzhugs/ stong pa ltar gnas pa la/ rig pa 'ang po bem stong cig med nam mkha' ltar cang mi bzhugs/
2b4(rnying rgyud): pade po 'od lnga ltar gsal nga'i cha nas/ snang ba chen po la/ kha dog tu phye ba ni cang mi bzhugs/ rgya ma chad pa ltar dkar po la sogs kha dog tu mo dang / snang ba la/ brten pa med par 'khor ba dang / 'grel pa ltar cang mi bzhugs/ yon tan mtha' dbus med pa
2b5(rnying rgyud): ltar snang ba/ phyogs su dmigs pa ni cang mi bzhugs/ rig pa'i shes rab cha bgos pa ltar snang ba la/ ris su phye ba ni cang mi bzhugs/ rgyar ma 'gags pa ltar gyur zhugs su rig pa/ sdang zhing dpangs mtho ba la/ ngo bo de la sted 'og tu sdud pa
2b6(rnying rgyud): ni gang yang med do// rang bzhin gyis rub stong pa rig pa yin pas/ snang ba ni yangs pa ltar snang ba la phyogs lhung med pa/ gsal ba ltar snang ba la dngos po med pa/ mthing ga ltar snang ba la cha ma phye ba/ dkar ba ltar snang ba la rigs mi 'dzin
2b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ ser po ltar sdang ba la yon tan rdzogs pa/ dmar ba ltar snang ba la go ma 'gags pa/ ljang ku ltar snang ba la ma btsal bar grub pa/ snang ba lnga nyid du gnas pa la kha dog mi 'dzin pa chen po// thum pa la dbyibs med pa/
3a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'gags pa la rgyun med pa/ khyab pa med pa la rang gdangs chan pa/ rang gsal ba la phyi nang dang bcas pa/ mdan pa tha' ba gta ga / rtsol ba sgrub med pa la ba bkyis bslab pa'o/ 'di namam tha
3a2(rnying rgyud): bye ma cin te dag ga pa shes kyig sta ga dang / thugs rdore snang ba de le shes pa din ra ba'i ngo // ni stong pa wAr ye shes de sdang ba la/ gsal ba la ma 'gags pa/ spros pa med pa la spros pa chen po/ rang bzhin ma 'gags pa la lnga tshogs pa
3a3(rnying rgyud): nges pa chen po/ gsal ba la mun pa med pa/ ma 'gags pas med pa chen po/ bab kyis stong pa la kun du 'char ba chen po/ ma 'dres pa la yongs su sdang ba chen po/ kun la khyab pa la gcig tu 'dus pa chen po/ dag pa la 'khrul
3a4(rnying rgyud): pa ma 'gags pa chen po/ rdzogs pa la gcig tu snang ba chen po/ thugs rngo go ma 'gags par bzhugs so// chos kyi su'i/ gsum ci 'byung tshul brtan pa/ sdang ba mi 'gyur ba la/ 'khrul pa'i snang ba yul ltar snang ba'i dus yongs su ma nges te/
3a5(rnying rgyud): gzhi las 'khrul pa'i go byung ste/ ngo bo mi 'gyur ba las/ rang bzhin ma 'gags par gsal ba ste/ thugs rje ma nges pa las/ ma rig pa ltar snang ba byung ste/ de ltar 'khrul pa'i yul tsam mo/ gsang ba'i sngags la ye nas gnas pa'i
3a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan gzhi mtshon pa'o// zhes bkra shis mdzes ldan chen po'i klud las/ gzhi gnas lugs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang rig pa'i sdang ba nyid kyis/ lpa thu sa pa rig pa'i byang tshul brtan/ rang gis 'khrul tshul sdang ba
3a7(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// gnyis gzhi las patha la tshus pa dag/ kye mngal gad la 'khrul pa med kyang / nga'i rtsal las sa laH 'khrul pa srung ste/ gzhi gdag mi 'gyu ba las/ rang bzhin ma 'gags par shar nas/ thugs rjemangs pa la
3b1(rnying rgyud): ma rig pa dang byung ste/ dper na nam mkha' la smin yang dag par yod pa ma yin te/ glo bur du sprin byung ba dang 'dra bar/ gzhi la ma rig pa yod pa cang ma yin te/ thugs rje ltar shar ba las ma rig pa byung ste/ gzhi la lhun grub kyi gnas lugs zhes
3b2(rnying rgyud): bu bachags so// de yang ma nges pa'i snang ba chen po zhig tu gnas so// de yang 'char lugs rnam pa thugs rje dang dzod dang lha dang ye shes dang gnyis med dang mtha' bol dang dag pa dang / mdag pa/ brgyad dang ldan pa rin po che ga'u'i gnas lugs zhes bya ste/ 'dod yon gyi
3b3(rnying rgyud): go ma 'gags pa'o// ma grub pa'i grub pa chen por gnas pa/ thugs rje ltar 'char ba'i go ma 'gags pa/ 'od ltar 'char ba'i sdang ba ma 'gags pa/ ye shes ltar 'chang ba'i longs spyod ma 'gags pa/ su ltar 'char pa'i ngo bo ma 'gags
3b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ gnyis med ltar 'char ba'i lta ba ma nges pa/ mtha' grol ltar 'chang ba'i thabs ma 'gags pa'o// dag pa ye shes kyi 'jug sgo mthar phyin pa/ ma dag pa ltar 'char ba'i sgo thugs rje ma 'gags pa/ 'dod don gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu
3b5(rnying rgyud): ga rnam pa / sa na da// sa na du 'du /
3b6(rnying rgyud): shag ma shig ma/ khral mkhrol ma/ yang ma yeng ma/ 'gul ba 'phrig pa/ sna tshogs su 'gro ba byung ngo // de nas lhun srub kyi gnas lugs chen po chags so// de'i ye shes kyi gom 'gags pa las yong sa spod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ldang lugs
3b7(rnying rgyud): chags so// yon tan gyi go ma 'gags pa las rang bzhin sbrul su'i sdang lugs srid do// de'i thugs rje go ma 'gags pa las ma dag pa'i snang lugs byung ngo // de las snang ba'i 'khrul tshul du mar chags te/ 'khor pa grub po// de yang
4a1(rnying rgyud): gnas lcags can pa gcig lug sa/ gas na na mnan da/ gas ga nas/ sasartan tha ma ga las/ pa/ de dang /
4a2(rnying rgyud): rkyen bzhi'i 'khrul te/ za ma yang rkyen bzhi la thug go// rgyu dmigs pa can du 'dzin pa'i rkyen las/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi chur 'khrul/ bdag po yul can du 'dzin pa'i rkyen las/ ming sna tshogs su 'khrul/ dmigs pa blo can du 'dzin
4a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rkyen las/ 'bras bu thug pa med par 'bul lo// de mthag pa 'dzin pa can gyi rkyen las/ snang ba lnga tshogs su 'khrul lo// de ni gsang sngags gzhi'i 'khrul lugs chen par/ dA yang sdang thabs la ma rig pa'i rkyen
4a4(rnying rgyud): dum brtan pa'o// rang ka ma dang bcas te sdang ngo // ma rig pa de yang rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa lnga dang bcas te/ rtog tshogs du ma sdud pa'o// rkyen stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa snang tshul du ma dang bcas pa snang tshul gyis 'byams pa'o// de yang thun grub rin po che'i
4a5(rnying rgyud): ga'u'i gnas lugs las/ snang ba ma 'gags pa las/ gzhi ma 'gyur bar snang ba 'gyur te// yul du ma'i rjes su 'brangs te thams cad la rtog pa'o// chos kyi sku'i ldang ba ma 'gyur kyang / 'khrul pa'i snang ba la 'gur 'gyur ltar byung
4a6(rnying rgyud): ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' 'khrul pa mi mnga' yang / sems can la 'khrul pa'i tshul bstan pa'o// tha ma rang gi sdang ba rang rkyen gyi sa gzhi las ldog pa'o// gnyis su med pa'i ldang ba rang shar bar ma shes te/ 'khrul pa la bdag por bzung
4a7(rnying rgyud): pas bdag pa'i rkyen/ rang rig pa'i 'bras bu rang thar bar ma shes nyi skyes pa can bzung bam+b+hi'i rgyanan// phral dang shes pa stong par nim shes/ dmigs pa la yul du bathung bas/ dmigs par nga byar/ dus pa klas nas
4b1(rnying rgyud): byung bar ma shes/ rnam yin pa la dang 'dzan par shes pa byung bas mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen no// rgya chen padan can dmigs pa na mabya bdapa na reg na pad dmagasas/ zhes bkra shis mdzes ldan rgyan po'i rgyud las/ gzhal 'khral ba
4b2(rnying rgyud): bya tshul bstan pa'i le'u lce gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang snang ba dam pa'i 'khor la/ dang po'i rig pa'i dbyings bstan to// rig pa chos 'byung lus bka' stsal pa/ kye snang ba dam pa'i rig pa yongs su snang ba'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ gnyis pa ldang
4b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa/ gzhi ltung ba chen po'i rig pa 'di dag rnams ni blod ma 'ongagasal bar ba ste'o/ chos kyi sku'i snang ba ni/ gnas lugs chen po dang 'brel pa ste/ de yang gnas lugs chen po gcig la/ snang lugs bzhir 'char ba 'di lta ste/ rig pa dang chos nyid kyi gnas lus
4b4(rnying rgyud): naM/ yo la dag dkyil 'khor ltar gas nga la cher med du gnas pas/ ma rig pa'i rgyul ga nyid gcig dang na tsas sa pa da 'ad ga gag pa'i/ rkyen gyis ma bsgribs pa/ ka dag chen po rig brton med/ zhes bya ste/ yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas ma gyur/ 'dzid da kyi sog
4b5(rnying rgyud): bdag pa'i sems can ma byung ba'i gnas/ rig pa ma g.yos pa'i ye gdangs chen po zhes bya'o// de la brjod du med do// ye nas stong ngas// dpag tu med do// gtu bang thal la// dmigs su med do// lta ba tha ba dang la'as// gzhal bu med do// dmigs dang thal das/
4b6(rnying rgyud): brtsir med do// bskad da yangs// gang gis kyang gtan la mi phebs so// togs par dgang ba/ sog sbyin mtshon du med do// rig pa mchos med kyi/ shes pa'i yul du byar med do// des ni 'khor ba mi mthong / gtu 'dzin pa ma / 'khor bas de nyid mi mthong /
4b7(rnying rgyud): pamed pas/ des ni chos mi spyod do// sa das rgyas patshog khyod med papa/ chos kyis de'i don mi rtogs so// tshig min papa/ de ni 'khor ba min no// lung ba med pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa min no// dang po 'khor bar lhung pas/ gzhi min no// rtag pa ma yin pas/
5a1(rnying rgyud): sa// da pa // / bad 'dus / sa pa sa smras // sa
5a2(rnying rgyud): thob pa ma yin / // dan rig pa'i dbyings chen po zhes ca// da las ldan thob de pa che'i na pags zung gyi/ de rnam sa kyis satshas thams cad byung ba'i gzhigs kyi'o// des pa'i sa
5a3(rnying rgyud): mas ca thung po pazhis/ ye shes byung po mya / 'di byung / dang/ rig babyung byas pa dzin pa na man/ sa mas bye gas/ thags byung / yod pa yang rang 'byung / des ni dbu
5a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin sa rung ba med du/ da// thugs kar snang ba yod / chogs pas// la yod do/ gas/ nga pa ya nga/ sems yod de/ sa cad 'ad / yid med do// // 'bral pa sod /
5a5(rnying rgyud): bte/ ma 'bral pa yid / sa// thams cad 'byung bachen der// de na sangs rgyas dang / sums can gyi dbyings chen bzhes rgya'o// dalas la sa mra'i ljang lags byung sa/ de ni la ma mngon par snang ba'i gzhi zhes rgya/
5a6(rnying rgyud): gnog pa'i lag yangs pa/ g.yo ba'i bdag nyid dzin pa/ swalnga dang ldan pa/ ye zhes lnga dang ldan pa/ rigs lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dog lnga dang ldan pa/ 'od lnga dang / yabs dang / srim lnga dang / gzugs lnga dang / wA lha dang / dr-i wa dang /
5a7(rnying rgyud): dang / ras kya dang / sa pa dang / spang ba la dang / gci ba lnga dpa/ labar lda nga la dngam/ dbang bachen pa da ba man rtsa gzhis dang ldan pa/ dbathang pa bcad drud lda/ pa
5b1(rnying rgyud): de ni longs su'i sdang lugs de dang de las byung ba'i 'brel pa'o// de'i snang ba las rang bzhin sbrul sku'i snang ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba sbal pa sru'i sdang lugs dang / ma dag pa srul bsgyu'i sdang lugs chags so// de yang rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku ni/
5b2(rnying rgyud): ngo bo lhun grub las shar ba'o// rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku de'i snang lugs ni/ longs spyod mi zad pa/ 'khor mi zad pa/ yon tan zad mi shes pa/ stobs zad mi shes pa/ rtsal zad mi shes pa/ tshe 'phrul zad mi shes pa/ tshe'i tshad grangs med pa/
5b3(rnying rgyud): nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba/ gzhal yas khang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrogs pa'o// de ni rang bzhin sprul pa su'i ljang lugs zhes bya'o// de las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sprul pa'i sku byung ngo / de yang snga
5b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs snang ba la sna tshogs kyi don shes pa'o// snang yang rjes su ma chad pa'o// ldang yang rjes su mi zhen pa/ mig rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ snyan rnam par dag pa banga' ba/ shangs rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ ljags rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ su rnam
5b5(rnying rgyud): par dag pa mnga' ba/ gsung rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ thugs rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ thugs rje'i mdzad pa sna tshogs ston pa/ ye shes khyad par can mnga' ba/ mkhyen pa ma 'gags pa kun tu snang ba'o// de ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sprul pa'i sra'o//
5b6(rnying rgyud): de las ma dag pa'i 'a chags chags brtan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams chags so// de yang 'di ltar snang ba chen po ste/ gyi snong 'byung ba wa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa las/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / 'byung ba chen po nam mkha' srid do// de la 'dzin
5b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsam pa brjod kyis mi langs pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dang / khong khro dang drug go// de la 'gro ba rigs drug skye ba byung ngo // phrag dog las mi ru chags so// khong khro las lha ru chags so/
6a1(rnying rgyud): dartsal las la ma yin chags pa/ 'dad chags las mi dwags pa chags pa// gti mug las rgyal bar du chags so// zhasang las dmyal sna chags pa// de gzhon du gas tug gis snang bachags sa// dan
6a2(rnying rgyud): 'khar ba'i gnas pa// de yang gnas lugs chen po gcig lnga dang sa pa ma ga nag ljang lugs chen po bzhi cur byung ngo // gnas lugs bzhi las sdang thabs bzhi ltang ga / de nas ma thus pa'i sna ba'i gdor rjes/ mang pyod pa'i rig pa la
6a3(rnying rgyud): sras rba/ kye sdang ba'i thabs rnams gsung dugasol/ zhes zhus so// bka' rdul paM/ sdang thabs chen po bzhin/ ldan thub pas rdzardzogs pa ba'o// longs ska la kha mig na ba can 'od kyi rang bzhin lta ba'i bur gnas pa'o// yul
6a4(rnying rgyud): wal gzugs sbyar snang ba'o// sems can le na dang tha dad du byung nan// dI yang byams cad la snang ba snang thabs kyis bsgribs pa'o// kAs bapra shi sa mngan ldan dpa la nam mkha' med pa'i rgyud las/ gnas lpags dang spang lpags
6a5(rnying rgyud): ma sasu na sa
6a6(rnying rgyud): chos 'byur shes rab gyis bka' stsal pa/ kye maton sdig yang dag gsang pa'i yum/ don gyi thugs chen po rnams/ yang dag sangs rgyas mthar thug dang / dgongs pa'i don la mthar byeg dang / yang dag/ lba ba'i mthur thAka dang / mtshan ma tshig gi mthar
6a7(rnying rgyud): thug sa// e ma \u0f7f/ yang dag mthar thuka ngas bshad kyis// sdang ba dam pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sangs rgyas dkangs pa mthar thug ni// rig pa'i bzhag thabs nyid la thug/ dgongs pa'i don la mthar thug ni/ dbyings kyi smon ma nyid la thug/ yang dag
6b1(rnying rgyud): ltaba'i mthar thug ni// lu gu rgyud kyi sul thug/ mtshan mchog gi mthar thug ni// rang shar chen pa'i rgyud la thug/ rgyud rnams kun gyi mthar thug ni// sang ge rtsal rdzogs chen po dang // lag med pa'i rgyud la thug/ lung rnams kun gyi mthar thug ni// bdud rtsi
6b2(rnying rgyud): bral lhor lung chen dang // gsong bdabang rdzogs lung 'bu// yang gas zugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// nang bu dri ma med pa'i sra// yang dag mapar thug rdzogs pa'o// rtsem rnang mdad bral gyi rtag med nas// gsang rdzogs bdag pa lam-i hA// chos kyi
6b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med pas// sems can grol bsam mi khyab// gsang sngags nges don bsdus pa ni// gsang ba bcu bdun nyid du bstan// lha ba gsang rdzogs chen po las// gnyis med dag pa'i mkha' grong la// yang dag gter chen 'di gsungs pas//
6b4(rnying rgyud): sku dang mnyam par spyod// gsang ba rig pa'i sngar bstan pas// ka dag nyid dang lhan cig rkyod // sangs rgyas nyid kyi lha stangs ni// cog bzhag bzhi dang lhan cig sbyor// yang gas dathugs kyi me long ni// sngon ma nyid dang lhan cig sbyor// sangs rgyas
6b5(rnying rgyud): gru yi rgyan nyid dang // chen po lnga dang lhan cig rgyur// rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid pa// rtog pa'i rgyal po bsam mi khyab// lpagasum gsang sngags ma nyid las// chos su'i thig le nyag gcig la// bya byed med pa'i sku nyid las// mdzes pa'i
6b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsam me khyab// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes chen po// sku dang ye shes 'gag med pas// mtshon pa'i yi ge tshig las 'das// rig pa'i yul gnyis med do// sems can blol bsam yas shing // dgongs pa nyag gcig rang sangs
6b7(rnying rgyud): pas// bsam pa'i yul la sngar snang zhing // thog ma'i mgon po 'od dpag med// zhing khams dag pas sku gsum gsal// mgon po dri med dag pa las// 'od snang dag pa'i kha dog gsal// sru yi snang ba chen po ni// rang bzhin snang ba ma
7a1(rnying rgyud): 'gags pa// sa / ma 'gags pas/ na nga/ las sa// babral pa dang ba 'phru'adas// dpal ma sa rgyad sam las las// 'anga'
7a2(rnying rgyud): grang sa bsnam yasas// rga nas yang snang ba'i la khor 'thung ba'i sram da byas pas// 'di spyad sa gso m+ba ti// sa gas ba ga ng+gA'i mang bdag rme ga/ bdag ga nga ba dam pa'i rig sa rnams la/ yang dag pa sa zhes gsang ba dam pa rnams
7a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs shig/ yang bkang sprul pa// rig pa'i spang ba chen po 'di la// de dgas bcas nam mthong // grang thab 'ardzu na ma mthong nga// yid du bzung na zer zang // de'i phying na yang dag pa'i chos nyid lnga/ tsal ba thub kyis mtha' dang bral bar bstan pa'o//
7a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bkra shis mdzes ldan chen po/ dpal nam mkha' med pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mtha' gsang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang rig pa'i snang ba dam pa nyid/ ma bzhugs pa'i gdan las bzhengs nas/ rang gi snang ba chen po 'di sbas so//
7a5(rnying rgyud): gyi snang ba chen po 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la/ gsal 'gri ba med par zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la che chung med par zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la bden rdzun med par zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi
7a6(rnying rgyud): thugs la rtog pa med cing dran byed med par zung zhig/ kye rang bzhin gyi sdang ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste// chos kyi sku'i sdang ba la bsgrub tu med do// longs su'i ye shes la dpag tu med do// sbrul bu'i shes rab la brjod du med do// de'i phyir lugasum
7a7(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// oM maho/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid lags la 'grib med kyang / sems can la la rdul lugs bsam gyi ma thab ste/ reg pa nyid la thul bar rigis med pa ma yin no// 'khrul pa med kyang la thal bye
7b1(rnying rgyud): 'gags pas/ 'khrul ba ltar snang ngo // gsang ba 'don la chos med kyang / sems can gyi bral chos lar snang ba la/ reg pa'i ye shes nyid la la bul rtag du mar sdang bas rnams cud rjeng chas ltar snar bang // yang dag pa chos kyi su'i ldang btad pa
7b2(rnying rgyud): la g.yos bzhin du/ chos kyi pu'i ye shes kyi snang ba rnams/ mtha' ma 'gags pa'i spyod yul du mang ldang ba re/ yang dag pa'i chos kyi srubasam pa las 'das kyang / sems can dzam bsam pa dang bcas pas/ bsam parang kau ma'i khyod cing /
7b3(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i rjes su 'thung ba'o// yang dag pa'i thangasam pa'i dngas pas stong ste/ tha byed ky-i la bral pa dag pa'o// rig pa'i bu nyid sems can pa dang rdzus te/ 'byung ba'i sngar la gnas pas brnyan bye // ngan d+ha pa Sh+T+rI pan lags lan ma shAn
7b4(rnying rgyud): 'o// kun la bang po 'char zhing / dA la 'dra 'bral ba ba na// 'di kyi pa kyi tshul du 'chang zhing snang ba ma 'gags pa// kye mags sngags kyi mtha rang gi rig pa'i bu rnam par dag pa'o// tshas byams ched kyi mtha' di ma spyod pa'i rjod
7b5(rnying rgyud): na pa la rnyog po// blta ba thams cad kyim 3/ wA du zad pa'i sdang brgyas 'debs chen po la thugs/ dgangs pa thams cad kyimapa' de/ gzhom du med pa'i rang ra chen po la thug go// spyod pa thams cad mA d-i/
7b6(rnying rgyud): shrI bye nga bral ba la gas// thurnams ca tha man / wagA byed la thug ka// snang ba thams cad kyi mtha' ni/ yul zad pa'i gdang mtshan pa la thunag/ dam cheg blams myed kyimapa ni/ bsung du meng pa'i bsgru pa
7b7(rnying rgyud): chen po ma ldan to// dri la thapas rgya d-i/ bsgrub tu ba dpa'i grob pa chen pa sa 'azhig/ zag thathams cad kyi mang dum 'gyur bar yi sa rdzogs pa la thugs// dkyilal lar thams cad kyi pa du gyi 'i dbyings kyi smon mas
8a1(rnying rgyud): thug ga// yig 'bru thams cad kyi mtha' na/ ma brgyad pa'i rang byung chen pa la thug ga/ lha'i phra thams cad kyi mtha' na/ yangs pa nyid la rang byung ba la thugag// rdzas bu'i mtha' ni bsam pa mad cing rang dzag pa la thugag// yongs
8a2(rnying rgyud): spu'i mtha' ni/ rang gi snang ba'i phyogs sad pa la thug go// sbrul sku'i mtha' ni thugs rje'i go ma 'gags pa la thug go// kye ma lce shi med par srog 'dzin par 'dod na/ mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i sku longs shig/ 'gag pa med par rang grol bar 'dod na/ rang snang chos
8a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi yul la ltos shig/ lce 'grib med pa'i dgongs pa la gnas par 'dod na/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma la ltos shig/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yul blta bar 'dod na/ rig pa lu gu rgyud kyi spu zung zhig/ yangs pa sdang ba kun tu 'char zhing kun la snang ba'o//
8a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba legs / nang pa la mkhas pa/ rgyam gyi bu nga bzang pa la/ longs sru nga ba gas pad lta/ yul gri dab ba sa myur snang ba/ sangs khyen gyi rjel bu zla 'ang ba dang bcas par rigs dngas su'i chag dang
8a5(rnying rgyud): bcas pa 'di gsungs so// de yang thabs kyi snang ba dus gcig la rdzogs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdzogs pa chen po 'dir/ rig pa mngon sum la gzigs pa'o// thig le nyag gcig chos kyi sku'i ngang las ma g.yos shing / de'i
8a6(rnying rgyud): snang ba las kun gsal lo// thugs rjes thams cad 'dzin cing / dbyings su 'dzin par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba phal pa brgyal te/ snang mi rus pa'o// e ma ho/ sngon byung gi dus na sangs rgyas 'od srungs chen po zhes bya ba zhig la
8a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba chen po brgya stong dang ldan pa'i mchod rten/ shin tu brtsegs legs pa gsal ba/ mtho ba la srid pa'i rtse mor sleb pa la/ mu stong gsum 'jig rten gyi gyi 'gro yongs la khyab pa/ rtsa ba ni na ngag chen po'i dmyal ba'i khams la zug sa/ chung ba'i
8b1(rnying rgyud): ga la/ sa / da sas la/ sa nanan ma pa rjes su na/ san na smras/ gnas da su mas/
8b2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs kyis sodas patshad pa byas pas/ gang la yang ngas sgrub pa nang sa/ dang du se ma dang / gas pa nga dru ga ldeng tus 'du nas/ mched pa'i 'isdig gzhes nga drug sa las sa tsam so// shes
8b3(rnying rgyud): na dpal rnam pa 'a ma pa'i rgyud ldan pa las/ dbang pa dan d+ha/ dakhrul gzhi bstan pa'i phyi ma lda // / pag shes mangs san pa lan mamakha' bad pa'i skang kyi rgyal bajigs sa// rang \u0f7f/ phasarba/
8b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig/ slong girgya pa shA byan/ 'phrul ba na ma dras ci / bya shes su ma ldan la 'tha// thag shA dang/ sa
8b5(rnying rgyud): pa sa sa
8b6(rnying rgyud): sasu la // sa sa gangs 'a
8b7(rnying rgyud): du sun
9a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin rlung 'tshub pa/ lo danas/ mtshan bzhin me 'bar bden/ bcom ldan 'das thugs ni ba las mgayos cad smratha bar nga/ gzhon nu dpa' bo stobs ldan zhes bya bar phur sprul nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa khro bo phyag na rdo rje la sogs
9a2(rnying rgyud): tshochogs dang mkha' 'jom pa sogs te mkha' 'gror tshogs rnams la rgyud chen po gsang ba yang khol du lung ba 'di bshad do// ma rig pa cings pa las// don dgrol to// gsal bar byed do// snying gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od/ byin gyi don// rgyas par ston to// zhes bya ba'i wa nyid kyi sku 'khor rnams la/
9a3(rnying rgyud): lan gsum brjod do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos zhu ba zhus pa/ ngo mtshar bas/ e ma byams mgon bcom ldan thugs rje can// bstan pa'i snying po rgyud thams cad kyi nyid po// gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo'i cha lugs
9a4(rnying rgyud): ma na par phrul nas/ sa ma yagalas sa sa nas na pas/ mkha 'tha mthams cad me la za yin par bya// 'dzin kyi khams thams cid kyang ra kyis 'angs pa/
9a5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang / sarba mA chos thams cad sa tam pa nyid bye med pa po/ lam la a hU~M/ zhes brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de nas khro bo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa/ dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams kyis thabs cig tu 'di skad
9a6(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rang byung dbyings dri ba gsumadris so// nas 'od gsal bar gsung du gsol// a ti theg pa'i don du gsung du gsol/ rang rig bstan pa'i sgron ma mi byung ba gsung du gsol/ zhes dri ba gsum dris so// de nas spobs kyi bdag
9a7(rnying rgyud): posu rloms dang mi 'jigs pa/ bka' stsal pa// kyo rtse khro bdag chen po nyon// nga yi bstan pa thegs bsam me khyab// de rnams don chen 'dir rjen la gang gi kyang gnapa bas/ bshad legs par nyan/ dring da la rang byung dbyings nas 'odags pa rig pa'i grong // mgyes
9b1(rnying rgyud): gdod nas dag pa'i marig pa dang ga pa pag pa bdang / rig pa byang chub sems// skye med don ldan rig pa'i ye shes su/ dri pa nga gyu nga nas so// 'ja' chen lta bur jo rnga ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// tsi d+hi'i dkyil 'khor ti shi kyi na gnag / ye shes 'od du gsal// ye shes 'od 'phros mig
9b2(rnying rgyud): nas la ma byung zhing / rnam dag stong pa'i mkha' la nam mkha'adod snad nas/ ye shes 'od du brdal// stod gsal 'byed med stong pa gcig pur med gsal ba yod// dang du gnyis med thim/ ji gnyis pa/ a ti 'gyur med rig pa'i lta ba ni/ gcig la kun rdzogs tha dad du med/ tha snyad kun dang bral// @
9b3(rnying rgyud): ltad spangs na dang byung stong pa gcig por ma yi gsal par yod/ bde ba'i klong // gnyis med rtogs na bde chen a ti'i dang // theg chen don rtogs rig pa a ti'i ngang // gsang ljags don rtogs rig pa a ti'i ngang // ye shes don rtogs rig pa a ti'i ngang / rang ljang don rtogs rig pa a tI'i
9b4(rnying rgyud): dang / rje ba gsum lha/ rang rig bstan pa'i sgron ma 'di// bzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra// byang chub lam gyi sgron ma rang byung rang la tha ma/ mig nas sung zhing ting gi kyil gyi rig pa lajis/ dper na nyi bzhin 'gro ba yongs la khyab// tsi d+ha'i dkyil du gnas bcas mig nas la ma phung zhing
9b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes sgron ma stong nyid nam mkha' la/ rig pa mi gnas nam mkha' pa yo shes kyi spang ba sar shar ro// ye shes 'od phung nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bag chags sbubs la brten nas ye shes dbyings la spyod// ye shes sgron ma rang snang 'od po che// ye shes sgron ma bstan pa
9b6(rnying rgyud): kun gyi rtse// zhes bka' stsal to// yang zhus pa// e ma ho/ ngo mtshar gyi go nas thugs brtse bas sems can pa ran gad sa pa dang rang gi don rtogs par byed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan thugs rje can// rnam gsum dris lan de ltar na// don gyi snying po gsung du gsol// brjod med rnam dag
9b7(rnying rgyud): gsung du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ khro bdag chen pos bka' stsal pa// kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// nga yis nga la ston pa yin// legs par yid la gzung bar byos// snying po 'gyur med klong na rig pa rang byung gsal// snying po ye shes bu la gsal
10a1(rnying rgyud): 'thos yangs kyi pa// don kyi nga ba dgasas de ste// bran la mam pa'i nyi du gagatsug pa// brdud pas / sa pa pas tshogags pacan du meng // dag pa'i lags pa pa' man 'ad bas// dpadas
10a2(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal brjod me dang ma// dbyer med tshul gyis sems can yangs la gnas// e ma ng+ge/ rang byung ba ba'i wa// tshig gcig bstan pas don can go/ kha dag dkur da mar ma 'dres yongs su gsal// phrag cig bran la grub pas 'de ga zhen
10a3(rnying rgyud): snying po'i bu// 'gag med klong nas shes rab 'du gasngal ba// rtag par gter 'chang rang gi thug pa la gnas// gyad rten don 'grol gsang sngags A li kA/ yaM shes don stan gsang sngags rgyal po 'di// bran la dkon pa'i rin chen gter yin pas/
10a4(rnying rgyud): ga ldan pa sa da pa sa// zhes 'irgyal pa kyipaka' ba ni mi na sus rab do// ci rgyang bas nga kyi rgyal pa gsang bul pa pa ba/ dam pa pa dang byung gises ga sa
10a5(rnying rgyud): das yang nam nung sgyu ban mags dgu pa dzu shes byung gyupa / 'gram chen du la nas la gas pa ba 'di
10a6(rnying rgyud): ba sa / rdzun shA sa sa/ shA nags nga / sa klus
10a7(rnying rgyud): du 'chad/ theg par tsarnams gsung dugasum ma mams na mas ga sa/ zhes zus pa/ rdo 'ang nas mga'aphral ba// theg pa'i spo pas ma sa
10b1(rnying rgyud): dang nas sa na// sun na// na na du
10b2(rnying rgyud): na sa // la 'dus// de yang bshad lugs gang zhen// 'jig rten pa'i theg pa dang / lag sa sa rig sa na na zhing pas no// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa'o// dang rig brtson byas med// 'jig rten pa ni ga zhen// yi ge sa la 'dung
10b3(rnying rgyud): 'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yi ge ha zhes kun tu grags// lha dang mi yi theg pa bshad// de la yang ni rnam gnyis so// lag lhu dang ni yang dag ste// log lnga'i theg pa bas ma lus kyang // bsdus na rnam pa gnyis su 'dus// rtag lha dang ni rgyang lgang
10b4(rnying rgyud): rtag par lta ba'i grub mtha' ni// rgyu rtag 'bras ze 'gyur bar hA// kun rtag pa theng zug la// 'bras thug nas gabus 'gyur ba'o// da yang migs la rdzogs// chad par lta ba'i thub mtha' ni// rgyu ni chu'i lu ba bzhin// blo bur dag tu 'dod pa la/
10b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu stong pa phyal chad do// 'jig rten rgyang par lta ba ste// dA l-I'i lus 'di bor nas ni// lus ni 'byung ba'i bag lnga zha// sems ni nam mkha'i bag la zha// cang med stong pa phyal chad do// de yang yi ge da la rdzogs// lha mi 'jig
10b6(rnying rgyud): pa byed lnga'o// yang dang/ lta ba la yang rnam gnyis so// de yang ye ga gnyis la 'dus// yAM ga gnyis po gang zhe na// yi ge ma dang la 'dus// rgyu yi theg pa dang drung ni// gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa'o// mtshan nyid la yang rnam gsum /
10b7(rnying rgyud): de yang yi ge rnam pa gas ma// yi ge ba dang ca dang ni// yi ge la la rdzogs pa'o// nyan thos pa yi thub batha' ni// 'jug pa'i sgo ni bden bzhi'o// bsrung ba'i tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcwa yis// log pa'i blta ba dag las yang dag 'phags/
11a1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i lta ba gang zag bdag med chos la bdag ni yod par 'dod/ bden bzhi sdug bsngal sun 'byung 'gog pa lam bden / bsgoms pas 'bras bu rnam bzhi lan cig phyir dong ba phyir mi 'ong ba dgra bcom pa rang byung ba/ thob// sdug bsngal
11a2(rnying rgyud): spang bar 'dod cing 'gogs pa bsgrub par 'dod// kun 'byung spang bar 'dod cing lam la mngon par gnas// nyon mongs spangs shing sa lam bsgrub par 'dod// de la rnam pa gnyis su ste// bye brag pa dang mdo sde pa// bye brag pa yi lta ba ni// phung po khams
11a3(rnying rgyud): dang bye mched la// g.yag rnga ni dru gseng tshul du 'dod// mdo sde pa lI lta ba ni// kha rton byas pa'i rang bzhin dang // thos bsam byas pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sa brgyad 'bras bu thob par 'dod// rang rgyal mdo rje'i theg pa ni// 'jug pa'i don rten
11a4(rnying rgyud): ba ta pa// te smra brjes 'ams// hrI hU~M gas pa bdag sa pag pa gas// 'du thugs gtan po mi nag ma na pa sa// dag sa ma da/ ma ga // dusan
11a5(rnying rgyud): par brtse ba ni// rang rig rang gsal rnam pa'o// semamatsham pa// spyod nyid ring bzhin med par blta/ dbum pa/ lhong nyid ma 'gags so sor gsal bas 'phags// bden gnyis tshul gyi rnam pa can// don dam dang ni kun rdzob po// stong pa rtsal chad ma yin te// stong pa
11a6(rnying rgyud): dzadakyis gsal bar brnam// stong pa'i tshul me gnas tshig gis mtshan du med// rdo rje theg pa nam gnyis po// phyi bathub pa rgyud kyi theg pa dang // nang pa thabs kyi gung du gsungs// de yang yi ge rnam pa gnyis// sha dnga' la 'dus pa'o// byib pa yang
11a7(rnying rgyud): nam gsum mo// pri ya u pa yo ga gsum// de yang yi ge gsum du 'dus// yi ge gsum po gang zhe na// yi ge ha dang shed nga ni// ka la yang dag rdzogs pa'o// pi lo'i theg pa'i grub mtha' ni// 'jug pa'i sgo ni dag pa gsum// khrus dang gcang sgras 'jug
11b1(rnying rgyud): papa// lha mi dkyil labar gsal bas 'phags// sa s+yang gnyis med lnga dang rdo khol blta// bsrung ba 'i dam tshig gang zhe na// lung gcig rdul ma thung bsrung // rtogs pa'i lta ba gang zhe na// lha dang badzad ma dkris par rtogs// 'bras bu bcugartsig par /
11b2(rnying rgyud): la 'byung med gnas par rtogs// u pa ya ni gang zhen// rjod 'byel ga zur rjod// zhab log bstabs 'phags// decing gnyis med rnyed kyis theg pa zhes kya dpags// yi ga'i blab mapa gang zhen// 'jug pa'i ldan pangan pa
11b3(rnying rgyud): chub wa// rtogs pa'i lta ba lba dang gnyis med rtogs// bzung ba da mtshig gang zhen// mkhrel rnam pa gsum po bsgyud// ma khrel rnam gsum ga zhe ni// slob dpon ma ched kyis mkhrel dang // paMd ma l+ya yis mkhral dang // rang gi sems kyis
11b4(rnying rgyud): zhal ba'o// byang chub lnga po gang zhe na// gdan gyi sgo nas byang chub dang // su yi zho nas byang chub dang // gsung gi sgo nas byang chub dang // thugs kyi sgo nas byang chub dang // pa byed pa'i sgo nas mngon par byang chub pa'o// de dang 'du 'bral
11b5(rnying rgyud): med pa rtogs pa'i don gyis 'phags// gnyis me de ngang pas lha yi tshe 'phrul byung // nang pa'i chud la rnam gsum ste// de yang yi ge rnam gsum mo// AM dang AHhUM la rdzogs// mA hA yo ga'i theg pa ni// 'jug pa'i sgo ni ting 'dzin rnam kA
11b6(rnying rgyud): skye// chos can lha yi dkyil 'khor dag tu rtogs pas 'phags// bsrung ba'i dam tshigartsa ba su gsung thugs// ting nge 'dzin ni rnam gsum ga zhen// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin ni// ye shes stong nyid brdal bar bsam// kun du sbyar ba'i ting 'dzinani
11b7(rnying rgyud): snying rje gsal la ma yengs bsgom// rmyi yi ting 'dzin rdzogs bsgom// de yang sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgom// lu gsung thugs kyi dmachog ni// sku yi sgo nas ma byin len dang srog gcod spang bar bya// gsung gi sgo nas sun dang thal zhi ga tsang
12a1(rnying rgyud): chag ma lba// gas sku 'tshal bar mi snang gsang sngags zabs kyis btsa'// thugs kyi sgo nas brnabasams gnong sams log lnga spang bar bya// rngardza sgrub dpa nathugs kyang dkrug/ ma bya// mchad dang lha mnga' sran mo phyung /
12a2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab 'dra 'bral med par 'khyer// bco lnga rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'bras bu thob// dper nas gzhi lta bu'o// lung chen a nu yo ga'i grub mtha' ni// 'jug pa'i sgon cig chang rim gyis so// rtogs pa'i zla ba 'du 'bral med pas
12a3(rnying rgyud): 'phags// bzung ba 'dam chog nam gnyis ma skyes bsrud// theg char 'jug pa gang zhe na// snying po dran pas lha rnams ma bskyed rdzogs// dbyar na chubarngu pur rdul ba'i tshul du'o// rim gyis 'jug pa gang zhe na// dbyings dang ye shes rim gyis grangs
12a4(rnying rgyud): nas ni// 'bras bu brgya drugs la gnas// dam tshig rnam gnyis gang zhen// gsang sngags don rtogs rtag tu bkur bar bya// khams gsum sems can nyid rje'i lhan thagagacad mi bya// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa nas// ma rnyed nor bungan
12a5(rnying rgyud): chen snyer mdzad pa// rdo rje slob dpon rtag tu bkur bar bya// dper na yid bzhin nam mkha' lta bu'o// zhes rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis bka' stsal to// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan theg chen bdag/ theg pa brgyad kyi grub mtha' de
12a6(rnying rgyud): wA na// ata theg pa gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas// rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa// dI dris pade legs so// nga yis khyod la gastan par bya// ma yangs gus pa'i sems kyis nyon// rdzogs chen a ti'i grub mtha' ni/
12a7(rnying rgyud): daci rdzogs can rdzogs tha snyad kun dang bral// dam tshig bsrung du med pa'i phyal ba lhun krung gcig pu nyid// gteng nga pag dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral// 'gyur ba med pas dran par gud la thab// dusar med la rtag gcig dan
12b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog/ kun bral nyag gcig cing yang med pa'i 'odags la bde ga'i sku// zhes gsungs so// yang zhus pa// kye ma thugs rje'i bdag po/ bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum gyi don gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus sa// yang bka' stsal pa/
12b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa nyan cig/ nga 'das pa'i 'og tu ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la 'di skad stan cig/ bskyed pa ma hA yog ni/ chos thams cad kyi gzhi lta bu'o// phyogs pa A nu yog ni chos thams cad 'i lam lta bu'o// rdzogs pa chen ma a \u0f7f yos ni
12b3(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi 'bras bu lta bu'o// de'i phyir na bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum 'du bral med pa'i don yi ge gsum chis shes par bya ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ dz+dza AHhU~M gsum gyis shes par bya'o// de'i phyir nangs gsal bar bstan gyis yid la Ta
12b4(rnying rgyud): zhig/ skye 'gag med pa'i AM ni rang la yod// ste shi med pa'i AHni bdag la mchis// 'du 'bral med pa'i hU~M gcig bdag la mchis// yi ge med pa'i rgyud gcig bdag la mchis// bstan du med pa'i lung gcig bdag
12b5(rnying rgyud): la mchis// rang rig la 'byed man ngag bdag la mchis// ye shes snying po blon mngod po che/ zhes theg pa drug gi don theg pa gsum shes par bya'o// yi ge drug gi don yige gisum du shes par bya'o// ma 'ongs po sems can rnams la bskyer
12b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rnam gsum gyi don gyis kyung grol bar gyis shig/ sems can thams cad rang la yi ge 'bru gsum du gnas par gyis shig/ de yi rtser na bsgrub pa mahA yogs gzhi dang sngar te bshad/ lung a nu yog nam mkha' dang sbyar te bshad/ mam ngag
12b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po nyi zla dang sbyar te bshad do// don gyi snying po gtan la 'bebs brgyad 'dis shes par bya'o// zhes drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsang ba'i bdag po la theg pa'i don bkrol te bstan pa'o// zhes gyad thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang bzhal thon tu
13a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i rgyud rdo rjesems dpa' lhang gam yangag kyang chen po las/ zag pa'i rim pa ltab bsdus te bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos zhu ba khrus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
13a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das myangan las 'das pa' dzag / sems can thams cad 'dzid btsun pa / zhes zhus ma// rgyu ba phrul po 'jigs pa gtugs can gyis bka' phrul pa/ e maH// dzin chenapa
13a3(rnying rgyud): ngas bshad kyis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par nyon/ khams gsum gyi sems can 'di dag thams cad ni/ dang po gzhi ci yang ma yin pa las cir yang 'khrul lo// gzhi dang po stod pa/ rang bzhin gyis gsal ba/ thugs rje sems can la snang nus
13a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de nas nang 'dzin byed kyi shes pa ma reg pa'i cha las byung bzed tsam dgyus pa las/ shes pa spun pos pha gi las 'byung ngam/ nga las phag byung snyam pa'i shes pa byung ba tsam gyis 'khrul lo// ma rig pa de gzhi la med de/ nyams sam rmi lam
13a5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa la yod // snang na na ma papa las pas rkyen rnams thung ngo // gzhi 'ad khyim gyis dz+wal du gnas pa las/ zhwa'i rtser zhes tha ste marig pang ngas so// de la N+Do gang snong du mang bas bdag pa'i sbyin zhes bya'o// de la yul yul can du bca
13a6(rnying rgyud): bas/ dmigs pa'i rkyen zhes bya ste/ dper na me long la byes bu'i byad bstan pa lta bu'o// de gsum dus mtshungs pas mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o// de rang gi gzhi yin pa la rang gis ngo ma shes te/ 'khrul nas khams gsum 'khor ba gru ba
13a7(rnying rgyud): pa/ de nas nyan mangs pa rags sra song nas/ sems can gyi gzugs tha dad du b+h+yo // gzhad lta bra las 'khrul l-i// zhes gsungs so// de nas mkha' 'gro ma tshogs nag mo snying zan ma dang / zan b+h+ya dang / zad pa'i thang ba ca
13b1(rnying rgyud): dang / mthung mthun paHn+tu/ snyi khrag 'jib ma la lags rten ma mkha' gang ba'am mang chags rnams kyis thabs cig tu 'ang skad ces gas la to// gzhing rnam pa ga gsus ma can nam la gang dag gshes pa mamam gangs na /
13b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ a maho// klong bdag chen mo rnams nyon cig/ 'jig rten khams kyi sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang rdzas su yod do// de yang til 'bral mar gyil khyab pa bzhin du gnas so// de yang
13b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi phung po la brten no// gnas ni snying gi dkyil na gnas te/ de yang kun tu bzang bag bu kha sbyor gyi dgongs pa zhes bya ste/ dper na bso'i gzhu kha sbyar ba bzhin du gnas pa'i nang na 'od kha dog lnga'i dkyil nas/ zhi ba'i spes
13b4(rnying rgyud): 'bru tsam la po// khyim gyi sadz+ra du gnas so// dza dadag pa'i gnas sa// dper na byam pa'i wa lta bu'o// de las byung ba'i ye shes ni/ gnas pa klang pa'i dung khang gi nang nag nas so// dpang gro 'a bru yungs 'bru tsam la spyan phul thag tsal du ga na
13b5(rnying rgyud): de yang 'od thar ci tshul du gnasas// de las byung ba'i 'od ni me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar gsal la dngas pa'am/ dper na nya'i mig ltar 'od zur du gnas so// de dang rig pa'i 'brel pad snying ge rtse nas pa ba ca ra dkar gyi sA la matsam skal
13b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi 'dab nas yang yod de/ de nas la ma du chung das mga' nang du 'jug sa/ rtsa re yang rtswan chung gis g.yas nas thun nas klang pa dang 'brel lo// gA sngagasus gso dang grod nas mi gang bral la// da yang na pa mkha' la mig bathog
13b7(rnying rgyud): na// dag la pa dngas semal pa she ga/ sas sangasa'al bas dngas kyi di na sa pa // sam // sems pa rnams par dang 'a pa ga
14a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa /
14a2(rnying rgyud): sa
14a3(rnying rgyud): du lus
14a4(rnying rgyud): das na nga/ 'a 'a
14a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa nga/ da mas 'dus na sbyin ni/ rnas shAs pa pa 'a rnye sna margya yin / zung ma
14a6(rnying rgyud): na su
14b1(rnying rgyud): mkhyab par 'ab nga bcas te/ maba' rgyal ba la la na gsam thur bzlas na/ 'dis cas gas sa ta// badz+rag nas nar bral thub bcam / \u0f7f/ zhes brjod nas yang zhu na/ mamaH// mthags rdarjer par dum nga pa gar gang
14b2(rnying rgyud): sems can dbang po gags pa la/ ji ska zar lugs bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus pas/ stobs kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ e ma ti// gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams dan cig/ brgya ngan las 'das pa'i 'ag ba nas/ sems can bag
14b3(rnying rgyud): chags sa pa rnams la 'di skad ston cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ rig pa gzhi nas 'phags te lam du 'dug pa rdo shes par bya ba'i che dung po do rtogs gsum gyis ro smad la sogs te/ jo sdod te shu rtsa gcig shes pa
14b4(rnying rgyud): kya / gangams pa g.ya' 'am rgya mtsho las byung ba'i man shel dri ma med pa zhig skar khrang gi ldang ba la phyar nas bltas na 'od khadag lnga lkug par 'char te/ 5/ sa thams da pa / de yang segs sa
14b5(rnying rgyud): sa pa ma na pa dang ga shad da da pa ya ma dzes sul das // gang zhen/ kha dag mthang gang bdakar po dang / mang pa dang / dmar ba dang / ljang grul// man shel gzig rjes su 'dug pa'i gang zag na'i mig g.yas par lanam
14b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas pas bzang te/ rig gi nying du zhwagan ldang ba mthong ba pa gyur ro// lag pa g.yod pas mugs yon pa dag pa par gyur// 'anir po ra spa ba// ngan bzhin du dadag snying ga bye na gnas ma// drin nan kyang spadang// rtags bye sbed ni rang gi ma
14b7(rnying rgyud): mos mag mnan na/ 'od kyi thig le nying mig 'a khur 'char ro// do na rtags kya sma da ra// chos kyi srung ro skrod ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khar la spad do// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ing spang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spangs la bris pa rang gi mdun du bzhag ste/
15a1(rnying rgyud): mag gagar du bzhug nas gnapa 'angal bsas/ ma nga rdzags gru sag pa nam nang bar // gan dusas su rdzogs pa byung ba 'ams pa ma la 'char ba shes par byas shog/ ma
15a2(rnying rgyud): na/ chos pan rgyanam nga bar dag ga pa dun pa oM hA/ / rtog pa shes sa 'o das par byas na/ la
15a3(rnying rgyud): ci gargyang pabs kyis spang b.rang grags sa 'cha ba 'di gyu d+ha/ gnas la shes kyi rlung 'grub du la prA ga nyis gnasangs/ lam de nyis sa pa da khyer na yod pa'i bdud rgyas pamag gnyis 'gag tu gzhug sa// mam
15a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis bzhag pas ma dga' khrul pa'i snang ba 'di 'gags sa// rdo'i tshongs ma na bar snang ba 'gyur ro// blon po btson du zin no// blon mo btson du zin nas// khyi thun sgor byung // lci rkun skor kyang bas rgyal bgangan la bzhugs ma// rgyal pa
15a5(rnying rgyud): gdan la bzhugs pas/ ye shes rtog mer dragasal mo// rtog med du ngos zin pas ches srung nga lpags phrag rnas so// chos su'i drad la bzhag pas 'khrul snang dag rdzang dri 'thar ro// dachar mo gang nas 'char na/ nam mkha'i mthongs khu ga gnas
15a6(rnying rgyud): 8// de 'ang char zhugs pasum du zer ro// sangs rgyas ldan bams rnas par dag par ra ba dang / zhing 'ams de'i thog pa theg za dung zar ba dang / tshwa me bu gang 'chang bang / rgyamabul gnyis te/ zhing khams byamam thar 'thar bangs
15a7(rnying rgyud): srung tshas bur 'char ba'o// spu'i tshomabu 'char ba la gsum ste/ lu ma shang rung chang ba dang / bgrags tshul caska bzhugs nas 'thar ba dang / lu mdog can par ba ro// dang 'ams chomagron lnga ldan 'chang // su bar 'char ba ni rnams
15b1(rnying rgyud): gcig phur yang 'char ro// 'od dpag med gcig pur yang 'char ro// rigs lnga 'gre'o// mang bar 'char ba ni/ rigs lnga dus gcig la yang 'char ro// yu ma gra ste bcu ru yang 'char ro// bcu ga cig bco lnga la sogs par yangang char ro// bkrugs rtsal na/ longs
15b2(rnying rgyud): kha mig rna ba can me long gi gzugs brtan ltar snang la rang bzhin med pa la/ nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon ltar ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pas/ me long la nyi ma shar bltar gsal la rtog pa med pa/ gangams khri dang / dbu kun dang / phyag mtshan de shapa thams cad
15b3(rnying rgyud): ma sa sargyu da pa 'ang bas kyad sardzung sa dpa nga sa sa zhi du 'jugs pa nga/
15b4(rnying rgyud): dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / wang gu ste/ kha dog lnga ldan du 'char ro// sems can dang byung ba rnams la rdo slod gsum byas na de bzhin du 'char ro// rdo skrod byas nas de'i don nyams spu grangs pas rtogs pa'i don yang 'thal sdang thams cad pa
15b5(rnying rgyud): skad du 'chang/ ngag sna thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i su kha mig na ba can gyis gang nas dang la 'char ro// de rnams bdun po ni 'od kyi rdo sprad ces bya'o// ye shes kyi ro slod gang zhe na/ chos dbyings kyi ye shes rdo sprad ni mkhar gnong gi bcud la
15b6(rnying rgyud): pasnye mkhar gzhong legs pa'i nang du chu dang sems bkang ste/ mig go nigazugs la byed gyi me long bzhag na/ thig le dang thig phran gyi tshul du 'char te/ de las kyang 'od zer mtshon chang rtse mo bzhin du 'brun/ da ni chos kyi dazengs kyi ye shes kyar spong
15b7(rnying rgyud): mthor wA ru 'i ye shes kyi spo ga na naM/ ma long gnyis kyi bar du rdal tshon gyis dkyil 'khor ze ste/ pha rang gram tshur 'gram gnyis su mo long nge gzugs te/ de la bltas na sdang ba gnyis 'char ro// don mo long lta bu'i ye shes kyar spo do// mnya
16a1(rnying rgyud): pat+tA tu ba shas kyang sgra dag bad/ sung thab la sa 'drang // don mnyam pa tud kyilo shes bya bla dang/ bas can kra gas byu grang / mang ma la sa thang nga// da rnams ga pang banas kya dang // bya 'brub
16a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyi sprod ni/ man shel dri ma med pa la ngos bzung ngo // don bya ba grub pa'i ye shes bya slong // mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod ni/ nam mkha'i khams kyi 'ja' chen la ngos bzung ngo // don mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi'o spod do// yongs su rdzogs
16a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye zhes kyi spyod na/ nam mkha' sprin med la ngos bzung ngo // bdun po ye shes kyir bla // da ni rig pa'ing spong bstan pa ni/ rig pa gzhon nu bum pa su 'jo skad na/ mi gos dkar dmar kha dog sgra tshogs gyo napa gcig bdag gi mdun du bzhag na
16a4(rnying rgyud): mig gi steng du rin po che zhag ste/ mig nam mkha' la btags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i bu mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ni rig pa gzhon nub mo sku'i ngo stod ngo // ga pa gzhong du stobs ldan gyi po blod na/ khyim mun pa nag por mgos nag sa
16a5(rnying rgyud): pa rang gi bdun du gzhag nas/ gong gi ltar bltas na de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i su mthong bar 'gyur ro// denani rig pa dpa' nga stobs ldan gyi spong ngo // rig pa gzhi gnas rtse ro spod na/ rgya mtsho drangs pa la ngos bzung / de ni gzhi gnas
16a6(rnying rgyud): ga pa kun rtsagasal ba'ong slad ni/ nyi ma dang zla ba la ngos bzung ngo // de ni rig pa bar rtagasal ba 'dzi spyod do// rig pa gnyis de byer spyod na/ bum pa'i sbal dzes bzung ngo // den rigs gnyis maud gyur rmang // rig pa dri ma dang bcas pa
16a7(rnying rgyud): kyis bslang pa khril sa nga // dngo ga padris dang bcis padza sbed // rag pa ci yang ba gnas pa ldad ni/ mig par ldang pa bzlas gas shes pa bya// ra ga pa la mi gnas pa srung // nga gyu
16b1(rnying rgyud): rig pa ma sla dang // de kar nyi shu rtsa gcig rdzogs nas rigs kyi bu de mya ngan las 'da' ba'i blo/ rig pa mi gnas pa ma byung nas bar do'i sdang ba la 'dug go// de yang gang zhe na/ zhag lnga 'das par 'og tu rang gzugs gnas thugs rda'i thag pa zhes
16b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes mthong ba zhes kyang bya/ rig pa'i cod phur zhes kyang bya ba/ 'od zer phra brta rnga'i cha tsam zhe gzeng gis 'ong ste/ de'i dus su bag chags kyi sbubs med kyang yod pa snyam 'ong bas/ mig nam mkha' la btegs te bltas pas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'od
16b3(rnying rgyud): bu lnga ga zas le mthong ste/ de'i dus su yid ches pa ma'i par du bu 'jug pa lta bu'i gdams ngag dran par gyis shig/ mi 'gyur ba gser gyi zur ma lta bu'i gdams ngag dran par gyis shig/ de nas rig pa 'od kyi tshem bu la thim nas 'gro ste/ de'i dus su phyir mi
16b4(rnying rgyud): rdzog gang pag chen gyi mda' lta bu'i gdams ngag dran par gyis shig/ de nas brtan pa zob ste/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig nas sprul pa'i lha byin rus pa'o// phyi nang gsang gsum gyi dbang rdzogs pa rnams la de bzhin du byos shig/ sA ga m-i sa sa/ sarba d+harma/ 13
16b5(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod nas/ spyan ldog pas thugs ka nas 'od zer gyi phung po lnga 'phros te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang bar mdzad de yang 'di skad zhes bklags so// sarba d+harma a pa ma ka ma de ni zhu ba la 'dim ya/ oMHs+t+wa~M/ skye med pa da sas gas grags
16b6(rnying rgyud): de nga nga thag sa me ba// blo rgya ti pa na dgag med pa cir bzhid/ spru la ni nga tha masas ma me dang be she ga ba dang // sngo rje ba pal / sa brtsams sna pa'i ne'u pA rdzas 'di na rmA yA/ jis sa kyis dang sa
16b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ mA hU~M 'i gnasasam pa gang ba sa sa dpang da yo // b+h+rU~M kyi bur na med pa nas cig gapapa dang ma khes // A A bamed pa bye dang shag med kyi sa des pa ga nga te/ b+h+rUM A nyid dag shes gas rje a A hU~M khyem dang yang thegs
17a1(rnying rgyud): rgyun na sa na sa
17a2(rnying rgyud): bka'aphrul te// da nas yang gas pa'i bdag pa langags teg du sbyin pe 'ab dang gaHsa dang ga zed pa cig tu byas te/ zas cig tub la pa byung da bad pa/ ma / bcom ldan pas napa rjo da dpag med/ 2 mnapa
17a3(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'as byu gnyen cigs gcigs nga bam/ ma ga zu 'ams 'angs la ba dang / sa nga gas la byu pa 'gas/ das nga bshA tshul ba/ ba dus pa la nam k+Sha n+te/ pas
17a4(rnying rgyud): das 'arjog/ pa/ du gsus // 'ag ba ga
17a5(rnying rgyud): da lta thu 'das pa dang mdzangs pa rnams kyis kyang tron nas shang / zhes brjod nas mi nang pa nga drug shegs pa// zhes rgyud rkyen brje zas pas dpe' zhing gi ma lo gsang ba'i rgyud ces rbab/ gabapa mngon du spang ba bstan pa las/ gnas phrag stsa
17a6(rnying rgyud): gas lpags pasha pa'i lung shegs sa/ n+d+he/ de ma padrug sangs 'dab gnas pa las/ de rnams kyi nang nas gas pa'i 'dug pa lags 'dzin pa chathapas 'ad yar ces gso
17a7(rnying rgyud): drug sngal kyis na pa la ba rnams pa/ ma che ma dzin pa// thas pa'i thu cig bar rnams pa ban dunapa la// brnas pa sa bani langs/ #
17b1(rnying rgyud): ma ma sgrub sang la yang na pa sa dAnas/ shA shA da bas zugs na snyan smra pa 'gasas bathu na/ gas nga snang ga du/ sa /
17b2(rnying rgyud): rnams cad 'ang la sprul nas bzhugs pa// ma mang dag nang sbyin gyi ba rnams cang drug sngal can pa'i setha' par gyud to// denas 'bar rnamam kyi nang tsas gsolato// rtsen+da bcos pa rje 'chang / da za rgyags
17b3(rnying rgyud): sa rnam pa/ ma mas cing/ nga gyung la pa byed pa da / ga 'dre pa
17b4(rnying rgyud): ce mas pa da/ ngan bral bags pags pas / lan mas/ ra kyi na gang rgyud kyi sum/ mi gyung sa du ga pa shA nga bang ngas
17b5(rnying rgyud): pasgrub gas// ga'anam rtag pas la bsams dpa rnya sa rmums rnams kyid / byung ma da gyus zlas/ ga gyigs ga phrul nas du
17b6(rnying rgyud): don can mabyon par 'gyur ba'i phyigadrug bzhed legs par mi lda / sa nyid kyi med pa/ chen 'i gas// rgan gyi ya spros pa med migs shig// mthas byas nu gag su~M la rdzogs/ zlal 'des par ma thob migs 'dzin
17b7(rnying rgyud): lag/ ma dzin la m-ig nas mig 'o// 'gyung rmang gang pa'i dang las yig 'byung zhing // 'gag mad rtog zal lo ga 'a 'dzugs// skye medang nas gas med mi ge' ma pa na mas/ 'jigs// sgrib dadabang drang tshu
18a1(rnying rgyud): na 'du ma pas d+d+haN+Da yang ngas rdzogs/ na na na na ga yang lan gag tang dgas
18a2(rnying rgyud): sgyu pa pas 'jigs
18a3(rnying rgyud): grol mdzad lag sha 'digs // nga 'das la gnas par byed pa migs/ gagasags rla bangs thar zang pa las lam // sa rnams bzod med lagasu ladzAs/
18a4(rnying rgyud): sa 'dra lhun gyis zug rnas pod yir 'gyur med ngang la gnas byed sa 'di gsang // yi ge ma ni chos nyid 'gyur gzhi mchis ga la she na byas so pa'i gter// rig pa ma bcos yi ge ma yi dang / da sta yang mang po gapa gcig las ma ngas sa// kun gzhim bcos ye
18a5(rnying rgyud): ge ma bag cams kyi bang po la dag pa yod pa na/ yingang la rdzogs// gsang sngags don rtogs yi ge mtsho thaman men pa 'di gsang // yi ge drug gnon rtog/ rig pa rtags pa byed pa'i ngas gsang sngags rgyud cher 'tshal// yi ge drug gi don la gnas pa'i skyes bu rtsa
18a6(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das// rtogs byed rgyal po yi ge thugs rje 'byung ba'i mig sgra 'gyur drug/ gsang sngags thams cad thugs rje me nasangs rgyas me 'i phreng yi ge drug la rdzogs// zhes yi ge drug gi don ston pa sa dang zhes rab 'dra 'bral med pa 'dod bka' stsal to// de
18a7(rnying rgyud): nas yang gas pa'i bdag pas 'dig kyis gso to// rtse gro btsam 'ang rdo 'chang // yig 'di bya rang ste da// dbang ga byas te/ sung du gsol// nas blangs// don 'phang gas bka' phral pa// a mnyan na bdan pa nyan/
18b1(rnying rgyud): dar larna pa pa gsum 'a nga // drug na sa dang byam gas pas rnams kya pas pa ma thams gyi dang nang dang gsang pa'// byin rdul chas tha pa du // shAn sa sa sa ma ma
18b2(rnying rgyud): gzhin // khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang // rin chen rdzas ba bzhing nas dang man shel dang // chog mchod pas mdzes pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi yi// dreg ni gzhung dang mthun par gang ba// sa tshon lnga lda sa gyi grwa/ 'bru lnga bskyed/ 'od ldang tatas/ dbus su mthing nag grwa gsum
18b3(rnying rgyud): ge// mam pho pra zlum po gre// de yi phye rim 'khor lo tshogs bkyang ldan// pa ny+tsarare khA rtsikA pa lA/ ye she sa rnga'i rtags/ mun pa'i ba dan dag dang ldan// gru chad ljang bu sgo bzhi dag dang ldan// phyi ri ma zlum po rdo rje'ir bar nag po dag po// bcas/ dbyengs kyi rtags/
18b4(rnying rgyud): gru gsum steng bu grod rtsA so gnab cad nag po babod pa gyes pazer ba'i po la med pa'i ning ba ka'i sa bcan/ gsum bzhig ste// thod pa'i nang du sha khrag sna tshogs blugs la bzhag rmi dang gicom lum pa'i rtags// zla ga ma gsum gyi steng du bkra shis bum pa gsum/ rang du shes dung ri mchog
18b5(rnying rgyud): nga nang du ldan sna tshogs blugs la/ dar dmar pos mgul chings bya'o// 'a ya rdza bam rkyen gas/ rtsi bas brgyad steng du khwa mchog sems sa sa kya nga 'dzad pa ha/ gapa brgyad bzhag/ grwa chad tshigs na nang dgas snyed du rin chen ba banyi rdzas cu
18b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ me long lnga ye shes thaM rtags dang rma gya lnga 'od ji ji rtags gzhag par bya// de yi sgrub thabs bzhin du shes par bya// rdzas kyi dbang rnams// dang 'o bum pa nas rim bzhin bsrur// bskur pa'i gnas ni tshangs pa'i bu ga'o// de ltar gyi nang gi dakhang
18b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas// gsang pa'i dbang gsang bag na cigs dpas la 'jug par bya'o// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa la/ thabras ma cha da da/ yid jo tshand 'thang po 'das pa ma pa dab pa/ mig dpar dag mad pa/ pau nyi pras gcig na pa/ ba 'bres pa/ skyes pa dang baphrad pa/ yang dpe rdza ba rnamapa/
19a1(rnying rgyud): pamamatha dpa'// nas sa pa ga brjod/ bgasagadus bcad dpag/ bung ma na nadab ba/ sathags pa/ 'tham rab/ shadag ga/ drang ba/ ngan byal da// bag gsum dang gtong man/ blang thab bgan tugs par ra// gsang ba dkar dam
19a2(rnying rgyud): 'dres pade// me long mchags mags pas// d+hus te sa nga ge slob pa la sa dag 'a / dka dbangagasuM ma rdzogs nas ni// gang du bstan pa dag / gdams ngag gdabapang bya/ rgyas sa ba
19a3(rnying rgyud): ga gas pasa'o// dbang rdzogs rnal 'byor su gsum nges pa ri'i'agrib// gsang sngags don mtshon dbang gis skal bar bya/ ba nga na 'gas gas ya ngas sa bajud // dbang mchog mthob bcod pa dpa dpa 'byong mi dper na mnyan pa lag tu med pa bzhin/ pa grol ba sa
19a4(rnying rgyud): ga 'gas sad
19a5(rnying rgyud): dag nyis mas yo ba ngags ma tanas cad pa na// gsang sngags dbang lam brten 'grub pa ga la 'gyur// dper na pha rol grol ba'i grwa bzhin no// dbang mchog ston pa'i rdo rje slob dpon la// nor bu rin chen gser dngul dbyig gis
19a6(rnying rgyud): mchod/ yon mthas nas mtheg/ rta dang glang po la sogs dbul bar bya'o// pha ma gu slar bcas pa dbu la pa bya// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// bya kya bcom ldan stobs kyi bdag/ dbang gi bye brag de ltar na// dam chog bye brag gsung du
19a7(rnying rgyud): gsol// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// kye mgasang ba dag nges par yid la zung // dmachog bye brag stsam par mamadzangs bsam mi khyab// mdor bsus babrang tsham da bcas bshad kyis legs par yid la zung // rdo rje theg pa'i dam chog ni/ rkyen sa
19b1(rnying rgyud): dpa nas gzhas brag// thams cad nga zung ba bad bye ga zham ga can mchog tu 'thar // dayang bzang thab pas tham mkhakha sa gdams// 'azung du ma mags srung byed thabras mangs can
19b2(rnying rgyud): na nga a'as ma 'a pa pa sa ya sa so// nyams dam pa zhi thams cad theg par byed// gsang sngags do ston rang sgrub pa la/ pa nga / rin chen gas nga ni rang lus tsam zhig ma
19b3(rnying rgyud): mas sha sa/ bral thar byang // dam tsug 'jal par drag pa byed// dpo da pe bzhin rdob dpal// de ban rnalal sebs rdzob mdapa bzhin 'ang sa nas
19b4(rnying rgyud): dmachags pa zang pos bral// bsu sa na par byed so la zhing ba zhes na ma da thogs pa d+ha / ng+gA sa rnams ma bsus y-i rjeng bral ba babyung // dems klogag sar yang ngamachag me nga //
19b5(rnying rgyud): bdag grob dpon tshad mar ma gyur spel 'dra'i lung // pa me she sa lag pa'i lam du zhugs shing gsate grags 'chol bar thod// do ni dag rgyal log 'dren yin pas spang bar bya// tha nga gagasapa mi shes rgyal tshe nang thun rmongs
19b6(rnying rgyud): gcom tha mkhan// dkyi 'jigs pas smra zhing mchod langs gcod byed// ngo tsho med cing tshi di dzin pa khrel med bag 'jom mar// gas gas sdong dang me ldan gang zas spang bar bya// yangs shed rgyud la mkhas shing sgrub thabs dag la
19b7(rnying rgyud): su' gyur pa// thangs chung bzang zhi rtogs shing lte bdag la ma 'a sa sa rmong du 'dzin nyid gas pas ma // gsang lpags kyal po rje A li ka/ lus yo yul la rtag du bstan par \u0f7f// ma
20a1(rnying rgyud): mas ma tha ma sugs padal// gas gapa mas du na sa dang shag/ ya da nga/
20a2(rnying rgyud): mthong gas / ma / nga ca pa nga sems dpa' ga pa pa sgyu las/ gsung ba dang du ltung ba ba da / 'as / su rnams
20a3(rnying rgyud): snying ge kyil 'khor gyi oM rtse nas 'khor rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba'i don grab mi shes bstan pa'o// kye grogs po dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la/ rang gi reg pa 'od lnga'i rang bzhin du gnas so// de rnams
20a4(rnying rgyud): don bkrol ba 'di lta ste// khyab gang la thab chub rig pa 'od gsal wa// 'gyur med kyor yangs rig pa 'odags la swa// rnam dag don sdor klong yangs rig pa 'od gsal sku// khyab gnal chen po mi 'gru 'jig pa 'od gsal smra// brjod med
20a5(rnying rgyud): bsam thal rig pa chos kyi su// dpag tu med pa'i yul las 'das pa reg pa chos kyi sku// 'dzin pa'i spyod yul ma yin reg pa chos kyi sku// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje ldan pas rig pa chos kyis// 'di chen ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pas
20a6(rnying rgyud): rig pa longs spyod sku// gsal lam 'dres so so'i mtshan nyid ldan pas rig pa longs spyod sku// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pas rig pa longs spyod sku// rang bzhin gcig la tha dad snang ba'i rig pa longs spyod sku// 'gag med klong nas thugs
20a7(rnying rgyud): rje 'byin pa'i rig pa sprul pa'i su// cir yang gsal zhing cir yang rtogs pas rig pa sprul pa'i sku// ma 'gags yongs la khyab pas rig po sprul pa'i sra// gsal 'grib med cing 'dzin rtog med las rig pa sprul pa'i lha// gnyis
20b1(rnying rgyud): 'dza mtha' da bral bas ngan par da pa tha// 'dzin pa'i yul med rig parab nyid kyi zhwa// sa dang la ma la mi gnas rig pa ba nyid kyi la// dngas pa gzung du med pas rig par babyed kyi smra/ can nga du 'dur med gnapas ngab tu rje du
20b2(rnying rgyud): don dang ldan pas rigang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgra// gsal la mi 'gyur dang la gnas pas rig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sra// 'gro ba kun la gnas pa'i rig po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sba// sra zhib brtan pas rig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgra'o// de ltar sems can rnams mtsha nga lda la gnas
20b3(rnying rgyud): mo// de bzhin du su rnam pa lnga po de'i don thugs su chug cig/ snga las ye shes 'byung ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ rig pa 'gyur med chos dbyings ye shes dang / rig pa rgya chad phyogs ldad med pa chos dbyings ye shes dang / reg pa gzung 'dzin yul las
20b4(rnying rgyud): radas pas chos dbyings pa shes dang // rig pa su mtha' med pas ches dbyings ye shes dang // rig pa gsal la dngas pas me long ye shes dang // rig pa mra ldang zlu ma por gnas pas me long ye shes dang // rig pa gsal la phyogs lung med pas pa
20b5(rnying rgyud): napa dang // rig pags la lam 'jus rdzogs pa sa ma mang la shes dang // reg pa mag la mnyam par gnam pas ma nyam nyid la zhes dang // dgapa pab nga ma yul lus 'das pas mnyas nyid ma shas dang // dag pan la rtog
20b6(rnying rgyud): thal bas mnyam nyid ye shes dang // rig pa sla dang tshig las 'das pas mnyam nyid ye shes dang // rig pa d+mo yi ze zab rtogs pas so sor rtogapa'i ye shes dang // rig pa cu mar nog pas so sor rtog pa ma ye shes dang // rig pa
20b7(rnying rgyud): zur yang 'azang bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang // rig pa rnam pa cir yang sdang bas mo sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang // rigs khyab tsal med pas bya ba gral pa'i ye shes dang // rig pa 'dzin tog dbyings su rdzogs pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
21a1(rnying rgyud): drang // ga pasan sajugs pas tha bathab pa yo shes dang // dag pa 'gag mad dang chags pas rba' thab pangs shes dang // zhes ma pa yangs la ba din du shes par byag// ya shes las byung ba'i 'ang lnga ga zhen/
21a2(rnying rgyud): deyang 'dog rnam pa rdzani// rig pa chos kyi sba ba 'drar rab med pas kha ga mthing ga gsas// rig pa bsam pakun dang thal zas kha dog mthing gang gsal// rig pa gdang sa dang ldan pas 'di can mthing ga gsal// rig pa'i 'bras ze zang maH
21a3(rnying rgyud): gyur yin pas dzod men mthe ga gsal// kau shing rtan mongs gas pa med pas kha ga dgang po gsapa// rig pa shel slong lta bur dag pas kha dog dkang pa gsal// rig pacang sems drim med pas bdog dkar por gsal// rig pa
21a4(rnying rgyud): thar gting mtha' yas pas kha dag dkar po rags la// rig pa'i ye shes tha snyad bral bas 'od chen seng por gsal// rig pa'i me shes 'dzin pa med pas 'od che nase po gsal// rig par ma shes rang gis gsal bas tshad chen mang por gas/
21a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa 'gyur med ngang 'a rdzogs pas 'od chen ser po gas pa// rig pa'i gling na dbang rnams thams cad rdzogs pas kha dog dmar por gsal// rig pa'i klong nas lce med dus gcig rdzogs pas khadog dmar por gsal// rig pa 'gyur mi dang
21a6(rnying rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pas 'od chen dmang po gsal// reg pa 'gag maud kun la khyab pas 'od chan dmar pongags pa// rig pa sa la 'gyur ba med pas 'di zin ljang gyur gsal// rig pa dngos pos stong bar khyab pas kha ga
21a7(rnying rgyud): tharags la// rig pa shes rab 'gag pa med pas kha dog sdang bu dgas so// 'dzin pa'i srod yul med pas 'a dog lngar grar rags pa// de las 'ang 'dzas 'jig tan gang bar 'gyur// yun la zhin pa sa
21b1(rnying rgyud): gas dang kyis rnams pa 'das par zang// dgas sems can pas byang rgyal bar na// sa na gsung ba rnas ngas nga gan ba ga tud pas/ spang sa nas rgyal dum ldab pa/ / nas
21b2(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i bdag pa phyag na rji nyi ma na bar gyur nas// thugs rdo can pa dang ldan pa dang 'di skad ces gsol// / d+ha ma grang yangs bcom ldan thugs na// byang chub 'byung ba gter chen gsung drugaso pa// zhes bu na thams
21b3(rnying rgyud): stobs kyi bdag pos bka' bral pa// kye mya rje 'dzin pa nyon// ngas bstan legs par yid la zung // da jig byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi 'di// dper na lha rdzas nor bra rin chen 'di// grang pa'i phyogs su bzhag na rdob gyur// rdo ba
21b4(rnying rgyud): su bzhag na bsil bar 'gyur// mun pa'i phyogs su bzhag na snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin rang gyur reg pa 'di// rtogs pa'i don dang ldan bu ran// nyon mong ye shes grog su 'gyur// nyon mongs skyes kyang ye shes skyobs su gyur na bsgrib pa med// ce togs ba'i
21b5(rnying rgyud): bdag phongs par zung // rang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'di// dper na nor bu chu 'dongs bzhin// rtag ma can du sbal na tog mdangs par 'gyur// de bzhin snying po don gyi gdams pa 'di// btab na nyon mongs gos mi 'gyur// bag
21b6(rnying rgyud): chags 'dams las ye shes pad+ma phye bar 'gyur// ye shes chu yis nyon mongs thams cad 'khrud// ye shes ma yis bag chags bsreg par byed// ye shes bde ba'i sgra la sngar sreng gsal// gcig pu dal bar 'dug na snang 'grogs su 'char
21b7(rnying rgyud): mthus dbyings nas ye shes 'od gsal ba// kun la yod da kun gyis mthong ba med// dpag pas mi dpog nam mapa'i dbyings dang 'dra// gsal la 'tshor ba nyi ma'i 'od deng 'dra// 'gyur ba med pas ri rgyal lhun po 'khri// bal la gtor
22a1(rnying rgyud): dpag pa tu btu dpa la// gas pa ba papa dam rgya // nga dang gyu rlab na/ so sa dang bsanapam thas // gas sal ba dag drugs pas 'angamardzun dang// dud
22a2(rnying rgyud): da pa du da cigapa ma // rgyun ca pa pa ldan dang // gnas lan ngas bya na/ na tshinas ra bamed tham pa'i nga // gangags pa byeng ba d+ha bas dag pa 'di khams nga//
22a3(rnying rgyud): dmalal ma 'dra// gan mi gzhi mang gyung pasas gzhi mnyam pa 'dra// dgas 'dad yangs su rdzogs pa dpag bas ma ston shing 'dra// gsal la dngas papa btsun pa mi yang 'dra// nad med mkha' la 'grubs 'dab chags rgyal ba 'dra// munu dpa
22a4(rnying rgyud): lugs bcas pas zhig mo zeng thogs 'dra// kun la thal gyis phrag pas dpag chen mda' dang 'dra// ye shes dasteng sasu sre dpas 'byung ba chu dang 'dra// nin mongs bag chags bsreg pas 'thung ba ma dang 'dra// dpe rnams de bzhin mched
22a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes ngan sa spyong // rtag pa ma 'gyur la shes bdal ba'i sgra// kun la yod da dngags thabs kyis tshad// ming byung phrin la gnas pa'i rig pa zung chub sems// dab mi 'byung kuran lade bzhin gnas// rang bzhin gsal bas
22a6(rnying rgyud): sman yangs la/ zhwab// nga gis sdig sa thab gdal bad ba'i bong // dzA rje'i mchog snyan pas blang bar gyi// zhes pan // denas yang gsang ba'i bdag pa phyag na rdo rjes rdo rdzagaseng te 'di skad ces gsas s+ho// a
22a7(rnying rgyud): da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgangs pazugs sa nga // ra gidod can // des rjod pa rjegs pas shing gsum pa'i ta kyisems sems cad de bzhi gagags pa mas gang ngar gyus// nga
22b1(rnying rgyud): gshag pa'i sku mthang ba'i sems can dag kyang mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas so// ngan sang gi skye gnas thams cad rgyun bcad do// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pa dang la rang ngam rgyar byas nas 'di skad ces rdo rje 'chang chen pa la gsal to// ba
22b2(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chang // rig pa'i dpe don de ltar na// ma rig dpe don gsung du gsol// zhes zhu ba zhus so// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// e ma ho/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// ma smin matog sa khor ba ni// dper na kyi le blang chug 'dra// 'thong ba
22b3(rnying rgyud): krung thar pa'i dus mi 'byung // de bzhin ma reg lca gra bcug thang bar ga 'gyur// ma rig chu dang 'dra ste thams cad sdud// zhe sdang me ni bskal pa'i me dpung 'dra// 'dod chags tshe chu dag ni 'thung ba 'dra// gti mug 'gribs pa khang stong mun pa 'dra// nga rgyal
22b4(rnying rgyud): dregs pa ri bo bsnyil ba 'dra// phrag dag gnod sems gcong dong dag mo 'dra// nyon mongs rnam lngas ye shes sgrib par byed// yid ni dper na khang stong rkun ma 'dra// dbugs ni dper na nags kyi spre'u 'dra// sems ni dper na mi gtsang
22b5(rnying rgyud): 'dam rdzab 'dra// kun gzhi dper na sems can phag pa 'dra// shes pa dper na bya sgo rlung khyed 'dra// gzung 'dzin dper na skyes pha bud med dbang gis bskor ba 'dra// las kyi bye brag rgya d+hi 'dzings pa 'dra// sdug bsngal bye brag chu bo'i gnyer
22b6(rnying rgyud): ma 'dra// nyon mongs 'bras bu 'di la bzod pa'i thabs med do// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'dzin pa'i rtod phur 'di// byas pas mi thon bzhag na thon par 'gyur// byas pa'i chos rnams spangs na dal ba 'grub par 'gyur// bsam pa kun
22b7(rnying rgyud): spangs ye shes mtsho mi g.yo// gsang sngags rgyal po spyad na nyon mongs ye shes 'gyur// dper na khyim stong sgron me btegs na mun pa gsal bar 'gyur// de bzhin ye shes sgron me btegs na ma rig rig par 'gyur/ de kho na nyid kyi rtog
23a1(rnying rgyud): pargyud la skyes na nyon mongs thams cad ye shes grogs su 'char// de phyir rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes lnga dang sbyor cig/ mdag pa sum brtsegs dang ye shes sum brtsegs sbyor cig/ nyon mongs pa sna chog
23a2(rnying rgyud): su snang ba dang ye shes kyi 'od kha dog sna tshogs su snang ba sbyor cig/ e ma ho// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du shes na ma dag pa'i snang ba 'dis bsgrib pa med do// rigs kyi bu dang dal bar 'dug na/ ye shes kyi sdang ba lkug par 'char ro// de'i phyi na
23a3(rnying rgyud): rogs med gcig pur gnas par bya zhes 'byung ngo // kye grogs po dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ni smin pa dang ma smin pa mi mang// de'i phyir na bsgoms pas 'bras bu mi rnyed pa'i man ngag go// kye grogs po dag yang dag par
23a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lta ba ni brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpang chos la gnas par mi bya'o// rtse grogs po dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang las btsal bar bya'o// de bas na rgyad
23a5(rnying rgyud): 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi bka'i dam par zung zhig/ rig pa gnyis med kyi ye shes ngos zung zhig/ rig pa gzung 'dzin dang bral bar mkhas par gyis shing // rig pa cing spang ba thams cad klong gcig tu dril cig/ ces bka' stsal nas/ 'od phung rab tu
23a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyed pa zhes za ba'i sa matil snyoms par zhugs sa// de nas mkha' 'grom rnams kyis sbasnyan pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dang glu sna tshogs kyis bsngal bar mdzad do// de nis de rnams kyi nang nas nag mo 'jug gi spyacan ma zhes bya bas 'di skad rjes
23a7(rnying rgyud): gsal to// n+ya ha thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs shig/ khams gsu ma thams can thams cad nyan monganges pa ma rig pa'i phyis 'brums pa 'di rnams la/ thabs dam pa bstad du gsal/ bstan pa'i sgron ma 'jig rten
23b1(rnying rgyud): gyi khams su yun ring bang gnas pang mdzad dugasapa/ zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mang ba mngon par sprul nas/ la la ni phyag na rdo rje'i su sha stag tu gyur/ la mni'i ba'i sran stag
23b2(rnying rgyud): yang / la la ni rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sku sha stag tu gyur/ la la ni yab yum snang ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ngo mchod skyes nas/ thabs cig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// rtse kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang //
23b3(rnying rgyud): yi nges tshig gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// gsang sngags rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// kye kye 'byung ba'i bdag mo nyon// ye shes rgyal po tshig gis mtshon du med// rig pa'i rgyal po tshig las 'das pa yin// 'on kyang tshig gis don
23b4(rnying rgyud): rnams mtshon par byed// tshig don gnyis med 'brel pa'i gtan tshigs bshad// sku yi nges tshig gang zhe na// mi 'gyur don dang ldan pas rdo rje snying po'i sku// lce med dang la rdzogs pas bya rtsol bral ba'i sku// 'gag med ngang la gnas
23b5(rnying rgyud): pas bya btsal med pa'i sku// mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral bas thig le stong pa'i sku// rang gas pa byas pa med pas 'od gsal bde ba'i sku// dngos po rjes su med pas stong pa 'dzin med sku// rgya chad phyogs lhung med pas ye shes brtan pa'i sku// de ltar
23b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs na bde chen dang la gnas// de ltar sku bdun don lam yengs spyad par bya// don gyi rig pa mi zad bde ba'i gter// zag med byang chub chen po bdag gis blangs// nga med pa yi sngon rol du// rig pa dbyer med dang la shes bya bde byed
23b7(rnying rgyud): gsal// nga ni rang thung bde chen zag pa med pa'i sku// nga ni sru yi 'od la zhugs shing gsung gi zar la rol// de phyir 'od zer zhes kyang de la bu// nga ni mi gnas ye shes phyogs la gnas pa med// nga yi srul sngar srid gasrel zhing bde chen 'ab
24a1(rnying rgyud): bar snang // des na nga ni thabs kyi pha rol gyin la gnas// thogs med gsal ba'i mang me bsam pa kun dang bral// bsam bral bde ba'i sgra la snang srid gsal// bsam dzub sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rig pa 'gas med
24a2(rnying rgyud): klong // kun gsal chos nyid ma long 'on po che// gnyis me da nga du bde chen 'od gsal mnyam/ zhes gsang ba yang khol du phyung ba'i rgyud/ rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi mo ming gi rgyang chen po las/ marig pa dang ye shes kyi mthun dpeng bstan pa
24a3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste drug pa'o// // sha\u0f89\u0fa4sa?30// de nus yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// rtse kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rdzogs chen nges tshig gsung du gsol// zhes zhu bzhus so// stobs kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/
24a4(rnying rgyud): nga dzin pa tan me// rngabs cad thug pa ngas che de// dag pa mthal dang la mi zhes rdzogs pas rdzogs// banas be teg mi ngang lA 'i shes dri me rdzogs pas rdzogs// spyod pa cos med da sa ma zhes pad la rdzogs sa
24a5(rnying rgyud): lta ba dgag bsgrub med pa'i ngang la ye shes rtogs med rdzogs pas rdzogs// 'bras bu dmigs med dang la ye shes nyi shu rtsa lnga rdzogs pas rdzogs// khru dang ye shes rang gi snying gi dkyil na rdzogs pas rdzogs// stong pa'i ngang las rig pa dngos
24a6(rnying rgyud): med gsal ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas rdzogs// lce med dang las 'od ldam 'dres gsal bar rdzogs pas rdzogs// stong nyid gsal lam yabs pas na pa// bya ba med par snang bas pa// gsal la 'dzin pa med pas pa// 'bras bu tshad dang ldan
24a7(rnying rgyud): pas pa// thag pa kun gyi gong du gyur pas che// gnas lugs don la g.yangs pa med pas che// ye shes sgron ma lta ba kun gyi rtse mor gyur pas che// gsal la ma yengs sgom pa kun gyi rtse mor gyur pas che// dang byung ma cos spyod pa du
24b1(rnying rgyud): mor gyur pas che// 'dzin pad rang gas la 'bras bu kun gyi rtsi mor gyur pas \u0f7f// 'gyur med dang la 'gag med rtsol bas cha// 'dzin med dang la 'gog med rtsol bas rba// 'dzin med ngang rtog med gsal bas che// zhan mo dang la chags mang
24b2(rnying rgyud): gsal bas che// brjod ma dngang yang de chen gsal bas che// nam dag byang chub brdal ba'i snying po yin pas che// bya btsal bral ba'i rig pa dngos med yin pas che// bde chen dang las mi g.yo mnyam par gnas pas che// snying po'i don la mi
24b3(rnying rgyud): g.yo mnyam par gnas pas che// 'dzin pa'i spyod yul ma yin kun la yod pas che// tshig dang yi ges gtan la mi pheb kun gyi snying po yin pas che// rig pa ye shes nyi shu rtsa lngas brgyan pas po// ye shes 'od lnga dag pas brgyan pas
24b4(rnying rgyud): 'od la zer rnams so sor brgyan pas po// gsum brtsegs dbyer med mnyam pas gnas pas po// su gsum gyir mi ldog pas 'bras bu tshad dang ldan// rgya chad phyogs lhung med pas lta ba'i tshad dang ldan// gsal la rtog pa med pas
24b5(rnying rgyud): sgom pa'i tshad dang ldan// dang byung bcos pa med pas spyod pa'i tshad dang ldan// bde chen zag pa med pa'i byang chub dngos med 'di// bzung bas mi zin chu yi zla ba 'dra// dgos dgu rang la tshang bas phyug po'i ngang mdzod 'dra// rig pa byang chub
24b6(rnying rgyud): sems ni gdod nas skye dang bral// ma skyes pas na 'chi med rig pa'i klong // thig le rnam lnga 'du 'bral med pa'i klod// ma rig 'khrul pa med pas gzhi yi thig le bzang po yin// 'gyur med rnam par dag pas lam gyi thig le bzang po yin//
24b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa rtog pa med par bar chad sel bas rgyan dang ldan pa'i thig le bzang po yin// 'gro dang 'ong ba med pas bzang po'i rtse mo thig le bzang po yin// skye dang 'chi ba med pas chos dbyings thig le bzang po yin// de ltar thig le rnam lnga yang/
25a1(rnying rgyud): dbyen thig la rnam pa bcu yadang// de yang bstan pa 'di ltar yin// bzang po 'khrul med thig le dang // bzang po zag med thig la'o// da ni gzha yi nyar gzhag go// lam gyi nyer gzhag gang zhe na// 'dzin med na mdag
25a2(rnying rgyud): thig le dang // sa dang lam gyi thig le'o// do ni lam gyi nyer gzhag go// 'bras bu'i thig le gang zhen// nam smin par chad sel ba'i thig le dang // mun pa sel ba'i thig le dang // snang ba bzlog pa'i thig le dang // rab ba ma rtse mar gyur
25a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thig le dang // 'od ldam 'dres gsal ba'i thig le dang // su bdun ldan gyis thub pa'i thig le'o// de ltar thig le lnga dang sgra lnga dag tu stor// de ltar bcu rtse yang yum bcu dang ster// de las ye shes 'byung ba gang zhen// de ya
25a4(rnying rgyud): spa gas pa 'i/ zhes bka la te// danas yang gamang pa'i bri ni sa rje bam pa/ rnam ma g+na sa dun stsol/ zhes zlab rnams/ de nas yang ba' la pa
25a5(rnying rgyud): maho// gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// ye shes rnam pa lnga yang lnga lnga ste// ye shes nyi shu rtsa lngar shes par gyis shig/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbyings kyi ye shes dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gnyis/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye
25a6(rnying rgyud): shes dang / dbyings chen po'i ye shes dang gnyis/ dbyings thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang lnga'o// mye khyodan can chos nyid/ me long lta bu'i ye shes dang // me long chen po'i ye shes gnyis// rtog med gsal ba'i ye shes dang // rtog
25a7(rnying rgyud): med dngas pa'i ye shes gnyis/ gsal ba 'dzin med chen po'i ye shes dang lnga'o// hAHhA/ swA tong mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // mnyam pa nyid ma 'gags pa'i ye shes gnyis/ mi g.yo ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi 'gag
25b1(rnying rgyud): nyam pa nyid kyi yogs gnyis/ yol yang mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyi yi shas dang wA'o// \u0f88\u0f90 ga / mas rtogs pa'i 'ashes dang / dan thams cad rabatu 'byed pa'i la gas pa'is/ rtags pas dacig par rgyub lags dang /
25b2(rnying rgyud): wa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes dang gnyis/ sgra dang tshig la mi gnas par go ba'i ye shes dang lde'o// hU~M gas pa stod/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba thams cad byed pa'i ye shes dang gnyis/ rdza ba la mi gnas pa'i ye shes dang / b+ha ba btang
25b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i ye shes gnyis/ sgro 'dogs thams cad gcod pa'i ye shes dang lnga'o// d+hi mu a/ g+hang stod gnyis sa med pa'o// kyu yang / rigs kyi bu de ltar gong bzhin rtogs nas shes pa'i dus na/ de las zer 'byung ste/ nyi zla lta bu'i zer dang / srin bu me khyer lta bu'i
25b4(rnying rgyud): zer dang / e mar lta bu'i zer dang / snang bzer dang bcas par snang ngo // rigs kyi rta mu a yang/ pu de ltar go zhing rtogs nas shes pa'i dus gcig na/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ zhes bya'o// de'i don la ma yengs mi gnas pa'i rig pa
25b5(rnying rgyud): sha nas rang la rang gis rtogs pa ni/ 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya'o// de ltar shes nas mos pa'i 'khor rnams la bstan pa'i phyir na/ 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ zhes 'byung ngo // rtse grogs pa
25b6(rnying rgyud): dag bstan pa 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams la de bzhin du byos shig/ de ltar shes pa'i rigs kyi bu de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// kye rigs kyi bu skyes bu de la snga rtags 'di dag 'byung ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gcig
25b7(rnying rgyud): phung brjodan nyams dga' ba dang / byin kyi na pa dang na / lus shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar yang bdang / ni sa pa mi gyis ma/ mi dang 'grogs nyid mi 'dod pa dang / ngag dang chu bzhinas ra gyi/ nam mkha' la 'phung lce mabyad
26a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bgacags kying ba ma slob cog sdang ba 'di 'gags nas dag pa'i 'du shes dang / gangan banas canang pa ma pa / lus dang srog la yang mi chags pa dang / lus ga dag pa rna ra ba byed/ spang ba gang la yang yid mi 'dug pa dang / ga nga/
26a2(rnying rgyud): dang tag cang rdzogs pa'i byer/ shes pa mi bying bar gsal ba dang / rkyed kyi dang sa ma 'ad pa'i cing / shes pa dang gis dal ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tha batho sa pa'i phyir/ 'grog na bde ba dang / snang thaMd bum she pa cis/ nyon mo dra zas cad gang yang ljang mi dus pa dang / nyon mo dra lang kyang rtog par mi 'dzin pa dang / ShI nga sho' 'ad byed/ gzugs
26a3(rnying rgyud): sdug pa la chags pa mi skye ba dang / rig pa la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir/ gzugs mi sdug pa la zhe mi sdang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nus pas zas skom gyi 'du shes mi skye ba dang / rig pa gsal la rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ mi dang 'grogs nas kyang pha rol gyi sems dang ci mthun byed pa de ni/ spang srid
26a4(rnying rgyud): sgram nas pa'i cos nyid rtogs pa'i chi na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga rtags so// mya ngan las 'da' ba de la yang gnyis te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// de yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
26a5(rnying rgyud): phung po lhag ma med par sangs rgyas pa'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i skyes bu de la/ 'od dang / sgra dang / sru dang / gdung dang / sa g.yo ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo // 'od la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'od khyim gyi tshul du 'byung ba dang /
26a6(rnying rgyud): 'od chen du 'grengs te/ skas ka'i tshul du 'byung ba dang / 'od khyim gyi tshul du gyung na/ zhag lnga nas brtan pa thob ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'od skas kyi tshul du 'byung ba ni/ zhag bdun nas brtan pa thob ste/ mngon par rdzogs
