26a7(rnying rgyud): par 'tshang rgya'o// sbal yang gnyis te/ dur gyis byung na gag bdun nas brtan pa thob ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// thug gis byung na zhag bcu bzhinas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gdung la swa T+Te/ kha dog mthing gni
26b1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa skad mdzad kyi zhing khams su skye ste mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// kha dog dkar po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// ser po ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o// dmar po snang ba mtha' yas kyi'o//
26b2(rnying rgyud): sudon yod grub pa'o// kha dog sna tshogs su byung na/ sku lnga'i sa la lhun gyis grub pa'o// sku la yang gnyis te/ zhi ba'i lu dang / khro bo'i sku'o// zhi ba'i sku byung na snang ba 'di 'gags ma thag du brtan pa thob ste/ sprul pa'i su 'byin ma nus do// lo
26b3(rnying rgyud): po'i mu byung na de nyid la brtan pa thob ste/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig nas sprul pa'i sku 'byin par nus so// rtags de rnams ma byung na skye ba gcig gis thogs te/ yang de bzhin mi 'byung mi srid do// de bzhin du sgra dang / 'od dang / gdung dang / su dang / zhan dang
26b4(rnying rgyud): bsrel yan chad 'byung ngo // zhes rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud chen po/ gsang ba yang khol du byung ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ces 'khor rnams la
26b5(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces bla bsgrags so// 'arjo rje la dang / mthu tshon nyid kyima'i ba ta shA ba/ shas de shes pa nyi pa kyang me dang/ san ldan dgapa yi la/ rmyi ma nyid bye bad palas ni thos pad byer ba'i tsha ba dang / dang po chos na tshan pa las 'dapa/ a ma bya da me
26b6(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas 'aper rnams kyis yang dag pa'i don thugs su chud do// de nas yang 'di skad ces bsgrags so// burgyas thal nas/ sarba Na nga na dag yang ma las sapa/ d+ha bang gcad papa dgapa/ thim dgyes nas dang
26b7(rnying rgyud): yi / rta thim gas te gyi gdag 'jog ma pa yang kyi mdus deganyis pa'ad da/ rgyag a a dbugs na thogs// ke ma pa / dgas da / a hA dkyi sa shad dpar
27a1(rnying rgyud): onya man pa dang/ a mdzan nan pa/ AHmang da tan pa/ gtodang ta pa/ an bla da pas byang dang / zhes brjod nas mi snang ba'i dang du gshegasas// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pas 'di skad cesags
27a2(rnying rgyud): rtse mgye hud thugs rjes zung / zhes gsol pa dang / nam mkha' nas sgra 'di bsgrags so// sha shes rabaci ga nyid/ sa 'gyur ba med pa cas nyid/ ma gnyim sa pags lab/ 'dod pa'i meshes/ bye bamed pa la rgya bdun pa byar ba med pa shes kyi da nyid de
27a3(rnying rgyud): pad ma 'thu bacho nyid ma cos sham pa nyis med do// su ngogs gas lus pamed par nas gagasum pa// chosamams cad dag paded brtse ba med las bye ba'i tsho 'phrul ma nyis tu rjo'o// badz+ra rig pa legs sag te/ pA DI ti pa nga byud par dgas pa/ sarba bcad cad/ d+hA drod pa'ig lu shin ha da
27a4(rnying rgyud): nas nyes med pa da/ ni bsta pa'i ti ba/ e drang deg/ kr-i g+has/ pa d+ha d+ha h+yaM hUM/ a a \u0f7fsa dacings bye ba med pa de nga dpas 'das sa// da 'bal med pa'i rig pa byes dadu khyo byig/ zhes smrab spags nas cang byed do// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pa la byang chub sems dpa'
27a5(rnying rgyud): pangs pa la sogs dang / thub pa drug gis 'di skad ces gsal to/ !58/ ston pa mi snang ba'i dang du gshegs na rgyud 'di ci ltar gzung bar brtsi/ zhes gsol to// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ byad 'di'i mtshan ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'
27a6(rnying rgyud): ting gi ma long gi byad ces bya bar ming thog ste shis zung 'ag/ yang rgyang chen po 'di skang bston pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhing / yang thams cad kyi na 'grol brten po zhes zla bar bung zhing / dgongs pa kha gong gi hung chen po zhes bya ba ngang rdung zhing / he thub pa chen po'i
27a7(rnying rgyud): ma dag pa nga min bgamapa y-is rnamasanyon cing / chud chen po gsang ba rmad du zung ba 'di ni 'jig rten du 'byung bar dka 'o// de'i phyir na bstan pa'i snying po 'di rab tu tshangs shig/ don thams cad bye ba med pa'i dbyings su stsol cig/ drang sho pa dpa #
27b1(rnying rgyud): da / da sa 'ang ma 'das pa'i sems can rnams la byag cag chubs 'ang shes // de bzhin du ston cig/ byang chub lam gyi smon mang shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad brjod pa dang bral ga dang gas pa'i ngang du bsus shig
27b2(rnying rgyud): rgyad thams cad yi ge med pa chen po'i rang gi rig pa'i rgyud chen po rang di de bskad da pal ba 'dzin pa med pa stsol cig/ lung thams cad gzhan gyis nyon 'i dus bstan du med pa'i rtsa ba'i lung rtsig pa'i be shes chen por stsol zhib/ man ngag thams cad brjod gzhi dang bral bar 'di la
27b3(rnying rgyud): mad nga 'di rims/ stsol cig/ bsgrub pa thams cad phyir me yod gro bya byed dang bral bar stsol cig/ spyod pa thams cad ma bcos pa'i mchog chen po dang ldan par stsol cig/ bsgom pa thams cad gsal 'grib 'dzin pa med par stsol cing / na
27b4(rnying rgyud): dri la rtsig/ 'du 'bral med pa 'di ngas su gci dang du ma med pa/ 'khor ba'i bya ba thams cad thong zhib/ gcig phung dal bar gnas pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba la/ sdong yang nas yang chags la ga dang/ rtag tu 'dris par gyis shing / ye shes 'char ba'i dus drar 'do la ye shes kyi na dang dogs pa
27b5(rnying rgyud): shes par shes shig/ bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di yin par shes par kyis shig par da pa she sna pa sa sa cad shes ra kyis shig/ gzhi'i chos kyis maben pa thams cad cing yang rnam ma stong pa rang bzhi na thas 'thugs rje tha dang gsum du shes
27b6(rnying rgyud): par gyis shig/ lam gyi chos thams cad su lnga ye shes lnga ru shes par gyis shig/ 'bras bu'i chos thams cad sku gsum 'dung ba med pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bur shes par gyis shig/ ngo bo'i chos thams cad gzhi stong par stong pa ga pang snying pocan
28a1(rnying rgyud): na ga pa dang gas par gyis shig/ rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad gsal bar shes par gyis shig thugs 'i chos rgya ma sa sa ca da nga sa pas mas ma
28a2(rnying rgyud): s+yan nams nams// thams cad kun la thub pa nas kyis nig/ migs kyims thams cad ma dzes par zhes pa shes shAn/ da kyi sa thams cad la rkang mi dpa la ma yang shes pa ces nag
28a3(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad r+Ne 'i khro 'dapa sprob su med pa shes par gyis shig/ rig pa'i chos thams cad bdag rtag gi blad bral bar shes par gyis shig thas pa ma mam bananan/ de bzhin du chas sbe pa bye rda ba thams cad 'gag pa med par stsol cig
28a4(rnying rgyud): 'gag pa med pa/ ga pa'i la la cing yang snang bar sgrol cig/ cir yang snang ba skye ba med par dz+wal cig/ skyeb med pa 'gro 'ong med par bya gnas pa las ga pa sa can rgyal cig/ 'gro dzang med pa gnyis su med pa de byam thal phral cig
28a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis medags leb mtha' grol 'od zeng du gnas pa chen por stsol cig/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi pa yang me rtog mi sems pa d+ma chen gyi dbang tsam la tshul cig/ chos thams cad gsal la ma yengs parda stsal cig/ dbyung ba med pa rgyag yang bcad
28a6(rnying rgyud): pa sa rgya ba ya sbyin nyis pa sa na gapa btan papa te/ de ba shang namanas kyi lde dang lags ga pa dang yinas med kyi la nas sa// ces brjod nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang mi sdang ba'i ngang du gshegs so// de nas yang nam mkha'
28a7(rnying rgyud): lasas 'di ska dgrags so// 'du rjes canan kyi pa zhi pas shi mthus d+ha yum bya sa pa she ngas ra kA lu sa 'angon// rat+na da pagasas su ma
28b1(rnying rgyud): da pasams bsasas/ as bya tsha gapags sa ban das ga ma na dang gzhags pa/ tA tho pa nga sa 'ag pag dang // na rgya tu 'os ban pa/ u d+ha tA/ shim la ma da snangab/
28b2(rnying rgyud): pa/ A myongs kyang tshi med pa/ u m+b+hal tu l+le ki star snang ngo // zhes rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud chen po las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs shaM yang rnams rang rang gi 'khor rnams la 'di
28b3(rnying rgyud): skad ces gdams so// rgyud 'di'i me la tshe bya'o// dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyi gshed ma bya'o// zhes gdams nas nga rgyal gyi sgra 'di skad bklags so// ra s+pho sa ma ya sdod byin ted byang zhig snying phyud b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes brjod nas mi snad pa'i ngang du gshegs
28b4(rnying rgyud): so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i bu log rtog sel byed la sogs dang / thub pa drug dang / mi ma yin gyi 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do// zhes rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud ces bya ba yang
28b5(rnying rgyud): gsang gab sbas kyi rgyud rdzogs pa chen po gtan la 'bebs pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu dpa' bo stobs ldan gyis dur khrod chen po me ri 'bar bar gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams la rang rang gi rig pa dngos su bstan pa'i bka' dam pa/
28b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// / rgya rgya rgya/ sti/ mkhas pa chen po bi ma la mi tras sgra dang 'gyur du gsungs pa'o// ljags kyi srung mas srungs shig/ 'grel pa don 'brel phra bkod bya ba yod/ snying gi me long nyid la
28b7(rnying rgyud): mthu bzhi/ \u0f7f/ rgya gang ga du/ sa mnyan Ad na tanA rAmaH ngas lamamam tsha gas pa sa/ bdag dang / hUM bye ro/ meng la/ mam la ba dang ma gan mab na ma phags
29a1(rnying rgyud): ban ba dang nags rtsom sa rgyud ces byag/ thams cad ston du rgyud/ pa mad du nan na rga gas su nas rang bzhin pa na 'bang ba la zhug mam ga// tshad nyam ca/
29a2(rnying rgyud): ceno// skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcigan/ don gyi snying du kyis nas sud sa da pa brdal pa'i mnapo kyi sri ni/ mdun de bye med par zhal kun du thal leng bzugs su/ she ya sa mnas/ des 'gro ba dang 'od ba med pa'i don sems can la ston to//
29a3(rnying rgyud): sa pa/ 'di sad bdag gis byas pa'i das ga grIn/ mngon pang dus ma thus pa'i bud ni ga mi cig sa thogs par da na sa la mngan par gnas pa/ rtsi dang nang med pa che tham la kun tu yang nang du
29a4(rnying rgyud): ma ma la phyinas brtan nang gas lag sa/ nang nas bltas nartsigs pa pa/ yang na pa 'od cung phyogs bcang / thang sa / chu khrad kyi rab can/ na / ye shes lngaska ma bzhin 'chang ba/ da
29a5(rnying rgyud): mas gas sa/ sra lnga mdun dang chub tu med par gsal ba/ sa pa ga / 'od ldam 'dres pa la rjes da // gsal ba/ don gyi steng ma ston pa'i rtags su/ rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba/ ra ma ma mas nas/
29a6(rnying rgyud): mngon par snang ba'o// ga sogs / rnan pa na sa/ gzhal yas khang de'i nang na sbyin pa kun tu bzang mo// rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' dang / rig pa kun tu bzang po'i ngangal thabs cig tu bzhugs so// jug pa da na
29a7(rnying rgyud): ded dang gas kyisems dpa' dmas kyis 'di ga dacas gas pa te// mngam dzad 'a dmi sbyinas da byed pa dzin byed du sum zhes nu 'azlas sa// dngas nyin pa kyang tu bzang bas/

29b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs pa dang / de rnams don bshad du gsol zhes zhu ba zlas so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon/
29b4(rnying rgyud): byang chubs mas dang ny-i du 'dzes par mgyud na/ mthang yang can las rnam shes dag mi 'gyur bas// 8yang nas yang du mnas btags shing gams pa \u0f7f/
29b5(rnying rgyud): don dmang las mi dmigs 'dags 'gru sa kyi// dmigs med ngang las 'ang lags la 'grib yangs kyis med// sems can grol banas na nas/ kye zag mang ba'i phyir/
29b6(rnying rgyud): nga sa
30a1(rnying rgyud): na ma du du rgyu smras sa su nga rgya
30a2(rnying rgyud): tshig don 'brem pa
30a3(rnying rgyud): ga pa yar ma dpral sadun cu gal / // ban chu ma na gal gyi ltung ba de gyul gas// thugs tu la rtag pa ma na/

30a5(rnying rgyud): sa ga su su na
30a6(rnying rgyud): sus sa
30b1(rnying rgyud): la la nas dag ba cu 'thung // na du snying pom bskyed dbyings nas gnal rdzogs// sangs rdzas thams cad 'byung ba'i sa ban ga sha m+bu grang bcas// don gyi la shes skad cig dang la rdzogs/ dasu na gyis gaganan gas 'dzagag// rtags kyi yo shes /
30b2(rnying rgyud): rjod sa/ lce 'bri med par snang // dpa yi ye shes shipa ltang dri med nam dag dang // chos su'i ye shes byab ma dbral ba'i gas/ bsam 'das brjod med dang // longs su'i ye shes tshad kyi nang brda kha dog ma 'dres gsal// sul sku'i ye shes cir yang ta/
30b3(rnying rgyud): degang zag pa cing snang ga pa dang / bgyur tu btub// gnyis med ye shes/ sdug sum drang thal med pa'i dgongs pa/ tha snyad mtha' dang bral// rtog med ye shes zhen pa dang bral ba'i rig pa/ 'dzin pa'i yul dang bral// 'dzin med rig pa rte ga med ye shes gnyis snang mtha' dang bral//
30b4(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid ye shes kyis thams cad nyi nyid rtogs pa/ tshig las 'das pa'i dang // chos dbyings ye shes dbyings dang phral 'dung thab med pa/ gsal la rtog pa med// dag pa'i ye shes gyon mongs med pa'i rigag/ dri ma'i mtha' dang bral// gsal ba'i ye shes/ de nga dod khyis la
30b5(rnying rgyud): gnas/ stong pa'i yul las 'das// stong pa'i ye shes dngos po'i rtog pa med par phyid/ yul las 'das// mtshon pa'i ye shes gza' gtad chos dang bral// dmigs med ye shes bsgom pa'i yul dang bral/ bsgom du med pa'i dge par dgas pa// 'das pa'i ye shes
30b6(rnying rgyud): tshig dang po sa dang shig gis mtshon du med// ma 'ongs ye shes nyin mangs kyi'i bus dngos por bstan du med// da lta'i rtags ni/ ye shes yul la mngon par snang // rdo rje'i don ni/ ye shes 'du 'bral med par rtogs// de rnams 'byung ba'i ye shes rang gi ga pa
30b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin no// ye shes bsgom pa'i yul dang bral ba'o// kye kye rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dkyil 'khor don dang ye shes don// nga yis khyod la legs par bstan pa yin// rang byung don gyi snying po ni// bskyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa'i tshul/
31a1(rnying rgyud): nganas 'dang ma man // dug na sa nga pa ba // ga nad na// da na su nga ba 'das su 'jas/ la da sa nga na
31a2(rnying rgyud): gas 'dug sa sa
31a3(rnying rgyud): nas yang can pa ban cu bang ba sa kyi/ rten pams pa da na ni tegs 'a rig pa rgya dzes pasas/
31a4(rnying rgyud): dang chos srung gag/ med 'dras pas kun// ye zhes dngos med pabye ma zhenas nga la rig pa phye med 'dus pas can// rig pargyang na ba nga la snang srid thams cad 'dus pas kun// rig pa ldan grub ngul 'bras bu byad med rmi la bsaH// dag pa
31a5(rnying rgyud): spyong po'i rang las la shes shes labs btsun pas rgya// gsal ba 'dzin med nga la rig pa rtog med bzhug pasaH// snang sto dbyung med dang las reg pa kun thal bzhag pasaH// dper na rim chen gas glang sbyin pa bzhin// mde'i bag med sna ba
31a6(rnying rgyud): gsasu gyung // de na pa nadu bang po gas rtags nas / na pang ma ni mam 'i pas pa // ta nyid dpa'ang ni ming sa rjod // de cing med dug cig pa zeng // ga
31b1(rnying rgyud): sarnas pa 'dang // dang sasu du byung nga/ ma na da nas // kun nakyis pang baspyod dam // nanas krung chu mams pa sa gad+ha/ par sems dpa' dam nan
31b2(rnying rgyud): cig/ chos thams cad kun tu bzang po lnga'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin kun tu bzang po dang / ma ga ri pa ma ma na ngon/ sbyin le zhes slong du 'dus la so rte dzidi rtogs so// de sa rig pa nga pa las bya ring yinas so/
31b3(rnying rgyud): rig ni nyis shi tha da pa ga sa pas das bshes ning de yang ma das/ dang pa shang das btong ba legs kyi gi ngas na// gyan kun tu bzang po dang / rig pani / stong ba can pa/ ltung ba'i mnas cing 'argyan pa/ ye shes 'dod kyis brgyan pa/ 'od lags ba ma dres pa bcan pa/ gsal ba' sgragasu ma dper med ces bcang ngo // debang
31b4(rnying rgyud): drug su bye na pa na 'das 'o// ston pa kun tu bzang po dang / mi ci nas na pa tshul nga la dang rlob 'am na ba gang // de yang drug supam rnam pa dang / mthul ba mi ma sunams can na mgang de bzhin rna // rig pa kun tu bzang po dang / mashi nas so 'do shapa/ seman pa tho ba sa bcas
31b5(rnying rgyud): las thol pa'i cos su/ dbugs las tho ba'i mo nas/ babyung ba nga grol da did dang / rig pa sung dag nyid/ walas byung ba'i gshes ma gags pa/ shes ngabagi bad tid du gang pa/ bas ma pa dang la pa dag pa'o// rtogs pa kun tu bzang po'o/ na chos kyi la phye ba dang rtogs pa/ rig pa da gas la gag por khyod do ga pa'i sra togasapa/
31b6(rnying rgyud): dge cing bang snang ba thul da'i bur rtogag pa/ rig pa nig nyig gcig ging tshong su gsum ru 'jal med pa rtogs pa'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ tsi na t-i brgyad kyi chos thams da kun tu bzang po lnga'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// bkod pa rin po che rnam par 'grel pa'i don/
31b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud chen po 'dis shes par bya'o// kye ma rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ rin po che rnam par bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ma bris par bkra/ rang 'tsha 'i nyas tshu man / ye shes bstan pa'i ri rgyal senan gyi pa ni ma brtsegs par dpangs mtho// ye shes brdal ba'i
32a1(rnying rgyud): bzung na sarnam thas sa// mnas mang sangs na martags par gsapa pa dang// gnas gsal pa na san ma byas pa sas pa sa sa 'chang chub mar
32a2(rnying rgyud): sa
32a3(rnying rgyud): na 'a sems dpa / ngas bstan ma
32a4(rnying rgyud): dal @gcigs / dmas gca
32a5(rnying rgyud): sa gyu
32b1(rnying rgyud): 'das// ngani dag pa can tu bzang // nga rna rang rig byang chub 'ams// lan kyang sems kun tu bzang // nga ma sems la car d+hAng rdzogs// ngan rtags pa kun tu bzang // kran bzang dang la gnas pa yi// rnal 'gyur bad gshegs sa la gnas//
32b2(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i don ldan kun bzang ma yengs dang // kun tu bzang mo dog med yangs pa'i klong // kun tu bzang po rgya chen kun la rol// kun bzang yab yum gnyis med gcig gi tshul// rtogs pa'i don ldan kun tu bzang mo'i ngang // 'gyur med b+ha ka
32b3(rnying rgyud): yangs pas sna tshogs cir yang 'char// b+ha ga'i nang na snang srid thams cad sdud// yum gyi b+ha ga stong pa chen po'i yul// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis 'gro ba yongs la khyab// 'dzin med bgrod med lam la gnas pa'i kun bzang byang chub sems//
32b4(rnying rgyud): kun bzang zhal ni phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs// kun gzigs kun tu bzang po'i phru la mdun rgyab med// yum gyi b+ha ga bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// kun rdzob yul la mi gnas tshig gis mtshon du med// don dam ngang las kun bzang cho 'phrul 'gyur//
32b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad yid bzhin 'byung bas kun bzang rin chen gter// zad med gter la longs spyod kun tu bzang mo'i klong // don dam mthun pa'i ye shes rtags mchog ldan// ma bris dkyil 'khor 'od gsal bde ba'i sku// kun bzang thugs kyi dkyi
32b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor mthis yongs la gsal// kun bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mo long 'od po che// thugs mchog dkyil 'khor ma bsrubs dang gis grul// spu yi dkyil 'khor ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i don// sra mkhregs rdo rje 'jigs pa kun dang bral//
32b7(rnying rgyud): stong nyid 'jigs med ye shes gsal bas brgyan// nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa// ye shes sgron mas 'gro ba yongs la khyab// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen tshul// 'bar ba'i 'od zer phyogs bcu gang bar 'gro// kye ma ma bgyid rin chen
33a1(rnying rgyud): ma can su sa ma na du du na / sa ma
33a2(rnying rgyud): smradu
33a3(rnying rgyud): sa
33a4(rnying rgyud): thag gas ya ma da sadus brjid ma pa ga bzhin gagags dun dpanashes sha 'thang da
33a5(rnying rgyud): sa
33a6(rnying rgyud): ma na pas shesan bad
33a7(rnying rgyud): martson pa ni bzang 'a bani pa/ thong gas
33b1(rnying rgyud): nya nas/ brnam pa can tu pabang bgasal ba 'dzin med pa nam na sa rna dgas ngas sa zhan das/ lta ba kun tu babang po khams gsum thig mar blta/ bas maman sa da/
33b2(rnying rgyud): sa gas da pa// 'bras bu can tu bzang po yi shes tshig tshangs mi da nga dad sa/ du mchog kun tu bzang po ba de chen 'od 'bang du da na mas // gsung mchog kun tu bzang po 'gag
33b3(rnying rgyud): med to la 'i te / tshangs pa'i dbyangs// thugs mchog kun tu bzang po thas jog pa dpa nasapa dran rtog dbyings su stsol// phrin las kun du bzang bya na kyims lazhom btsal lhun gyis brab// yon tan kun tu bzang ba dang chu //
33b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs cir yang 'char// rdo rje kun tu bzang po mi 'gyur rig pa'i dang / she ste // rig pa kun tu bzang po stong gsal dpyir med dang / pa da// ye shes kun tu bzang po zang ma rjo dag/ gsal 'grib yongs kyis med// snang ba kun tu bza
33b5(rnying rgyud): pa da kyi snang ba'adi nyid pa cag cir snang rig pa'i thogs// shes rab kun tu bzang po tsho thams cadakyi med nyonas/ rnam dag don la spyod// ye shes me yi sa bzhes pas kyang tsha da/ kun bzang dang la spyod// rig pa'i rlung gis ma bskyod dbyings su gshegs// shes rab
33b6(rnying rgyud): chu yis thams cad gcig tu sdud// ma brgyad mkha' la de bzhin rig pa gsal// gsal la ma yengs hA ting dpag dka' ba'i dang // stong gsal brdal ba bde chen dbyings la spyod// rtse gcig gsal ba don dam dbyings kyi dang // ma 'dres rdzogs na
33b7(rnying rgyud): lhun grubs la gnas// dmigs med mthong na ye shes mkha' lags la// shes rab don la mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral// rdzogs chen a ti 'gyur med klong na sgra// dper nag can gzan rgyal po seng ge ni// gangs kyi stangs na gnas shing sder chags zil
34a1(rnying rgyud): gyis gnon// de bzhin rdzogs chan a ti ni// kye med don cha ston gyi theg dman zil gyis gnon// 'gyur med a ti'i ngang la rig pa byar mdags pa// zhes gyon pa kun tu bzang bas ngan pa cha rags kyi sems dpa' rnams pa
34a2(rnying rgyud): nga rang gi don bstan to// zhes kun tu bzang po thugs kyi me long gi chud chen po las/ kun tu bzang po'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang kyi brtan ga pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol
34a3(rnying rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dang ldan pa/ don thams cad 'gyur ba'i gter gsung du gsol/ rton pas bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho// pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' nyon// snang srid ma bcos chos chu'i ngang // ye shes ma bcos thugs la re la// 'byung
34a4(rnying rgyud): ba ma bcos yongs chu'i ngang // kha dog ma bcos dbyings la rol// sems can ma bcos sprul lu'i rang // thugs rje ma bcos 'gab med klong // kun gzhi ma bcos bde chen dag// rig pa ma bcos nam mkha'i rmong // ye shes ma bcos rnam dag
34a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'dog ma bcos ma 'dres gsal// gnyis med ma bcos stong pa'i ngang // rang byung mi bcos rig pa'i sgor// 'od ldam bcos gsal ba'i ngang // sems nyid ma bcos rig pa'i dang // yid rnams ma bcos ye shes 'ang// 'gyu byed
34a6(rnying rgyud): bcas yid kyi 'od// sems ma bcos sangs rgyas dngos// ma rig ma bcos rig pa dngos// drug ldam bcos ye shes lnga// sems can srog ma bcad na sangs mi rgya/ lege la gas rdzog sa ngan // srog bcad sdig par 'gyur ba na/
34a7(rnying rgyud): rigs kyang na pa chu ba dang ca ga// ye nas chad pa su la sdig/ srog bcad sdig par zag pa ny-i dzang ba dang su mgyur ba/ mi 'gyur rang gi bde chen sa// dus gsum sangs rgyas srog bcad nyon mo khron gas makyis cad pas/ mngon sangs rgya// chos la gnas na byed dpa
34b1(rnying rgyud): rgyad rdzog pa rdal yin pas grang b.rabya// sangs rgyas mi bsgrubasangs rgyas bsgrubs na srung bar 'thur/ na/ sems can mdzang thang sa rgyas ngas myiH/ ga ya
34b2(rnying rgyud): byas dge rtsa mi bya 'dus byas dge rtsa byas na snang ba 'di gags ma nag tu mangs rgyas pa'i tshig/ 'jig par 'gyur// sangs rgyas bsgom pa ma yin bsgom+ba nangan song chu// lha la mchod pa mi 'bu la yul na ha sram cu rtsa gsum dpa la med pa'i rgya
34b3(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal chen por 'gyur// sbyin pa la sogs pha rol phyin pa drug mi spyad/ rang gi rig par bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir// spyad na rtsol ba'i bsam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas yod pa ma yin stong nyid gcig pu nyid// gud na med rang
34b4(rnying rgyud): sa byung ba'i phyir// ngan song yod pa ma yin pa de chen 'khor ba'i ngang / rig pa'i don togasan// ting 'dzin la sogs sangs rgyas sru la sgrib pa yin/ rtsol ba med pa'i tshig/ bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa/ gsal ba yod pa'i phyir/ nga la sgrib pa yin// mchod pa phyag
34b5(rnying rgyud): rgya la sogs pa la sgrib pa yin/ lha rang batshong ba phyir// snang ba chos skur 'dod pa nga la sgrib pa yin// ci snang sems su 'dod pa ngal sgrib pa yin// rang byung gzhan las 'dod pa tshig pa nga kyang 'i tshi/ nga la sgrib pa yin// srid pa'i bar do 'dod pa nga la sgrib pa
34b6(rnying rgyud): yin ma banyin pa dopa byas pa gyir// ye shes sems su 'dad pa yanas la bgachags med pa'i phyir/ nga la sgrib pa yin// sangs rgyas sku ni ma bsgribs yangs lus ngas rgyas kyi bu sems canas grub pa'i byig gsal// spril med rnam dag gyang chub brdal ba'i klong //
34b7(rnying rgyud): grib rgya ma dmigs sgri bgyed ma 'gags shing // de yi phyir na sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas med yang med// 'dzin pa med pas sems can yul yang med// rtog pa med pas ma rig 'khrul pa med// zhen pa med pas sna tshogs yul yang med// chags pa
35a1(rnying rgyud): zugs thams kya cad// 'das pa mad pas ma 'das pa yang na// dusu 'a bzhan du man dag na par dang
35a2(rnying rgyud): sa
35a3(rnying rgyud): mas / ma /
35a4(rnying rgyud): spyan kun bzung yab// la ba rgya'i sgrib pA d+ha rAH// gal ba'i rnam pa gsung drug sa/ zhes rnam sa// de nas sbyin pas bkang stsal pa// ma patir rnam nga/ sa yinas par ri ma // byang chub
35a5(rnying rgyud): ma sems las sa sargyasas ni
35b1(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa phrul nan 'dadan na ma ga sa mas gal ba yin// chas sungad rtag pa sa dzud pa las gal ba son// salam 'bras ca dad par lasag ma pa 'on// stang pa yul lan nam khang la sagal 'dzan// mtshan ba cas bzhan
35b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung bsgom pa 'i gang las gol ba yin// rtog pa lam du khyer na yabang las gol ba yin// byang chub 'dzin par 'dod na la gang las gol ba yin// mtshan ma'i tshig la zhen pa nga las gol ba yin// ting 'dzin nam gsum 'dod pa ats+tsha shar las gol ba yin/
35b3(rnying rgyud): cig char rim gyis 'dod pang las gol ba yin// sdang srid thams cad 'od kyi sdang ba la// sdang srid tha mal bzung bas khyod kyis gol// rang gi phung po sangs rgyas dngos yin la// sha khrag phung po 'khrul par mthong bas khyod kyis gol// 'di ltar snang
35b4(rnying rgyud): dag snang chen po la// 'khrul pa'i snang ba rtag par mthong bas khyod kyis gol// zhing khams sum brtsegs rang las 'char ba la// zhing khams gzhan nas 'dod pas khyod kyis gol// ma rig 'khrul pa rig pa'i bdag nyid la// ma rig spang bar
35b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas khyod kyis gol// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rang la gnas pa la// dkyil 'khor gzhan nas bri ba khyod kyis gol// sangs rgyas ma bskyed rang las byung ba la// sangs rgyas bsgom zhing bsgrubs pas khyod kyis gol// byang chub rtog medang
35b6(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa la// 'dus byas dge rtsa byas pas khyod kyis gol// gsang sngags rgyal po tshig las 'das pa la// tshig dang yi ger bzung bas khyod kyis gol// don gyi snying po skye shi med pa la// skye dang 'chi bar bzung bas khyod kyis dol// chos su
35b7(rnying rgyud): bsam pa kun dang bral ba la// bsam pa sna tshogs khyod kyis 'azlas pas gol// yongs sgyu ma 'dres cir yang gsal ba la// ma rtogs gti mug la dor bar bzung bas khyod kyis gol// srul mu sems can rnams dang mthun par snang ba'o//
36a1(rnying rgyud): shAn / smra// na
36a2(rnying rgyud): ga
36a3(rnying rgyud): rgya pa smras pams mau na kyinas 'a smin pas me sa thun gas sa/ gsasal pa'an 'i phyi'i sring bsha/ nang nam ma ming sar tu
36a4(rnying rgyud): brnam par 'chog/ ba dus degatsug rgyuzhi ba'ang bad dang mide yo thong byis kyi byung bdang gsas pa'i ma mer gdadug/ dper nyi ma kyil mo
36a5(rnying rgyud): 'a 'das sa
36b1(rnying rgyud): bgyid zhog/ rtogs pa 'don la rig pa 'char nub med// 'dzin med dang la rig pa byar med gsal// bya dang byed pa'i chosi ni sdug bsngal gru// bya ba btang ba'i rdal 'byang mya ngan 'da'// mthar gyinas la mi 'gyur rig pa gsal/
36b2(rnying rgyud): bzod med la ma la rig pa'i ting la mabyung // rnam dag mkha' la rin pa 'od du 'dam// rad can ma 'dres sa par bzhin gshegs// demand yi dbang du mi 'gyur 'thung brtan// bad gshegs ngan mchog mad yi ge med// tshi ga dang
36b3(rnying rgyud): ger btags pas ston pa 'khrul// 'dzin pa'i yul la zhen pa'i spyod pa med// me bapyod don la bzhag na rig pa bde ba'i blo// sna tshogs cir yang 'char ba 'ang chen sprul pa'i sgra// d+ha ma gcig tu sdud pa shes rab rang byung chu// gsal la 'dzin
36b4(rnying rgyud): pa med pas bya btsal bral ba'i sku// 'gyur med dang la gnas pas rdo rje snying pa'i sgra// ma bskyong dbyings nas shar bas rig par 'i shar su// bshigs pas mi shigs stong nyid snying po'i tha// skad cig dang la mi gnas ye shes che ba chod su// 'dzin
36b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tog pas me sgrib rtog pas don ldan bu// 'dzin pa'i yul med byang chub snying po'i sku// de ltar 'dzin med skul gnas na shes rab pha rol gyin// de ltar go ba'i yul dang sam kan 'ad 'a che// rtogs pa'i klong las kyi da kyi rdzag mi 'da' shes
36b6(rnying rgyud): rab bya// shes rab slong nas 'a ma / ye shes gtsug phung wa// ma 'dres gsal mdzes lteng re lhan na'o// kun gyi rting pa'i sku ni byang chub don la spyod// gnyis med bde chen klong nas ye shes nyi ma shar// 'gyur med yangs
36b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i klong nas thugs rje'i zla bshar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rig pa'i yi ge a// de las cho 'phrul 'byung bas yi ge ni// de las thugs rje 'byung bas yi ge la// de las nges par gnas pas yi ges// de las 'khrul pa bzlog
37a1(rnying rgyud): pas yi ge sha/ de las gnyis med gnas pas yi ge ma// de las don du sdud pas yi ge oM// de rnams yi ge gcig la 'dog pas yi ge AM// de rnams don la 'jog pas yi ge hUM// de bzhin yi ge rnam pa dgu// 'gag med
37a2(rnying rgyud): dang la de bzhin gnas// yi ge'i sgra ni stong pa'i tshig las 'das// 'dzin med rnam dag spa 'gyur dbu// ma bskyod drang la bzhag na don chen 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bka' stsal to// de nas pad+ma'i sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// em ho//
37a3(rnying rgyud): dmatshar gyi yi ge gsung du gsol/ zhes byas so// yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ a ho// dar+b+ha rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams nyon cig/ ngas chos thams cad b+ha dang yi ge la don bsdus hUM bstan gyis legs par nyon cig/ de yang tha
37a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyang dbyings la bshad de don che'o// rang gi rig pa'i don ma nor bar bshad kyis legs pa ra yid la zung cig/ h+ya d+ha ra nra dA dA A/ u myos thams cad bye ba med pa rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal phye ba med pas chim med parang byung ba de ba'i bu bya mchad pa'i ye zhes de ni gyi rnying po'o// na bye med pa pal bye 'i tshul du byar bas
37a5(rnying rgyud): sems ca ci gtunas rjo gra tung nas thag ma rig pa de bang nga gis 'ayos shes pas pan do/ nga/ de bar shag pa med pa bus ma u ba pa'i me shes drags rje ma 'gags pa do byed tu mchi yang rna ni cir yang zhes brtog pa med pa da yang ma 'gags pa kun tugs pa pa'o// sa/ rdzogs pa chen po 'gyur ba med pa'i brtapa pa dag lam la mi gnas pa don ci ye zhes de 'di ga/ chos nyid tu ba med pa'i sa ma sun gyis byab ba
37a6(rnying rgyud): ye she ci cod kyis pa na pa jonas pa sa brgyas so/ sha/ de bang shes pa kyi la grol ba byed pa na 'a nga do sags pabazang sa mas kyi 'i chog pa'i sa la gnas pa des tshob nyid kyis la don pa 'o sa par rangs byas so// ma/ de yang matam nyid nyis pa me dang chogs dang bram pa ga pa rtog pa med pa gas pa la dngas pa/ ye she'i da dang cas pa'o// oM/ de yang
37a7(rnying rgyud): bla ma gags pa nis kyis brtsan nas yong ba/ de la 'od kyis brgyan nas yod nga/ de la bang pa bkran brgyar 'od po'o// ai/ o kyi thus ca dam bgyi dang/ 'tho da ngo da dus cha rbad rtag pa'i shes shing mgados do// hUM/ de yang sprul ba'i bud nyis de'o/ thal med par rtogs pa'i ba shes te don ci stir ngo'o// a/ de rnams thams cad bye ched du la bzlab chog kyi bu bye med stong ba'i rang 'din no//
37b1(rnying rgyud): mnas gas gags dpa samams sa gad sa stonasagadang dag pa' bas thas chags dpas cam byang ra bdang sa/ sa dbyar bdang gathos pan nga pa dadag na das mas kyasasasabacas thatha sa par chag lasas ma thag ga ga'adas na/
37b2(rnying rgyud): rlob so/ d+ha ma/ cho ci chu bsam pa da pa 'i rin ma nyid kyi 'o// sa mra chosamams cad dod ci sa das 'o/ ka ma/ dag pa'i ba ne gyi rnang pa 'byod podo// de bang tha mu pa do dngo'o/ d+hanI/ dbyi dang bshes nyis pa med pa dod ston pa bye mi na pa'i da thogs che ci do/ sa za/ yi zhe mas 'i 'ongs kyil 'ad kyi
37b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du rig pa dang dang ba/ bus med par drang ba dang lpags kya 'char ba'o// g+ha ha/ rig bdag pa'i bum 'asrig pa yongs la gsal brtog pa'i dri ma med pa'o// d+ha pa ri yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus sa stong pa nyid ye shes kyi lus can gyur ba med pa rtswa rtag par yod pa'i don rang gis shes pa'o// sarba/ chos thams cad bu gsu mchi dbo las ma 'das pa'i rig pa sa das na gsal ba'i le
37b4(rnying rgyud): shes ci yad nyid do// yA sho/ de dag pa se shes kyi tha la shes nga 'azhag pa med pa ga thag med pa'o/ d+ha ni/ shes ra gyi nalas 'das nas 'bral ba las sngon go// de yang dang yo dpa 'i nyir du 'o pa yar/ sarba/ chos thams cad tong ba'i nga zhin cogs da'i ched brdzang ba cang du sa ba bed pa do/ dA sto nyi 'bri la 'i rto par
37b5(rnying rgyud): rang na zhes pa gang gang bya ba sa med pa/ pa ma/ yongs pas na pas 'das pa'o// de bang thag 'i shag par sa mad/ ma da la ga kyig cin pa// su b+ha/ 'bral ga gags na pa dag d+hang la yongs su mya dngas dang papo d+ha dra/ de bang bya 'a du drab 'o// 'dab pa das gtang 'a / sha hra/ shes bdag pas dang thad bye bye du
37b6(rnying rgyud): grol ba don gyi le zhes dang 'ayang migadas so// sarba/ chos thams cadas dang lam la mngon par mi zhen te ti'i phyir gen dngas pos stong pa'i phyir ro// san ti/ ming gyur ba'i rig pa dang gis to gas pa dbye mi byed pa'o/ par/ stong pa'i lam las thugs rje'i da byeng ba de yang ma 'gags pa'i ye shes so/ sarba/ de thams cad tshig la mi gnas pa'i ye shes 'khor
37b7(rnying rgyud): ba'am ga pa pa/ Ta du rba/ 'ang sa yi 'i yo kyin/ ye/ yang d+ha da ge ba na / sarba/ mtha sems cad kya nga sa pa kyis bsla pa/ thadangs na lakhri bad te tu nga ma na kyi nyi na yas med pa dan do nyi / sathamams cad gragapas pabs
38a1(rnying rgyud): na na
38a2(rnying rgyud): du su
38a3(rnying rgyud): sa
38a4(rnying rgyud): na rgyasmra sa
38a5(rnying rgyud): sa du sa
38b1(rnying rgyud): gyu na ga nan
38b2(rnying rgyud): das pa
38b3(rnying rgyud): 'dan da#ga su ma ma ma sacad du/ 'dem
38b4(rnying rgyud): na ying sras su 'o/ 'asal bas tang bzhinan gyi ma dang / gas pan dpapa mdang / mi spar ba ste ngan ci ga nga mam tang pa la nis kyimacos pathabapa brjod ga rnams si chu pa napa 'di ci bras nyi gas
38b5(rnying rgyud): nganacag tsa nyi nyam pa las ma 'dasasas byam sarigags dag shesagag sa ta ba ma na pagle ces thab na / paca mas sa ma gzhanas gsas da' da zhems
38b6(rnying rgyud): na / da ba nasags ta dan pa 'i da.a ta ma hA hA d+hi sa tu stong ba'i yig bsgrags // yang dag 'jogs tshang rgya ba'i thangs
38b7(rnying rgyud): drug gi sbal bsdus te bstan pan// de nas pa mang+gA'i jig kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi don thugs pa chud do// zhes kun tu bzang ba thugs kye ma ma ga chen pa las/ gol bri ba la bzla ba'i leT ste gsum pa'o//
39a1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang las kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis 'diska cismranas pa// mya ston pa phran tubacang // dang dang dan rnams gsung drun dum/ smras chu bzlas so// kun pazang yab kyis bka' stsam // kye 'dus pas/

39a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil nas gzhi'i ste de la sra gsum nye thams ci gsas nga ma rdzogs nas thod do// rdzogs shing 'phro// rang byung thabs rig pa/ ldan su ni ma bsgribs 'gro ba yongs la khyab// chos rba// nyag gcig dgongs pa'i don rnams sna tshogs cir yang 'char zhing 'phro// blo med bsku med dang

39a6(rnying rgyud): rab blo la rim gyis ma yin cig char 'char// de rnams man chad blo la rim gyis 'char zhing zhag res brtan par 'gyur// pag chags skabs dang thal ba'i tshe// yang dag pa la bde chen mi g.yo bskyod pa'i tshe// rtse mo man tshad ma// bar mdo la snang ba re re

40a1(rnying rgyud): nam ngas 'dags na// gsal yang dngan pa 'ad ba phyogs cu ganga'ang ga// dmigs pa'i yul mdu 'angan par mtha' 'as gros// drag zung sa gas chag pa dam par dag/ 'ang na mad drang

40a4(rnying rgyud): 'gags na dag pa'i snang ba 'thar// bag chags byebs kyis ye shes rgyu lus brjig// lus 'di dor nas dzod kyi snang ba 'char// de la gnas ni rin chen zla byas la mthar gyin 'gyur// slebs gsum gcig tu 'dril nas sgrub pa phyags

46b5(rnying rgyud): 'od nyid la brtag/ thig le rnams kyi tshad 'dzin pa// dra ba mig tshags warba sh+tsad kyi bar la brtag/ rnal 'byor goms pa'i tshad 'dzin pa// rig pa tshad la phebs thig le las bu/ la brtag/ spos med rang dag tshad 'dzin pa// bsrub rgya rnams dang bral
46b6(rnying rgyud): bar zad pa brtag/ bde ba rang gnas tshad 'dzin pa// yab sum gyi snyoms 'dug mkha' mnyam dag tu brtag/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshad 'dzin pa// snang srid phyag rgya'i zhing la brtag/ rig pa rtsal dbang tshad 'dzin pa// gzhi spyod lus ngag brda' la brtag sem gyi//
46b7(rnying rgyud): srog shing dam tshig tshad 'dzin pa// gde ldan mi 'dang rgyan pa ye bsrungs rang bzhin med pa nyid la brtag/ tha snyad grub mtha'i tshad 'dzin pa// thig le nyin cin ltos dang bral la brtag/ thig le gyi nang tshad 'dzin pa// rig pa mkha' lding rin phres pa nyid la brtag/
46b8(rnying rgyud): dran pa rnams kyi tshad 'dzin pa// sgo lnga'i shes pa tham ngon pa nyid la brtag/ gsal ba rnams kyi tshad 'dzin pa// yul rgyan rtsa gcagapa sa drang sogs bral ba'i mtshams su brtag/ theg pa phyir rang yang byung // rtag pa nyid kyi tshad 'dzin pa// martogs pa'i dran pasangs
47a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas grwa baDAg/ 'don pa kun gyi tshad 'dzin pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs pa sonas/ wa la brtag/ ma rig rtsa ba'i tshad 'dzin pa// yod med rtag ca gnyis kyi mtshams su brtag/ nyon mongs rnams kyi tshad 'dzin pa// glo bu rA dbu'i rtsas das
47a2(rnying rgyud): gyen gyi dus su brtag/ 'gu byed yid kyi tshad 'dzin pa// gang bas ma mar shes pa min 'i tshad yul gyi snang ba brtag/ bdag 'dzin blo yi tshad 'dzin pa// 'gyu byed 'gyu ba'i gro long yang lung bal mtshams su brtag/ shes rab chen po'i tshad 'dzin pa// yul gyen chod pa'i sgo
47a3(rnying rgyud): shaM/ bar du brtag/ rtog med rang sa tshad 'dzin pa// tha rags bral ba'i dbang gi rdzas dag mtshams su btag/ dwang sa ma lnga yi tshad 'dzin pa// 'byung ba min pad dag pa'i dus na brtag/ ye shes rnams kyi tshad 'dzin pa// rang gdangs sa 'a'ado yul sdang tshon brtag
47a4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku yi tshad 'dzin pa// gnod pa bral ba'i dus su brtag/ longs sku nyid kyi tshad 'dzin pa// rig pa ma bu 'phred pa'i tshe na brtag/ sprul pa su yi tshad 'dzin la// phyed phyed nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing 'ams mtshams su brtag/ bla ma'i man ngag tshad 'dzin pa// thang
47a5(rnying rgyud): pa 'byung ba dengs pa'i dus su btag/ snying po rnams kyi tshad 'dzin pa// thig le 'dus pa'i dus su brtag/ was rtags drod kyi tshad 'dzin pa// rtag \u0f7f res 'jog bral ba'i dus na brtag/ gnyis kyi/ yang kyang // gsung gi sgra yi tshad 'dzin pa// sred pa gzhir bzhengs mang min
47a6(rnying rgyud): chos rnams nas gdus su brtag/ ba rang gnas mi 'gyur sku yi tshad// 'byung ba zang mesas mi nang pa'i dus na brtag/ ye shes thugs kyi tshad 'dzin pa// snang ba thab gyi ma ming gzhir bzhag dus su brtag/ dgongs pa rnams kyi tshod 'dzin pa// rig pa gong das gong / srang la theb par
47a7(rnying rgyud): btag/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshad 'dzin pa// bas la 'dra nas gsum dang bral bar brtag/ chos nyid mi ga yo'i tshad 'dzin pa// gang mabakyis mnyam pa nyid kyi dus na btag/ lhag mtho nyi gyi tshad 'dzin pa// bla ma'i gdams ngang ga pa nyid la
47b1(rnying rgyud): brtag/ 'bad med rang grol tshad mi rtse 'dzin pa// khregs tshod thod rgal ma cang hab ba mtshams su brtag/ lus gnas ye shes tshad 'dzin pa// 'dug stangs spang ba mi 'drab sa ge dang drang grang sa sags pa/ rnams kyi dus na brtag/ yid ches goms pa'i tshad 'dzin pa// nyams myong
47b2(rnying rgyud): goms pa'i dus na brtag/ sku gsum 'bras bu'i tshad 'dzin pa// chos rnams tshalang mayin pa shes/ zad pa'i dus na brtag/ thugs rjes don byed tshad 'dzin pa// ye shes mkhyen pa'i nam ma cad na / dus na brtag/ kha dog dbyibs zang tshad 'dzin
47b3(rnying rgyud): pa// sa la 'byung ba'i gnod bral dus na brtag/ 'byung ba rnams kyi tshad 'dzin pa// 'od dang byungs gyi nang gnyis kyi mtshams su brtag/ de ltar tshad rnams brtags pa yis// don gyi yid ches ngo sprod pa'o// zhes gsungs pas gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs
47b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor de dag rab tu dang bskyes te/ glo'i dri ma thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis dag nas/ de dag gi tshad rnams dus gcig la zin par gyur te/ mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
47b5(rnying rgyud): kye bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi tshad bka' stsal pa/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de rnams kyi tshad 'di ltar gtan la phebs pa lags na// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang / de bzhin du 'gyur ba lags pas/ bdag cag dang ma 'odra ba'i
47b6(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams kyi spros pa'i gdung ba gang gis chad pa lags/ thugs rje chen pos bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ ces zhus so// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye gsang ba'i bdag po khrod nyon cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i
47b7(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams kyi spros pa 'di dag rnams kyis chod par 'gyur ro// gyi snang ba thams cad la rdo sprad pas/ nang du lta ba yid la gsal bar skye ba yin no// de yar snang ba thams cad sems su ro sprad pas/ sems nyid sna tshogs su go ba'o// de'i tshe chos thams cad kyi 'du byed la
48a1(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa zhes bya ste/ mig dang / mag gi rnam par nus pa dang / rna ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / snga'i rnam par shes pa dang / lde dang / lha rnam par shes pa dang / sras dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams kyi bzhin nyid shes pas
48a2(rnying rgyud): lus yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ gzugs kyi phung po rnam par dag/ nam mkha' yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag/ sa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ rnam shes
48a3(rnying rgyud): gyi phung po rnam par dag/ rlung yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pas/ snang ba thams cad rten gzhal yas khang du ngo srid pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas la longs spyod pa zhes bya ba yin no// kye ro rje sems dpa' sems nyid lha'i rang bzhin du
48a4(rnying rgyud): rdo sprad pas/ sku nyid gsal ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid dam par go bas/ sangs rgyas rnams dang gdan gcig la gnas pa yin te/ gzugs su thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rang byung / thA su thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rang byung / dri sku thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rang byang
48a5(rnying rgyud): cho sku thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rang byung / reg su thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rang byung ste snang ba thams cad srur po smad pas/ brten pa lha'i mu ro sprad pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya'o// kye gsang ba'i bdag po nyon cig/ rdo rje sku yi rang bzhin
48a6(rnying rgyud): pas// mi 'gyur mi shigs dang du gnas// bzla gsung gi rang bzhin pas// ma 'gags 'gab med snying por gnas// 'khor lo thugs kyi rang bzhin pas// me tog bsam gtan chen por gnas// sku gsum mi 'gyed dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas rnams
48a7(rnying rgyud): gyi thabs shar ba// zhen pa sgos theg pa bcad // ngagra ba drug gi ga yangs zhum// snang babang pa 'di thugar/ zhes pa nasas dam yang tshig tu bsgrags nas gsang ba'i bdag pa ma 'di ska ces bka ma / kyi gsang ba'i bdag pa/ nga nga nying srung par ba/ ngas/
48b1(rnying rgyud): du sa na da
48b2(rnying rgyud): gidang rnyed pa'o// kye gsang ba'i bdag po ton cig/ chu'i snang ba med pas kun thab chen po'i snang brnyed/ sa'i snang bar nga byung bas/ khyab bdal chen pa'i stong pa rnyed// mi'i snang pa 'a rdzogs pas// rang gsal chen pa'i stong pa rnyed// rlung gi ldang ba rang sangs pas// bapyo nga chen po'i stong pa rnyed// dam
48b3(rnying rgyud): mkha ldang ba me dngas pas// dag pa yul gyi stong pa rnyed ces dam pa'i tshig tu brjod nas/ yang gsong ba'i bdag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rtse gsang pa'i bdag pa rdo rje 'dzin/ stong btid gsal bar nga smad pas stong pa nyid blta ba rnams dang mi byed par byed nas/ sril dang dzin pa
48b4(rnying rgyud): thams ca dang sa dag ste/ miganas pa'i grong mkha' mnyam dag pa'i gnas pa/ ji rje snyed pa'i ru po dang du len pa zad po gsal ba'i rtsal zhes ma pa'i don byes te/ chos thams cad ci 'bras bral dbang thob nis rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don la gnas pa'o// kye ma gsang pa'i bdan
48b5(rnying rgyud): nyon cig sanas med pa'i snang payis// masal 'byung ba rang ba 'du nga byed// byed kyang gzas mi'i stong pa'is// phu gsum mngon pa'i rjod ldang rnyed// 'byung bzad pa'i stong pa yis// nal 'byor ba na pa'i dod sdang rnyed/ rgyun du gnas pa'i stong pakris/
48b6(rnying rgyud): gas ma bzhag pa'i 'od thang rnyed// dar mtha' la mi gnas stong pa yis// cig sdig grol 'od rnyed// ces dam pa'i tshig tu brjod nas/ yang gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rdzo gsang ba'i bdag pa/ gsal ba rig par du srid pas// gsal ba nyid mtha'
48b7(rnying rgyud): nga rnam par 'byed pa'i ring ldang dran nas/ dris thams cad las 'das pa'i dgar de'ang byung / yin tan thams cad rdzun pa'i ser ngo rang byung / ma btsal bzhag pa'i dmar pa rang byung / bya btsam rdzogs pa'i ljang gu rang byung / mi 'gyur khyab pa'i mthing gar rang bung ba la/ gsang ba
49a1(rnying rgyud): bdag pa rdo rje 'dzin pa che// sku yi gsal chas rig pa dri med mthong// thig le'i gsapa chas rig brtag gcig mthong // ya shas gsal chas rig pa ya dngas mthong // dbyings kyi gsal chas rig pa ni rang yul mthong // sgron ma'i gsal ches rig pa'i rang ngo mthong //
49a2(rnying rgyud): 'od lnga'i gsal chas rig pa'i kha dog mthob// snang ba'i gsal chas rig pa'i rang bzhin mthong // shes rab gsal chas rig pa'i 'dug tshul shes// zhes brjod nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye gsang ba'i bdag po khyor/ yid gzhan
49a3(rnying rgyud): ma yengs par nyon cig/ rig pa dang dbyings ro sprad pas rig pa nyid yul thams cad kyi bdag nyid du byung ste/ de nyid gnas kun la longs spyod pa zhes bya bar rdo rje snying po'i tshig tu ngas bstan to// de'i phyir na/ sngon du ga snang pa'i yul la mkhas pas/ dran pa thams cad kyi sgo bkag pa zhes bya ste/
49a4(rnying rgyud): de nyid kyis de nyid grol ba'i man ngag gzhi rnam par dag pas la ma mngon du shar ba ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa'i don la mkhas pa zhes bya bar rang byung ba yin pas/ bdag nyid lung thams cad kyi lung du rig pa nyid byung ba'o// kye gsang gA'i bdag po nyon cig/ gzhi 'gan
49a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rig pa yis// chos nyid 'dus pa'i dbyings dang 'phrad// mtshan nyid dzin pa'i rig pa yis// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings dang 'phreng // lu gu rgyud kyi rig pa yis// rang bzhin 'od gyi dbyings dang 'phrad// ces ramra pa'i tshig rang byung ngo // de nas yang lag ni rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
49a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi don bsdus nas gang zag gcig la rton na ci ltar bgyi/ ston pa nyid kyis bdag la gsungs/ de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ 'di dag tshig tu brjod do// en to// snang ba thams cad sems su ro spad pas sems la byan chud/ sems stong
49a7(rnying rgyud): par ro smad pas rtong par bde ba'i rgyas gdab/ stong pa rig par ngo sprad pas rig pa nyid dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'o// de'i phyir na// 'bral rnams spru la sku la ngo sprad pas snang ba 'di gtan la de bas/ longs rtsom rtsa rkyod rdzogs pa'i sku la ngo smad pas
49b1(rnying rgyud): dad brlang ba btan la ngas/ rgyas mthal gradapas cas nyu gnas dag pa'i sdang ba gtan la thabs pan// dkar 'bral sa dang za pas pas ca da dang du mas pa ma mas
49b2(rnying rgyud): mas da na dang gsas la mas pa sa na tums na dang nga pa rigapa nyid pa
49b3(rnying rgyud): dag sa
49b4(rnying rgyud): rangs sa// der tsha de la gang gnas pa// tsa nyid can thang zad pa'i sag/ zhes thong mas pags pa'i rgyu min pa mas/ yul la spyad pa bstur ba'i ba sasam pa/
49b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa'i 'khor de dag dgra' mgu yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod na// gsang ba zla
49b6(rnying rgyud): rin po che sbas pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po rgyud 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bcud du phyung ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan ngo ngom la dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba skab dpal
49b7(rnying rgyud): brtsegs kyis bgyur ba'o// // dpal sngags kyi srung mas srungs shig/ rdo sprod sbas po'i rgyud la 'grel pa rin po che bstar ba rgyas bya ba yod/ jo khrod sbas pa'i rgyud lam bri bco/
50a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ radz+ra mrak+Sha ma sad+han+d+ha nam/ bad skad du/ mu tig rin pa ma zang pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mag pa' bdag nyid 'khrul pa ma mnga' ba nying la phyag 'tshal la// 'ad ga
50a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ kye ma 'ang shes rig gi cel por rnang ba'i phyi 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid chen po rnams nyon cig/ gzhi rig pa las 'das par bya ba'i rtsal med/ nga med pa'i sngon rol na/ ka dag rang du gnas pa/ 'khrul ba med pa'i rig pa/ 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba
50a3(rnying rgyud): na thungs yod do// de las de ma dag pa las 'di ltar snang ba'i tshe 'phrul gyi sdong dang nang bcad chen po cher byung ste/ rang rnadadu 'khrul pas ma bgos pa'i yul so sor shar ro// de'i tshe yid byed pa po kun tu bang po snang ba 'du byed kyi rgyal po// snang ba la rang dang bdag ris su 'byed pa'i rig pas
50a4(rnying rgyud): mgales kyang sdang ba'i rtog pa du ma ltar bdag 'dzin du byung ngo // 'khrul pa'i snang ba rang dngas pa dag rna zhing bam+bu su rig pa bzhi la bzlog pa'i thab mchog tu bla ma'i man pa/ ngas bstan gyis/ legs pa'i sras dag mi gsum tshul gsum gyis nyon cig/ de nas spyad papo'i don
50a5(rnying rgyud): nga du rtogs pas gsang ba'i bdag pos ji ltar gsungs pa'i don khong du chud nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'di skad rtogs pa che bas glo sung dang bral bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig/ zlos pa che bar rton na/ ma 'khrul pa'i rig pa ka dag tu cha yis ma bgos pa'i snang ba so sor dag pa'i yul gzhal
50a6(rnying rgyud): yas khang dam pa/ rang rang gi/ thugs tsiN+Da'i dkyil 'khor na/ sangs rgyas kyi snang ba dpyod pa'i shes rab rig pa rdo rje rnon po'i sku dang / rig pa rang gi ngo bo rdo rje lu gu khyud kyi sku dang / rig pa rang bzhin rar snang gi sgra dang / rig pa rang dngas su cog bzhag gi sku dang / rig pa thogs pa
50a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rang dag tu gnas sru dang / rig pa gcer snang mthong bag cer grol du byang gi sku dang / de thams cad kyang jo dog dag la rig pa ngo bo'i sku las ma g.yos te/ rang bzhin gyi snang ba mdor bstan pa/ ngo bo'i 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dkar ba dang / ji ma med pas dmar ba dang / yang car rdzogs
50b1(rnying rgyud): sa 'ang // spang du dang / mas pasogs te/ nang rang snang gi 'khor ba sa mchis mi tha' pa dang / tu bzhan gnag cha
50b2(rnying rgyud): dang / 'jigs pa med/ rdo rje'i rigs dang / yon na rdzogs tha / rin po che'i rigs dang / gas pa da sa pad+ma'i rigs dang / byab da 'ang/ las kyi rigs dang / u bo phyug na rdo rje dang / rta ma grin dang / ye shes kyi gshin rje dang / las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i
50b3(rnying rgyud): pa zhes barbad/ tshogs la sogs te/ dpag tu med pa dang / phyi yul la snang ba 'dul ba'i 'khor thub pa drug/ phul ba ltar dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sprul pa'i suM bri si gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'dzin byed rig pa solas gal 'khrul pa'i 'khor 'di lta te/ nyan
50b4(rnying rgyud): rab ba hA
50b5(rnying rgyud): gagyis babangang rtagapa che ma rig pa dang / bsamasems dang / yid dang / kun tu cang byed nga gtan pa ses la nges pa chen pa'i rid kyi rnamashes/ nyon mongs pa 'ad cag pa dag shi mdog gti dang / dbyang dag lan do do/ lnga dang / byas 'dzin pa dang / rtog pa mam mdong dang / mi dge
50b6(rnying rgyud): ba/ la sogs pa dang / de'i spang ba'i 'khor dam ma na pa do rten/ 'di lta te/ yul sdong dang / shes pa bcad dang / dran pa yid dang / mthong byed mig dang / nyan byed rna ba dang / rngom byed pa dang / myong byed kyi dang / 'du byed rdza po dang / gzugs
50b7(rnying rgyud): gas/ dang / sra nyi 'gro med dang / dri zhems pa dang / pa dang / reg bya byas 'a ni nang dang / chos dbya med pa dag la sogs pa dang / ralha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'kho
50b8(rnying rgyud): dab sol bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ba ca 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang / da tsho na mngon pa la sogs pa dang / ha na rnam ni sag 'jig tshogs su blte ba dang / dge tshumo da gas ga sa nyan thos dang / tan the sa
51a1(rnying rgyud): rgyaladung/ / byang chub sems dpang dad ya dang / u ba dang / mi ga dang / ma dang / an+da dang / nyamasanas/ dpag tu zad pa ma rnachags sa srung bdang / nga
51a2(rnying rgyud): cig tu bzhugs so// zhes mu ti ga zung ba'i rgyur gsang ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u te dang pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khrul [ред]pa thams cad dag pa'i mnga' bdag la/ blad pa/ gseng ba'i bdage zo ma sogs pa
51a3(rnying rgyud): rigs gsum gyi khro bo rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// nan / bcom ldan 'phrul med du/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ rab 'khrul pa log na ji ltar gdi rdzog/ bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig
51a4(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' des/ nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ kye maSh+Ton cig gsang ba'i bdag/ dpa pa gan da de 'khrul med kyang // sems can gro lul dz+wA la ba ste// de yang rig pa'i ye shes ma kyi// dbang da 9/ rtsi yis
51a5(rnying rgyud): den mthabs bye ni/ 'das / 'bral pa dang po gnas rdzog/ rang rig ye shes rtogs dag // gnal 'ang/ mtham mas sadang shub ca pa 'thabs// ma ga
51a6(rnying rgyud): 'das rang da tus mar legs su bdal// lu gu chung la rang mi tu dro rtag tu blta// cir sdang rig pa'i sna pa rna chags tu rgolas klong du bskyal// rang rig dang po'i so la so dag/ bzhag/ ma rig pa rtsubad nyid naca byung nyid kyang nas bcad// ye shes snang ba
51a7(rnying rgyud): kyapa mig nas 'chang// 'khrul sa med sngag nam pa rdzog/ ye shes snang ba ma dang bu la ldang // sems kyi cad bcan sem sa dang na kyi kyi ye shes slong // ma ri gzugs dang mingags na/ sra brgyad// rga rje'i rgyun brgyad
51b1(rnying rgyud): 'od su kra ba 'aso rtsayin/
51b2(rnying rgyud): ya shes gsal// reg pa 'amathang bya tang na pa ta mad snang bar 'gyur// 'khrul snang zang das yul sbyang rig pa ka dang tu rang / pang pa dag/ dran pa rgyan bcad chos su'i ngang // 'khar bskye phyung wa gsum rang rdzogs kyiganas gsal// stong pa dngos med ma sa
51b3(rnying rgyud): gsal bas mdzes// dug lnga yi zhe lang dpas mdor phyung sman gyi dag/ 'a nyo/ mun pa'i chu zad sgron ma nyid// 'khrul pa'i rgyu senas med pas zad mo zhes grogs// gsal ba'i spu 'bar gnyis me de dang // sem rig gnyis med 'khor ba ma rabaHsangs/
51b4(rnying rgyud): don gyi ye shes rig pa rang dag/ gzhi la ldog/ don dam kun rdzobu smos pa la snang ba sna tshogs gnyis med pa'o// e ma rta mgrin rgyal po nyon// sems kyi gnas byung bsam pas ma rnyed pa'i// ye shes nyid// rkyen snang yul med/ mngon padang bcog dun na btur cig char pa// 'khru
51b5(rnying rgyud): pa ldog pa'i rdzogs ngo ba ni// lu gu rgyud du thams cad rig pa rang dag tu sangs// dran med yid med pa'i yul gyi dkyil 'khor du// rnam rtog 'dzin pa las grol rgyad chen rig pa nyid gsal// dran pa'i yid kyisnang ba ci snyed pa// 'khrul pa chen po'i
51b6(rnying rgyud): bdag tu bzung ba yin pas// dran pa sangs pa'i nam mkha' rtsa byed dang bas pa la// 'khrul pa de nyid nya sta kag ma bzlog par bya// chos nyid yul s+t+ri nAr ba zhi pa snang ba la// bsam pa'i sres r+b+ba gas snang tsa dngos po ji snyed pa/ ldang ba Tha dag
51b7(rnying rgyud): ga pa sa ni / lab nga pa na / dad 'i bad payi pas// rtanas pa
51b8(rnying rgyud): rab rangan ngas gyis// brtags te rang snang yul la shes pa da tu blta/ 'khor da// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// dran rig gnyis las ma 'das so// kye mnyon cig gshin rje'i rgyal po khyod// rang rig ye shes rang gdapa dang cas pa 'od 'bar bas/
52a1(rnying rgyud): tu tusadu na su na nadu du na/
52a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i bya rdza bzad la ltos// rig pa 'gyur med rab phreng pa'i ye shes zadra// len yosas rang gsal chos nyid yul la 'gyi'o// chos nyid stong pa'i yul gnas pa/ nang sag/ stong pa nyid kyi dpa las la ye shes la// sku yi steng ba mas rang bas ma mi khyab
52a3(rnying rgyud): spang ba'i chos nyid ste med la// sku gsum chos nyid bye med ni/ sad+da ci bas ma 'das dngos por thalas bdag tu mi 'dzin pas// grwa smyung rgyad ltar snang zhing 'ad tha ltar 'byung bye dben mngon ni// rtsig pa'i snang ba las rgya pa'i 'od gsal pa// zhes dang / sna tshogs zhen pa
52a4(rnying rgyud): rang grol ma rig nyid rjeg pa yos te// zhes pa'i bar 'di byung ba gnyis gang yin na cin gang dog gzugs pa ri ma dragangs dbyang / chos su 'di bzhin nyid kyi snang de ni// dran byed bsam pa'i chos med da sems las 'das// chos nyid mA gangos pa'i dbyings rgya ma zad pa las rang byung bas// rnam
52a5(rnying rgyud): rtog rang gi mdud pA yid ma g.yos pas grol// col thub das 'gra bya byed rgyun du mi sdang bas/ bdod na/ 'khrul pa'i ye shes ma la zha/ de tsa/ rang byung ye shes bdag med pas// jo gro ra grol bas lu gu rgyud du shar/ de la/ 'dzin pa med pa'i rang snang ni// gzung bas ma zin sdang ba rang bzhin
52a6(rnying rgyud): chu zla 'dra/ shes rab rtse rtsa la thogs pa med pa'i rang grol ni// khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin// spo bsku ma byas rang sar grol// drob srub med pa nga rdzogs/ rig pa nyid kyi gzung bar dgang ba jo bo ni/ mig gisu lug spro med bsku med dang bu rang thugs su grol// chos kyi sku yi luT rgyad rtsi rang sdang ni/
52a7(rnying rgyud): grang sa nga thadag tsam du snar ba las// dngos pardad byed yid las 'das/ ra'o shig mtshan ma 'dag da snang ba thams cad kun// skye med khyedas ga pa nga thol na chos su thob pa'o// e ma ta// dag pa ye shes sabral sdang med pas// bams po'i rna bsu rgyal ma du mi/
52b1(rnying rgyud): das/ zodas ma na smranamams sa mnas/ na /
52b2(rnying rgyud): steg nas da/ na pa dgus byalas/ maTa' ba gzhi rdzo gnyis pa'o/ denas
52b3(rnying rgyud): be kyis 'din sa tha bcom pa da rje chang // da nam nis ched po'i lung/ nges pa'i rgyal thos pagang rgyal cig/ de nas bcom ldan spyod 'chag da pa/ ma bajugs pa 'i byan pa mi na
52b4(rnying rgyud): sa / ra ya ga thub pa# 'ings pa mang byed rlon pa ma mardzas kyi phre nga gyur ba
52b5(rnying rgyud): da sas nasas mags pa thong d+ha sa du// gas ma
52b6(rnying rgyud): ma gags pa/ sa rnams samyal la ga'igs blang mtham/ na nan bzhes rnags
52b7(rnying rgyud): gsasu la 'dra sa gi byang sa/ sa srung ba sas cad ma sa
53a1(rnying rgyud): dus rgyas pan sa ma / mad ma mags da ma rgyad/ sa sunas/ sa
53a2(rnying rgyud): ning nam pa mi // tha ga chag lus/ snang ba nga / cizhes da 'phyi 'ar/ na chen gatheg ba
53a3(rnying rgyud): dang po' 'dri dpag ta mid// rig pa'i dun ba dgasas pas/ pa8/ thu gsum rgyal ba'i zhing khyam sde gshegs la// man pa'i nachen pas mngon snang bas// byang chubs pa sa kya da par 'byed/
53a4(rnying rgyud): brjod du med cing sla dang bco/ dus pamod dum med // kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ 'tha sa mang sa san yang yo nyas/ 'khor ba nyid mang 'a dren pa'i gyi don rtogs mnyid pa da sa/ mya ngan 'das shes yod pa yin/ sa nyon mongs ma
53a5(rnying rgyud): dusan pas mimithug kyibatsal du po/ no she nyid gnas
53a6(rnying rgyud): na chen pa med da// dkyigs// da med pas// 'byungakyidon rtogs na/
53a7(rnying rgyud): sa dun/ ma 'thab pa 'thug/ samam da kya na/ sa sa rgyas da/ gis
53b1(rnying rgyud): na sangs cadas// mthabya ba cu sasas ras la/ ting pad tog sa sa
53b2(rnying rgyud): pa nas sgra yang ldan gyis grub// dngos por snang ba'i lugs mthong na/ stong pa 'jol tog/ stong pa nyid kyang len sa tong ba ma bsgrubs rdzogs// chos kyi med 'khong bshes na nyid a yi don rtogs na// spyi med chos nyid pha rol gyin/ rig pa ni med du 'thol// e mato// rang
53b3(rnying rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi rgya/ snang bal se shes kyi rgyas bang brtan// stong 'byams ye shes su yi rgya/ gsas tong dbyer med// sna tshogs sems nyid rig pa'i rgya/ brad tod dbyer med// rnam dag klong yang sa ye shes chu/ dkyings rig dbyer med// mtshan ma dngos dag rang rig tu/ dzan la gags kyas btab pas
53b4(rnying rgyud): rishi par med// snang ba rang rdzogs dbyings kyi rtsa/ tha sadas ni gyis rgyas ba sa dpa pa gas pa'i thegs so/ spyod pa rmad byung sdang ba'i rtsa/ rnang sa nga dang 'gyur bas// bsgom pa rmang byung sems kyi rgya/ nyid mtshan brir bag/ lta ba rmed byang nam mkha'i t+ya/ mang dzad byer rgyan chad papa
53b5(rnying rgyud): papadang rnam mkha' 'bral// 'bras bu rmad byung tshig chod rgya// rig ba tu mi rdzog/ ye shes rmad byung stong pa'i rgya/ gzhi 'dzin pa'i ye shes gang ma// chos nyid rmad byung rol pa'i rgya/ gzhi sa bcos pa'i rang snang pas thams cad rang thol// rtogs pa rmad byung shes rab rgya/ rang rig pa'i ga deng gis rto gas pa ro bo mnyam nyid//
53b6(rnying rgyud): dkyang ba sa phrag tu n+ta// yang dag zang byung rig pa ma gsang pa'i bdan ma nyam sa du dzi na// gsang ba'i dbang nyid rabardzogs pa// byung ba ba
53b7(rnying rgyud): gdams ngag 'di/ ma pad dpe sa// snying po nyid la phrin kyi sa ga sa nas snying po brtan// nges pang dad bcud gsum man ga 'di sha sa kyi ga sa pa ra nga ye // rgyud kyin tso ngo mthar thun sa kya bu \u0f7f'gyur// don dam kun rdzob na gas gnyis
54a1(rnying rgyud): dang/ na nas na
54a2(rnying rgyud): gas pa sa sa
54a3(rnying rgyud): sa kA
54a4(rnying rgyud): chags // 'chogs nan sa gonas gnyis padangasad 'as
54a5(rnying rgyud): sa su ma // zhing khams rnam dag sun tha ma pa'i/ shes pacig zeng brjid kyi byu gas ba pa / 'jal pal ga nga brdzu ma gsu na/ da da rnam tho dbang gis rgyam
54a6(rnying rgyud): 'did ces zhus sa// rtse bcom ldan thugs rje can// ga ca thun pa/ chos nyid dbyings kyi brten pa ga// da durab tu zhus pa dang / dge bcom ldan rdo rje dpa' bo das/
54a7(rnying rgyud): shes na// nye ba'i ma sa ga stsal la// das kyal nan/ byas ma sa shan/ zas dbyes casangs rgyas pa kyi'i zhi
54b1(rnying rgyud): me tshur shes shing rang rig pa
54b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can kun gyi drur// rngam zhing yang dag 'am ra ba la srung// rig nam pa sna med snang ngan// b+hUT+Ta b+ha byad gnyis las 'das/ rdzam bya / gsang ba'i sgra dang rig pa 'dzi / rnaMs / rnam par dag ca ma tags
54b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyer la// thugs rjes thams cad pag chags pas 'das pas bcos shing bcad du med// chos nyid dbyings kyi rkyen bzang shigs po// thig le'i sdang ba gan migapa/ sa kyi rin de/ 'bras kya'i jig gi/ ba pa pabang ngos rgyan pa dang / mtha' yas shing // su'i ngo bos
54b4(rnying rgyud): shi le ma rgyan chad med/ lu gu rgyud// ye shes lnga sdang ba'i 'od zer lnga/ rang bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyi lam nam mkha' rang gsal gyi sku// chos nyid yangs pa'i nam ma'ang rang gsal dkyil 'khor du// gsang sngags thabs kyi spyod pa ni/ nyon pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems
54b5(rnying rgyud): dpas bstan// e ma ho/ ye shes 'azung chu nyon// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// dag pa'i ye shes 'dzi cha 'od du gsal// chos nyid spros pa med pa'i gdag yod pa kyang 'das klong // 'gyur med po rang bzhin chan zang ldan 'byams 'di// so sor snang zhi sems can
54b6(rnying rgyud): don byed pas// rang rig chos su rang dag gi ye shes sku yi klong / dngos med// stong pa'i ye shes gsapa ma mkha' la b+ha tshogs su rol// yang dag ka dag las ye shes ma 'gags lhun bub tu yangs// ting 'dzin ye shes shes bgyis pa me dang 'dra// yang dag ye shes rlung dang 'dra//
54b7(rnying rgyud): ngapyod ye shes thabs gsang gzhi bas ma gachos zhing // chos nyid lus kyi rgyan bzang ba/ longs su'i rdoT/ chos kyi sku yi spyod pa ni/ sna tshogs 'dog pas 'das pa'i 'od lartson// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa dang / sems gnyis su med pa'i don brtan// thig le rnams rtsa bzhinas kyi bzhugs so
54b8(rnying rgyud): zhing 'gro 'ong med/ ni// rang gis ma cos gagilas ma g.yos rtog pas g.yo ba med// lta ba'i ye shes ranang pa'i nonas thabs mkhas pas/ snyig nyid/ ma bskyod rdo rje sems dpa'i ngang // sna tshogs rol pa'i sku bstan pas/ thun rtsod pa stan// rgyun tu zer \u0f7fzla sdang zhing
55a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par ral// gsang 'gas cad kyi gamadangs camadas / so nas gsus byas ral tan/ tsas rnams panas na gaman tsa// khyad pa mthad rnams yang rang sar bral// ngab
55a2(rnying rgyud): gdams las su ltar snang ba dag/ gsang sngags la ma par dopas migs kyi rba la gnas pa yi// bsam 'das lamam pad rab dag ci mamed pa na shi na ba nyid yul las 'das// bag chags yul kyang po rnams su yi dang // gsang sngags thams cad thabs la
55a3(rnying rgyud): rdug/ rnam 'i da sa dag pa dgapa ma su mdang tu ma nga ba na nga sa gnas pa// chags med ye shes gsung gi dang // spyan rdzogs chen po'i lta bar bstan/ rna tshogs / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing // thugs rje nyon moms 'i dri mthon ched rnam par dag/ shes rab chen
55a4(rnying rgyud): bor cho duladu gyur pa'o// stong dag 'khrul pa dang dag brta/ ye shes rang byung ba// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba rig pa ni// gsang sngags lu gu rgyun gyi dang / rig pa 'brel mamed par gnas la// chos rnams kun gyi rang las gung ba ni// dbyings kyi sgron ma thabs kyi
55a5(rnying rgyud): dacings du 'thar rtsed pa rtog pa// chos sku ba ga da pa'i rtsod gral tu dngos po'i lam du snang // dri ma med pa'i ye shes ga dag tu gnas pani ni/ dang thos/ stong pani yul gyi gnad du ga la ba bya ma sa cong 'ardeg/ man ngag rgyal mo ra ba di cig tu grol bas yul du macings spyi bcings dang /
55a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad rang snang l+ya gu N+yad lhun rdzogs pa'o// e ma to// rnal 'byor kun gyi lta ba ni/ 'khrul ba'i gnas 'azlog pa brtan/ sems ze// sems kyi sgo bcad rnam rtog dngas// khyim dbyings yangs lugs rdi ba lta btog pa'i mtha' thabs thun po ma yin pa/ man ngag ni/
55a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i gro bcad ye shes kya rdzi nga po gnas nang du gas la/ !// chos nyid gran pa rna yo bu lan du khyem dag na ba gtub na ye shes snang ba dang // khyi rkun mdor byung med gru ba dang sangs rig pa'i ra gro dro pa dus yo zin// mtshan ma zil gnom dpa la
55b1(rnying rgyud): bya pa snang brgya yas btab// ye shes lnga'i gang 'gyur med klong yangs 'od dkyis kun tu chub// shes ra'i rang sna chos nyid mas pan ma/ 'du chod/ mas par bye dpa // rkyen bral chos nyid te cad pa rigs kun gyi snying por gnas// snang ba byu
55b2(rnying rgyud): gangag mi gzong 'idapa mkhang 'jug/ em to/ na la 'tsham da/ rang rig yinas pa mi ma dang ma g.yos dang du zhog/ ma rig pa nyid kyid ti ga cir mong du bya'o// 'khor ba nyid kyang bag da sa rbanas bzlog kyang/
55b3(rnying rgyud): bsam byed yul du na banas rgya dpa med// rtsa ba nyon pa sa wa dag ye shes laphral// dran byed cad pa thob sangs pas byams ri pa / rang rig dag/ sa9/ kun gyi lam la thod pazhi rnam par ldang // kun gzhi ga lus khyi ma mang /
55b4(rnying rgyud): dam pa pa dang/ stong rig gsal ba'i gzhi shes shi bstan pas// gzhan rnam pa med kyang 'khrul pa zhes shig gzhi la bamyal/ rang tu ba rdzog // phung po ga sa gang canas 'ang bye dam / lnga nyid tu med pas// 'khrul ba'i lus ni ra da tha dngasas panas mngon pa
55b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas// 'byung ba lnga nyid ye nas dag rdzang a rdzang dngas pas/ 'di tam/ snang ba 'od gsal dri mas pa bsrings pa nyid du grol// dbang po wa mig/ dag sa/ 9/ sra ma 'o// yul bshagasas nyid cer bzhag pas// 'dzin pa'i yul lnga bral sogs pa cos bu'i bad nyid rang sar gro la/
55b6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs lnga nyid mdod cags sogs tug ldang gis mthong ba rang yin pas// khams gsum nyid ni 'dod 'bas gcags bams gnags med pa'i bzas ze nas pang thol ba yin pa ga rba/ gzhi la bskyal// ma rig pa nyid ye nas rig par gnas pa'i phyir/ rang byung bas// 'khrul pa'i rgyu nyid ye nas 'ab per
55b7(rnying rgyud): sangs// kun gzhi sas chos srung rang shar bas// rgyud gyi bya ba cing 'i 'i sa la rtsad nas bcad// yid bzhin tanapa# ma pa pa na pa/ dgongs par ye gnas pas// 'bru byed rnams ni 'a sa da ra
56a1(rnying rgyud): bzhag yin// dbugs na tsun pa ni ye nas rgyun chad pas// b+h+ya ni gdod nas yod mkhan/ can ma ya // 'dod pa'i yon tan gtan dra grangs nadu /
56a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pas/ thal bdang to/ ni blo dathal bar zhes pa phyis// zhen pa'i mtha' ni bsgom pa nyid// yan lag ma brkyod ye byin pas/ 'phor gnas su dag pa re le zhes 'od gsal zhes bya// 'gro ba'i lam nyid ye nas bgrod// rang tung gnas badzin du 'gro ba ba ma med// spras pa'i ngag
56a3(rnying rgyud): ne/ blor rtsa brjod med pas/ rgan cag zhid dang mangs das/ ye nas smra bas ma yul las blo da pas 'das// bas mchod pa'i 'bro' du yi stong de na na ga bya yang na 'o pas// ye nas bsam gtan chen por gnas ma zhin kyi bas / nan da pa das nas // ji
56a4(rnying rgyud): nga nyon rapa de ma rnams ni rang dag pas/ chos su ga din kyang na bsgribs pa/ dri med zang zal chen por gnas/ de lang rtsol du bsres marto dang// byas pa byung ba med pa'i phyir// thog ma nyed nas ngagazhi 'acol smrab kyisani rnyed bya byed bral// gzhi nas gzhan 'byung chos med pas/ rang
56a5(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir// klogs nas/ gdod nas rang byur nyag gcig mo/ rig rtogs par dag 'di rang mo lha gcig tu'o// gcig/ de sa pa nyis su ched pa'i rigapas dang gnyis kyi grangs zad pas/ spros pa dang bra' ji// thig le zla dang bral ba tshig rlob pa med pa/ nyid// mun pa 'dor ba ye nas rlabs gdod nas rnam
56a6(rnying rgyud): dag pas/ rang la gnas dang / rig pa'i snang ba 'od sra gsal khyab// 'khor ba rgya med 'gags dzig 'dug nyid zin pas// ye nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis/ gzhan nas med par yid kyis kyi rang brta'o// mtshan ma'i snang 'i bdag min cing rdza bas cad du dngos po rtong sa res
56a7(rnying rgyud): pas rnga/ phul pa ni garnas pa ma na tha dang nga ba de 'das pang// bdag 'dzin blo ni ye nas zad// rkyen rnams rkyen gyis/ mang gi badzin meng ga po 'an ta mang rtog dang zas pa dang du gyur ba sa byas dang / dang grol bas// nyos chos rnams ni srang can na tshogs pa rnams nyid la tid cog
56b1(rnying rgyud): bzhag pa'o// de nas ta mgrin rgyal po nyid// snang ba dekun rang grol bas/ dngang dang sas cadas thamamasams rnam pas byas papa tas// ra mtshar mchog byam pad sa gyur nas ni dbas samasasas da das// 'argya ba'i
56b2(rnying rgyud): sa la rab tu 'gyel// de nas bye pa lu par du khyod pa sa cad ta tan rdo rje 'chang ched des// de ny+tsa ma rig de kho mgrin mas rnas pa brgyal ba bslang ba'i phyir// 'di skad ces gang she dang tho byed nas ni ched du 'arjod// e ma gag dag de ltar sdar ba
56b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// 'khrul ba nyid kyang de dag 'khrul ba'i snang ba'in kyad rang grol na// 'khrul med snang 'chis mi grol// ji ltar yod lam sgra cha dang sras ci bya byed rnams/ dngas na/ stong nasaHrig rtsod gsal ba'i spyod pa de la rang du ge spyod par btan/ yin// bzang dang
56b4(rnying rgyud): ngan par rtog pa rnams/ rtogapa tugan// bsgom pacu pa klong chen yin/ gang dud pa tam// log lta nasapa yang dag cang 'dod pa rnams// rdol byor ras men can pa nga gas rdzog lta ba yin/ da/ re dang
56b5(rnying rgyud): dogs par thab sa 'dzin pa kun/ nga bya ga/ zad ma thal b+harma rkyen gyisam dribs 'bras bu b+hur rngog yin// phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas/ rtogs pa gzhan sa gas rgyas pa banyan// tang gsum thams cad 'di ltar snang ba rang bzhinaHdkyil 'khor la// char dang khra
56b6(rnying rgyud): rlangs rang byung gi chag chag btab/ sa pa mi'i dad nga nithig pa yin par brtan nas myong ba ma byas par/ 'gro ba'i lam dmigs thig chen te// rkang pa'i rjes ni rdul tshon ris/ cad 'i dgos// 'gro bar 'dod pa sta dra stabs nyid/ thams cad ta drwag pas rdo rje ra spos kyis rnam rtog gi bgegs pas la// ya na lag
56b7(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa par nyi dang zang ni phyag rgya'o// ji ltar sbas pa ra shig 'thas pa nga ga 'das nyid rjod ma na'i hate/ sngags kyi chog/ bsam pa rnams ni rang zhidzi yang myo bu dan na gsang ba/ bskyed rim yin// yid la ba
56b8(rnying rgyud): ma kyas pa'i rig ba
57a1(rnying rgyud): thabs cad ma byas pa'i mchod pas su bu rgyad kyi dngas sung zab/ 'gru ba mchod pa nyid/ mig gas cang ca/ gzugs su sdang ba lha yi // rgya chen ba nga dang gzhan ces brjod pa rol mo nyid/ rang bdin gyi khyad par/ rang gi lus ni bum pa yin la/
57a2(rnying rgyud): rang gi/ skra ni lo 'dab bral ba'i kha rgyan rgyan ci rgyal mdzes// khrag dang chu ser chu rnams bram rtsa nyid/ rang ga/ don snying la sogs rdzas kyis gtams// rang la snang ba'i dbu khe nas rab la gnas pas rdzas dang rtsol bas dod dam mi tho ba gsung / rnams byin/ seMn da canas dbang ban rdzogs
57a3(rnying rgyud): bzung ngo // ma bskur nyid la rdzogs pa'o// de'i grogs dang tshig gang zhe na// 'da' bar 'dod pa dam tshig la// bsrung bar 'dod pa bcings pa nyid// dgrol bar 'dod pa med du 'thubs na 'ching ba'i tu byas zhing bsgrubs na/ nyams pa ste// med par 'dod pa thub mchod/ yenas
57a4(rnying rgyud): pa nga bral ba yin// bza' dang btur ba kha zas chad la sogs pa/ bsnyen pa la// nyal ba dang tsog zur 'dug pa ma btsal ba'i sgrub pa'o// 'du byed rnams ni lhag gnas nya don nyid// glo dang lung pas ye nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub/ pa yin// mthong ba rnams ni thams cad brdang /
57a5(rnying rgyud): mnab tu grol bar brtan phyag rgya'i bda'// de la chag pa nyid tan rtsod yin la zhon med rang grol du bad+ha'o/ nyams myong yin// shes ri ba/ rang des rig pa'i rgyal mo dran lam ma'anags pa'i rig pa ma bur phrad pa'i gdams dgag/ gsal ba gdams ngag la// yul sems gnyis 'dus 'dzin pa gnyis med bye gdams ngag
57a6(rnying rgyud): gdab pa'i yul/ skye ba med pas/ skye rgas na 'chi rtog tshad stong pa la goms pa'i gnad // cho gas drug ma 'gags thug par bzhag na rig pa rang dag gi rtogs pa'o// de nas shes rabag tso ba ma pa gyiye shes mkha' 'gro rnams// shin tu dga' yid byas pas mgu yi rangs nas/
57a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsal// kye 'khrul med grol ba de ltar byin na/ sdod kyi 'jig rten gyis mi grol/ nyon pa/ rdo rje 'chang gis kyi da pa bar brten pa bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta rtags pa ma sa med pa cher// nam mkha' nyid ni khye' rkar pas/ dang
57b1(rnying rgyud): bya/ nam mkha' nyid ni dang pal ba dngas par grol// rlung ni rdza bu med cang gzung yul med ldang bas/ sun bya'is thad pa cin// dngas pa sdud pa'i las su grol// me ni byin byed sbyin D+ha shing theg par mde sa thams cad thegs byed/ za bas/ rtsa / bskyod ci
57b2(rnying rgyud): da ras snyigs 'gyed par grol// sa ni skyed byed 'degs/ srab med pa brtan pas na// dngos men pa'i rnam mapar dzin te maba' las rtong pa'i phyir/ mtha' yas stong par grol// chu ni spud byed/ gshe ba med pa'i rngan pa rlan pas na/ sreg byed du 'i te sung ni sa du thu ba cher smin pa'i las
57b3(rnying rgyud): kye grol// nam mkha'i drung ni rang nas dngos pa la// nam mkha'i mas ni spya pa kyad ma la bab ca chu sabyed/ sdud par byed// nam mkha'i rgyus tong ba 'thas das rte tu 'dus pa pa / ni sreg byed pa'o// nam mkha' ma yas tha dag 'apas cad ya ngam
57b4(rnying rgyud): skabs 'gyed// nam mkha'i nam mkha' ni 'das pa rna tshogs pa snga tsa/ sdang ba'o// rlung gi chung ni 'di lta cwang cu shis tag sepas brtan pa la// rlung gi nam mkha'as rngatha pas cad tu bang zad ye gdangs che// rlung gi chu ni tshogs bcad par 'grob myur mgyogs te//
57b5(rnying rgyud): ge mes ni dam pas gas pa thud par byed 'phen srung byed// rlung gi sas nI bya bsogs ci gcag rtan dag shing de galda sag ga/ gzugs brtan gsol// chu yi chu ni grwa dang cas pa sgra snyan yin// chu yi nam mkha' rgyan mi cad cing byar ba tha~Ms thogs pa med/
57b6(rnying rgyud): rlung ni gci tu mdzad par 'grobs chags med rgyug/ chu yi mes ni gzugs sum bu dpas sdud par byed// chu yis san+ni rlung gis byab bas so// khyab par byed// me yi mes ni me phra sa ning chen pa sreg par byed bskyed par byed// me yi nam mkhas bu shing thams cad theg pa yin dngo
57b7(rnying rgyud): po bsreg/ me yi rlung gis cishin tu 'ab bas na 'bar bar byed// me yi chus ni zhing ma legs pa zims cad med par byed pa'o// brlag par byed// me yi sas ni rjes gang la reg pa bsreg par byed pa'o// 'dzin pa'o// sa yi sas ni bas ga khyab par 'grobs 'gro ba khyab// sa yi nam
58a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' mam cad sa ca ga/ thag can ta// sa yi chung gas dbang can ga gas pa da ba da gang stongs kyang// sa y-i d+has na tham tha sa 'das kya gas dngas pa bgrad// sa mams na ca ma ngas skams
58a2(rnying rgyud): pa ma gsangs pa 'ang ya blang dub/ na // ngas par blang na' sams ta dbu/ gas sa sa dul bas spangs thams cad mi / rang byinan ma
58a3(rnying rgyud): dang du grong/ dbang dan lan zu tham pa mams// gzugs zhid rnams ni dang sa ta na lags pa ma pa'i ci dngos pos grol// chos ni chos kyis grol ba la/ sa grong sa kyin na pa dgas// med pa la yang dngo sa dang da ba dpa / med pas grol// gcig ni gcig gis
58a4(rnying rgyud): sa kya sa ca nyi yo thar das/ grol ba la// gnyis su sdang bas gnyis nyis du gyis tha ga 'das kyi/ grol ba'o// rta mchog dpal gyis yang gam lab// kye ma bcom ldam ma thad pa da rdo rje 'chang // snod rnying bzhin kyi 'jig
58a5(rnying rgyud): rten yang grol gyur byas/ pa 'ad// brgyad kyi sems can/ sas nga kyis ma grol/ ba / 'gra ldang/ sems can dang / grol bar mthar na/ dashang/ grol ba rnams la don med mar 'gyur/ gas// yang na ga cag/ dang grol ba de dag sums gas// 'bad ba med
58a6(rnying rgyud): par grol lam da tshal la matsaM// 'bad pas grol na ga nasan 'das stan bam po// grol bar rigs pa ma lags ni// sems can sa da 'grol ba ji skar grol sa na na da nga drug // bcom ldan 'das kyis rba rnam
58a7(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rdzogs sanapa #/ 'bad pas grol ba ma yin te// mchog nyid nas ni grol bar gnas/ shes nyi pa ma sas// thabs dang nas rab sbyong ba las// pa dang ma'i nyi dag // 'angan @#
58b1(rnying rgyud): byamam da rnan ya du na tu na tu / 1
58b2(rnying rgyud): dan sa
58b3(rnying rgyud): su sa
58b4(rnying rgyud): // @# 'du
59a1(rnying rgyud): na mam dus gas ma nan rna tu nadan na
59a2(rnying rgyud): na ga smras myang thags nas sa
59a3(rnying rgyud): 'chang gis man rgyas par bka' stsal pa// gsang ba mchog gi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin na / gnyis ni gawA po gcig byud par la si/ rang shin btan// spos med nyag gcig dgongs par gnas/ yang ma ga ma sa bdas cag
59a4(rnying rgyud): bde chen thig le'i rang bzhin can/ ji bgad// sangs rgyas kun bdag das pa na dkyil 'khor gcig/ ngo bo nyid bye mamam sa dang ma 'gal ka dag pas// rang bzhin nyid la gas cags pa ldan thul go// na
59a5(rnying rgyud): shes bgyid sa/ sa dang kyin pa ngas pas da so// 'di mas kyang sngam pam sa dmas / dang mad sa rnams kyi myong yum mis sa ba// gcig sa pa dang gnyis ram 'dang 'thang yul med
59a6(rnying rgyud): brdzun pa bangs kyis thag sa pabastan du byeng dang mang gnasam/ da nirjed pa ni/ tha
59a7(rnying rgyud): de' rnams nas ma 'gyur// 'das pas ma gyi me nying bsgri ba sa / bsam pas 'thababs ma
59a8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs mi ci rig 'tshur btag sa
59b1(rnying rgyud): mang ma dad/ byon pa dang bral khrims dang bzod pams// da nyid ma gnad pa dang man par 'bras pa thal // thas pa dang bsam pa dang bskams pasan mjug tu ga nang kya na mdum mdzang// dam bya ma mdan
59b2(rnying rgyud): min/ dbang batham dadang thos/ 'batsun gi sa pa tha / lha med skyed pa'i sa bon med/ 'a'ajig dang sa pa'i/ sngags dang phyag rgyas ci zhig bya/ bad dzad bzung med// mchod pa smin na yango la sogs sgomi dgos// dbang dang dam tshig bza ses
59b3(rnying rgyud): ga la yod/ gtso dang ba kyi bzlasapa/ bsnyen pa dang ni sgrub pa med/ dbying 'ab dang rdzas mi dges// 'khor lo spo ba dkyil 'khor byed pa yod ma yin/ bzhen na/ bsrung ba med rab dang tsham gos cing bsrang yul med// gdon dang gyis par mi gcod gnod pa'i yul las 'das/ thas
59b4(rnying rgyud): cad don lam thub bas/ yin stonas pa/ de ni nga rang byung ni rig pa yin 'gro ba'ang yin// sems yin sems las byung ba ste/ bya ngab nyan mongs pa sngar byung nim shes yin/ sems kyang rdza bcu bang nga rig pa yin// du ma yin la nyag gcig yin/ 'di ltar ldang bathams cad rishing mi chos bu zig sa nyag ga ci cang
59b5(rnying rgyud): yin// 'khor dang myang 'das pa rang yin// dkyil 'khor la sogs rim 'dug yin/ nong na steng bathor ma gas pami na par da bang bdag cig dang byed ngamang yogs pa dang ba byas pa chos rnams kyang rig pa rgyal pothos nyis pami byed pa yin/ bya thosamams dpang bdag nyid du turabs so//
59b6(rnying rgyud): cha ma yin chos su ldang ba yin/ gsus mi 'gro bas reg ga// gnas pa yin la grol ba yin/ ma/ 'dug dang nyal dang 'chag pa yang yin/ gzhan ci// srog gar yang yin de gcod pa nyid kyang yin/ 'dod dang gcags dang gcugs da/ 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes//
59b7(rnying rgyud): dang shems pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyar ldang // dag dpa ye 'bras pa sard byu/ ram byin pa brgyal / sa garnams dang yon tan kyang // de nyid las dza na 'ad
60a1(rnying rgyud): ngabazang thams cad byung dang // mdang nab tang ma ca di ltar nga ba'o// chos sun mid da pa dang de las byung ba'o// sa bu ma rlung nam mkha' dang // 'byung ba chen na pa rgya bde las phung // lha dang lha min mi rnams dpa// dbyang bcol sor 'bugs dang /
60a2(rnying rgyud): dad pas ngang dag kyang / da chags de sdang gti mug dang // ngargya'i brag dag la sogs na/ mas na 'phrul chung // mari sems dang mi rnams dang // phung da masad phyim da // dam pa gas sa rnams dang /
60a3(rnying rgyud): sogs// dbang snga la sogs pa byung / 'ad ma ba tan// sgra dang rje dang ngo dang ni// reg bya nyid dag dod yon ni/ rigs/ da nyid kyi ni rgyan dang ngong dang 'dzin du byung // gsogati pa dang lam pan+da dang ni// b+hir ngo med la sogs pating sangs yang / 4ga/ de yi rtsal dang rol par gyur// kun ga'i sbyor bdag
60a4(rnying rgyud): kye dang / dang ni nyer len rbas kyai rung pod thams ci// sha dang khrag dang chu ser na shi drung rnga dang / lus ci rtsa// rus pa pags pa baspu dang // bsags pa'i lus rnams rig pa de las byung // lus dang ngag dang yid dang ne// sems las byung ba'i nyon tshangs rnga tshogs ni// thams cad nga mi ro las byung /
60a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa chos kyi brang rgyan du shar cing snang ba'o// skyes pa bud med rta glang dang / lus kyi phung bdab bams bya// gzugs ni tha dad pa thams cad de las byung / spyod 'a ma// bza' dang til dang 'dug pa dang // sna tsho ga 'khor ba'i las rnams ni byung ba'o// kye khro ba dag de ltar de lja rnang pa thams cad 'khrul ma myong mi ba ga
