82b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba gang la gsungs pa lags/ 'di bdag la gsung du gsol/ de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zeng kun 'dus khyod nyon cig/ skyes bu gang
82b3(rnying rgyud): gis 'das pa'i rjes ma bzung / ma 'ongs pa'i sngon ma byis kyi zhen pa bslangs/ da lta'i shes pa rang so la cag bzhag tu bzhag na/ shes pa thams cad snga phye med kyadranas gsabs par 'dres nas/ gcig 'dus ngo bo rtsa gcig ces bya d+ha/ dus gsum
82b4(rnying rgyud): n+tam pa da d+hartags pa na la 'gyur// yang dus pa'i bganags rnams kyi du rjes sum byug/ kyis 'byung ba/ du rdzogs rnams rdzun nu bas/ denyur theb gnags rnams chud pas brjin pa
82b5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o// 'dun pa dacig par 'ad / dran pa rang zad kyi thabs kyis 'khar 'das gnyis med du bsreb ste/ 'das pa'i dran pa rnams mtshams bcad pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dran pa rnams med byang pa ma
82b6(rnying rgyud): chen po miH/ mgo mnan pa sems tshi tshad dang / da ltar gyi dran pa rnams rang yal du btang ba ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o// yang 'das pa'i sems la phugs me gtad// zhebam brdag/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems la rtsab mi ga
82b7(rnying rgyud): da ltar gyi sems la/ 'jal ba'i rdzas su me gro/ glo mi gtad pa ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin no// 'das pa'i ma rig pa la gzer ma bsgyur/ 'bul ba cad ma bca par shog/ pa 'ongs pa'i ma rig pa la ha bas cod paraH/ g.yab ma 'do
82b8(rnying rgyud): da ltar gyi ma rig pa phang du ma blangs na/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin no// 'das pa'i zhe sdang la zhe ma chags/ gnod pa miHma 'ongs pa'i zhe sdang la 'gran sems mi bya lcags kyus ma bzung / da ltar gyi zhe sdang la pha rol po la gnod ma
83a1(rnying rgyud): bskyal/ ngar ma blud pa ni bus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o// 'das pa'i gti mug gi gzhi'i shes rabatugs pa sprin ma bsdu/ ma 'ongs pa'i gti mug gis 'od gas paca gom bcad/ da ltar gyi gti mug gi char
83a2(rnying rgyud): pa ma phab thos pas meng gro pyad na/ du sa gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o// 'das pa'i nga rgyal la len ma gdab/ khron la ngan du mi blta zhing yon tan la rlom pa maMHma 'ongs pa'i gzhan las che ba'i sems mngon tsami gtod nga rgyal la khus ma gdab/
83a3(rnying rgyud): da ltar gyi dra ci nas kyang gzhan gyi gami bcag/ rgyal la thog ma gtad pa ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o// 'das pa'i 'dod chags nyid sngar kye mdza' sug la sems mi phang sun phyung / ma 'ongs pa'i 'dod chags rnams
83a4(rnying rgyud): paba'i bsam pa'i bya zhe bcang/ da ltar gyi chags med rang grol du 'dod chags rnams yul phyung ba ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa yin no// 'das pa'i slang 'bras pa'i mi lan no paHphrag dog la dam dum bzung ma 'ongs pa'i phrag dog la ma 'bras pa'i sems canal
83a5(rnying rgyud): gnod mi bya sems ma bsdu/ da ltar gyi phrag dog la/ bad ka'i shAd pa thams cad grogs pa dper sems ma bcug pa ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ 'khor 'das gnyis med du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po zhes bya'o// sems dpa' chen po mya
83a6(rnying rgyud): ngan las pa'i gzhi zang thal du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni/ da kun tu bzang po chos thams cad kyi byang khungs su byung ba ste/ 'das pa'i thog ma'i gzhi cang cad sku gsum la sna gtad/ ma 'ongs pa'i bar dol goms paraHsku gsum la rgyab brten/ da ltar gyi sku gsum
83a7(rnying rgyud): lwa nyams thang longs spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu mngon du byas pa ste/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du ye nas gnas pa zhes bya'o// 'das pa'i ye shes lnga la gzhi bcal/ srung ces byab dang mo// dang tsang ba nyan ma 'ongs pa chags rdza la yongs
83b1(rnying rgyud): ge pa b+ha/ tha mo gtad/ da ltar rtso ma gas la mas la ma nga thong paH/ gsal bas gsal ba'i 'od du 'dus pa zhes bya brta/ dus gas pa mnyam pa nyid du dag pa'i rnal 'byor ro// 'das pa'i shes pams rig ma la yang zas
83b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i rig pa la zhing god ga ca tshad bzung / da ltar gyi rig pa rdo mdzad la mngon sum du byed pa ni/ ma las bu bzung po chos nyid kyis da med zhes bya ste/ dus gsum mnyam nyid du rig pa'i rnal 'gro nga// 'das pa 'jig
83b3(rnying rgyud): cha chos mad bzung / ma 'ongs pa'i theg lal ShamaHb+hA ga tung/ da ltar gyi thig la rnams dpab da ni gcig tu bsdu ba na nyag gcigagiHpa bcad pa zhes rba n+te/ rdzas gsum mnyam pa nyid du dag pa'i rdul 'thor ba zhes za ba yin no// 'das pa
83b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings sun pa dpa dang mtshams ltar/ ma 'ongs pa'i dbyings dang snang bgang rtsa rgya bskyed/ da ltar gyi dbyings rnam ma'i'i byings dang m-i ga dang ga pa dang sa gcig la gnas pa ni/ rig pa khyim du chud pa zhes bya ste/ dus gsum mnyan pa nyid du ye nas
83b5(rnying rgyud): 'brel bar gnas pa zhes bya'o// 'das pa'i sgor ma rnams la sad chos sde gtud/ ma 'ongs pa'i ga 'di ga/ skyon ma rnams lam tra bzung / da ltar gyi sgron ma rnams la yang nas yang tu gsal gdabapa ni/ song pa chos babyung gi sgor mang dngag ga
83b6(rnying rgyud): blta ba ste/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du ye nas snang ba yin no// 'das pa'i rkyen pa kyi/ 'od rnams la lam btid/ me 'ongs pa'i 'doda'i 'od rnams la sems bzhag/ de ltar gyi 'od smon pa rnams la blo phab pa na/ snang ba thams cad rang rgyas
83b7(rnying rgyud): thengs pa zhes bya ste/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du y-i nis 'du 'brel med pa'o// de nas 'od zer dku ni 'dus byang grub sems dpas gsol pa/ gya bcom ldan dpal kun tu bzang ba/ rus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bkri ba'i dus ci la gsung / gsum
84a1(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ni gang rnams lags/ mnyam bcas ci la gsung / nyi \u0f7fsa gang lags/ 'ang dag rnams kyi don bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ ston pas ngan 'di dag bdag la gsung bar bya// zhes gsol bas/ rton pa kuraHbzang
84a2(rnying rgyud): los zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di dag bka' stsal to// kye ma kye ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun 'dus/ ngas rnon yul dbyings shin tu gsal ba zhes za bar/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par brtan pa'i sa bya bar/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'
84a3(rnying rgyud): rnams la 'di skad du lung bstan pa yin na// lce 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon cig/ snang ba thams cad rang dbang du gyur nas/ rig pa mngon sum du bstan pa'i rtse/ dgongs pa gongs pa langan pa mthong pa'i dus nas bya'o// sdang ba thams cad rjon
84a4(rnying rgyud): yang gag nas rang zad du shar te// nyams kyis zan gang na dang 'phel ba'i tshe// rig pa nyid tshad ci nas srang la 'debs pa'i dus zhes bya'o// skyes bu 'byung ba'i lus kyi sto bas zad nas/ shes pa rnams ska brko bas bya nas// ba nang du banyis pa'i tshe/ rig pa
84a5(rnying rgyud): byangs 'debs pa'i dus so// chos nyid rkyen dang bral nas ba mdo snang ba thams cad bde bar brdal ba'i tshe/ chos nyid ma bya mnyam pa'i dus zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa'i 'od zer gyis/ yul rang gi lhas gang zhing byas nas kyu mngon par byang chub
84a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i tsha/ brtan par 'a thob kyi dus zhes bya'o// kye ma kye ma 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon cig/ blta btang bas sems cad gsangs rgyas/ sgom par gsal gyis ngag lnga nyid mi dod par rgyas/ myod ba rgyas 'debs kyi lus kyi rgya 'thob sa

84b7(rnying rgyud): de ltar gyis pas rang gi rgyud kyang dag/ 'dzin pa gzung ba phra ba'i las nyid do// zhes kun du bzang po klong drug pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i don bstan pa las/ chos thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i glong
85a1(rnying rgyud): zhes byaste dang po rdzogs so// lha'i lce gnas dag par byed pa chos nyid rtsol ba dang bram chos shad nga nan pa zhen/ pa'i skabs te dang po'o// / das ston pa kun tu bzang bas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas
85a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis med rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bya chung sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun 'das kyis 'khor de rnams la bos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas/ sems can gyi
85a3(rnying rgyud): cang mi mdzad par snang bas/ bdag cag rnams kyis ston pa nyid mnyam par bzhag pa las bzhengs pa'i tshig rnams kyis rab tu 'phrul lo// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la tshig de skad du brjod pas/ 'khor de dag gi nang nas/
85a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po grog gi 'od zer kun nas sprin dang bral ba zhes bya bas 'di skad du tshig tu 'jod do// kye ston pa'i 'khor du 'dus pa'i sras dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang mi rnams nyon cig/ ston pa ni ting nge 'dzin las
85a5(rnying rgyud): bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa mi mnga' ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ye nas kla dag chen po yul dang bral bar mkhyen pa'o// de nas tong zer kun 'dus kyis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba
85a6(rnying rgyud): de'i don ci zhig/ glog gi 'od zer kun nas sprin dang bral bas smras pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yo nas rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni rtag chad pas shes mtha' thams cad dang bral zhing / rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma med pa'o// yang gsol pa/
85a7(rnying rgyud): de nyid gang / smras pa/ de ni tshigagis mgagapa brjod pa thams cad nye bar zhe ste/ yang rje blo gang yang mi 'jug pa'o// gsol pa/ de tsaM lA bu/ smras pa/ de nyag gcig smos pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// gas pa de zhin no// de ltar chos thams cad
85b1(rnying rgyud): nga la yang kun tu bzang pos bstan pa yin/ khyod kyis kyang de ltar go ba ni shin tu lags sa zhes smras so/ de dag gis gleng bslang pa snyan pa kun tu bzang pos mi rtog pa'i ngang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog gi 'od zer kun nas
85b2(rnying rgyud): sprin dang bral ba la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'di skad du gsungs so// kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'dus pas kyang / chos thams cad kyi don de ltar khong du chud pas mi skye ba mngon cir mi rtogs par gzigs
85b3(rnying rgyud): pa nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i chos nyid dbyings rnyed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang go zhing shes nas rtogs pa de shin tu legs so// ngas khyod la snang ba gnas dag pa'i gzhang/ rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi
85b4(rnying rgyud): chog sgo yis byang chub sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ kyang dag pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos ngazhing gzhi sang gi yon tan khams nyi ma stong gis rab tu brgyan pa'i tshad ces bya ba na yod pa'i dus nas lung bstan pa/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po ye nas rnam par dag
85b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe/ 'khor 'das snod bcud du snang ba thams cad til gyi 'bras bu spang ba di la gcig gi nang du mnyam par bzhag na/ 'khor 'das dus gcig la gsal ba'i gas pa chen / gi tams ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa yin no// yang de la dbugs kyang
85b6(rnying rgyud): nas su rdo rje chen po la rigs longs spyod pa yin no// de la longs spyod pas snying po 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i zheng khams spang ba sa pa stong mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan mas/ ngas snying po yul thams cad sdung ba zhes bya ba'i chos nyid kyi ro myangs pas
85b7(rnying rgyud): lus rig thams cad rdo rje ltar ces kyang mi shigs pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzinathob po// de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems rnam par dag pa'i 'od gsal chen po'i mang gi don nyams su ma longs na/ hU~M rdorjesnying po la tshag pa ltos shig/ de bltas pas ya sa'i 'jigs
86a1(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i gdang thob nas/ snang ba thams cad sra gsum gyi ba dang nyid du dang thar te/ chos dang chos pa yin khyad pa 'a ma' bar ba gang du yang mgrub pa rtag khong du chud par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rjod kyis thams cad
86a2(rnying rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pa tha pa pe gtang ba'i tshad ma d+had na/ bzhab pa'i sa rdzal dmas par bya'o// snang ba ma da ci thams cad s+yAmra lta bu dag pas rnam par spong bas mi rtag pa rgyang la brtan pa'is la gams par byas na/ 'khrul pa'i snang ba thams
86a3(rnying rgyud): gyis gnod pas skyes bu'i sems la g.yeng bar mi nus pa ni sems rnam par spong ngal gong sems tu shos mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o// ci 'dzi sa 'brang ba thams cad 'dus pa'i gnas su/ sems rnam par zhi bar byang ba ni myong ba rgyud la brten pa'i skyed
86a4(rnying rgyud): bur/ zhi gnas la bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa thams cad 'dus pa'i sa/ rlo bad// yid 'byung gartog pa dang bral ba'i snang ba/ sems rang bzhin gyis nal du khebs pa'i nal 'byor pas/ sems nyid rang gnasas
86a5(rnying rgyud): gta gams rnal du phebs pa'i gnas zhes bya'o// gzhi thams cad ldan pa la gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas su sde'i don gyi sems rab tu gnas par byed pa'o sbar ba'i skyes bu'i sdang ba rang bcad nas/ sems rang dal du 'dug pa'i ba zhes bya'o//
86a6(rnying rgyud): shes tshe rol pa shar ba'i dus na/ sangs rgyas de da gdang chen po kun gyi mdzad par rnam par ril ba'i sa rnaMm mas rnam par bzhag pa'i dpung ba sa / le bskyod pa'i sa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems 'apa' zin pa de dag gis/ bzhag pa'i
86a7(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas par bya ba byer/ gzhag thabs chen po lnga la mkhas par bya'o// sems kyi sdang ba rnam par snang ba'i rdzas sa sa/ bas sa pang po / sems rnam par srung ba dang / rnam par 'dul gnang kyi shang ba dang / rnam par byam pa sa~M
86b1(rnying rgyud): rtog pa ste sems kyi las thams cad rnal du dbab pa'i thabs la mkhas par bya'o// ye shes kyi dbye ba rig / snang ba rnam par snang ba'i dus na/ ye shes rnams kyi ngo bo tshig pa dor pha brgyad dang / rang gi mtshan nyid lnga dang / ye shes kyi rangs ldog pa dang /
86b2(rnying rgyud): log pa'i dus ragra pa'i snang brlab pas dang / de nyid log pa'i tshad rig pa mi 'gral bar sdod pa kyi thabs la mkhas par bya'o// de'i chos nyid kyi snang ba chos nyid dpa de'i tshad rang snang gi dus na/ chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yul 'od dang 'od sem du dang / sa/ dang
86b3(rnying rgyud): lam dang / ye shes bzhi rtsong chos nyid dang / sku dang ye shes su gi ngo bo dang / chos nyid kyi tshad mig le dang bu dang / 'od du snang ba dang / ci ltar shar ba'i tshigs rdzi tsam na yul dang / chos nyid kyi ldog pa'i thabs la mkhas rang spang du pa zhes bya'o// dbyings chos rba/
86b4(rnying rgyud): kyi snang ba rang med dang snang ba'i dus na/ rang gi mtshan mthar gni 'thar ba nyid rnam par dag pa'i dbyings rang gi ngo bo dang / de'i snang ba'i dus span drab pa dang / sdang ba ci ltar tshad la dpab ne ta goms pa pa dang / dbyings rnams kyi mtha' gang yin pa
86b5(rnying rgyud): dang de dag gi thabs la mkhas par bya'o// rig pa'i snang ba rdo rjes brgyad rang snang ba'i dus na/ 'khor 'das ru shan 'byed pa'i lus ngag gi spyod pa bached sngon du bya bas rig pa 'khor ba dang 'brel pa bcad pa dang / zhen pa dang rtog pa dang / lus dag lus dga'
86b6(rnying rgyud): bsob rnal du dbab pa/ rig pa rang gi ngal bso ba'i sa la slob pa dang / de nyid thangs pa dag pa mngon sum du rig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ sdang ba rnams la goms shing 'dris par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas par bya'o// dbyings rig gnyis su med pa'i dus
86b7(rnying rgyud): na/ dbyings dang rig pa tshad la dbab pa thamatha sam thar se pa dang / snang ba thams cad ci yang ma yin par chos nyid zed pa'i thabs la mkhas par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po klog gi 'od zer kun nas sprin dang bral ba dang don rnams la yid
87a1(rnying rgyud): chos mgyes nas/ bzhag pa'i khyod 'i khadangs la mkhas par bya'o// sdang ba thams cad kyi zad ni/ rang gi sras rnams kyangs pa na nagags ma spang bas brkyang ba// bshas rnams kyi chad na/ thrig rna
87a2(rnying rgyud): bas pa le gyi nang du spang ba dang 'brel pas bzung ngo // 'od kyi tshad ni snang ba thams cad zab pa mi rnabs skya ngang gnyis su med pas bzung ngo // rig pa'i tshad na gang ga/ dang dpa 'tsho 'ong med pa'i ye shes rang bzhag tu gnas pas bzung ngo // chos nyid
87a3(rnying rgyud): zad pa'i tshad ni/ spang ba thams cad shod pa logs pa gang gi ngo bor yid ma grub pas 'dos mthab bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po klog gi 'od zer 'od kun nas smin dang bral bas/ stor pa kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces
87a4(rnying rgyud): gsal to// rkye'u ston pa kun tu bzang // de ltar bzhag pa'i don rnams kyis// bdag gis skye med mig kyang thob// shes rab rnams kyi lus zungs rdzogs// sku gsum dbus bu zag pa cir bzhag rnyed// bzhag pa lnga don de ltar na// sa
87a5(rnying rgyud): can rnams kyi rang skad yul// ma brdal bzhag pa'i dran de gang // ston pa nyid kyis bdag la gsungs// kun bzang ston pas bka' stsal pa// kye ma byang chub sems chen du// yis bstan gyis lags par nyon// sems can kun gyi
87a6(rnying rgyud): sdang mo// / gzhan nas bcol pa'i gdus snyed de/ nga// ring gi maN+Da yos rang dag 'as// so/ nga gsum 'jig rten ganganas kyang // de nyid btsal yang rnyed gnas med// da gzhin kun gyi grong yul ni// de nyid dA dbang rang bzhin
87a7(rnying rgyud): dus mthang kyang mthong ba mo m-i// snangs kyin nga ga sa pa'i rapa radu/ mdu// pa yis mthong // gas/
87b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i skal bsan// rtog pa med pa'i sku bzung ste// nga yi thugs rje'i 'od la zhugs// 'di dngang nyid skal ba mnyam// nga yi dkyil dang khor yang yin// nor bu rin zin 'ong 'bar ba // sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang zin 'di// dus nasas bya #
87b2(rnying rgyud): medang las bstan// nga ni kun bzang rtog med la// thugs rje'i snang mthang ma 'gags pas// sems can rnams kyi re gnas sa// ma btsal bzhag pa'i rin po che// kun gyi spyod yul min pas na// 'di zhing rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ma yi nang na
87b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo// dbang phyug yin gyis gus phyag 'tshal// kun tu bzang po nga yi sems// su yis rig cing rtogs pa de// sangs rgyas stong dang skal ba mnyam// skal ldan skyes kyi blo rtsal can// mi g.yo dgongs pa mnyam gzhag rjes su 'dzin// dkyil
87b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag go// 'di lta su yis rig cing shes// ma btsal bzhag pas don dang 'phrad// ngadi 'phrang rnal 'byor skal ldan du// bskal pa brgya phrag bye bar 'gyur// de phyir 'di la 'dris par gces// rtag tu 'di la goms myod na// rdo rje
87b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyid dang mnyam// de nyid klong du gyur par bya'o// de nas glog gi 'od zer ni// kun nas smin dang bral ba yis// ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshig ni 'di skad nyid du gsol// kye kye ston pa kun tu bzang // ma 'ongs sems can kun d+ha
87b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i ye shes ci ltar gnas// 'di kun bdag gis ma 'tshal na// ston pa thugs rje chen pos gsungs// kun tu bzang po ston pa yis// zhal nas gsung ba cang med par// tshig gi rgyal po 'di dag kun// ma gsungs la khod kyi zla
87b7(rnying rgyud): la snang / sra sams pa'i sa/ rnyog pa med dang rang sems stodro dang / rtog pa med pa'i rang rig yul la gnyis// 'dra'o 'dra'o nor ra re// ma bsgribs gting gsal snang ba rang shes rig gi rgyal po dang // 'gro ba'i bsam rgyud zhen pa
88a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu pa shapas gnyis// 'du 'dra'adod dang/ mal ba'ag pa'i 'gas pa dgazhags pa dang // tshungs mas kyi dpa ngaso gnyis payos lasab/ 'dung 'dudun / sa sa
88a2(rnying rgyud): med rig pa yul snang dang // dran pas ma 'gro drug 'phrul pa gnyis/ ra to yul man po bya/ 'dra'o 'dra'o nor ra re// chos nyid dag pa'i bar do dang / ngos 'i rang la chen po// ya dam lha yi l+ya lus bcom pa rtabs kyi la rang gnyis// 'dra
88a3(rnying rgyud): 'da' nor ra re// rang bzhin sbrul s+ye'i gang khams dpan pa chen pa dang / mr-i re// theg pa bkrung ba'i sangs rgyas gnyis/ gdung yod pa dang / 'da'o 'dra'o nod ra re// sku gsum 'bras bu'i mthar thug/ ka8/ dang // sna tshogs ma nges lhan grab gnyis// 'a
88a4(rnying rgyud): nang ror// thag pa rnams kyi yid dpyod bltab na tshul 'jog pa dang dang // rig pa mngon su banya pa gnyis/ 'das papam gyis 'a ba snang // lte ba'i phyogs ba bar bya mi 'dra nas 'dra 'dra la// 'dra'i 'dra'i nor rar// tshal med rig spu yul da
88a5(rnying rgyud): hAng dang // pa na rna sa/ sgom pa'i gzugs brtan gnyis/ na nga da// 'dang 'drang na du // rig pa'i mdzad spyod yul ya dab rol pa dang // 'gro drug pa rtog 'phrul ba'i snang ba gnyis// 'dra 'jadran pa rang // rang ba'i
88a6(rnying rgyud): yi rnaM padag jig pa dang // chung bcur mtshan banas sems pa na'i theg pa gnyis gas/ 'dra' 'dra nur re // zas lha mngag sdang ba kag dang // skye na dngas pa'i grong kyi snyam la la gnyis// 'dra 'o
88a7(rnying rgyud): rang 'is pa 'bral 'a chan pa dang / shes dadu sams kyi rgyang chang 'a rdzogs gnyis// dadrang drang dang 'i/ sa ma da yi / gang 'ag dong rgya lardzogs pa dang / nag sung du yang bye da babyor po gnyis// 'dra'i 'dra da// na
88b1(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i bden chog gnas lugs kyi tshig cam dang // ldem dgongs padrug pa'i rtsig cam 'gal tshig gnyis// 'dra'o 'dra nor ra re// nges pa'i bcu gsum yul ru pa pa man ngag dang // mtshan mad pe yi dpon rnam gtu gyi rnonas bas di gnyis
88b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra'o 'dra'o nor ra re// gal te gsang ba'i bden pa'i tshig/ nyid kyi zhal nas ma gsungs par/ 'khor rnams kyis/ rmi lam lta bu'i mtshan nyid du// 'khor gyi byang sems rnams la ni// shes rab tog dpyod blo la snang // de ltar rang rang rgyad krol nas/
88b3(rnying rgyud): shin tu ngo mtshar nyid gyur nas// 'di skad tshig ni yang gsol to// kye ma ston pa kun tu bzang // nyid kyi zhal nas ma gsungs par// bden dod dam dang can rdzob gnyis 'dra gzhi'i tshig rnams ni// bdag cag rnam kyi blol yang // rmi lam lta bu'i tshul
88b4(rnying rgyud): dug/ 'di dag rnams ni ci ltar lags// ston pa nyid kyis bdag la gsung // de nas ston pa kun tu bzang // rang bzhin nyid mabacos pa'i gyi yul dag nas// klog gi 'od zer smin bral la// 'di skad ces na bka' stsal to// kye ma byang chub sems
88b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ glog gi 'od zer sprin bral ba// nga yis bstan gyis legs par nyon// de ltar rmelam lta bu'i tshig/ ngas ni tshig tu ma brjod par// khyod la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyi// bro yi gting du yid ches pa// ngas ni
88b6(rnying rgyud): bshad pa ma yin te// nga la de ye bar dag bya// sangs rgyas stong phrag drug khri yis/ 'di kun gyis gsungs pa'i tshig/ grang rnam gcig tu dril nas bstan// da tshig khyod kyis thos pa legs// de kun sangs rgyas de dag dang / skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ba
88b7(rnying rgyud): mi tog ye shes las byung ba// ma btsal bzhag pa'i man ngag gis// ya yod dang po'i sangs rgyas rnyed// 'di tshong na 'thab pa'i sdang ba dag/ dag pa'i rtags ni chos rnams rmad kya nga med zad// 'di nyid zad pas 'khor ba grangs/ 'khor ba nyid
89a1(rnying rgyud): narnam pa pa snang ba'i rtags// rigs thag gzugs rnams mi sna sa/ deska mi snang za sa sa/ 'od sa smra// 'gro dang 'od 'dun da lda ba dang // dzaltar nga bzhiH ra
89a2(rnying rgyud): gyis ro// pa// 'di ni bden dgoms pa'o// bden goms rnal 'byor skal ldan pa// sus ma rnyed pa'i don rnyed de// 'di la rin thang dpag tu med// dpag med nor dang 'phrad pa'i mis// sus ma mthong ba'i snang ba mthong // 'di mthong rang nyid rig re
89a3(rnying rgyud): che// de ltar sems la snang che ba// chos can dum bu'i phyag mas btab/ me rdza ba byas// chos can du mgur sus tshod la// 'dis ni rang rig yangs sa ca nar gyis zi ni// 'di ltar zin pa'i skyes bu yis// sangs rgyas pas kyang yin ma skar sangs
89a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas// bden pa yi ni dkyil 'khor la// su yaMs blta bar nus pa de// rigs rnams la kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// dpal ldan tshogs kyi bdag po zhes// he ru ka yi dbang rnams rdzogs// khyad par can zhes rim pa la 'khor los sgyur/
89a5(rnying rgyud): mi de ngan song gsum 'tha' ba dang shing/ dang bar dol 'das zhes// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'di la lung rnams ston par 'gyur// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' nyon// rnal 'byor skal dang gang ldan pa// khyad par 'di rtogs nyid du
89a6(rnying rgyud): shes// 3/ 'byung ba dang tsun pa dang gnas pa dang bzlog pa bzhi goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lus kyi rtags phyi nangags dang blan med pa rnams mngon du 'byin/ gang gis dacings kyi 'od la 'dris pa yi// sa dzo ri thag rang ser 'gags// thig le dag longs su'i
89a7(rnying rgyud): spangs la sus goms pa// nyig gcig dgongs pa rtsad kyang chod// sku pa la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs drug gzugs kyang longs skur gsal// rig pa nyid le sus goms pa// 'dis ni chos rnams kyi yang zad par 'gyur// snying po
89b1(rnying rgyud): yang nas yang bsdus pa// nges pa 'di la gang goms pa// chos kun s+ya dang ngang / bslab pa med par shes// de bzhan ma rang gnas su bsgoms ting 'angan thob// de las gnanaHgrub pa'i mtha' med pas// lung dang rig pa dus gcig/ zhes ngas
89b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// sngags dang phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dang // mchod dang dbang dang dam tshig ni// ma btsal bzhag pa'i tshul du thob// 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta rnams// skad cig cha la dus gsum rdzogs// sa dang lam dang tshigs rnams na/ pan bgro
89b3(rnying rgyud): cing sbyang dang tshogs pasag med par// skal ldan sems la dus gcig rdzogs// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu ni// ci ltar gnas pa'i tshul du snang // ngo bo rang bzhin thugs je ni// tog med rang sangs nyid du gnas// chos su longs
89b4(rnying rgyud): spu sprul pa'i lha// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i tshul du thob// lha dang sgom dang spyod pa dang // ma bstan 'khor ba'i tshul du rdzogs// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni// yo rdzogs rang gi lus la gnas// snang dang stong dang dbyer med ni// ma
89b5(rnying rgyud): byas ya rdzogs nyid du gnas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' ye rdzogs te can sngon gyi 'char tshul/ tshul du gnas// dmigs pa dag pa'i rnal 'gyor pas// dri ma med pa'i phyogs nas ni// gzung 'dzin med pa'i lta ba mthong // da
89b6(rnying rgyud): bral ye shes gzhi dag las// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis// 'di kun reg par rab tu dka'// gal te 'di nyid sus rig pa// stong gsum kun kyang rma med pa'i dag pa ti la 'brur chud// rgya mtsho chen po rlabs kyis btab/ 'phor ba rang das// des nir rang
89b7(rnying rgyud): srang la gzhal// dgrang 'od 'di ri pa// khams gsum po ni gting nas rang dag tu bzlog/ srid pa gsum lus sems kyi shen pa kA gdar sha bcad// shes rab dag pa'i sems can ma lus srog bcad nas// sangs rgyas rnams dang dbyer mi phyed// kun tu bzang po byang chub
90a1(rnying rgyud): sems// mi snang mi 'byung rang rig gsal// gleng bral 'di la 'dris pa'i mi// brjod med ra ngadag rnyed pa'o// 'di nyid yon tan dpag tu med// dpag med sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam// mnyam nyid shes pa kun gyi rje//
90a2(rnying rgyud): rang rig mnyam pa'i rgyal po la// bla ma'i gdams pa// gis lung gis gsal gdab pa// 'khrums dang dgas 'di ni gser 'gyur rtsi bzhin du// brjod du med pa'i klong zhes bya// gcig cig pa shes byab sus shes pa// des ni gnyis kyi grangs zad par// kun bza
90a3(rnying rgyud): yi sems la shar// de la shar nub yongs kyis med// nub med snying po'i don 'di la// dag pas zhugs pa'i lung rab can// 'di kun sa ste mi 'gyur rdzogs// 'gro ba'i mgon po dri med ngas// mdzad pa med pa'i thugs rje yis// zin pa med
90a4(rnying rgyud): ya'i las rnams byas// sna tshogs su shar bas// chags dang bral ba'i yid kyis ni// dad ldan lngar ma mthong ba'i yul mthong nas// bla ma'i gdams pa'i rtsad rnams ni/ reg pa mthong ma thag/ dus ni skad cig mtha' la chod// gri ma yang nyon sems dpa' che/
90a5(rnying rgyud): kun bzang ngal lta ba med/ yid dpyod// lta ba med phyir snang ba zad// de bzhin sgom pa nyid kyang med// sgom pa shes pa med khyer dran pa 'gags// spyod pa zhes ni rma byung du brjod du med// spyod pa med phyir lus 'byung zad// zad pa 'di la mtha
90a6(rnying rgyud): brten nas// mi de mi yi snang sangs kyas dang mnyam pa med// lha/ beT rkyen tshangs pa dang byug dang srid pa'i bdag po kun// 'di la skraka cing sngangs nas ni// 'jig rten chang shas kyi mthun pa'i gzugs bzung nas// sdor du mgyur pas 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid dang
90a7(rnying rgyud): bral// 'khor ba'i dpudi phral la mngon par zhen// 'di kun rang gi las spyor phyir/ de dag sngags la gzung ba yi/ sngags la 'dug pa'i yan lag/ sems myong pa la sogs pa gis/ byin po lo gtog 'grong kun/ thugs rje ldan pas sems gzung bya/ rtsa chung ba 'bra pa// de nas
90b1(rnying rgyud): rig snang yul 'di bstan// 'di la mthong mthag tu 'dris bskal ba che// de yi phyir na kun bzang ngas// 'di kun rig pa'i skyes bu ni/ skad mi wa/ 'phags pa rnams dang rdzu 'phrul mnyam/ 'das pa'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o// ngas ni 'dra
90b2(rnying rgyud): kun yang phye bar// tshig gis rnam par mtshon nas ni// yang dag gsang ba'i don rnams su// gzhung du rnam par bkod nas banyan// 'di la 'bras bu lus 'dris pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// zhes kun tu bzang po klong drug pa gsang ba
90b3(rnying rgyud): kyang chen po las/ chos nyid thams cad gtan la phab pa'i klong zhes bya ste gnyis paro// bdan/ dzar+pa ne/ rdzogs so// / lha min rnams gnas su dag par byed pa'i skangs te gnyis pa'o// / den pa yang rton pa kun tu bzang po nyid
90b4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid sgyu ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas/ zhal gyi sgo la sogs pa nas 'od zer stong phrag dpag tu med pa 'phros nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
90b5(rnying rgyud): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi/ yid kyi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs so// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'od zer kun 'dus mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba
90b6(rnying rgyud): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa la gzar te/ ston pa kun tu bzang po la ma chags pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod/ maglengs pa'i tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ston pa kun tu bzang po lags/ 'gro ba rigs drug gis bsdus pa'i sems can rnams
90b7(rnying rgyud): la/ sems nyid ces pa ci lta bu lags/ 'di bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ ston pas gsung du gsol/ de nas ston pa kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'di skad du bsgrags so// bye 'od zer kun nas mtha' yas
91a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ 'khor 'di dag gi nang du ngas seng gere skra bsngags gis/ khyod la sogs te/ dbang po rab tu dang bas nyon cig/ sems gtan ga phengs nas brtan pa rigs drug gi sems
91a2(rnying rgyud): dzan la sogs pa 'di dag rnams ni sems kyis bsdus pas na/ sems can zhes sal tshig thams cad du dbyung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' khyo sems pa rnam par dad na 'di ltar yid la zung zhig/ mnyam par gnas pa'i sems nyid la/ khyab
91a3(rnying rgyud): gdal chen po'i yul snang bas// gnyis med snang ba ni 'brel zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// mtshan ma med pa'i sems 'di kun rig pa'i yon tan 'chang tshul du brtan sems nyid la// chos rnams grangs su snang ba ni// rang grol gnyis med ces
91a4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// brjod du med pa'i sems nyid la// grong gzhi bral ba'i tshig snang ba// smra bsam yul las 'das pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// btsal du med pa'i sems nyid las// rang byung chen
91a5(rnying rgyud): por rang snang ba// rang byung ye shes chen po zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// dri ma med pa'i sems nyid la// yul rkyen bral ba'i snang ba ni// rang dag chen po'i dgongs pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// rtog pa med pa'i
91a6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid la// ma bzung 'gag med rang shar bas// rang reg gsal ba'i rang ngo shes// kun tu bzang po nga yis brtan// bsam pa med pa'i sems nyid la// rang gnas lhun 'byams snang ba ni// sgra bzhi rang log 'gongs pa
91a7(rnying rgyud): zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// dran pa med pa'i sems nyid 'di// 'gyu byed rang dag spang ba ni// 'dzin pa rang grol bsam gtan zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// byung tshor med pa'i sems nyid la//
91b1(rnying rgyud): ma bsams lhag mthong snang ba ni// 'gro 'od zad pa'i dgongs pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// gzung ba med pa'i sems nyid la// ma 'gags rig pa snang ba ni// rol pa chen po'i ting 'dzin zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis brtan//
91b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa med pa'i sems nyid la// rang shar chen po snang ba ni// ma 'gags mi rtog dgongs pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// gzung du med pa'i sems nyid la// bdag rtog bral ba'i snang ba ni// rang bzhag chen po'i dgongs pa
91b3(rnying rgyud): zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// rtag chad med pa'i sems nyid la// bzang ngan med pa'i snang ba ni// spang blang bral ba'i dgongs pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// glang dor med pa'i sems nyid la// phyogs med rang
91b4(rnying rgyud): grol snang ba ni// khyab gdal chen po'i dgongs pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// bying rgod med pa'i sems nyid la// btang snyoms chen po'i bsgom pa ni// tshogs du gzhug pa'i dgongs pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan//
91b5(rnying rgyud): yang med pa'i sems nyid la// de dogs bral ba'i snang ba ni// yi bzhag gdeng ldan dgongs pa zhes// kun tu bzang po nga yis bstan// snang cha med pa'i sems nyid la// nyag gcig cha phra'i snang ba ni// spros bral chen po'i dgongs pa zhes//
91b6(rnying rgyud): kud tu bzang po nga yis bstan// de ltar rang dngas dgongs pa rtse// sems kyang gtan la phab pa yis// rnal 'dzir sems la rang dbang thob// dri ma bcings pa las grol ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'od zer kun tu mtha' yas
91b7(rnying rgyud): pos// snyan pa kun tu bzang po la// 'di skad tshig gis yang nus sa// gro ston pa kun tu bzang // zad pa'i sams nyid dka // mang ba'i sems nyid kyikyang lags// 'di dag pa dag la 'aka' dz+wal ga// ti pas gsungs pa
92a1(rnying rgyud): dbang rtsa// da yis bstan gyis bzhon// yod pa rnams ni 'di staH// zlab mod pa'i sems nyid la/ dag// sa sha sa 'a na// 'gro drug snang ba rang na dbang // thang drug zugs rnams 'dzin par ni// rdzang gzugs
92a2(rnying rgyud): su smin par rdzogs// 'gag pa yod pa'i sems nyid la// mi rtag rgyu ru rang shar bas// rang bzhin med pa'i sdang bar ni// dper na rmi lam brten du rdzogs// spros pa yod pa'i sems nyid la// sna tshogs snang ba dang sharabs// sgo lnga so sor sdang ba
92a3(rnying rgyud): ni// rangs bzung ba'i cha nas rdzogs// bstan du yod pa'i sems nyid la// sgra tshig ming rnams rang shar bas// tha skad blo rnams dang dag par// na ma'i man ga gsang ba rdzogs// mthong du yod pa'i sems nyid la// 'byung rkyen du ma rang sha
92a4(rnying rgyud): pas// snang ba'i yul la mngon du ni// ma 'dres rang gsal nyid du rdzogs// b+ha du sa pa'i sems nyid dang // snang ba'i phung pos ma shar// bung 'jug chen por rang 'brel par// mi brdza gzungs dang ldan par rdzogs// yul du yod pa3/
92a5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid la// spang ba rnams ni dang shar bas// bdag 'don gnyis po rang dag par // yul drug rnams ni sa sor rdzogs// brjod nayod pa'i sems nyid la// rgyu dngang lung dang man ngag ni// gcig lagacag brten gcag par ni// grub pa
92a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang bangs par rdzogs// bsgom du yod pa'i sems nyid la/ gnas lhag mthong rang sha rabs// panyam pang la zhag dang rjes sra'i// mi g.yo bsam gtan gyi por rdzogs// blta ru yod pa'i sems nyid pa// rnang srid gcig pa rang
92a7(rnying rgyud): sharabs// khams gsum rangs grol bdi// a ti rang bzhin chen por rdzogs// skyong du yod pa'i sems nyid la/ bya byed rnams ni je sha rabs// ldang ba dang 'dzin cha nas ni// sems nyid ba drung shugs snga tshogs rdzogs// rdzo
92b1(rnying rgyud): sems nyid la// rab nyid dag rang snang bas// Nal bskab rnams dang bral ba nga// lcag sung rang la lag par rdzogs// bzang du yang ba'i sems nyid la// zag pa so sor dang shar bas// 'dod rgyal 'i dang mad men par ro// snang pa 'ang
92b2(rnying rgyud): gsang dzin par rdzogs// dmigs su med pa'i sems nyid la// snang ba sna chags dang sha te// ming dang/ 'a dag sa sor ni// gzugs su rnam pa gnyis su rdzogs// dpag tu yod pa'i sems nyid pa// lda ba'i yul la rang nang \u0f7f// btang pa
92b3(rnying rgyud): swa nyid dang byu bar // dmyigs pa'i rtenang dang bzlas par rdzogs// bsgrag tu yod pa'i sems nyid du// ngo mthar tshig kun rangag bas// brjod d+he kun gyig na myur // san pa'i chog dang brnas pa rdzogs// bdag hU~M yo pa
92b4(rnying rgyud): nyid la// sna dpe rang bzhag gzhing sha rabs// cog bzhag chen po'i lta ba ni// brtsal ba med pa'i rdul du rdzogs// pi ltar 'i sems nyid la// nyon mongs rnams ni rang shar bas// drug pas sran du bgyur bad+man
92b5(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes nyid du rdzogs// dag tu yod pa'i sems nyid pa// b+h+yo lnga'i yud rnams dngadag par// ma togs rgya nyid dang dngas bzhinasnang ba rnams ni dang sar rdzogs// zol na yod pa'i sems nyid la// 'di ltar spong ba'i yul da/
92b6(rnying rgyud): lA// rdul gyi madrid pa rang grol bzhin// rang ge 'jug sar sgrol ta rdzogs// gzhag du ya pa'i sems nyid la// rang snang dag pa'i chang / sa ni// zla skad med la phab pa bzhin// nyams myong gang nas gong du rdzogs// de ltar yod pa'i ma
92b7(rnying rgyud): nyid ni// snang bkun gyi bdag par 'byung // de kun 'byung ba'i sems rnams kyi// dri ma thams cad nga dag pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpar ni// 'ad zeng kun tu mtha' yas ngas// skyon pa kun thubazang nga po// 'di skad tshig gis rab nyung ba/
93a1(rnying rgyud): kye rgya ston pa kun tu bzang// yod pa'i sems nyid de ltar na// snang ba'i sems cad ci ltar lags// nyon pa zugs rnga che mnga' bas// rim pa bdag la rgyal gsung // rton pas gsungs pa sems dpa' che// sems gas
93a2(rnying rgyud): pa rnal 'byong bas// 'di ltar nyid du rnam pan bshad// tshogs thug snang bang sems nyid lnga// tog tshogs rnams ni rang sa da // mchog dang ba'i sems nyid la// tha skad ming rnams rangs dang // rags par da pa'i sems nyid la/ @
93a3(rnying rgyud): byin rnams rang sar dag/ gdung 'dzin snang ba'i sems nyid pa// bcings pa'i bdag 'dzin rangs dag/ yod par snang ba'i sems nyid la// dngos po rnams ni das pag/ med par snang ba'i sems nidel// stor ba nyid
93a4(rnying rgyud): dag/ yang mad/ ba'i sems nyid mi// grub pa'i mtha' gnyis rang sar dag/ chos zhwa sna pa'i sems nyid pa// rang gi mtshan nyid 'angs rang ga/ chos med snang ba'i sems nyi la// lekhrul pa rnams ni rangs dang // gzhan pa
93a5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid la// dri ma rnams ni rang sa dag/ babs su grub pa'i sems nyid la// gzhi ga nag chen po dang sa da// jog 'angs chen po'i sems nyid la// rdzing bzad kar dang sang dag/ yin par spang ba'i sems nyid la// zur gyi chog
93a6(rnying rgyud): rnams rang sa ra dag/ min par snang ba'i sems cad la/ ma byin len pa 'angs dag/ yin dang min pa'i sems nyi dang // mi tshangs spyod pa dang sar dag/ 'jal pa med snang sems can la// ngag dkyil rnams ni 'angasar dag/ yul
93a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i sems nyid la// gra ma'i rtseg rnams rangs radag 'aslabar snang ba'i sems nyid la// 'od log rnams ni 'angs pa // rnaMs da// pa'i sem pa nyid pa// srog gtsang pa yang rangs radag// kun rje snang ba'i sems nyid la// dan
93b1(rnying rgyud): gsas rnams ni dang sa dngag/ 'bras bur spong bar sems nyid la// rgan dasams rnams ni dang sa dang// gra byung ba'i sems nyid la// zhugs pa nams ni dang sa dngag/ gtsug sas pangang sams nying la// ma
93b2(rnying rgyud): rangs rang ga/ dri ru snang ba'i sems nyed pa// shes pa'i chu rnams rang sar dag/ ro rje snang ba'i sems nyid la// myod byed shes pa rangs radang // reg tu snaspang ba'i sems nyid ma// ngag tu'i shes pa rang sang dag/ chos su snang ba'i sems
93b3(rnying rgyud): nyid la// sring dngar 'dzin dang sa dag/ bdag tu snang ba'i sems nyid la// zhan pa rje rnams rang sa dngag/ bdag med snang ba'i sems nyid la// cha dang bral ba rangs de drag/ zag banas snang ba'i sems nyid la// bai rnyed pa'i
93b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba rang sar dag/ zag med sdang pa 'i sangs nyid la// 'khrul gyon dri ma rang sang dag/ dmigs par ldang ba'i sems nyid la// dmigs med cha rnams rangs ra dag/ po tshogs snang ba'i sems nyid la// tsho ba rnams ni drangs ra
93b5(rnying rgyud): yod du spang ba'i sems nyid la// skyed byed cha rnams rang sang dag/ gzugs su sdang ba'i sems nyid la// 'byung ba 'dus pa rang sa radag/ rnam shes snang ba'i sems nyid la// rgya chen rnangs ni rang sang dag/ tshor bsnang ba'i sems
93b6(rnying rgyud): tid la// nyams myong rnams ni rangs radag/ 'dra shes snang ba'i sems nyid pa// gzung 'dzin cha rnams rang sa dag/ 'du byed snang ba'i sems nyid la// nyon mo ras grangs rnams rangs rA dag// tog 'dzin snang ba'i sems nyid la/
93b7(rnying rgyud): dran pa'i gzung rnams rang sa ngag/ ces stor ba nyid kyis gsungs pas/ byang chubs pas dpa' sems dpa' chan mo 'angad zar kunaHmtha' yas pa la sogs pa'i 'khor dag gis sems la ci sa pa bkun du dbang rdzi chu /
94a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i lta stangs dang ldan par gyur te// de nas yang 'od bar kunatu mtha' yas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas/ ston pa kun tu bzang ba la 'ang skad ces zhus so// kye stan pa kun tu
94a2(rnying rgyud): bzang po sems su snang ba de dag rnams kyi don ci lta bu lags/ 'di dag bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ gsung gi mnga' bdag chen pos gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ kye byang chub
94a3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ sems kyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab kyang 'di dag gi don rnams ni/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o// rig pa dang rig pa las byung ba'i sems nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sems rnams
94a4(rnying rgyud): so// yang gsol pa/ kye ston pa kun tu bzang po rig pa dang / reg pa las byung ba'i sems nyid de gang lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sems de gang lags/ 'di kun bdag la gsung bar zhu/ zhes gsol pas/ ston pas gsungs pa/
94a5(rnying rgyud): kye sems dpa' chen po/ rig pa dang rig pa las byung ba'i sems nyid ni/ dri ma dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'das pa ste/ mdor na mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad de/ rig pa'i rang snang mthong ba'i skyes bu rnams kyi spyod
94a6(rnying rgyud): yul lo// rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sems ni/ 'di ltar rtag par snangad pa rnams dang / yod par snang ba dang de bzhin du med par snang ba thams cad dang / ldang ba dang / grag pa dang / lta ba dang / sgom pa dang / spyod
94a7(rnying rgyud): par snang ba thams cad dang / 'dzin pa dang / rtog pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams te/ bsam pa'i yul du sdeng tshad thams cad yin no// mdor na 'khor ba'i chos thams cad ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sems te/ 'gro ba rigs drug
94b1(rnying rgyud): rlung ka ma'i snang ba thams cad do// byas pas dpa' zin pa/ sems dang la shes rang ga bas byed na/ nyam sgron zung gas bsgribs pa dang 'draH/ khyod ldang badz+rad na byung brnam sa// dang phreng dmams pa mkhas pa'i rnam 'byung ba rna
94b2(rnying rgyud): phyi rol gyi yul bdag med du rtogs/ ye shes la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ rig pa nyid kyis ye shes la dbang bsgyur nus pa'o// yang gsol pa/ kye ston pa kun tu bzang po/ sems kyi gnas gang lags/ ye shas kyi gnas ga
94b3(rnying rgyud): lags/ bstan dugs/ zhes kus so// yang bka' stsal pa/ gyes pas dba' chud pasems gnas jibran ga zhi yin no// de tso'i byang nan/ na smra gas pa pa'i phral thams pa byung cings mas su 'dugs pa'i phyir /
94b4(rnying rgyud): shes kyi gnas ni myos kyi sgra yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi spyani dran rtag thams cad mi mngal zhing / yul can tha dad nga 'dzin pa'i shes pa meng pa'i gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang zer kun d+ha mtha'
94b5(rnying rgyud): yas pa/ de'i phyir na kun gzhi dang chos sgra mabyad na/ gzugs gcig la tha dad du 'dzin pa dang 'dras/ don so sor ldang bar mi nus so// 'di ltar sdang ba dang oM ldang ba dang / yod pa dang med pa dang / thams cad la sems kyis ma khyab pa
94b6(rnying rgyud): gang yang me dang // dka rjes nyid gang lub can byol/ chos can tha dang du spang ba thams cadag cig tu 'dus te/ gnas mi 'gyur ba nga 'dug/ papa m-i 'gyu cing ra sh+mi / sril 'i 'gre bar rang ba ma/ sdang ba mi 'gyur ba rang
94b7(rnying rgyud): bdas pan/ bung tu bzang bang 'i mdzad spyod mdzin// byas sa nga# gyun/ ngas sa ma'i chags nga shA sa/ sprul khyor chu mthadang/ sems ca dasan kyang nam 'gags
95a1(rnying rgyud): par byed pa ni// sangs kyis rnams kyi mang srod dang // sems can kun gyi rab rgyad gnyis// 'jug zhag cig la khyad pa \u0f7f// dAm+b+ha kun bzang nga yis bstan// 'di la 'dres pa su lan pa// kun bzang dang
95a2(rnying rgyud): skal ba mnyam// zhes kun tu bzang po grong drug pa'i rgyang gsang ba chen po las/ sna tshogs smos pa sems su gtan la phab pa'i grong zhes bya ba ste gsum pa rdzogs so// / 'o rnama? ga/ mi'i phye gnas rnam par dag pa'i skabs zhes
95a3(rnying rgyud): bya ste gsum pa'o// / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang po nyid/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba rjes su dran pa sems kyi rdul rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa las langs nas/ mi ska bang seng ge rnam par bkyed zhes bya ba'i tshig 'khor
95a4(rnying rgyud): nang du 'di skad du gsungs pa'o// 'khor ba'i thog mar yin te/ mi zad pa rgyun gyi shes pa rang 'dzin du gnas pa'o// de'i phyir na 'khor ba rnams kyi tha mar kyang nga dang byung ba yin pas/ zad pa shes pa'i don nyag gcig tu go ba'i rnal 'byor
95a5(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya'o// kye nga'i 'khor du 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin pa sogs pa rnams kyis/ 'bor ba nyid thog mtha' bcad pa la mkhas par
95a6(rnying rgyud): bya'o// zhes tshig tu bsgrags pas/ 'khor de dag gi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma bcas pa'i 'od zeng zhes bya bas 'di skad ces ston kun tu bzang po la gsol to// kye rgya ston pa kun tu bzang ngo // sangs rgyas thams
95a7(rnying rgyud): cad kyis 'khor ba chog mtha' bcad pa'i lugs yod lags sam/ ston pa nyid kyis 'khor bzog mtha' bcad pa lags sam/ 'di rton pa la bad ba nyan par 'tshal lo// de nas rton pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ kye byang chub sems dpa'
95b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nyi ma 'dus pa'i 'od zer khrod nyon cig/ 'khor bzag mtha' bcad pa zhes bya ba ni/ ngas ci ltar bcad pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang bcad pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcad pa bzhin na/ ngas kya
95b2(rnying rgyud): bcad pa ste/ thad dpa ni ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang rig par gyis shig/ ngakun tu bzang po smos pa thams cad nye bar zhi nas/ 'gran zla med par sangs rgyas pa'im/ chos thams cad kyi
95b3(rnying rgyud): rdul dang bral ba ted de/ zhing khams kun tu mtha' yas pa mthong nas/ snang ba phyi nang gnyis su med par 'dres pa'i cha/ glong rnam par dag pa'i dgongs pa thob ste/ de'i tshe 'khor ba nyid theg mtha' chod pa zhes d+ha ra// de nas byang chub se mas
95b4(rnying rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma 'dus pa'i 'od zer gyis/ 'di skad ces ston pa kun tu bzang po la gsol pa/ kye ston pa kun tu bzang po thog mar ston pa nyid med pa'i sngon rol na/ 'di ltar sems can sems can zhes kyang ma grub/
95b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes kyang bya bar ma grub pa'i sngon rol na/ gzhi 'di ci ltar gnas pa lags/ 'di bdag gis ma 'tshal na ston pas bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus so// de nas ston pas bka' stsal ba/ kye ma byang chub sems
95b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen pa nga yis bstan gyis ngal nyon/ thog ma babs kyis grub pa rtags tas nga rgyas med/ ma NaN+Da sa mas bang rtsod ji ga/ gzhi// yod pa nga po gcig las med pal// 'khrul bar snang ba'i phyogs dganas/ thanyas na pa// rtag
95b7(rnying rgyud): danasas kyi tshogs dag ni gtan phab na/ gleng btas// rim pa bdun gyi tshul du spang // rim pa bdun gyi snang ba yang // ngagro gad yo ya sa gcig gi sdang tshul las// gcig sa ga ga rigs pas shes pas de ltar sdang // 2
96a1(rnying rgyud): kyang dadan tshigags mtshan pas 'di lta ste/ ga/ lhun grub la 'dapa nyid du gnas pa la// sna tshogs bsdus pa'i snying por snang / ga/ rngas pa med par 'ango sa gnas pa la// dgra byed yod bcas rnam par ldang / !// ras
96a2(rnying rgyud): par 'do rangangang gnas pa la// dran byed 'pho ba med par snang / gtang / gyung du btub par ngas sdang ba la// 'bad dap+l-i yi snang bar snang / gaM// tsa yong bo ma tha thang ba mapar gnas pa la// gang ljang tang gi por sna / ga9/ khra [ред]
96a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs ngag tu 'arang pa gnas pa la// sna chags so sor tshul du skyed/ rgan ga na po shen/ ma ngag te// ka nas dag par gnas pa la// de la ye nas med bar sdang / blar ba rmogasas/ 'di kun zla yi rim pa las// ring chu la[рд╜]

96b4(rnying rgyud): ngas kya sa yon thaM ba rdzi po/ ya dgos med 'gyur// de phyir ldan grub ces pa'i gzhi// don ra btub pa lags ma lags// kun tu bzang pos bdag la gsung // ston pas gsungs pa sems dpa' che// ci ltar khyod kyis glo ba bzhin/

96b7(rnying rgyud): ngas pa pa dpas// mangs nges pa can 'gyur zhing // mangs pa yangs brjid kyang med kar / nings can 'gyur// rang gis ma ngas rang yod pas das ma ma sa naca pa ma// nges pa da byer mas pas kya/ yis ni las mtha' bzhin// 'di kyad shes bya
97a1(rnying rgyud): nyam tham ma pa med/ ma lags sam// rten pas gsungs pa de bzhin na// yangags pa nyi ma 'dus pa yis// 6bya ston pa kun tha bzang // nyid kyis gang du gsungs pa yi// ngas pa'i gti zhes gsungs pa/
97a2(rnying rgyud): 'di yang yang dag snying po min// dper na rkad kyis gsus pas migaser can dag la// dung dag po la ser po snang ba bzhin// rangs ldog/ sung dang ser po yin na drang gi chos nyid seng ba med pa ci togs/ pa'i khyad kyis ni// rang gzhan gnyis med mang cho sa zhan
97a3(rnying rgyud): kami btub pa bzhin/ nges mtha' bral// de phyir de yang shes kyalas yang dag min// yang na gyur del 'bras zag 'das mi nyung ba de nyid rgyal zas pa byung ba 'bras sulas su byung nabyad ci na/ nges par// bdag rtag pa dang khyad med 'gyur// 'di yang ces kya
97a4(rnying rgyud): lags sam// gsungs pa de yang gong dang mtshungs// de nas 'di skad yang gsol pa// bsgyur du btu bces sngar gsungs pa// rang gi gnas lugs bsgyur btub na// 'di yang nges pa med par mtshungs/ gnas chags bcud cas bda' sa
97a5(rnying rgyud): thug med du 'gro ba'i khyod thang ngo // 'bras bu nyid ni sems can ci gyur ldog phyir/ 'bas pa gyur rdzob las/ 'bad pa rnams la dgos med par// yang dang yang du ldog pas nas// bems po rnams ni rig bcas su/ dbang nag di 'ad sems po rnams da tam

97b1(rnying rgyud): mtshungs// mang ba'i sgra yis nyams pa'i phyer// 'di yang shes bya ma lags sam// gsungs pa de yang nga bzhin no// yang gas pa ston pa kun tu bzang // khas lan rnams kyi sa bang yin ngas papa 'ang ban/ dang ldan par ni// snyan pa nyid kyis d+ha
97b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas// 'di kun phyogs kyi 'phen pa tsam// thams cad yin ngor bskyab drag pa tsal du ma nges te ma dag pa yang mi rnyed de/ dag pa dang mdag pa bsres/ pa'i phyir// thug pa med pa'i skyon 'gyur bas// 'di yang shes bya ma pags sam// ston pas gsungs pa
97b3(rnying rgyud): sbrang dang mtshungs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang // nyi ma 'dus pa'i 'od zer gyis// ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshig ni 'di skad rab tu gsol// kye kye ston pa kun tu bzang // ston pa nyid kyis sngar gsungs pa'i// ka nas dag pa'i gzhi
97b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs// de yi mtshan nyid bzhugs tshul gang // bdag la gsungs shig kun tu bzang // de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// kye ho sems dpa' chen po nyan// ngas bstan tshig la 'khrul med pas// khyod kyis 'di dag lags par bya//

97b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog med// sangs rgyas med cing sems can thang tshal med// chos med chos kyi 'du shes med/ chogs// gang med ci med ci yang med/ rkang ga// dag re med pa'i snying po la kho/ pa zhig tshig gi gtan phab nas/ mangs 'tsha
97b7(rnying rgyud): nyid la ngo bo tusas tshul ka dag pas// rang bzhin du du bar byed mang gags pa'i rnas ni stan thub po// patshon pa nyid la de ltar ro// ston pa kun tu bzang ba la// byang chub sems dpas yang gsol ba// ngo bo nyid pa ka dag pas/ mngag me pas sems ca

101a5(rnying rgyud): ba mchog yin te/ dgongs don thasa'i man ngag rnams kyis de yi phyogs brtags nas// lba ba'i snying po sgron ma rin po che 'di ni// rgyam chad cing phyogs su lhung ba med par snang ba ste// 'di dang su 'dris skyes bu rnams ni mya ngan 'da' ba'i gzhi/

101b1(rnying rgyud): las mi rtag ye shas nyams sha ba// snang ba kran kyang bdaba' glang du rnam par rol pa'o// daphyir las kyi bde bas su gsum gnad nas zin te bar// dpag brdebs chos kun brjod med to ta ba // sems kya bad bas 'khor 'das gnyis mang 'dras pas
101b2(rnying rgyud): bde// bde ba'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yang snying // bcos pa med pa'i snying pos thams cad rnal du phebs// 'gag pa med pa'i snying pos rang snang zad kar gcod par byed// skye ba med pa'i snying pos 'khor ba dong nas 'don par
101b3(rnying rgyud): byed// rang bzhin gnas pa'i snying pos thog mtha'i chu shan 'byed par byed// khyab gdal chen po'i skyeng pos chos kyi dbyings rnams lhud par byed// ye dag chen po'i snying pos chos kun zam la 'bebs par byed// stong pa chen po ji snying pos da

101b7(rnying rgyud): kyis nyag gcig gting zab rgya che lam snang bas// smos bzas sdug bsngal rnams dang ye nas bral ba'i lam du su 'jug pa// 'di ni 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod pa spangs te bde ba'i lam dang nyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen pam 'di sus shes pa// dri ma
102a1(rnying rgyud): zad cing da sa dgazhal dang bral ba'i lam ci skyed do ni// ma na yan dag pa dun pamams nga sa 'anas gzugs shA pa pa rnam pa sa dab dag zugs ra bathug pa ma sa pa
102a2(rnying rgyud): ba shes da gagapa nas dang yul lnga tha thub/ lan kyi sa ra pa'i zag zin pa mab/ shes pa 'i mang 'o// rtogs pa lnga'i chos d+hag / zhagag gaslos grang cigs/ rlos bdu pa nas pad pa da gas sa da lug bdag nyid du dang / sems pa
102a3(rnying rgyud): nam 'amangs kya da kyi mamams pan pa 'dzin pa dang / ya dzu pa dang / yang gas nang dzu pa bams/ lnga chos wA ma ma pa dag padzad ma med pa dag dgas bamad pa dang brjo pang dag thos pa ring ba cha sa/ 'byung ba chen nam+b+ha trA~M ma tham thang yi nga gi rang ba /
102a4(rnying rgyud): dzu dang / mdzad pa 'brags rjen man na ba tham 'das ma la bu 'di ma shAs mag/ dang gtung pa'i gas ba rje kha nga sa dang nad pa la pa la pa'i mas thas cad sa
102a5(rnying rgyud): su / ma mas nga dang 'dag dang yang 'apam
102a6(rnying rgyud): ga zhin dang / shi tu kyi dzu / rna me/ thags na chug pa sa pa bas kyi ma mang/ bu rmeg pa 'theg par byar rtsu ba/ lnga snang bsnga da y-i daya bas paldadag 'thongag / gathogs pab kyi yul du sdung// rlung ma med pamags papa ma/
102a7(rnying rgyud): sa cwa rmya 'i ma mngan kya mas/ bde brgyas par thas ldan la rgyag da da sa pa/ rngarnams sa da sngal pa bzhin du yang thob par lanas chags
102b1(rnying rgyud): pa ga dri lnga bsapa sa tshang ma bdug nga/ gad 'a sa pams rgyab gzugs pa'i ma pa byung ba/ cing gas ya byug mas/ gangagagagags tur ba rnas pa gtugs/ yul can nga ni rang byu dang // meng lnga zang ba sa sa/ chog tha
102b2(rnying rgyud): tshan po che// yongs su 'jig pa med pa'i ma// grub rgya 'dzad pa med pa chog/ rna nga ga phral kyichog/ dgongs par nga rdzogs chog te/ tha snyad lnga yi tra rig pa'i thartad/ cha da srung de/ gzhas bya rtsol 'da' kyad nang si// mtshan ma rdza dpa'i ma nyid do// bdang nyid du ni rang byung ngo // pa r+Na 1
102b3(rnying rgyud): dang / nyabs dang / dpe dang / rig pa nyams su myong ba'im/ reg lnga mi snang ba'i reg dang / snang ba'i ga dang / gtsang ba'i dang / 'dzin pa'i dang / mi 'bred pa'i reg go/ chos lngas lus sems ye nas tshims pa'i rgyu// lung lnga/ 'khrul ba zhin log dang / skasnang bsas 'dza ngas dang / gdamos gdu byeng chos dang / theg pa dbang
102b4(rnying rgyud): ya zhes pa 'i bang dang pa pa'i sang dang / rten lda mo mig bti/ thig pa ga pa brtes lab rba dadapa 'a'ang tan/ ya shes rka pa bdan/ byang c-ings pa bdon/ mkha' lnga'i byang b+ha sa nyid du yang ye nas shar/ phreM bang na gi mkha' dang / na kyi/ gas gag rang
102b5(rnying rgyud): gan med kyi 'gro shid do// yid wa ban 'ol byed pa sogs pa'o// dran pa shA ba'is dra sogs pa lnga yi rten du lam nyed yi nas 'du 'bral med sdang ba/ bdag lnga rje srul phrin pam 'di bdag gis de bya byed kyi kyi gyi/ de da byed kyi bang bdag nas da kyang kyi zhes pa bdag gis/ de
102b6(rnying rgyud): dumyong kyad kyi zhes pa bdag gis gzhan lnga'i gyos pa dang thal pa'i dang ba rol du 'i don no// nga shang to'o// chos can du na chen po ye nas byung // 'dod chags lnga dang nang shar du ba rtiH/ zhe sdang lnga ste gti mug lnga yi cho 'phrul bu ni ye nas snang ba ste// nga rgyal lnga dang khong khro lnga ste phrag dog lnga yi mdzad pa
102b7(rnying rgyud): rnams su'ang snang // gzung ba lnga gadza sa dang 'dzin mnas das pa chos nyid nges pa'i lamadu'angag 'a ma/ yod pa ma lnga dang 'angag tha nga rgyas lngas su bzhi thub pa me bdag rnams su
103a1(rnying rgyud): nas snang ba'o// dbyings lnga gyu par gsus nang bam kyangs sa pa sas/ rigs lnga dang gnas dang bgadag ga da dadapag/ kun pagasapa dadang kya ba nasum nang ba la napapa kha dag wa yi snang ba'o// mams mad nga/ dgang
103a2(rnying rgyud): dri med dang dag chags med zegs bcas ma gos pa'i dkar por// ser po lnga ste sa 'dzin pa'i sted byed ser po rang byung nang grol ser po'i yon tan no// dmar po lnga yi chags chen chags bras yi gdangs rang gdangs / khyab byed kye dmar po'o// snang ba ye nas rdzogs// rdzang gu lnga byar med pa bral byang dag bya rdzogs rgya btsa ya
103a3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i b+ha dgu'o// dang ma thi // lA lgang byed mi 'gyur kya che ba'i d+hA t+ya'i phyi'i mthing gis yul gcig tu rdzogs pa'o// yi yul du rang rdzogs nyid du'o// chos bcings ye shes la sogs pa'o// ye shes lnga dang sku rnam dA nga la sogs pa'o// lnga'i bdag nyid chen por ye nas rnam par bzhugs// zhi'i thig le la
103a4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'o// thig le lA dang swe dgyur ba las 'das pa'i rnam 'dzegs pa 'o// ma lnga yi dkyil 'khor du ni ye nyid nas ni mnga' bdag go// \u0f7fla o rnga'i lnga yon tan lnga yul rdza ra dag \u0f7fyi 'bras bu ru di ye nas gdangs/ kha dag med pa 'od lnga dang bcas/ pheg dang ldad zer kha dog dang bcas pa'i 'di la / dang
103a5(rnying rgyud): lnga dag khyab byed dbyings zhes Thab lnga yi tshul du gnas te rang dag go// mi 'byed pa'i dkar po la sogs pa mi gsal ba lnga dang stong pa lnga e tong byam chad ste 'degs stobs lnga gyi yi chung bar rtse na shegs ba'i da'on nyid kyi'o/ ni ye nyid nas grol bar ro// 'char byed lnga mig gnyis na
103a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi 'o tshangs pa'i chuga'o// de dang snang tshul lnga dang shes pa lnga gang po 'de ba'i shes pa gnyis pa gsas pa'i/ yi ngo bor bzhugs// dpe lnga phyi ro'o/ rdzam sogs pa rta gsuM phrig pa stong pa sogs pa lnga don lngas mtshon tshig pa dang skul sogs pa pa'i tshul du shar// dbang rtse dang gas baban
103a7(rnying rgyud): lnga bsur cu med pa'i don bang lnga dam tshig lnga ste med pa la sogs dag rgyag rgya lnga yi rten du ye nas rdzogs pa'o// mngon shes 'og gi sogs lnga dang gzugs lnga rdzos ring brjod pa'i gzugs pa na tha ma pe la sogs pa dang ni dran sngags kyi gnas pa 'oslab pa lnga yaM ngo bo rdzogs// dkyil 'a
103b1(rnying rgyud): las pa lnga dang rag sa 'das ba lda ngan bdag sa lngam mas ya la sa du rnam par rang dag pa'o// rtogs pa lnga thangang thag nas sa dgapa la ma dang shes rab lnga nga kyang mags dang rnangs med pa kya dang wA dag gis tha ba'i ldang bar 'jigs pa'o//
103b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rang bzhin gyis dang mi tog pa'i byas pa'i tab pa'i gnas pa'i lnga dang rang gnas lnga tshom bu la sogs pa dang mi rtog lnga/ su'i gzugs chas lus la ma rkor ne yang dang / rdzogs// lha ba lnga rigs rdza tha ka'i rdzang dang sgom pa lnga rigs rnga'i rang ga nas kyi bsam gtan ste pyod pa lha dang
103b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor rigs ldar khyod/ lnga yi rtsal du rdzogs par snang // snying po su lnga'i rigs lam rtog pa lnga dang gdal ba lnga deng de la yang su tra lngab su ba zhi rang dag chen por ye nas rdzogs pa'o// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i 'od zer kun tu snang byed khyod nyon cag
103b4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu ngas bstan khyod kyis legs par zung // chos su stong gsal rig pa mngon sum gyis khyab pa'i gang d+ha la sus goms pas ni rang lus gcig tu grol// longs su gsal sna d+ma snang ba thams cad gzugs skur shar de gang gi mthong ba'i me// dkyis
103b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor kun gyi bdag po yin pas kun tu bzang po'i// lta ba nyid du 'dug/ spru la grwa gyi yul la bdag tu gzung ba med pa'i ngang du sus 'dis sems nyin mthong ba'i skyes bu ni// 'khrul pa lhal rkyen rnams kyi phan gnod dngos po gang yang grub pa med pa yin// lha gsum gyir
103b6(rnying rgyud): mi ldog pa'i sa lanal 'byor bde ba sum rkad rig pa can// 'di ni sangs rgyas stong gi bde ba 'dzin pa nyid du kun tu bzang po nga yi sems yin no// s+ya yi snang ba lhag par sus mthong rnal 'byor kun gyi brten pa yin pa dang yis 'di yang bkod// gang gis phyi mo ldog pa'i ga
103b7(rnying rgyud): chen longs pa'i tshad rnams sus 'dzin pa// bla ma mkhas pa'i lha dang ngo spod don 'di bde ba'i rang bzhin rin po che// de la dri ma med cing gdags pa'i sgra rnams kun gyi 'du shes nyid dang bral// de rtogs chog pa dag thabs bzhi'i rnal 'byor gdeng du yang dag nyid po nyid tshud pa'o//
104a1(rnying rgyud): ngan gsarnams na mang ngan das pa 'tshon brjod pa'i mtha' bdang gos dang / zung bsams dang tha mchod mang na 'das pa'iman na ning thams cad pa dang ni ba dang // dbang pa sus rnams kyang na'adas par rnon thags mchog ga
104a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
104a3(rnying rgyud): yas thab pa dang yang she/ narjem kyang mang na 'das nyid zad pa'i dris ni b+h+ring tsho rnams ca yang ri ga pa sa sa// rdod dang rtags ba mngan 'das pa rten pongs rnam sa na gas rang chud rtong par byas pa'i na/ 'ad pani ma dzang rgya pa ga
104a4(rnying rgyud): blda dang dardzogs pa'adis nanas pa'i sa sa chen dus mdzang ba// 'di na dus gsu sangasags kyi 'bras pa pa 'a ba ga ya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras pa di sams gams dang laldan dang na nyid
104a5(rnying rgyud): 'thur// thog ma'i mgan srogani ga // dri med dag po 'od kyi bus rnas rang byung dra nga zlang bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdad pa'i bdaganyid du yang gas mchog chen pa nyid bye su thob ta// de la ma rdzog shes pa'i rnal 'byor mo rtsi'i stobs dang ldan pa'i rna /
104a6(rnying rgyud): ma// 'bras thab kyi maud tharnapas can tu babang po dngan la nyam 'o// zhes byu nga po slong dag pags nga chen po'i bladams/ b+hang po la mdang brtas pa 'bras bu dngo la bar bathun pa thong nas rgya byas pa rdzags na// yi dwags kyi skye ga rnam
104a7(rnying rgyud): 'od zer dkar po dang / kha dog
104a8(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i skabs te lnga pa'o// na 'a nab nas// / de nas nyon dgan tu bzang po sa nga gis 'bor rnams sdung pa'i rgyad du// narje gyi sgron mas nas 'ad ba ba dag dum thang te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi bas sa rnams snang bar bya na sa
104b1(rnying rgyud): gas pa / da pa gan dgyu bang lda pa dang / ma rdza pa mjug da ba la la srung bdang / sman me dang nga/ ba rnas thun pa pa dang / dpan du mang pa dang / rlub tu mang ba dang / ga sa man gtud ba pa dang / /
104b2(rnying rgyud): dmar po'o// yang ser po dang / rab tu ser po dang / shin tu sang po dang / mchog tu ser po dang / tshad med pa'i ser po'o// mthing ga dang / rab tu mthing ga dang / shin tu mthi ga dang / mchog tu mthing ga dang / tshad med pa'i mthong ga'o// de bzhin tu ljang gu dang / rab tu
104b3(rnying rgyud): ljang gu dang / shin tu ljang gu dang / mchog tu ljang gu dang / tshad med pa'i ljang gu rnams smos so// gzhan yang shel kha dog lta bu dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dang / ma tig gi kha dgal bu dang / tha dad ba'i sgo 'i khadog nya'u dang / rin po che mthad lta bu dang / rin po rgya ma
104b4(rnying rgyud): mthong lta bu'akha dag dang / ragwa dmang po lta bu'i kha dag dang / mur nga 'byab sa bu'i ba dag dang / zab dang rting pa lta thu'i ba dag dang / mAtha'i mdangs lnga bra'i bdag dang / drug na mangs par po skyes phul ba dag dang / ri thugs kyi gnog sa du ba da nga/ se ga
104b5(rnying rgyud): dpal ba lta bu'i dka ba mdas kha dog dang / mkha' 'gro'i mig lta bu'i wa'i kha dog dang / brgya byin gyi shin tu dmar med lag pa lta bu'i kha dog dang / gser gyi g.ya' lta bu'i kha dog dang / dug gi drangs pa dam sang nag po lta bu'i kha dog dang / 'grong bya'i gshog pa lta bu'i ga
104b6(rnying rgyud): medzang 'ong jog gi/ kha dog la sogs pa rnams smos so// de ltar 'od dang bdog de dgra rnams rnam par spros pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ kun yizhes dang khadog 'od dang bzhugs tshul lha dang / sra ngo bo thams cad rang gsal zhing dang dag chen po'i
104b7(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan du brtan pa thopra b+ha/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang rang gi tshom bu dang bcas pa'i zhal rnams dus gcig la mthong ngo // de nas 'khor de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang gi 'od zer gyis 'bar ba thams cad 'jigs par byed pa zhes pa bstan
105a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dus gcig la ni smang mdzad pas// bdag cag rnams kyi rnam rtog zad// nyid dang skal ba mnyam gyur kyang // ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams// yang dag lam la 'dzud pa'i phyir// nyid kyi ting 'dron
105a2(rnying rgyud): wA Ta// de yi tshad rnams gang gis bzung // ma 'ongs pa yi sems can gyis// 'di la ci ltar bsrab par dgyi// 'di kun sems can+ya kun don du// snying rje chen po nyid bzhengs la// bdag gis nus pa 'don 'di gsungs// de nas skyon pa kur tu bzang // snying rje can po
105a3(rnying rgyud): yid g.yos nas// zhal nas spos cho ga 'di skad gsungs// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' che// rang gi 'od zer 'khor ba 'jig/ khyod kyis zhus pa 'i legs so// nga ye tshig tu 'di skad brjod// khyod kyis 'di kun rab tu byung // ting nge 'dzin zhes ngas bshad pas/
105a4(rnying rgyud): de kun don ni 'di ltar snang // ngal bu gsum / pa'i sa pa/ na pa ting 'dzin gsum gnas na co chan/ ting 'don gsum yod de// rang gnas cog bzhag bsam gtan gyis// dngos po'i gnas lugs mnyam par 'dog/ thog pab chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang sngar
105a5(rnying rgyud): zad ka'i zhe nang bzlog/ rgyas 'debs chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// snang ba skar rna bsngal bral thams cad rang sar 'jog/ rang gi 'od zeng sdang ba yis// 'khor ba 'jig pa'i byang sems kyis// ston pa nyid la 'di skad gsol// kye kye sngon pa kun tu bzang// rang gnas cog bzhag
105a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ne// ston pa'i thugs la ci ltar shar// na mngon ni gang tsam zhig/ thog pa' chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// 'di ni nang gi dus su ste// dedi don blol ci ltar bsgom// de bzhin byas 'debs ting 'dzin ni// 'di nyid lam du rtsi ltar bya// sgom pa rtse ltar bgos pa lags// 'di kur 'ad/
105b1(rnying rgyud): gsam 'tshal ma// ston pa thugs rje chen pos gsung // de nas ston pas dka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' chen po nyon// ras bstan pa la nor pa med// khyod kyis nor med sems kyis zad// rang gnas chog bzhag ting 'dzinan// nga yi sems la 'ang lta dang / dang
105b2(rnying rgyud): sangs kyis 'dod pas kyang // 'di ltar blo la snang bas la// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur// ting 'dzin dang po cog bzhag gis// sku gsum rim gyis goms pa yin// dngos po gshes kyi rnal 'byor la// don 'di 'chod tu nye bar 'gyur/ las nas da pa par
105b3(rnying rgyud): 'di ga bya ba'i tshe srog tumagyi nyams// sku gsum goms pa'i gting nyams ni// cig char skya ba ma yin te// 'di kun rim gyis blo yul lo// thog mar sprul sgra'i ting 'dzin thob// de dus rang gi shes pa la// lngar ma mthong ba'i chos rnams ni// bsam pa med par rgol char// rang
105b4(rnying rgyud): sa
105b5(rnying rgyud): gi spyod yul nyid du 'byung // rig pa rtsol med mkhar bzhag nas// rang gi sbal sgra de ltar thob// de 'das rig pa ma 'gyur bas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i grwa nyid kyang // rang gi shes pa'i chud du ni// rang sdang rtsol ba kun bral bar// nyams su
105b6(rnying rgyud): myong ba 'di ltar 'byung // sngar ma mthong ba'i 'od snang yang // dum bu dum bur sus mthong ba// 'di yang longs spyod sku la spyod// skal ldan rnal 'byor rigs ldan de'i// shes pa rang la nyams re gsal// dran bsam
105b7(rnying rgyud): dbang po ma 'gags par// yang rtog gzhan la mi 'dug cing // rig pa dang dal bde bdag med// rang gsal blo la goms pa yis// nad gsal 'gyu yid phyir mi 'tshor// dngos po'i rjes su sems mi 'breng //
106a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten bya bzor ma dzad// 'das ni longs spyod rdzogs pa thob// de nas rag pa nam mkha' la// cog bzhag chen po'i lta stangs kyis/ yongs pamed par mnyan ga
106a2(rnying rgyud): sa su
106a3(rnying rgyud): na sa da/ byed/
106a4(rnying rgyud): 'di kun nyams sa myong pa dang // sa dang cha dang ma spa gas// tha me 'du mas 'da' mas// mdzanan mngon shing jug rnamams// sa dang ldan pa 'angs / 'dzin de ma 'o// zhes tha' mas
106a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// sa ma byung chub sems dpa' ste// skrag nam dang thang dgongs pa ma// mad na 'di ltar nyams dza rnye// thal pa pra yi na la bu'i phyod// rang gi shA la mchog tu/
106a6(rnying rgyud): sbrul bu'i tha~Mng 'dzin za'o// gsal la ma tog shes pa'i nyams// yongs na'i ting de na na saH/ ga med mig ma / la pa zad par rung sha // so rgya'i ting nge 'dzinan pa kyi// ma 'byor lda pa
106a7(rnying rgyud): thob bo// se mthang chub sems dpa' nyon// thog papa chen po'i byung dzinan// gang gis 'dim rnams thu dan// ljang 'gran lada'ang bsgyur zag// de mi rim pa'i rtsal rnamasan// rnam pa zhim pag
106b1(rnying rgyud): gan la yul natha// yul rgyan rtog par rang shar // 'di kro rang bzhin mad shes na// spang bya thams cad su pa 'am/ zil ma dang ri gzugs brtan ltad// me tog gzugs sna na pa ma ma rgyad
106b2(rnying rgyud): shar ba de// sdang ba rnams ni thog babasas// snang rkyen rgyud la ma 'char bar// zir me ldog pa'i ting 'dzin thob// rtse ma rang gi 'od zer gyis// 'khor ba 'jig pa'i byang chub sems// zas 'dabs chen po'i na/
106b3(rnying rgyud): su zhig bsgom par 'dod pa'i mis// mi 'gyur ba yi gnad gzir phyir// lus kyi 'jug stangs gzir byas nas// shes pa nam mkha'i mthongs su 'phangs// de bzhin migags par snang la// glang po che yi ste stangs
106b4(rnying rgyud): kyis// dran med chas 'debs chen por bzhag/ de ltar rig pa nam mkhar gtang // 'od dang 'bral ba med par mi// rnal 'byor rgyun du gang bsgom pa// nyin dus snang ba dam ched shes kyi rnam par btug pas shes par thog na gnas
106b5(rnying rgyud): pa// thongs me shes rang gsal pas thang tshong rnams rang sar dag/ nyin par snang brgyas gdab pas mtshan ma rnams zil gyis mnan pa'o// rgyas 'dapes so// mtshan dus rang rig gnas khang du// dus bzhi mnyam pa'i tshad bzung phyir/ srod la dbang po gnas rbasra
106b6(rnying rgyud): par dran pa 'gro bcad// dbang po'i sgo rnams rab bsdus nas// thig le stong pa'i smon pa la// rnam 'byor ldan pas sems bzhag pas// thig le nyid ni 'phel pa na// shes pa nyid kyang 'phel bar btang // de bzhin thig le phra 'gyur
106b7(rnying rgyud): thig le je 'phra je 'phral// shes pa je phra ze phrar bzhag/ gnyid dang mi lam gnad kyis ni// sngang zhen pag chags rtsad nas dbyung // 'di ltar mtshan mo'i dus rnams su// rnal 'byor skal dang ldan pas
107a1(rnying rgyud): su bar byas pas/ byang chubasams ta// dus ya // gags sa da/
107a2(rnying rgyud): ga brnag teng 'dzin chad// 'byung ba ngas spyo pas rgyang// de bzhin thog pa shing da na tshad// 'ad chags pa sogs nyin marnamaso// rang ga kyang lag // me dga'i bsas m+b+ha pa da/
107a3(rnying rgyud): ma dbus bas kyi da ltar pa se sa
107a4(rnying rgyud): sa
107a5(rnying rgyud): mngaran lus dgra rangs la// yid 'byung chernams mir mgong// dbang po rgyal rnams drug la hU~M// shes bzhin cod pa je yid pa 'gyis// rang dang mi rtog chen po la// gas yul rtag mad nyams ldan

107a7(rnying rgyud): rnams bcu/ datung nga srung ba na// 'gajug 'phrul bu'adudu gags byang rgyargyag na pa sru thabs pa mum nga sang sring min mo tha'adu bsra kyang
107b1(rnying rgyud): ste// 'byung bas bskyed pa'i sha khrag lus// 'byung ba rang sar dag pa'i phyir// 'di ni yul du snad pa med// 'khrul pas bzung ba'i yid kyi lus// 'gyu ba rang sang sadra ba'i phyir// 'di yang mi snang rangasar
107b2(rnying rgyud): yil// rig pas bzung ba'i 'od kyi lus// mun+ta'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du'o// 'di tshe chos nyid zad dang na// 'di la gang goms sangs rgyas zhing // de nas lus gsu ma mtha' zad nas// bya bra rdzogs pa'i rgyam thong/
107b3(rnying rgyud): tshe 'di'i lus kyi mtha' rnams dang // bral ba la ni nye ba yin// gzhi la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang gi gnas kyang stongs par 'gyur// lam la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'byung ba rags pa'i dri ma zad//
107b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu la ni sus goms pa// mi rdzogs la 'di yis b+hin// kye ma sems dpa' chen po nyon// de ltar nga yi ting 'dzin no// 'di la goms pa skal ba ldan// snang ba gsum las rnyed padz+rag// ting nge 'dzin de/
107b5(rnying rgyud): sus gzung ba// su gsum la yang mngon par gnas// 'di nyed su yis bslab pa la// b+h+rUM sdod chos rnams blo la sdang // 'di gsum gang gis goms pa'i mi// 'khrul pa'i zhen yul rjud nas chod// 'di nyid nyams
107b6(rnying rgyud): khyod shar pa'i mi// ma btsal bzhag pa'i bsam gtan thob// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' nyon// da ni ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyi// tshad la goms pa'i rnal 'byod pas// ldog pa med pa'i lam zhugs nas// stong gsal
107b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i gnas su phyin// lu gu rgyud kyi lus blangs te// dran bas ma zad pa'i rtser byed nas// sngar ma mthong ba'i yul mthong nas// gsal byed dbyings kyi go rar tshud// chu pes su gsum rang lus zad// de ltar lus
108a1(rnying rgyud): dun/ rnam / da du byas/
108a2(rnying rgyud): gdum blangs ma pas/ byu 'dzirjes rnams dang // da 'a ngags pa skyeb pas/ brgyu ba rnams sa nas tshong // bden pa dang na ra rjod sa gdags rid/ 'apa drug
108a3(rnying rgyud): gang drung dpad+mam byung // dbazhin mang kyang sa byung bas// yang ba sa shA ma ng+ge med/ mede dag pa'i phung ga// sa rgya bdi'i slong chu byu rgya gseng ba ra / nyebs
108a4(rnying rgyud): 'angan gyi rlung bstan pa // ga rtagasas/ la ba'i sgraganas dag pa bye nga lA pas / dadas pa 'a sadrud 'dzin spangs/
108a5(rnying rgyud): bya byung/ sa pa pa
108a6(rnying rgyud): gas sa
108a7(rnying rgyud): phyu
108b1(rnying rgyud): yang // zhes kun tA bzang ba byung drug pa'i rgyud ces bya ba las/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sgra gnas dag par byed pa/ rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po/ 'bram phrag drug rgya rtsa ba zhi'i bzung byung ba rdzogs so// kun tu bzang po thang rngu
108b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud la/ 'phrul pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// rdzogs so// snod chen drug gi rgyung la mthu lnga// tsha d+d+ha8\u0f7f/ rgya ga / dang/ smanapraSh+Ta ka n+ti raH/ a dz+wa la~M tar+than+ta ra/
108b3(rnying rgyud): skad du/ gser gyi me tog mangs pa rin po che/ sgron ma 'byurang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal snang ba rang shar ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ then pang ma yin pa'ong da te/ stong pa
108b4(rnying rgyud): kyi gzhi tshad med par gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor na/ gnas byin mod ma yin pa/ mi 'byed pa chen po'i 'dul rta d+ha so so ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa'i snang ba chen po rnam par bkod cing / ye nas rang gsal chen po'i gzha/ rang sdang chen po'i spyod pa 'gag
108b5(rnying rgyud): med du shar pa'i klong nas/ 'gag pa med pa'i rig pa shar nas/ brjod du med pa'i don 'di gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// sarba a sa ma la d+ha thim/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i dang dru gnyis med du jim pa zhes bya te/ d+he ta A loka/
108b6(rnying rgyud): anam pa lam nyi/ thams da nyam shin kyigs kyings ba/ sarba ma n+ti sha b+h+ya gas/ A shes nga// 'das ba sa sa/ dgas gyings kyi tho pa par na pa/ egs pa/ man shid kyi thug tu madrun da / 'dus
108b7(rnying rgyud): ba nan par dag pa rgyam thor pa dal la cu gtum gar/ 'di ska dang dag gis thos pa'i dus gci na/ rmad mang gi bla 'don/ sgron ma snang ba oM byed pa/ sna tshogs rin pa cha'i sa gzhi la/ gangs can bya tshogs pa/ ye shes rnam dgapa ma su
109a1(rnying rgyud): ga du smra
109a2(rnying rgyud): sa da
109a3(rnying rgyud): nga pa mas sa nga sa mang po
109a4(rnying rgyud): da tha~M nga zhugag pa gapa/ na sa
109b1(rnying rgyud): gas gtad can 'di// su mos stod pa skal ba bzang // sal bzang ba dba'i dang nal can// dad pa ma dag rdul tsam meng // dul dang bral ba rang dag nyid// 'di la rba/ chog dang bral// 'du ga ston pa rnam pa de 'ang /
109b2(rnying rgyud): can kun gyi lus la spang ba 'dzin// kyang zhags rgya yi sgron ma yis/ mig lazar// gzugs sogs rab nyid du spyad// shes rab rang byung gron ma yis/ rang kya dpa 'ar// theg pa rnams kyi the tshom gtsang // zag le stong pa'i ga#
109b3(rnying rgyud): skyon ma yis// 'khor 'das das pa'ang tshams byor byed// dag pa rin pa'i ma dA ngas kyi dz+nyAn ma yis/ 1 da nga// ra~Mb 'byor nyams kyi bgra 'do/ zang sanas b+har// 'di thar thang par snang 'ang // nganas nga
109b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chad// dga' mgu dang pa rab skyes nas// sdang dag rdo rje 'chang ba la// zla ba'i tshig ni 'di skad gsol// kye ma ston pa rdo rje 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rang snang ba'i// rton pas sbyin pa bzhi gsungs pas// kyang zhag
109b5(rnying rgyud): yi sgron ma zhis// ston pas tshig tu sngar gsungs pa// 'di nyid ma 'tshal bdag la gsungs// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// tshig ni 'di skad rab tu gleng // e ma rgyad dag rdo rje 'chang // ngas ni kyang zhags la sogs pa oM na ma rnam
109b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi// snang ba nyid la rangangal phang bltas pas// 'di kun rim gyis bro yul sdang / wAr ba 'di rim gyis dang yig d+har ma yin/ mig shi dang ma kyar zhags rgya yi sgron marig rnam par ga nas mas ni// gsum gyi sdang ba 'dzin par byed//
109b7(rnying rgyud): des ni gsum gyi snang bzung ngas// rtab ngas kun gyi snying pa ngas yang // da kun 'di yi bzhabs na// 'od ni lta ba'i gzhi 'dzin par// skyed bye sa bon bzhin du gnas// b+h+ya ba rnam pa y-i dbapa pe nga

110b1(rnying rgyud): bdag tu 'das dang rnapas// zhags pa kya mams zhes ni kyang nas stongon// dgadzin nam mkha' ste 'bral la sa/ dga' bdag med dang 'a cad slar snang bas// snang ba las da 'dug / /
110b2(rnying rgyud): zhesabya/ n+ya sna ba dadag la// zhen pa gnyis dpa rang sar log nus ni// kun m+b+ha lA chags pa'i gnang baHsems med par// snang ba ba 'i tho rangs rab 'ganas ni// bdag na
110b3(rnying rgyud): rgyu zhes // snron ni ru gi/ snang ba kun// gong nyams nas gong du 'grel ba yis// rig pa'i ye shes gsal bas smon// 'byung ba rags pa'i sdeng bkun// rang shes spyod pa 'gas/ med cing // dbang ba'i rang sa gas pa
110b4(rnying rgyud): pas sgron// rig pa rtsi yi dbyings nam mkha' bzhag pas// nad dbyings rang sar dag ste sdang // nyams rang bde dgas pa rang dngas kyi sdang ba 'di skyes pas// dbyings rig khye ba med pa gnyis med du 'dres pas ma yang yan// dbang po kun gyi
110b5(rnying rgyud): dngas ma yang / 'char byed sgon mig yin pas// kun dbye pa dang mdza das kyi gzhi 'dzin ma zhes na// dbye ba dang sa ra las byas pa'i rnam pa gsum yin no// 'byung ba la ba la sharabs yum dum pa dzin dngas mar ngar 'dus pa'i// kyar zhags
110b6(rnying rgyud): 'i sgron ma dang // ye shes pa la ci dang 'dus pa'i gyad zhag sa dang // dbang po thams mdus pa'i rgyang zhags so// 'di mi mtshan nyid 'di nye bu// 'char byed 'gag pa med pa yis// dbang po'i dwangs ma mas gi sbyor
110b7(rnying rgyud): mas dang sa mang la ba yun du gnas/ gom pa nyid 'gyu brje la ring nga // la ba ga rab drang mazung bar 'a / bzhes
