111b1(rnying rgyud): ma zhes// gsungs pa'i don de bdag nyan 'tshal// de yi ngo bo ji lta bu// de bzhin nges tshig rnam pa gang // dbye ba du yis bstan pa lags// 'di yi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// sgo ni 'char byed gang la sdang // de bzhin gnas pa gang gis
111b2(rnying rgyud): lags// dgongs pa'i tshad rnams ji lta bu// 'di la mthun dpe gang gis mdzad// ston pa thugs rje chen po la// 'di kun bdag gis nyan par 'tshal// de nas ston pas yang gsungs pa// kye mi rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang // nga yis bstan
111b3(rnying rgyud): gyis khyod kyis nyon// 'di kun 'khrul pa med par zung // shes rab rang byang sgron ma ni// 'di ni sgron ma thams cad kyi// shes byed/ 'di med na don mi rtogs pas na nyid du gnas pas na// kun gyi cha la 'di nyid pas// 'byed pa'i shes rab mgo'i na
111b4(rnying rgyud): na yod pa lag nyid pas ni// 'byed pa med pa'i tshul du gnas// cha phra ba skyed pa'i ngo bo ni// ye thog nyid nas gnas pa'o// shes pa dngos dang dngos med pa'i// snang ba kun la rab zhugs nas// lci yi don rnams shes pa dang // ma btsal bzhag
111b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdeng rnyed de// rang gi ye shes tshad rnams shes// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos su ni// sus ma rnyed par rang rig pas// kun las khyad 'phags rab tu snang // gzhan gyis dpyad pa'i gnas med pas// rang shar ye nas dag pa'i
111b6(rnying rgyud): yum// gzhan kyi yul min dang zhes pa// byas pas 'di don rnyed pa med// su la re ba med pa'i phyir// ye nas rang snang byung zhes bya// smon ni chos nyid thams cad kun// gnyis su med par sdang bar byed// mas ni rang ngo khyab
111b7(rnying rgyud): pas so// chos nyid ma skyes mi 'gag pas// mi gnas rang sar grol ba ni// ma chags gnas pa med pa ste// yi nas bcing grol med pa'o// dbye ba rnam pa lnga yin te// gzhi gnas rang byeng shes rab kyis// lus sogs
112a1(rnying rgyud): sa ma rkun rnams kyad// snang ba cad 'dzin shes rabanyis// dbyings dang rig pa'i 'dun pa 'dzin// ngan pa 'gag med shes rab byas// shes pas gcag yul rnams sdud// mas dkyikra pa'i shes su
112a2(rnying rgyud): gyis// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid 'byung// 'dug byang nam gsum shes rab kyis// rang bzhin bad gtan la 'bebs// snang dang mi snang chos rnams kun// rang bzhin med par sras shes pa// ji dI ni de la mtshan nyid do// 'char byed de/
112a3(rnying rgyud): ni dbang po'o// khyad par snying nas 'char bar byed// de rtags mtshan mo'i dus nyid du// blo dang sbrid pa drag po dang // shin d+ha rmA drug se lus pa tshe// / dmar la drangs pa'i 'od zer ni// ma stug bzhin dun pa 'thos pas// de'i tshad
112a4(rnying rgyud): rgyags da yis// 'chang bar byed pa'i rnangs ldan// skyed par byed pa'i rtsa bzhinas// 'bru dang 'phral dang 'grig pa dang // yang zhing bapyod pa'i bdag nyid du// d+ha'i dkyil 'khor nyid lar khang // dngas ma shes pa'i bcud rnams na/
112a5(rnying rgyud): martag yar ba'i mtshan nyid da'ang// lnga bzhi las kyi rlung dang baHsa/ nas pags lags pa des mi// shes rab rnams mi 'ang bzhin du// la tshong ma kun 'ad ma// shel zhug log pa stong ba'i rang // gsal ba shes rab chen par
112a6(rnying rgyud): bkrugs// ming bzhi 'dus par yag pas ma// thams ca dang thad pa'i ba ga / senapa ga sa// bsasu gas pa bzung pas// shes parjod me krugs pa yang // shes rabacal rnams thapa 'jams pas/
112a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'am krugs par gyung // rlung gis shapa rabatsal bskyod kyi// rngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyid// yid la dra gi dgas la par 'ar// gas ma dang migs pa rnamasan// na na ma 'asal yid las byung// rdzas dkyi na
112b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// gzhi gnas shes rab rang byung tshad// chol kun mnyam pa'i nyams skyes nas// shes pa brtan pa'i gdeng su rnyed yin// de nyid 'gyur ba ma yin par// rtag tu rgyud la gnas pas na// 'dis ni gzhi gnas shes rab zin// rang
112b2(rnying rgyud): lus kyang yang ba dang // shes pa rnams ni gsal ba'o// snang ba cer 'dzin shes rab tshad// cog bzhag nyams su myong ba'i rtags// lus dkyil kha dog lnga yi 'od// rtsol ba med par phyir shar nas// 'di la shes pa rangs zin// lus
112b3(rnying rgyud): kyang sa la reg pa med// 'di yis shes pa gar gtad pa'i// bem po rnams kyang 'gul bar 'gyur// dad rtsal 'byongs pa'i tshad yin no// dran pa 'gag med shes rab tshad// shes pa gzhan la 'jug pa med// gcig pur 'dug par dag
112b4(rnying rgyud): ba dang // dben pa'i sa la rtag tu dad// mi dang 'grogs snying mi 'dod par// shes pa rtse gcig 'gyur ba med// gzhan gyis brjod pa'i gtam la yang // zungs su 'dzin pa nyid dang bral// blta ba mi 'gyur gdeng nyid du// nam mkha' dag
112b5(rnying rgyud): 'thab // seng+ges dag gtadas de cags/ do nams rgyan gyis kyang // 'dul bsgyur drug la na// pag med zhes pa bdu yangs pa// 'di skad shes pa ma den// rdzun pa ga med nas ra ba zi// sa mang dag
112b6(rnying rgyud): shes rab tshad// kun gzhi dang ni chos sku yang // 'di ltar phyed dwags 'di lta bu// lus la zhen pa'i blo bral nas// rig pa gang gtad sar gnas te// lus ni bem po bzhin du 'gyur// sems dang ye shes phyed pas ni// 'gu byed rnams kyi sgo
112b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'gag/ 'byung ba dngas snyigs su byed pa// rigs pa'i snang ba rang 'gags te// lu gu rgyud la bde bar spyod// de bzhin 'khor 'das sus phyed par// 'khrul pa'i blo rnams skye mi srid// gal te skyes kyang phan gnod bral// de la
113a1(rnying rgyud): na na du na na na dag sa
113a2(rnying rgyud): su rdzus
113a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa
113a4(rnying rgyud): ma chud
113b1(rnying rgyud): gis bzung // 'di nyid dngos ni gang zhig lasla// de yi thabs kyi man ngag ci// de la mthun dpe ji ltar lags// 'di kun sems can kun don du// rdo rje 'chang la bdag nyan 'tshal// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba yis// rang bzhin chen po de
113b2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad tshig tu yang gsungs so// kye ma rgyud dag rdo rje 'chang // khyod kyis zhus pa de lags so// nga yis khyod la bstan par bya// 'di ltar ma 'ongs don du yang // ngas bstan khyod kyis tshig 'di zung // thig le stong pa'i blon ma ni//
113b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kun gyi yid ches so// 'di nyid su yis shes pa de// thig le sku la longs spyod de// goms pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// de phyir 'di yi ngo bo ni// nyag gcig cha phra smos dang bral// stong pa'i mun 'bral rang gsal che// rang bzhin
113b4(rnying rgyud): gsal mnyam pa med// mi rtog spros bral zlum por gnas// ma skyes chos nyid stong pa nyid// mi skye rdzas med 'jig dang bral// chos nyid ma yengs dang shar nyid// ma 'gags ma grub mtshan nyid bral// ma bsrung dang dbang bzhi rdzogs phyir//
113b5(rnying rgyud): dmar por rang gsal ye nas stong // dri ma med cing ka dag pas// bdag 'ching nyon mongs rnams dang bral// rang gis rang gsal dngos pos stong // 'di ni de yi ngo bor 'dod// thig ni mi 'gyur drang po la// ye nas bcos pa nyid dang bra // le ni//
113b6(rnying rgyud): gdal ba chen po la// spang ba rnams ni rang sar rdzogs// stong pa dngos po'i 'dzin pa ni// yul la zhen pa'i blo rnams bkag/ rang bzhin stong pa chen po yi// gsal la rang bzhin blo mi snang // sgron mas 'od lngar snang ba ni// byas te rang ngo gsal
113b7(rnying rgyud): rig bcas// 'di rnams nges pa'i tshig yin no// chos nyid stong pa ma bcos pa// lhun thub chen por ye nas gnas// thams cad ma spangs rang shar nyid// tu chad phyogs lhung ye nas med// rang shar dang grol rdzogs pa'i grong // sems can sangs
114a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas gnyis med rdzogs// dbye ba nyid ni rnam pa lnga// gzhi gnas rang rig thog la las// skang srung las 'das gcig tusas// lus gnas rtsa ya~M thAmA la las// bad+ma dang thug brda lag cig tu brnam/
114a2(rnying rgyud): sman rdzob rgya la thig pa yis// phung sems bskyed pa'i rgyayi te// phung po khams sogs ces rnams kun// thA tha la rdzogs pa chen por bzlas// dono sa thos med thig pa yis// dbyings dang rig pa gcig tu brnam// rang byung 'bras bu'i
114a3(rnying rgyud): thig pa phyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgangs pa ni// mni bra'i spyan bu 'ardzogs pa'i drang // tsal bskye brtul ba'i dbyangs su barbas// dza na kun rnaM 'i dathe bas na// ming byar rdzog la stong pa las// rang ba'i yul li rnam pa Sh+Ta/ tsa
114a4(rnying rgyud): bzlum pa'i gnas na gsal// gsal ba 'di la nub pa med// ye nas rang byung chen po'i tshig/ 'di kun sprob med gcig tu gnas// de nyid mthong ba de rang nyid// gzhan nas btsal ba'i gnas med do// rang ginas dgongs pa sacig yin pas// @
114a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi grangs zad de// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i don pa thal// 'di la gnyis srog la phred// nga gi tshan nyid rdo'i tong // rang gis mngon par zhen pa'ag// rang ba'i na mi 'byur rto/ med dang // ma rnams pa dang mtshams med par// thig sa
114a6(rnying rgyud): rma dang bral ba yi// rang gnas chen po'i dgongs par// bye byed thal bar byen dud nas// mtshan nyid tang pa gsal bas thag// rang rdo lus kyi mtha' rnams zang // mdor na bdag 'dzin bral las sgrol// stong pa chen po'i ye gdangs pas/
114a7(rnying rgyud): rang gnas sras kyang byas med par// yenas mnyam pa chen po gnas// sems can chen gyi lus kyi kyi/ tsad+hi rin chen gzhal yas khang // rkyen snying khrag grangs me yang // khyad par chen por rtsa ba'i las// gti gser gyi mtshan dang /
114b1(rnying rgyud): drang dkar rnal ma lta bu ni// phA la dakhril dang shel lhag can// 'di ba'i'i nang du khyad par ni// gnas shing rlung ge rta la zhon// 'byung dang 'dug dang rang shad dang // snang ba yi ni bdag nyid du// yanas zlos pa med par yang // gan
114b2(rnying rgyud): thig le bzang po dang // lam gyi thig le de bzhin bzang // bzang po rnams kyi rtse mo dang // bzang ba'i rgyan dang ldan par yang // rtsa rnams kyi ni nang na gnas// 'di kun rtags kyi rang bzhin du// lus gnas rtse yi nang na yang // sems
114b3(rnying rgyud): yang lus rten du// thog ma nas ni gnas pa yi// snang ba yi ni 'char byed la// rkyen gyis ma bsgribs sems can mig/ tsan+d+ra dkar 'dam zhes pa'i sgo nas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du yang // rang gi 'od zer nyid du yang // dang cha
114b4(rnying rgyud): rnams su rnam par sdang // 'char byed 'byung tshul ma 'gags pas// dbang po rnams dang 'brel ba'i tshul// snang ba'i yul du gsal bar yang // kun gyis mig nas 'char ba'o// stong pa nyid la rang log pa// myong byed bsal ba'i sna
114b5(rnying rgyud): du da zhi
114b6(rnying rgyud): rang gi mtshan nyid du// thog ma'i ka dag chen po'i las// rang bzhin nyid ni 'di lta bu// sus kyang ma byas rang gsal bar// ye nyid nas ni rang bzhin no// bar skad nyid ni stong pa las// snang ba dang do ma 'gags pas// rang byung thig le chen
114b7(rnying rgyud): por gnas// brjod med rang gnas ngo bor yang // ye nas nam mkha'i khams su sdang // thig le spro dang bcu med par// bar snang nyid du sus zin pas// de yi tshad du de 'gyur te// rtsol med grol ba'i rtags su snang // rtsol bcas la
115a1(rnying rgyud): da/ 'ad la 'das pa zlas sa// rnarnams 'an ngas thags/ rnam / gdagag pang// yang sa shA ba pa dang // sa pa byug pa ma nga /
115a2(rnying rgyud): yod// thal mang la ni sri mi chu/ yinags dang dag par med// danas parnamasu pa dang bral la sa/ se la dgang pogs kyi skyed // dang la pe ga lang
115a3(rnying rgyud): shas che// yi dwags med po de bzhin no// dmyal ba rnams la kha dog wa// rang gsal shes pa'i char gnas pa// smon ma dngos ni de bzhin no// rab gi mdzu ba dang mthun mo yis// dzA d+ha'i thugs dang 'gras btsor na// mngan du skad b+hA
115a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyis// goms par gyur pa'i gnad kyis ni// dmar po'i shas med lce ldan pade// b+har te na ma mkhar snang nas yang // 'angs ni rig pa'i rang dbang thob// na col med ring grol lo// rtsol bcan yang 'dri lta ste// rang gi mdza
115a5(rnying rgyud): rAmaH// dartsig cing 'ab badzag pa'o// sang dang 'adz+rab kyis yang bathaMd nis// mig ga 'dag stangs pakhas pasaH// 'onan snang 'gang chun chad pasal// de las ma me dang 'dus dmas bzung // depe rdzabs ni mdung \u0f7f// da da
115a6(rnying rgyud): yi nges 'gyur ro// dbya na mtha'i mdangs dang mtshung so// de bzhin khri la mig ga na// ya na de bzhin nyi mi mig/ de bzhin sngags chags rten ma'i yig// 'di rnams pazhin du sarnam pa'o// zhes smon pa bang ba d+ha las thig pa
115a7(rnying rgyud): na su 'o// sus sa
115b1(rnying rgyud): ston pas gsungs pa da ltar na// nyid kyis gong du gsungs pa la// dag pa dbyings kyi smon ma nyid// sngar gsungs pa mchog 'di yi// nga ba tsa lta ba du lags// 'ad ya ngas ngan rnam pa ni// 'di la dbye ba du tsam chis// da yi pa bzhin d+ha
115b2(rnying rgyud): gang // mtshan nyid dgongs pa ji lta bu// 'di la sems pa ji ltar bgyi// de yi tshad ni gang gis bzung // 'di yi gnas ni gang na gnas// de bzhin sgo ni gang nas 'char// de nyid dngos ni ji lta bu// mthun dpe gang gis bgyid lags so//
115b3(rnying rgyud): 'di kun bdag gis sngar 'tshal kyang // ma 'ongs sems can don du yang // rdo rje 'chang la bdag nyan 'tshal// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'di skad tshig tu bka' stsal to// nyon cig rgyud dag rdo rje 'chang // ngas bstan pa la nor ba med
115b4(rnying rgyud): khyod kyis nor med sems la zung // rnam dag dbyings kyi sgron mas ni// rig pa yi ni ngo bor sdud// lu gu rgyud kyi ra bar snang // 'di la sus goms don de nyid// mthing ga mi 'gyur gsal ba la// mu khyad kyi ni ra bar gnas// dang gas
115b5(rnying rgyud): phyi yi yul du snang // ngo bo nyid ni ma bcos pa'o// dbyings kyis rig pa'i rang yul byed// rdo rje nyid ni lu gu rgyud// 'di nyid nang du 'jug par bya// rang gi ngo bo rtog med du// nang gi dbyings kyi go rang yang // ma bzung mi gnas tshul gyis
115b6(rnying rgyud): ni// 'bral ba med par rgyun du gnas// rnam pa yul du snang ba la// dag pa dri ma'i grangs mtha' zad// sgron ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud// nam mkha' nyid la cer bton te// rang bzhin med par snang bar byed// mas ni da yi don gzigs
115b7(rnying rgyud): sa// rang bzhin nyid kyi ngos tshig tu// ye nas 'du 'bral med par gnas// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// gzhi la gnas pa'i dag dbyings kyi// rig pa'i ye shes smra ru 'dzin// lam la sdang ba'i dbyings kyis ni// rig pa'i thig
116a1(rnying rgyud): 'dadus sa ga// yul la snang ba' 'das pa // sa zhwad du brdzun du 'du// 'a kun du yang byu ba/ rlung ga na bas 'gagasmrapas// dang du pa spya dadu// rlung nga dag
116a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings su ni// rtog pa med pa'i rig pa yang // migayo mnyam pa nyid shes pas// thams cad mnyes pa'i dbyings su yang // ye nas rnam rtog zad par ni// rang bzhin rnam dag dbyings su gnas// brjod cing snang tshig gnyis medapar//
116a3(rnying rgyud): gyi dang nang med dbyings su yang // rang dal chen po'i ngang du gnas// phyi nang med par zad thal bas// ma bsgribs dri ma med par ni// ye nas ka dag chen por yang // rnam par dag pa'i dbyings kyi ni// mtshan nyid du ni ye nas bzhugs/
116a4(rnying rgyud): 'di med rig pa'i yul med pas// snang ba 'gag pa med pa yi// chang ni dbyings kyi sgron ma'o// 'khor 'das ru shan phyed nas ni// lus ngag rnams nin la du phab// de nas dbyings rig sdang ba brtags// 'di la goms pa'i tshad rnyed
116a5(rnying rgyud): nas// phyi rol stsal ci snang ba na// gang nas gang du yang 'phel bas// rim gyis rang gims chen pa thob// 'di la brtan pa'i tsha rgyud nas// chos rnams byed par gyur pa na// de nyid gams par byed pa sa// yan lag ca na
116a6(rnying rgyud): bshad do// mthing gA mi 'gyur snang ba las// kha dog gsal ba'i 'od lngar yang // 'di nyid rab tu gsal 'byar zhing // rang gi mdun gyi yang mtshams su// sor bzhi ma ni mtho gang las// 'phags te lus dang bral ba na// de yi tshad
116a7(rnying rgyud): du de 'gyur ro// mig ni 'byung ba'i rkyen med la// gnas pas rang gi rig pa yang // lus rgyud du snang ba te// srin bral mkha' la 'dzin par byed// rang shes nang du gsal ba'i che// tsi d+ha'i nang du gnas pa yin// phyir 'phros sprin bral ba
116b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'a// mig gi rnam shes dag pa la// gsal byed 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldang// mi 'gyur khyab pa'i tshul du yang // mthing ga'i rang gdangs chen por gnas// 'char byed sdang ba ma 'gags pas// bya yi yul la rnam par snad// 'di ni
116b2(rnying rgyud): 'char sgo mi gnas kyang // 'gyur med khyab pa'i tshul du snang // 'di yi snang ba rang dag pas// dbyings dang rig pa zung 'jug par// ye shes gnas te cog bzhag go// rang shang rang gi spyod yul lo// snang ba mig dang rang 'brel pas//
116b3(rnying rgyud): de nyid rten bral nam mkha' shar// de ltar 'char sgom 'grag pa'o// 'di ltang gnad gsum man ngag dang // su la 'jom pa'i skyes bu ni// dbyings la goms te mngon du'o// srid pa yi ni yang mtshams na// 'don gnyis 'jug zung
116b4(rnying rgyud): las ni// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// gnyis ni 'khril te gcig par yang // sor gcig gis ni ma reg par// nyin dus 'byung ba'i rkyen ldan pas// snang bar 'gyur te mtshan mo yang // mthing ga rang nga nyid du gyur// dbyings
116b5(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin 'od kyi khyim// 'gyur med ye gdangs chen por ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// sus kyang byas pa med par ni// ye nas gnyis med mnyam par gnas// 'di ni khyab che phra ba las// rang gi shes pa'i char shar nas/
116b6(rnying rgyud): mngon sum nyid de rab tu gsang // gsang ba ched po 'di nyid la// gang su spyod par 'dod pa de// ye sangs nyid la yang sangs rgyas// dngos po'i phyogs la bltas na ni// gsal byed mtshan ma'i cha ltar snang // stong pa nyid la bltas pa
116b7(rnying rgyud): yis// rang gsal gzung ba'i yul med pas// lus kyang mi drin stong pa nyid// 'di ni gsal dang stong pa ni// ye nas khyab cing gnas pa'o// rang snang stong nyid gsal ba'i yul// 'dis ni dgongs pa'i tshad rnams 'dzin// rang dag
117a1(rnying rgyud): can pa nyid du bstan// dus med sdang ba mkha' lan// 'byar med dbyings su thams cad 'das// 'di la 'byung rgyan nas bral hA// sangs mgus pa gcig kyang med// 'khor ba'i snang ba mi srid du/
117a2(rnying rgyud): na yi ge'i na ro bzhin// gnyis kyis bzung ste sdom gcig pa// nag po bsgyur du btub pa min// de las goms pa'i gdeng rnyed nas// bar snang 'ja' tshon ci bzhin du// kha dog ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// de nas yang gcig snyoms
117a3(rnying rgyud): spobs kyis// de yi rtags dang ldan pa la// bar snang khams kyang de bzhin no// chud 'di 'dzin par sus 'dod pa// 'di ni dam pa skal ldan pas// gud 'di so sor bzung ba yis// yon tan bsam med chen por thob// rgyud kyi mtshan
117a4(rnying rgyud): nyid rnam gsum ste// de yi ngo bor sbyor shes// ji ltar rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyis// rang gi brtogs pa'o// zhes smin ma 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i skyon ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de skad
117a5(rnying rgyud): pas gsungs pa yis// rgyud dag rdo rje 'chang la sogs// dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems skyes nas// de nyid gsungs la mngon par bstod// gser gyi me tog mdzes b.rin po che sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhin
117a6(rnying rgyud): bcud phyung ba rdzogs so// IM// n+ya rgya rgya// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lots+tsha ba ska ba dpal brtsegs gnyis kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// dpal sngags kyi srung ma lcam dral gyis// kyal ba'i bka' 'di
117a7(rnying rgyud): srungs shig/ dpal ldan zhwa'i mgon po dang / dmachog gi bdag po rnams kyis/ dam med sdig can gyi srog rtsa chod cig/ hud 'di'i 'grel ba ni mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba yod do// sgron ma 'bar ba nyid lam bu rdza/
117b1(rnying rgyud): ga spyad / na gnas/ b+hagapa/ da / nAm thAs m+ba sa r+b+bak+Shanad+hAH/ bad sma dang/ gas pa dang thAb sa kha gyur ba man pa gsang ba'i skad cas n+tab+ha/ bamam ldan 'das yangan pa
117b2(rnying rgyud): chen po pa sdug 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis brtan pa'i ngas na ri deni 'jig rten bulas bskal ba'i phyir// skye pa mtha pa / bzhi gzugs pa zhel das na// blangs
117b3(rnying rgyud): can kun gyi don byas pas// sangs rgyas da nya rnams kyi snang ba thob// sde dran padong gnyis par du sangs rgyas pa'o// nges pa'i sa ba 'bras bu sus 'dod pa/ nga yis bstan gyi sa dad pa'i rgyud 'di cig dang nyan// chud 'di na
117b4(rnying rgyud): sras gang goms pa// bsgom pa med par bar 'dod sangs rgyas 'thob// sras kyang bslab pa med pa du rang bzhin gyis ni// bla ma'i man ngag rang skad rtsad rnams chod// de phyir 'di la rtags goms par gyis// de skad ces rton pas
117b5(rnying rgyud): mAM gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi gnas chen gag sem pa cad panas po nas// mi snad pa'i ston pa chen pos mi 'byed pa'i 'khor ma ga sa gams lA pad+ma gsungs so// gsung nga tang // gsung thangs sa par babyung ngo // 'di skad padag gis thos
117b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus gcig na gi byeng pan na// gling gis lanas na kyang mazlas pa'i yongs su bkod pa chen po'i / she sang gnas/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'i dog dung gzugs brgyad cu chub pa dgas thams cad dus gtsugs
117b7(rnying rgyud): gsal ba/ bkod pa cings rgya chel dkyil rig kyang yangs pa/ kha dog ma 'arjes yongs su rdzogs pa/ lham bzhin ga das pa/ med bzhin kya ba gas rjod rnas pa/ 'grol bzhin mags pacwa gas pa/ 'phrug
118a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa/ shes pa'i khyad kyis/ shin tu mnyam pa chen po na/ mtho man med pa bcom ston pa ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa chen po sangs spos bral nyag gcigaHrgyas thams cad kyi lta ba dang / dgongs pa gnas gzhi nas/
118a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad zin pas bzhi do/ spyod mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo chen po nyid/ rig pa rdo rje lu kagyud dang / nyid rig pa khyab gdal chen po'i lha dang / de nyid dbyings 'dres pa rig pa mngon sum du snang byed kyi sku dang / ma na nyid kyithal bkod pa'i rang bzhin gyi/
118a3(rnying rgyud): ye ma long lta bu sogs shes chen po lnga dang / chos dngos po thams cad thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma dmigs gtad med pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / dbyings kyi don gcig pa rang gis mtshan nyid bral ba dang / gang ga por yang ma thab pa mi gnas
118a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i stong pa chen po dang / mi 'gyur ba rig pa chos su'i tshul 'dzin pa dang / kun tu gsal ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i tshul 'dzin pa dang / mdzad pa ma lus pa sprul pa spu'i tshul 'dzin pa dang / rnam par 'phrul du gzhir snang byed pa med pas
118a5(rnying rgyud): tsi/ chos nyid zang pa yang ma yin pa'i rigs las/ rang dang de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rigs lha dang nyam dang / rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan sgo wa nyid 'dzin pa'i thabs lha dang shes rab lha mo dang / rin po che'i
118a6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / las kyi rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / mi rang bzhin thugs kyi thugs rje las mdzad pa'i mdzad pa chen po las/
118a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad mtshan dang dang thad dad pa chen po'i sbu gyang chub can po mchog gis phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje mi bskyod pa rdo rje'i rigs las chung ba chen po srus gnod/ phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / rin rin po tsha'i rings pas byung ba chen 'byung ldan chen
118b1(rnying rgyud): bor s+ya phyag rgya dang brnyas pa dang / sAnga? pa rabs las byung ba pa mtha' las chen po'i u mkha dag phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / don yod brub ba'i sgra phyag rgya rgyabs ci dang bcas pa dang / sems sang tang pa la sogs pa dpa' chen po ral pa'i lta stangs rnams dang /
118b2(rnying rgyud): sa s+ho/ sems pa / 'dogs pa dzad pa'i nas rnams mtshan mo sgeg mo'i cha lpags rnams dang / rang byung gi he rug chen po/ las gyo / ma la bye / lnga dang / sgra'i phung po dum rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa chen po'i yan lag bsas kyis
118b3(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa rnams dang / 'dul ba'i sde dang / ti Sha rbag ta mdo lnga'i sde dang/ sa ting cing dang // thaza gas dang tinag la mags pa dang thab lab sum/ mngon pa'i sde dang / chen ting rang bzhin nyin thos dang pa yangs thag ma pa rdzogs pa chen po'i rnam
118b4(rnying rgyud): grangs thas thagaju caca zhi rnams te/ gsung gi/ chos thams ched phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / sems rnam par sbyang ba dang / gser gyi sbom thu khyen mams dang / rnam par gzhil ba dang / rgam par rnaMs lta ba'i sems dang / rnam par brtul ba
118b5(rnying rgyud): dang / brtan pa nya \u0f7f rdul du rlung gis baban pa lta tha'i bams dang bab pa dang / mi che rnams la gnas pa'i rig pa chen po la sogs pa ste/ thugs rnams dang / nam mkha' la yon 'dag na 'dam bubangs dngos por dbang bskur ba dang / rgyal sreg byed du
118b6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang / mi du gags pa mangs pa me la sdud par byed pa dbang bskur ba dang / mangs sa la spyod par byed pa dbang bsgyur ba dang / mangs pa rlung la brtan par byed par dbang bsgyur ba rnams te phrin las rnams dang / ma gzhi skabasas las 'das pa
118b7(rnying rgyud): bzlag par rtags rnams rang byung ba dang / ma ga na las bar bablangs par dngas grub chen po rang byung ba dang / me bskur ma btsal bzhag palnga yanapa dngapa da/ dbang rnams rang thob pa dang / ya ra dpa gdang bslangs par chos thams
119a1(rnying rgyud): r+dz+nyA na dgas pang/ sa sa pas nan / nga bag su 'dub rnan dang ba
119a2(rnying rgyud): par zhugs sa// danas pa sa tog pa'i thab pa chen pa zhes thabs/ ston pa ts+tsha rje mang can dpa/ mchags pa mchod pam ma med/ sa babral ba'i dbangs kyi la gdungs/ mtshan gas
119a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsam pas ni babyung / ma bting ba'i stan+d+ha las ni lang+yas/ mthus pa'i thugs na sa sa bdang / ma bsgrags pa'i pa pa dzad / zlum pa ni badz+ram/ sa dgas pa nga pa gnas par blang ba'i tshig ni zhus/ mun pa gnas/
119a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i dad pa mngon du blangs nas/ rang sa / 'di skad du rdo rje'i bu'i tshig rnams kyis tsun pa la rab tu zhus so// da banA chung za a sa kA ri ka ri masata/ Tha li t+ta maM/ sa ma~M ta swar+tha sarba/ kun rta li ma hAmAswA/
119a5(rnying rgyud): a gangs su ti thAs ta la/ tsakar d+ha lin kyai la/ sa sri/ \u0f7fsa d+hi Sh+Tha/ hrI ting las na/ ba la/ mai ti rtswa ga / btaHna mad ma / par loha stsaH
119a6(rnying rgyud): sa la dAta ka 'aH/ a s+yait+tarat+naH/ dI pa/ sarbas tA prArbe/ bshan/ naHtasar+b+ba ti pa n+ta/ d+hA zung pag/ kha na pa/ na napa/ ahA dbadza / seM se/ b+h+yas b+h+yas/ ma ma pa/ bud+d+ha puH
119a7(rnying rgyud): na/ / / / sa /
119b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya/ ke rar+thAka ni/ thAkas mA na sa ra/ tAn sar/ d+ha baH/ san khar ta ka lan/ sat+t+ra da t+tha/ aka tsa ra bta/ tAHsarbaHtam+b+ha/ ma nus par d+h+waH// tar+b+hu la/ madz+nyAnAs/ g+hata sa/ ta ya mak+Shar d+har/ rmang b+ha kha sa ran d+ha/
119b2(rnying rgyud): na na pa/ Id+b+ha pa/ zangs tam/ yin na mar ni/ san / samim+b+ha/ A.AsaH/ zhes pa 'a dzo bla ma na// rten pa'i thugs kyil rab khanapa ga 'a/ martog zlapa pa can pa
119b3(rnying rgyud): ma sams bzhag pa'i khyong nga jig+sa // rdo rje 'amang gi rlung can ma / 3/ 'dim spyad pas dngas thab thob// yaM shes rnams kyi ga gas sa 'dug sbyangs la// skyes blanarnams kyi gzhi nga dran pa rnyed// sprin ci log tu ma yin to// d+ha tsaM maM dang /
119b4(rnying rgyud): 'i gzung sa yin no// gzhings/ mi 'gyur dang snang can pa las/ blal mags pa// rtswa yi phung po rdzogs par bshad// de yang nal 'byong bdag sa nyams kyis pa thabs kyigs// grags pa med byu kyi rje zla/ srathabs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi
119b5(rnying rgyud): yid kyang tshem/ da pang byung // rnal 'byor ba mi pa sa ma nyams kyi gas// mkha' 'phral yi yid rnams 'phrogs/ 'am pa y-i// rigs dran mam pa dang rgyu 'khor ba'i zhan pa bkro// skal dang ldan pa kA rnams dang 'dra'i gnas/
119b6(rnying rgyud): mas kyi byung kun dang bang rdzog// rang dag padapa gas larnams ju/ shes pas TIg pa'i yul yang ga gad / ra / yid can dpang kyi sbyinarnamasas/ lus can rnams rnams pa bapa
119b7(rnying rgyud): spyong // dbang dngo mi tshig ginas zang bdal stod// marig padag ga ma ldanan// theg pa rnams kyi lags gnas/ ga // lha dang rnam na ban sa da kyi yang 'bral ba chag

120b1(rnying rgyud): pa rnams ngas pa sa pa // sems kya dngas pa byung pa// dbya dmang thu lan med// tud na 'gar yang \u0f7f// thugs tha du sa las sus bdang/ na dadang dgas su 'jur// nam mas 'dasas nyid tu
120b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// de nas ma rtog pa'i thub pa chen pos// spyan pa rdo rje 'chang ldan la 'di sad ces gsol// / rtse kye ston pathugs can// gsang ba'i gyad ni nam b+hA ba// sngon byung rten partson dus rba/ d+ha/ dzad nyid kyi ltur bshad pa 'dus// da na ma
120b3(rnying rgyud): 'ongs sems can la// ci ltar chud nyid bshad par bgyi// 'di dag bdag gis mang tshal na/ dza45/ thugs rje chen pos bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud rnams ni// phun sum tshogs pa grom mnapa
120b4(rnying rgyud): gnas rnam dbang lngar ldan pas// thun mong ni me ni nyid dang bran mong min/ nga'i// gleng bzhi rnams kyis dzin no/ e swA hA/ rang rig sgrib pa kun 'das pa so/ gnas kyi khyad par nyid na mongs yin pa na pa dang dayang dang sa dang mas/ du//
120b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid kyi dang nang khyad las// tshi rin chen gzhal yas gnas cad pa rdzogs pa kha / rang ga le shes rngon d+hang ngas shes pa byung na ma than sa yong maben dzi/ sru dang ye shes thig le rnams// btog rnam grangs 'ang can chu tshugs pa 'khor
120b6(rnying rgyud): drathung / man mang mayin pa'i tan // gdams pa nyams len bstan pa'i tshul// da nyid gom pa dras kyang yin// de ltar gnas pa'i thad de la/ se nyar nang ka gsadang ltar gsas can med pa yongs pa mogs pa dang / bshad pa'i yan lag bzhi dag las// khyad par
120b7(rnying rgyud): nim/ gang ltar bzhad// rtsa ba'i dan kyis mtshan ngos bzug nas sa/ yos don ma pa 'o lags kyis bdun na phyogs dpa paH// dgos cad don gyis radas zhag ya kyi // tshig sa/ nan pas dkyus pacad nyid /
121a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang sams can gyi yo rgyus don gyis yid rnams tshim// me tog thub pas yang gsol pa/ daltar tha nas/ ma bshad spyan ni ci lta bu// gca bo nyid rton pas kyis bdag la gsungs// thub pa nyid ni yang nyon cig/ lo b+h+yas
121a2(rnying rgyud): don gyis ma bshad na// gsang chen nges pa'i bka' rgyud 'di la// yid mi ches pa'i skyon du 'gyur// rtsa ba'i don gyis ma bshad na// chos rnams rig nga po gcigs par ma 'dus pas// mtha' yas pa yi skyon du 'gyur// yog don gyis ma bshad
121a3(rnying rgyud): na// theg pa che chung la sogs pa'i ru shan mi 'byed pas// che chung rim par don med 'gyur// dgos ched don gyis ma bshad na// rdzogs chen 'bad rtsol med pa la// don med pa yi skyon du 'gyur// tshig gi don nyid ma bshad na// rgyud rnams rim par
121a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i tshig/ thad ka'i 'bru mi chom pa'i skyon du 'gyur// de ltar sngar gsangs pa'i skyon rnams spangs pas ni// yon tan thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan rdzogs pa'i rgyud chen 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang chen pas/ bkad sngags 'di la
121a5(rnying rgyud): sus goms mkhas pa yin// ci ltar rang gi nyams tsha rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rgyud kyi don dri de'i na nas mnag rnams khong du chud// gdams yul byes 'gyu ba'i gang zag rnams la bstan// dbang po yis ni thol des phye nas// dmigs pa'i don
121a6(rnying rgyud): du gus 'dris pa/ shing golas// 'dis tshig don nams ni rgyad rnams dum bur 'gyur// 'di ltar bshad na don rnams 'byung // gsang ba zan med pa 'dikun snying po yang nas yang bsdus pa// 'bras bu des khyad par su pa'i rgyud du'o// thub pa yis ni yang gsol
121a7(rnying rgyud): pa// kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rgyun gyi rgyal po 'di dag ni// bshad pa'i rim pa de ltar na// gang dgagis bad+mo phran ci ltar bsgom pa 'gas// 'on te ma'i sgos grol ba lags// bzung ba'i yon tan ci lta bu// 'di dag bdag gisas
121b1(rnying rgyud): 'tshal to// yang dag rdzogs pas yang gsungs pa// mi rtog thub pa chen po nyon// gsang ba slad med pang gyud kyi yan lag/ yang nas yang bsdus pa'i// rgyud kun gyi ni rim pa la/ blo mgyis/ la lang bsgom pa nyid du ste/ gyud/ 'dir ni bsgom pa ma yin
121b2(rnying rgyud): gang du goms pa'i shugs kyis ni// skye gnyis mtshams su bar dod bde ba rnyed/ yang na dbang po'i bye brag gis// rab ni bar do med skye gnyis mi dgos te// 'bring la chos nyid bar do skye gnyis mtshams su'o// tha ma rnams ni rang bzhin rdul chu'i
121b3(rnying rgyud): zhizhi du dbugs dbyung ste// sprul pa pos ni rang rgyud grol// des na skye gnyis bad do med par yang // thog ma'i grol sa gang yin pa ru// kadag las// rnal 'byor ldan pa de nyid do// nga yi rgyud 'di sus bzung ba/ 'di yon tan// 'jig rten pan pa'i 'dir 'bras
121b4(rnying rgyud): bu dang // nges par thar dor snang ba'i sa thob ste// sku gsum 'bras bu ka dang / la yang longs spyod do// rgyud 'di nyid bcangs pa tsam gyis ni// ma bsgoms 'bad rtsol med par bsam gtan 'bab pa dang // ma bslabs chos rnams/ rang bzhin gyis shes pa
121b5(rnying rgyud): dang // ma bstan man ngag nyid skad cig la goms dang / blams// ma bshad rgyud rnams rang shes dang // ma bskyed yi ma mthong bas lha yang mngon du snang // de yi gyir na kyad 'di brten// rnal 'byor gang zhig skal che bas/ ba dang ldan pa// 'di nyid b.rangs
121b6(rnying rgyud): pas dngos grub thob// sangs rgyas dang mnyam mdzad spyod dang du longs// ngan song gnas rnams dong sprugs te// bde ba chen po'i mi g.yo ba'i lam du 'dzud// rang snang rang gis goms pa'i gdeng thob nas// dbyings su 'phyo ba'i rig dang 'du 'bral
121b7(rnying rgyud): med pa/ 'jigs med rnyed// gsang ba gsang mchog bla na med/ chos 'di rnams// nges pa'i snying po yang gsang 'di// su la snang bar gyur pa de// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang yang thob// rang rgyud la mi brjed 'bral med gzungs 'thob bo//
122a1(rnying rgyud): zhes nyi zla kha sbyor gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyud 'byung bar byed pa'i gleng gzhi bshad thabs dang bcas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // ga ma maH/ de nas chos thams cad rmi lam dang sbrum lta bu'i don ci ltar gnas pa ma
122a2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i bar do bstan brdas bskul te/ snang ba thams cad gtan la dbab pa 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ khams rnams dang ni phung po dang // skye mched rnams dang dbang po dang // yul dang yul can shes pa rnams// ci ltar gnas pa gtan la dbab// 'di dag
122a3(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snang ba thams cad dbang bsgyur thob// de rnams yul rnams sus 'dzin pa// rnal 'byor ldan pa nyid kyis ni// ci ltar khams la sogs pa 'di dag shes par bya// mi rtog thub pas yang gsol pa// kye bcom ldan 'das
122a4(rnying rgyud): kyis sngar gsungs pa'i/ khams lnga rnams ni gang lags/ phung po zhes ni ci la bgyi/ dbang po rnams ni gang lags/ skye mched zhes pa ni ci/ yul rnams ni gang lags/ yul can zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ 'di dag rnams la bdag ni the tshom
122a5(rnying rgyud): gyur// yid gnyis su gyur lags pas/ 'di dag gi don bdag gis ma 'tshal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye thub pa chen po khyod nyon cig/ de dag gi don ngas bstan gyis/ khams ni
122a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis te phyi yul gyis bsdus pa'i khams dang / nang sems kyis bsdus pa'i khams gnyis yin no// mi rtog thub pas yang gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan 'das phyi yul gyis bsdus pa'i khams gang lags/ nang sems kyi bsdus pa'i khams su
122a7(rnying rgyud): gang rnams 'gro ba gang lags/ bdag la de rnams kyi don gsungs shig/ yang bka' stsal pa/ thub pa chen po khyod nyon cig/ phyi yul gyi bsdus pa'i khams ni/ sa'i khams kyis lus kyi gzhi skyed par byed pas na khams so// chu'i khams
122b1(rnying rgyud): gyis ming du 'dzin pa thams cad sdud pas na khams so// me yi khams kyis yul rnams smin par byed pas na khams so// rlung gi khams kyis g.yo ba'i 'jig rten thams cad brten pas na khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyis dbang po rnams 'dzin par byed
122b2(rnying rgyud): pas na khams so// nang sems kyis bsdus pa'i khams la gnyis te/ sems sdud par byed pa'i spyod kyi khams dang / sems nyid las byung ba'i khams nyid do// snod kyi khams ni sems dran pa gzhi che ba las byung ba'i gzugs kyi khams dang / dran
122b3(rnying rgyud): pa las byung ba'i gzugs med pa'i khams dang / dran pa gud du 'dzin pa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i khams so// sems nyid las byung ba'i khams ni/ shes pa rang gsal gyi cha las byung ba'i mig gi khams dang / shes pa rtse gcig pa las byung ba'i rna ba'i
122b4(rnying rgyud): khams dang / shes pa mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i sna'i khams dang / shes pa rnams gcig tu 'dus pa las byung ba'i lce'i khams dang / shes pa kun tu 'jug pa las byung ba'i yid kyi khams dang / shes pa rnams kyi rten byed pa las byung ba'i lus kyi khams
122b5(rnying rgyud): dang / ming dang kha dog 'dzin pas na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / grub pa'i las 'dzin par byed pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gzhan rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dngos po nyams su myong ba
122b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad la khyab par byed pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / thams cad kyi don sdud par byed pas na lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dngos po rnams la log par
122b7(rnying rgyud): rtog pa 'dzin cing yul bsgrub pas na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i khams dang / spang ba'i yid 'dzin cing 'phro ba sgrub par byed pas na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i khams dang / zlog pa'i shes pa rnams dus gcig tu sdud cing gzhan gyi yid 'phrog par byed
123a1(rnying rgyud): ban ma gartanan pa rnams dang / da gnas pams rnas na ma na kya nye bar ldan pas na/ shAru sa tu dag pa' thams dang / dran pa byams padag sud+ha sa 'thal ldan pa 'jug pa
123a2(rnying rgyud): na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i khams dang / rags pa du ma rnams 'dzin cing 'byung ba rnams 'dus pas na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i khams so// de'i phyir na khams de dag rnams kyang yul 'dzin par byed pa yin no// de yang 'khrul pa nyid rlung du 'dzin
123a3(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i chalas spyad ba'o// mang po rnams ni 'di lta ste/ rtog pas phrag pa'i phung po dang / rtog pa rnams rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phung po ni// matog thub pas yang gas la/ sde bcom ldan 'das/ tig pas skrag pa zhes bya ba'i phung ba
123a4(rnying rgyud): ni gang lags/ rtog pa med pa'i phung po ni gang lags/ ston pa nyid kyis bdag la gsungs shig/ de nas nyid kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kye thub pa chen po rtog pa skrag pa'i phung po ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po thams cad gcig tu 'dus te grub pas na
123a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi phung po dang / shes pa thams cad bdag tu 'dus pas ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / nyams su dran pa nyid myong ba thams cad gcig tu 'dug pas na tshor ba'i phung po dang / mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi 'dzin rgyu 'bras las pa gcig tu
123a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pas na 'du shes kyi phung po dang / phra ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'dus pasan 'gro ba dang 'chag pa la sogs pa 'du byed kyi phung po'o// mi rtog pa'i phung po/ 'di dag ni dag pa'i chal 'byung ba'o// ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan thams cad 'dus pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
123a7(rnying rgyud): rig pa nyid zag pa zad pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang / de nyid kyi don skye med du sna bas shes rab kyi phung po dang / dri ma rnams mngon du dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir
123b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par bral ba'i ye shes mthang dang phung ba'o// dbang po la gnyis te/ gzugs kyi cha las byung ba'i dbang po dang / shes rab kyi cha las byung ba'i dbang po'o// me rtog thub pas yang gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi cha las byung ba'i dbangs
123b2(rnying rgyud): rnams gang lags/ shes rab kyi cha las nang gi byung ba'i dbang po'i cha ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral pa/ kye mi rtog pa'i thub pa chen po khyod nyon cig/ gzugs kyi cha las byung 'di dag ni
123b3(rnying rgyud): dbang po'i cha las byung ba/ ba'i dbang po ni drug ste/ rags pa rtsa ba'i cha 'dzin pa mig gi dbang po dang / bskyod pa rlung gi cha 'dzin pa rna ba'i dbang po dang / spyad pa chu'i cha 'dzin pa sna'i dbang po dang / smin pa me'i cha 'dzin pa lce'i dbang po dang / khyab pa nam mkha'i cha
123b4(rnying rgyud): pa yang kyi pa / 'dus pa thogs nga rtsa nang kyang myongs / pa kyilasarjod rlog kyi bya dbang ba ga ste/ mas nam par nga bdang 'dri 'a spyod / sems sa pa ma chis la
123b5(rnying rgyud): ba brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / bar mchod par tshi gdon pas mi gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin 'dzin pa dran pa'i dbang po dang / chos nyid stong pa nyid mngon song ba nye bar rig pa dang / len pa'i dbang po dang / lta ba'i don nye don shes pa bar len pa shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi
123b6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'i don skye bar byed pa'i sems rnam par zhi ba'i dbang nang dag su po'o// skye mched la gnyis te/ gzung ba'i skye mched nang gis dang / 'dzin pa'i phyi'i skye mched do// mi rtog thub pas yang gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ bzung ba'i skye
123b7(rnying rgyud): mched ni gang lags/ 'dzin pa'i skye mched ni gang lags/ 'di dag rnams bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsung du gsol/ de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ thub pa chen po legs par nyon/ gzugs la 'du shes su
124a1(rnying rgyud): sems pa dang / sgra la 'du shes su sems pa dang / dril 'du shes su sems pa dang / rol 'du shes su sems pa dang / chos la 'du shes su sems pa dang / reg la 'du shes su sems pa dang / mig gis gzung
124a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i cha dang / rna bas gzung ba'i cha dang / lngas gzung ba'i cha dang / lces gzung ba'i cha dang / yid kyis gzung ba'i cha dang / lus kyis gzung ba'i cha ste bcu gnyis so// 'dzin pa'i skye mched bcu gnyis te/ zangs ming rnams dang / phung po gzugs
124a3(rnying rgyud): dang // dag da mar la sogs pa/ kha dog rnams dang / dbyings rnams dang / tshig gi tshogs 'dzin pa rnams dang / tha snyad kyi tshogs du ma rnams dang / brda'i tshogs sdang dang me sdang ba rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pad ga dang / rtag pa dang chad pa'i
124a4(rnying rgyud): bdag ma yin shAn thos pa rnams dang / thams cad la 'du shes su drang sangs rgyas sems pa dang / nye bar len mo dang tshungs pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen rnams dang / 'byung ba rnams su 'du shes pa'o// yul ni gnyis te/ dngos po'i yul dang / stong nyid kyi
124a5(rnying rgyud): yul lo// mi rtog thub pas yang gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po'i yul gang lags/ stong pa'i yul rnams gang lags/ bdag la gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ kye mi rtog thub pa yang nyon cig/
124a6(rnying rgyud): dngos po'i yul ni 'di dag go// gzugasasra dz+ranar+Na dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang chos dang reg tu snang ba dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad gcig tu bzhir snang ba dang / 'jug pa'i rkyen tha de dag la dang du snang ba rnams so// stong pa'i yul ni stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
124a7(rnying rgyud): mthar yod med rtag cad 'dzin pa'i shes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// yul ma yin pa ni gnyis te/ mthar las 'das pa rnams dang / lta ba las yod med 'das pa'o// mi rtog thub pas yang gsol ma/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa
124b1(rnying rgyud): zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ blta ba las 'das pa'i yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gang lags/ bdag la gsung du gsol/ de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye me tog thub pa chen po khyad nyon cig/ mtha' las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po la
124b2(rnying rgyud): bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'o// yang gsol pa/ dngos po bdag tu mi 'dzin pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'o// yang gsol pa/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa zhes bgyi ba de rang gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni
124b3(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad nyag gcig tu 'du shes par zhes spro'o// yang gsol pa/ gcig tu 'du shes pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni byung tshor rnams kyi sgo 'gag pa'o// yang gsol pa/ byung tshor gyi sgo 'gag pa de gang lags/ de ni rang bzhin gyis
124b4(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal ba'o// yang gsol pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni yul thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// yang gsol pa/ yul thams cad rnam par dag pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ dka' stsal pa/ de ni
124b5(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi zad pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o// yang gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na// lta ba las 'das pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lta ba las 'das pa ni brjod du med pa zhes bya'o// yang gsol pa/ de nyid gang
124b6(rnying rgyud): lags// bka' stsal pa/ de ni rkyen thams cad las 'das pa'o// yang gsol pa/ rkyen thams cad las grol ba de nyid gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni mtha' gad du yang mi 'byed pa'o// yang gsol pa/ mtha' gang du yang mi 'byed pa de/
124b7(rnying rgyud): gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni gyis gdab thams cad las 'das pa nyid do// bya byed 'bad rtsol las 'das pa nyid do// phyogs ris thams cad las 'das te lhun gyis rdzogs pa nyid do// de nas yang mi rtog thub pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
125a1(rnying rgyud): mgyun tsam ldan 'das / bas na/ nyan mangs pa zhes bkyeb rnams ni gdu lags/ de dug rnams kyi na man+ta na ga lags/ log ba tsugs pa rnams \u0f7fsa lhags/ phyogs rtogs pa na gangalags/ 'dodan/
125a2(rnying rgyud): rnams ni bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung dang / ston pas bka' stsal pa/ e mA ho// mi rtog pa'i thub pa chen po khyod nyon cig/ nyon mongs pa ni drug ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhi'i 'khrul rtog gi cha 'dzin pa'o// gti
125a3(rnying rgyud): mug ni shes rab kyi cha las 'khrul pa'o// zhe wa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshu las 'khrul pa'o// dargyal nI lta ba'i cha las 'khrul ba'o// 'dod chags ni snang ba'i cha la sa 'khrul pa'o// phrag dog ni mi rtog pa'i chalas 'khrul pa'o// de dag la sogs
125a4(rnying rgyud): te nyon mongs pa ni/ bsam pa 'dzin pa'i sems dang / dran pa rnams 'dzin pa'i yid dang / mtshams sbyar pa'i bag chags dang / the tshom thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'i rtog pa dang / yul dang dngos por 'dzin pa'i rdul sogs te dpag tu med do//
125a5(rnying rgyud): de rnams kyi don ma rtogs pa ni/ so so'i skye bo nas a nu man chad do// log par rtog pa ni mu stegs can rnams te/ mthar 'dzin pa'i yod meg tsud ci nga dzin pa bdag to tag pa dang chad pa blta ba dang / bdag thu 'dzin pa'i blta ba thams cad dang / mdzon \u0f7f
125a6(rnying rgyud): rjes dpa ma ti kha thig man rgyu na yid dpyod du 'dzin pa'i lta ba rnams dang / rtag chang du 'dzin pa'i lta ba rnams dag 'du shes can du 'dzin pa'i lta ba la sogs pa rnas so// phyo gartog pa ninyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas pa sogrA te theg pa rim pa dgu'o// mi rtog thub pas yang gsol pa/
125a7(rnying rgyud): kye kyo rdo rje 'chang chen po// ston pa nyid kyis gong du bstan pa de rnams spar lags sam/ spyang lags sam/ sbyar ba lags sam/ rang zhi btang ba lags sam/ de dag re re la yang gnyen po de nges 'dul ba lags sam/ rang lugs sa
125b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa pagasasas na nyid lugasasas/ da rnams ngags nga grol pa lags sam// 'do ga rnams gyur na ba gagos mngams lags// na dran gtu sags ba sa/ da rung sa
125b2(rnying rgyud): bkang bra lang/ rgya mato cig thub pa chen po rjod// ngas bstan pa lo chog rnams ni// sems can kun gyi rgyud laganas/ nya ma chis ba/ de rnams kyis ni 'khor bar brjengs// bude ba chen po nyid bsgribs pas// 'di be rnams rje ma
125b3(rnying rgyud): byamed// de ba dra rnyed d+ha ma rtogs na// rnal 'byor lus 'du thob ma bzhin/ sbyi TIgakyis jim nga pa dzin na // de las de nyid rang byung byas// spangs pas ldang ba ma yin no// de bzhin gzhidi spangs pas kyang ni srid// gazlar bas kyang ni ma
125b4(rnying rgyud): ro// 'gyur med skyeng po ma rtogs pas// shes sdang n+da gyi phrag dam ga sa dza zhen// spang zhing zhi bar nus pa min// rang bzhin gyi ni gnas dgaH// ral 'byor ldan pa yis ni brtags// de bzhin mang kyi dzin / zhi ba nyid kyang min// 'dzin
125b5(rnying rgyud): sum lhag meg pa mthong rigs ma shes par// ring ba re mi rgyal po brgyad de ning mi sa bzhin// lus kyang gzhigs rgyas gi rtso sanus pa smin// gnyen po den chen 'das sam shes na yis ni grol ba min// ma btsam rang sha ma shes par
125b6(rnying rgyud): sgyogam sangs 'dod rnarlog yang yo bzhin// b+h+ri kyir sangs pa ma yin no// de nyid dang yang na com pa chog nyid min// rang sdad yims las sgrub pa ma shes par // tham la thun po'i snad pa bzhin// mngon chen zlog pa ma yin no//
125b7(rnying rgyud): ts+yai mthub pa yang na cig/ 'di dag slong ma rnam gnyis te// 'bang bcas rnams na ma sa dang 'bang med do// 'bang bcas rnams ni rang sang bzhag/ sdeng bgoms pa'i tshad rnams kyis/ bra byag// ye shes dag rje 'i pa'i snang bad /
126a1(rnying rgyud): rjen kun la rang shar nA// rkyen des skyeb ma yin no// byenan mangs can skad de dag skyes gyur kyang // rang bzhag rang sangs sa su ny+Nid du grol// de b+hir rnal 'byor snang ba'o// 'bad meng rnams ni 'di sa ste// ra
126a2(rnying rgyud): gis mnyen po me pas rang grol rang nyid la// rang gas rig pa nyid sa rig pa mar ni rang grol bas// lcags kyi chang shes nyin po dang lcags rnams gshog pa dang // rdo yis rdo rnams gcog pa 'phrin// deng gi gnyen por rang nyid che// rang bzhin rdzogs
126a3(rnying rgyud): chen rtogs pa che// 'di ltar goms pa gang yin pas// ma btsal bzhag pas rang snang don rnams rnyed// ma bsgoms par ni bde chen rang bzhin rgyas// rang bzhin dbyings rig nyid du mngon sum rig/ 'di nyid sgra dang 'phrad pa de// mtshams dzar gyis bas
126a4(rnying rgyud): chags kyis mi bsgrib par med smyig dang ldan pa yang / gno ba grangs pas// 'di nyid goms pas grol ba ni// the tshom nyid 'a goms kyang thabs rang bzhin du med na rakan// de nas yang mi rtog pa'i thub pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu mchod cing bstod
126a5(rnying rgyud): nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po lags/ de dag ni rang bzhin gyi bar do la nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bsdus pa'i rgyu la gla na/ de kun 'khor ba'i rgyu 'ba' zhig lags pas rang bzhin gyi bar mdo 'di la/ mya ngan las 'das
126a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyu gnas pa lags sam/ 'on te gong du gsungs pa de dag dang rgya gcig pa lags sam/ yang na gtan med pa lags/ 'di la the tshom mchis na bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye/ thub pa che
126a7(rnying rgyud): po khyod nyon cig/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do'i sems can lus kyis bsdus pa thams cad la mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu ni dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / khyad par med par gnas pa yin no// de yang lha rnams kyi bdag nyid dang //
126b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes dang / 'od dang / thig le dang / rig pa rang gi ngo bor gnas pa yin no// de nas mi rtog pa'i thub pas yang gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po lags/ sgra rnams kyi bdag nyid ni gang lags/ ye shes ni ci lta bu lags/ 'od ni ga
126b2(rnying rgyud): lags// thig le ni ci lta bu zhig mchis/ rig pa zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ 'di kun bdag gis na 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsung bar zhu 'chal/ zhes lus so// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye mi rtog pa'i thub pa chen
126b3(rnying rgyud): po khyod nyon cig/ sru ni gnyis te/ rig pa yul snang gi sku dang / dngas ma rnams 'dus pa'i sla'o// yang gsol pa/ kye ston pa drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po lags/ rig pa yul sdang gi sku gang lags/ dwangs ma rnams 'dus pa'i sgra ci lags/
126b4(rnying rgyud): 'di dag bdag la bstan du gsol/ yang bka' stsal pa/ kye/ thub pa chen po khyod nyon cig/ rig pa yul la snang ba'i sku ni/ dbang po rnams rnam par dag pa'i rgol lhag par sku chen po dang / 'byung ba rnams dang dengs phung po rnams rnam par dag pa'i
126b5(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / ma rig pa dang krol/ yul dang / yul can dang nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i sku chen po'o// dngas ma 'dus pa'i sku ni 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sku dang / ya ci bzhin pa'i sku'o//
126b6(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sku ni gang lags/ ye ci bzhin pa'i sku ni ci ltar lags/ bdag la gsung du gsol/ de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ kye thub pa chen po khyod nyon cig/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i sku ni 'ad
126b7(rnying rgyud): lta ste// rnam par mi 'byed pa'i rol pa chen po'i sku dang / thugs rje'i go ma 'gags pa dam pa spyi phud chen po'i sku dang / chos nyid ka dag rigs rigs lnga rjes su 'dzin pa la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin pa'i sku'o// ye ci bzhin pa'i sku ni 'di lta ste/ ye gnas dang po'i sgra kang
127a1(rnying rgyud): can po dang dang // mthog sa ga / ma 'gyur ba'i sa dang / 'bras bu zag sa 'ar rdzogs pa'i smra'o// yang gsol ba/ kye rtse bcom ldan 'das/ 'bras bu dang rdzogs pa'i zhes bgyi ba'i sgrani swA nga
127a2(rnying rgyud): lags/ 'di dag rnams phye la gsungs shig/ de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ kye thub pa chen po nyon cig/ 'bras bu rang rdzogs pa'i sgra zhes bya ba ni gsum ste/ chos kyi lha spros pa med pa chen po dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'dzin pa med pa chen po dang /
127a3(rnying rgyud): sbal pa'i su bdag med pa chen po'o// yang gsol pa/ kye ston pa chen po chos kyi su spros pa med pa ni gang lags/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mu ni gang lags/ sprul pa'i sku zhes gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ kye thub pa chen po nyon cig/ chos
127a4(rnying rgyud): k+ShiM sku ni gsum ste/ mi 'gyur rang dag ngo bo'i sru rlig pa gdag dang / khyab gad la 'od rjeng ga dag chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sgra dang / kun tu ma 'gags pa mdze rtsod dang / thugs rje'i sku'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i su ni gsum ste/ sna tshogs rang grol ldan nga
127a5(rnying rgyud): kyi sku dang / mtshan nyid 'dzin pa rA Ang 'a sogs rigs lnga'i sku dang / rang dbyings ris pa gsal ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sla'o// sprul pa'i sku ni gsum ste/ ma dag sem na sa yod pa skal pa'i sku dang / 'gro ba 'dul byab rdzun la sogs pa pa'i srung ba'i bru
127a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku'o// ye shes ni gnyis te/ gzhiganas kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes so// yang gsol pa/ k+She kye bcom ldan 'das gzhi gnas kyi ye shes la du zhig mchis/ mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ni du lags/ dre nas
127a7(rnying rgyud): yang bka' stsal pa/ thub pa chen po khyed nyon cig/ gzhi gnas kyi ye shes ni gsum ste/ bo ka dag gi ye shes mi 'byang bas dang / rang bzhin ldan gru'i kyi ye shes sangs pa dang / thugs rje grangangs rang sbrang gi ye shes so// mtshan nyid
127b1(rnying rgyud): nan nan na na/ du ga na ma /

128a1(rnying rgyud): lags/ bdag la bstan du gsol/ yang bka' stsal pa/ kun rdzob rgya'i thig le nI/ lus can kun gyi rtsa'i nang na gnas te/ pha'i rgyu dang ma'i rkyen du snang ba'o// de yang 'byung ba'i dngas ma 'dus pa las/ mra'i
128a2(rnying rgyud): thig le dmar po byung / byang chub kyi sems thams cad kyi snyigs ma 'dus pa las/ pha'i thig le dkar po byung ngo // de'i mo rnams kyi g.yas ca/ pho rnams kyi g.yon rtsa/ phyir na 'byung / khrab dang dang sa ma las rus pa khrag gi dngas ma las sha pa 'dus pa las gzugs su smin/
128a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa las dran bsam dang / byung tshor dang / rig pa byung ngo // de yang rdzus skyes dang / sgod skyes dang / drod skyes rnams la yang / 'byung ba 'dus pa'i sa bon dang / byang chub sems 'dus pa'i sa bon gnyis rang chas su 'jom pa
128a4(rnying rgyud): las skye ba nyid len pa'o// de ltar lus can thams cad la lus sdud par byed pa'i thig le dkar dmar gnyis ni dang chos su gnas pa'o// de yang skyes pa rnams kyi 'byung ba'i sa bon ni/ 'byung ba'i rang rgyas 'thums nas mngon du mi snang / bud med rnams
128a5(rnying rgyud): la byang chub kyi sa bon dkar po ni gzhi mi 'gyur bas mngon du mi 'byung / de'i phyir du bud med rnams kyis bde ba bsgom du mi rung gis/ thig le dang rlung nyid bsgoms kyang mi grol ba'i phyir ro// de ltar sa bon gnyis kyis phung po'i rten byed pas skyes bu rnams
128a6(rnying rgyud): kye tshe'i dus byed pa yang 'di gnyis kyis byed ste/ 'byung ba rang rang gi dgras ni glo bur du 'du byed do// 'byung ba 'ad kyis stobs zad pa rnams ni/ 'di gnyis kyis gnas nas bud med kyis mi dpyongs pa'i phyir ro// 'phos ci srid 'jo ba'i bar du par byed pa yin no// dag da mang gakyis
128a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa don dam gyi thig le ni 'di nyis 'asod pa 'chi bzhin gnyis te/ rang gnas nang mi mthu pa'i tshe grang la sogs rgyu'i thig le dang / skyes bu goms pa las byung ba'o// rang gnas rgyu'i thig le ni/ lus can rnams kyi mying na 'od kyi dngas ma 'dus pa'i thig le
128b1(rnying rgyud): tshon sna lnga'i glu gu brdzog pa lta bu 'am/ zhwa'i mig tshad lta bu 'am// ma tshang na nyal ba'i mig lta bu 'am/ mkha' 'gro ma yid 'gyur ma'i tshon rtswa rdza dngas pa mig lta bur skabs su rtsa rnams kyi nad nas rgyu ye shes kyi rlung gis zhir gnas so//
128b2(rnying rgyud): dme// skyes bu goms nyams su bye khas pa las byung ba ni/ dang po 'od kyi snam bur snang ba dang / gnyis pa 'od kyi zer sna tshogs su thag tu gnas pa dang / gsum pa trig le hu bu rgya dang theb pa mu khyud du 'char ro// 'bras bu rang smin pa'i thig le ni gsum ste/ 'od
128b3(rnying rgyud): rnams smin pa'i thig le dang / ye shes smin pa'i thig le dang / rig pa smin pa'i thig le'o// yang gsol pa/ 'od rnams 'dus shing smin pa'i thig le gang lags/ ye shes smin pa'i thig le gang lags/ rig pa smin pa'i thig le gang lags
128b4(rnying rgyud): bdag la gsung dang / yang bka' stsal pa/ kye thub pa chen po khyod nyon cig/ 'od rnams smin pa'i thig le bsgred par gnas// shin tu gsapa la go nas gong rtsa ma 'dres 'ja' tshon bzhin// 'di la goms na snang ba yang mthong ngo // ye shes smin pa'i thig
128b5(rnying rgyud): le rtsibs la gnas/ kha dog rang gsal nyi ma dri dkyil 'khor 'dra// 'di la goms pas 'di la rang snad mthong // rig pa smin pa'i thig le mu khyud rtswa mngod bcas// rang gsal zlum po 'di la gang goms pa// dgra pa chen po'i snang ba mthong bar 'gyur/
128b6(rnying rgyud): de dag rnams kyi thig le'i phyi dbyibs zlu ma// 'di la goms na rnal 'byor 'bras bu thob// rig pa ni gnyis te/ gzhi 'dzin pa'i rig pa dang / mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig pa'o// yang gsol pa/ gzhi 'dzin pa'i rig pa ni gang lags/ mtshan nyid 'a
128b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rig pa ni gang lags/ bdag la bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhi 'dzin pa'i rig pa ni/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud du snang ba'i rig mngon sumasu pa chen po ste/ rgyang zhags chu'i sgron ma las rig pa gcer bur rang thon pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor pa
129a1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi nyams brtan pa'i ya shes su snang ba // mtshan nyid mngon pa'i rig pa ni/ sems can thams cad la rang zab tu gnas pang // de nas yang ma rtog nub pas 'di skad ces zhus so// kyi bcom ldan
129a2(rnying rgyud): 'das don de rnams ni bdag cag gis lam du byed na/ thabs gang gi sgo nas byed pa lags/ bdag la bstan du gsol/ de nas ston pas gsungs pa/ de yi don rtogs par byed pa'i thabs ni/ rang gi shes rab dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa rnams dang /

129a6(rnying rgyud): phreng ba ste bu'i spyod pa yis// chos rnams kun gyir phying bya// ri dwags su hU~M 'i spyod pa yis// 'khrul ba'i rkye gyur yul rnams spong // TIgs pa bu'i spyod pa pas// 'khrul ba'i ngag ni spang bar bya// rje n+ya m+bu du'i spong pa
129b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i sngags kyi the tshom bcad// smyon pa lta bu'i spyod pa yis// gcig tu gnas pa'i yul rnams spang // seng ge lta bu'i spyod pa yis// 'jigs pa'i sems spang dur khrod chu// khyi phag lta bu'i spyod pa yis// gtsang dang sme ba'i rtog
129b2(rnying rgyud): pa sdang // dom bu lta bu'i spyod pa yis// dran pasam thog bab nyid du spyod// bu chung lta bu'i spyod pa yis// 'khrul pa'i zhen pa rgyud rengs spang // dang mo lta bu'i spyod pa yis// 'jig rten mthun pa'i tshig gis drang // glang chen lta bu'i snod
