162b6(rnying rgyud): du sa
163a1(rnying rgyud): bzung ba nyid du bstan pa dang // bstan pa'i dus su bstan par// bskur ba nyid du brtan pan// gsang ba'i gnas dang kyi stengs sa// de yang la thags ldan pa dag/ bad+ma dgra la ma chu bzugs te// rab tug zhengs/
163a2(rnying rgyud): pas dbang thob 'gyur// bsten pa nyid du bstan pa ni// bdud rtsi rnam lnga snod dag tu// byang chub sems dang mnyam sbyar te// mgul lam mtshan khung dag tu gdakas// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bcang // bcangs na dngos grub nye bar 'gyur// brtul zhugs
163a3(rnying rgyud): nus pa bstan pa ni// bu mchog dang dang ldan pa zhig/ yab yum sbyor ba'i bar dag nas// lce yis rab tu blang par bya// yang na me long ma gas pas// blangs te rang gis btung bar bya// des ni btul zhugs dngos brab 'byung // snang nga dbang
163a4(rnying rgyud): du 'dus gyur nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur// des ni dbang mchog thams cad thob// ma grol ba rnams grol bar 'gyur// gnyis med 'byung bar bstan pa ni// thabs dang shes rab blo gnyis gsal/ shes rab sems ma
163a5(rnying rgyud): pram dang ni// thabs kyi sems dpa' gnyis su med// 'di yis yang dag don chen 'byung // mun pa drug gi phyogs dag kyang // snang ba lnga yis rab tu gsal// ma bcos ye shes las chung bas// de byer gnyis med bstan po'o// e mata//
163a6(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang chen ni// rang rig gzhi sa gnas lugs ston// de yang rab tu bshad nga de// sdang ba sems su dbang bskur dang // sems nyid rig par dbang bsgyur dang // rig pachos nyid dbang bskur ro// dza bo nges tshig dbyer bstan//
163a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba sems su dbang bskur ni// shin tu rags pa lnga rnams kyang // mun pa sel ba snang ba sems las yang zug lnga ru bskur// mun pas myos pa rnam drug la// bdud rtsi thigs pa'i dbang bskur bya// shin tu gsang ba rnam gnyis la// bcos med nam ma
163b1(rnying rgyud): min gnyis dang bral// de yang bsrung bar byed pa med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dmachog no// don dam spyod la med pa'o// zhes sang ga la rnags chen po'i rgyud las// seng ga'i dam chog brtan pa'i la'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas kun dan
163b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rjes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po seng ge ca la rdzogs de la 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma ston pa kun tu bzang // rang snang rtogs pa'i rig pa la// lta barmad byung gsung du gsol// de nas kun bzang seng ge des// rab tu bzhugs nas
163b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// oM.e ma ho rtogs ldan sangs rgyas nyon// blta ba'i don la bsam yas kyang // nga yis don bsdus khyed la bstan par bya// sdang ba'i ye shes ngos bzung gis// rig pa rdzogs chen lta ba bstan// legs par yang dag nyid du nyon// e ma
163b4(rnying rgyud): ho// rdzogs chen rig pa'i rang skad ni// snang dang stong pa'i yul las 'das// sems dang yid dang chos las 'das// yin dang min pa gnyis las 'das// bzung dang ngan pa'i lta ba med// bsgoms dang ma bsgoms gnyis su med// rdzogs
163b5(rnying rgyud): chan rang gnas rig pa la// dge dang me dge gnyis su med// dang reg rtog dang bral ba'i phyir// / dmas gsum sems can thams cad rnams// shin tu mtshon cha rno ba yis// thams cad bsad na dngos grub 'byung // thugs rjes thams cad sgrol
163b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// rang gi rdo rje slob dpon nyid// bsgral nas rgya mtshor bskur byas na// sdang srid chos ca tog 'i rnams shes par 'gyur// rang rig ye shes yod pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'grogs pa'i mched lham gnyis// gcod rong dong du bsgyur byas na//
163b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes spu dang mi 'bral 'gyur// lu gu chud du yod pa'i phyir// lus srog bskyed pa'i phra srings rig ma gnyis// thang la bton na rang lus 'phel// ye shes yul dang 'phrad pa'i phyir// mchod lung bems rten lha khang ra da nasapa zung ban// la sogs
164a1(rnying rgyud): ngos gzung bral ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rang rigasus la rdzogs pa ni// ngas nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes rdzogs// ye shos kyi chad med pa tud// rdzogs don du gdang na// rtag mang shes rab rdzogs lug
164a2(rnying rgyud): so// 'khrul pa sna tshogs rdzogs lugs ni// drug las byung ba'i mun pa gsum// de las mun pa lnga'am drug du chod pa cad pa yang byung / de bzhin mun pa chos nyid kyi// snang ba gcig las byung ba'o// snang ba lnga yis ngo bor bsgribs// rang snang rdza
164a3(rnying rgyud): pas mun pa sangs// de bzhin bsrung ba'i dus na yongs su rdzogs// rang rig ye nas yongs rdzogs ni// rig pa rtog med snang ba nyid// ye nas kun la gnas pas na// de las bcas shing bsgom med pas// dang snang bzhi rtogs dbang du bshad/
164a4(rnying rgyud): kyil bye pa / migs zhengs pa sa bya// rang ga pan sa mi rnagasas/ gas pa sa du ngas gas / pa dang / na sa/ ga
164a5(rnying rgyud): pa rnams// tog med dag tu rtogs pa dang // sems kyi rnam rtog ci rnyed pa// yang dag nyid du rtogs pa dang // ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal 'as// snang ba sgron mar rtogs pa'o// de ni yongs rdzogs dag tu bstan// gyi ma ye shes ma
164a6(rnying rgyud): dang gis g.yos pa med par bstan// ye nas lhun rdzogs chos sprul// snang ba'i rang rkyen ngos bzung bas// shes rab lnga yis mchod na// mun pa drug gi spyod yul lo// snang ba'i rang rkyen chos kyi sku// 'byung ba lnga yi dug ro rnams// rang gdangs
164a7(rnying rgyud): yi snang ba'o// sems dang bag chags snang ba yang // yin min gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// chos kyi su yi snang ba ni// 'gyur ba med pa'i dbang du bshad// yang dag nyid kyi spyod pa ni// ma 'gags zhen med dbang du bshad// ye nas ldan
164b1(rnying rgyud): chos su ni// bag chags bral ba'i dbang du bshad// 'khrul snang zad pa'i ye shes ni// rang dbang thob pa'i dbang du bshad// des ni dbang gi ye shes bstan// snang ba nyid la mi gnas pa'o// zhes seng ge rtse la rdzogs chen po'i rgyud las/ seng ge
164b2(rnying rgyud): rang dpeng thob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas kun rig chos kyi rjes bka' phral pa// rigs kyi sangs rgyas nam lnga nyon// gsang ba'i rigs kyi dmachog rnams// ston pa kun tu bzang po la// bdag gis dri ba rab tu bya// khyed kyis nye bar
164b3(rnying rgyud): yid la zung // de nas rigs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis// kun rig gsang ba'i chos rje la// de ltar bgyi'o bcom ldan 'das// shes brjod rang rang stan las langs// de nas kun rig chos kyi rjes// ston pa kun bzang seng ge la// zhu ba'i yi ges
164b4(rnying rgyud): rab zhus// de nas kun bzang seng ge yi// chos kyi rdul bka'agyul pa// e ma rigs kyi sgra nga sbyin// nga yis don byed mchog bstan// de yang bshad pa 'di bya ste// sdang sa yul gyi dmatshig dang // togs byed lta ba'i dmachog dang // sung
164b5(rnying rgyud): rgyu nges pa'i dam tshig dang // bsung mtshams bcas pa'i dam tshig go// e ma snang ba yul gyi dam tshig ni// yul gyi snang ba ci snyed pa// thams cad ye shes rol pa las// 'das na rang rig mi rtog pas// nyams na gol sgrib lung bar
164b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// phyi yi mtshan nyid ji snyed pa// rang gi 'du 'phror ma shes te// sna tshogs zhen par gyur pa ni// nyams te ye shes don mi rtogs// nang gi sems rtog ji snyed pa// rang gi yul du ma shes na// nyams te 'khor ba'i kha mthar brgyad//
164b7(rnying rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bsam pa rnams// rang byung chen por ma shes na// sna tshogs mtshan ma'i rgyu gsog pas// nyams te dmigs pa can du 'gyur// theg pa mtho dman don brjod rnams// rang rig lta bas ma zin na// nyams te gol slob
165a1(rnying rgyud): srung bar 'gyur// chas su rang klung ma shes shad// 'don par phyogs pa rtan nga// nyams te rad sna dran sa rtags// snang ba phrul bad ma chag go// rtags byed stabang dam rtag na// @
165a2(rnying rgyud): chos skur martogs na// gzhan 'byung phyogs su lung bar 'gyur// snang pa rang du ma shes na// spyod pa'i grags su lgang bar 'thud// nam dag ri bar ma shes na// yin rin phyogs su rting bar 'jur// rtogs rnyed/ snang dang tshal 'o//
165a3(rnying rgyud): chu nges sa'i dam chog ni// rang byung nyid kyi snang ba la// ye shes rol pa mi dgags pas// snang ba'i skad rgya nges par bshad// sems kyi snang ba 'gag med pa// mtshan ma'i spyad tshungs par bshad// rang rig bcos pa med pa ni// don
165a4(rnying rgyud): spyad cu nges pa yin// mtshan ma'i na rig gsal ba// yang dag spyad rgya nges pa yin// snad de'i phyogs kyi sgron ma ni// rtogs pa'i spyad mya nges par bshad// de ni phung chungs pa'o// oM ma ho// bsrung mtshams bcas pa'i dam chog ni// mdor
165a5(rnying rgyud): nga yis bstan par bya// dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya// dge bcu dag ni spyad mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon skad mi bya// rang rig 'dren pa'i ston par bshad// dper na long ba'i lha thag bzhin// ye shes gsal ba'i lam ston pa'o// nyon mongs srug
165a6(rnying rgyud): bsngal mtsho sgyu ma yin// slob dpon dag la smod pa ni// dper na phun khung blon bsad na// mthong ba'i don byed med pa bzhin// sdug bsngal nyam thag yun ring gnas// bskal pa mang por myong bar 'gyur// de bas rtag tu gus par mdzod// ra
165a7(rnying rgyud): dge skyed pa'i slob dpon la// shin tu gtsobs blang bar bya// lus sems skyed pa'i pha ma la// rtag tu rim gro rdzun mi gcad// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni// bla med byang chub 'grogs pa'i spun// chos nyid dam chog smon lam mthus/
165b1(rnying rgyud): du mtshugs baspyad// rtab tu dang bru blar// de las zug 'dun su/ rad la dngag khyon bdu chu// ra ga rdzun nas ba // nga 'arjod// du dang
165b2(rnying rgyud): ban du 'a do thad// man pa midag rgyamed// den po dag sam dang man // rdzug rdzag 'dung ca na pa gyugyur// ga ga tu spang chud/
165b3(rnying rgyud): ma kyin dang sa srid rgya// 'dag shegs dkyil thaM med pa// / gsa' bags sa pas ta bcug // ga par rlog pa sa ma// thugs chags kyid ma na 'a// rnam tshongs dag da /
165b4(rnying rgyud): rtogs sa// rnams pa'i ltung ba las 'das te// phal dang ni 'dra yang dag tugs// martogs pa sa phyogs rnams dang // ldan par bsngagasang// gsung kyi gdums dgi kyi tshogs gsangs// gapang rdzogs 'das pa
165b5(rnying rgyud): nga dgas can yod mas na// drug nidzin pa bdas ma 'as pas// da mamin dang bla la rnams// las smra ma dzin gyi gsang // rdzogs rkyen ma ti gas pan// spyod pa rnams pa bzhugs byed na/
165b6(rnying rgyud): ma bajugs// gtsu klu sbyin pa rdzog par rdzur// gzha nga rdzog pa na shAn// bsang blugs sa na me pa nga/ la gas / gyur gyis gyi pa pad
165b7(rnying rgyud): dri ba bya// don cing ga dam sa 'ab pa // nang tug padrug byed/ ba' ba bri 'i byi dri phyi du ga du ra/

166a4(rnying rgyud): de yang bathun pa'ad ba pa'i lasu ba cig/ glenga'i mam na jug par byed/ nga rig pa ni d+had per 'byur/ khegs pa cing rigs bye// rang dgrags pa pa'i man/ ga cig na ni
166a5(rnying rgyud): dang // gsangs den ngas pa'i nying 'dzin pob// rang rig 'dags pa zug // phun par de rgya ma rmugs shing // snang ba'i rnam dang dag pa ral// chos rnams brjod dang thA bya'i ster// sems can lus pa dang rig // shin tu ra
166a6(rnying rgyud): gsas nam dga' // sumra rbad kyi tshul bganas// sems ca ban rnyog pa sa ng+yas// rnam thang rims rnye labs pan de// ma rkyen ldan ci nA~M// yon tan de skyed pa'i mang du yin te// nga dang bdag tu mi dmigs // ma

167a1(rnying rgyud): 'das sa sa sus byagasung nag// nas 'gas gas gags// margas rdzo zla ba gyur// ma na s+ho/ sangs nas rnam sa rgyam klas/
167a2(rnying rgyud): 'dod rtsol med gnyis sgra med// yang dag phyag rgya chen po'i don// sdang dang mi snang gnyis su med// rgyu dang rkyen du med pa la// byas pa zung ba ma yin te// rang gi snang ba dang snang ngo // rig pa'i ye shes rna la yas// sdang ba'i mashes
167a3(rnying rgyud): yul du byung // de gnyis mthong dus 'jom pas na// dam tshig ces kyang de la bya// rig dang ma rig gnyis pa yang // rang gi snang ba'i khyad pa re// rtogs dang ma rtogs gnyis po yang // dag dang ma dag khyad kyis bstan// gsang sngags gsang

167a5(rnying rgyud): spang ba ma yin pas// dri ma'i snang ba bral ba'o// rang rig dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bshad// dam tshig nyid kyi bo dang // des tshig dbyi ba rab tu gsungs// de yang bstan pa 'di lta ste// ngo bo srung bar byed pa yin// nges tshig ma bsrungs
167a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig par bstan// dbye ba bsam gyis mi khyab po// brngu ba dang ni rgyas pa'o// rnam grangs med las rnam grangs byung // rnam grangs blang bas rnam grangs med // brjod pa kun dang bral ba'i phyir// dam tshig mnyam pa nyid du grags// rang byung rtogs
167a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i da mtshig ni// gnyis dang gsum du bgrang du med// tha snyed du ma med par bshad// gcig gi don nyid rtogs pan// thams cad de'i rtogs par bshad// gsang rdzogs thabs la rab mkhas pas// yang dag nyid du mtshig med// chos dang chos
167b1(rnying rgyud): min gnyis dang la// de yang bsrung bar byed pa med// sbyangs rgyas rnams kya mchog na// dran du spyod la med par / nang mngag 'du chum can pa rgyad las// seng ga'i dam chog bstan pa'i ma sa bdun pang// de nas dun dra
167b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rjes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po seng ge ca la rdzogs de la 'di skad ces nus so// e ma ston pa kun tu bzang // rang snang rtog pa'i rig pa la// rna bzang byung gsung du gsol// de nas kun bzang seng gdes// rab tu bzhugs nas

167b5(rnying rgyud): chan rang gnas rig pa la// dge dang mi dge gnyis su med// dang rig rtog dang bral ba'i phyir// khams gsum sems can thams cad rnams// shin tu mtshon cha rno ba yis// thams cad bsad na dngos grub 'byung // thugs rjes thams cad sgrol
167b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// rang gi rdo rje slob dpon nyid// bskul nas rgya mtshor bsgyur byas na// sdang srid chos can tog pa'i rnams shes par 'gyur// rang rig ye shes yod pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'grogs pa'i mchod lum gnyis// gcod rong dong du bsgyur byas na/

168a1(rnying rgyud): rnam // gan mam bcan// bang na du tu ma// na na ma / ga sa// khams na tha ba sa da
168a2(rnying rgyud): sgra gsum snang ba yod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas bsngal te dur bcug na// rang reg rang snang rtogs par 'gyur// 'byung ba rang la log pa'i phyir// chos rnams par 'ju sa / mer bzugs chur pon// rang gi rigang rtogs par 'gyur/
168a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab de na la dpyod pa'i phyir// drag+sa rba// sems can thams cad lazhes/ dus gcig tu// bsgral na sdang ba thams cad stong par 'gyur// thugs rdo'i gan pazhin pa/ don nyid ma 'gags logs phyir/ di men// rang srog dang gis bcad byas na/

168a5(rnying rgyud): phyir// lha tshogs brtson du bzung byas na// dngos grub thams cad nye bar 'gyur/ ring // / rig pa kun tu yas pa'i phyir// snying po'i rgyan thag bcad byas na// bskyed rim thams cad gsal bar 'gyur// rig pa rtsol bsgra 'bral ba phyir// chog+sa
168a6(rnying rgyud): la bsag yan sa dag tu med pas na// sbyin pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// rang rig btang bzhig bral ba'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab ya thal na// rang don thams cad rnyed par 'gyur// reg pa gcer bur yod pa'i phyir// rgya 'ardzas ma
168a7(rnying rgyud): mjug ldog pas na// skye ba med pa thob par 'gyur// rgyu yis bskyed du med pa'i phyir// kun gzhi cad nas bcad pan// mngon ga sa/ sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin// chos sku gdod nas dag pa'i phyir// gsadag cad las rnams kyis
168b1(rnying rgyud): pas na// dag pa thams cad 'phas 'udu 'gyur// reg pasrog dang bral bas byer// rang sdang yi shes rtogs lugs de bzhin na// a ma hA// srung ba'i ma shes gsal ba rtse// rtog zul lags phyogs dang bral// rdzogs chen gas nga nga
168b2(rnying rgyud): shes ni// kun gyi rtse mor gyur pa'o// thigs chen blta ba'i dbang mtshon ni// khyung chen mkha' la ldings dang mtshungs// theg pa'i rang skad grangs mang yang // dper na seng ge laskad 'don dus mabyin pa yenas yangs// wa spe sar smad 'don du
168b3(rnying rgyud): mgrin pa yen sa dag/ rdzogs chen rang skad 'don pas rang rig ye shes ston par byed// 'og mas rang rig bstan du lta ba yenas dma'// rdzogs pa chen po'i 'don mtha' ni// mnung rtag reg pa nyid du bstan// de yang bstan pa 'di lta ste/

168b5(rnying rgyud): hrI bzung la 'dor ba tsam// de nas dang snang bas byung na// dbye na sdig tug par 'gyur// de nus don la ma yengs na// 'gul la ma 'grig pa tsam du 'gyur// de yi don lam yangs na// grAm bzhin pa dang med par 'gyur// denas
168b6(rnying rgyud): shin tu ba ltas gyur na// 'grozhi ma yin 'di srid mthong // rna mi dron la bcus gyur na// thig mo stong ba'i sgon ma mthong // de la yang dag paltas gyur na// thig le sgra dang bcas pa mthong // danying la yang ma med san// 'khrul snang yongs
168b7(rnying rgyud): ra mthong ba'o// rtswa yi sdang ba de rnams kun// sgyu ma 'da' tshon ji bzhin no// de la rab tu brtan gyur nas// nyin mo mtshan mo med pa ni// dper na ci sbrang mo yi mig/ nyin dang mtshan mo med pa ltar// rang snang dkyil 'khor de bzhin no//
169a1(rnying rgyud): su ma na ba gsun// // bdun nga gzhan pa 'os// ma dugasam da / dag gzhan na ma ga// ma nyad pa rnarnam mkha'am// dag pa ma /
169a2(rnying rgyud): dwags pa// rang gi gnas lags mthong ba ni// yul la med pa ma yin te// dmigs pa dag pas mngon dugs la// rang gi dkyil dang 'khor dang bcas// sa shes don la phral med kyang // sems can dus na yul du byu// madz+ra
169a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i d+has na rtogs na// ge ba'i dus na bde bache// rlung ba mthon nyams kyad rgya// rang rig gcig grags kyi mchog/ snang ba'i tshul du med pas na// rdo rje ze nang nyid las// cha shas su ni bas ma mthag// ring thung nga
169a4(rnying rgyud): kyi sgron ma la// rang sngang 'od ni bsam me ba// pheg la steng pa'i skyon ma la// zer ldan thig le bas ma khyag// ye shes lnga yi bel// mtshon pa'i tshi gni bas mi moM ShA ba~M// rkyen med yub sde snang la// 'gag med 'byung ba bsam/
169a5(rnying rgyud): mtha// em ta// rdzogs rkyen pa rlom stong pa pa// bsnyad cig ni bas ma mi khyab// rdzogs chen do ni gongs bstan na// dge ci gzugs sum srung bas// sen men gnyis kyi snang bar med// rdzogs can legs lta ni// dzaH/
169a6(rnying rgyud): dang mardzogs gnyis su med// rdzogs chen rig pa'i dbul// dadz+ral dang ma gaN+Dal me par// sems cani mi bsam pa rnams// chag dang yi gas mdza dang // gdams dag snying pogs ma la thag/ rang rig ces bu'i tha /
169a7(rnying rgyud): bsdus pas mthong bar mi 'gyur te// bzhag thabs ngo bo gsum la thugs// rdzogs chen 'gag med spyod pa nyid// byas pas 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// chags med rang grol gsum pa thug/ rdzogs che bsgom pa ye rdzogs nyid// bcwo/
169b1(rnying rgyud): bas byung bam ban// 'bum bas mthal gas drug/ ngags na don nying rtogs dka' bus// mtshan pa chag gas mnad do// gdums dgags bzla gnas pa // ga ldan nga ba gang cad// gnang/
169b2(rnying rgyud): byas rtogs par mi 'gyur te// brgyal sa chen po gcig la jug/ rdzogs chen rang byung ye shes nyid// bslabs pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dris pa'i snying po gnyis la jug// rdzogs chen 'bras bu cig cad ni// bskyed pa
169b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par mi 'gyur te// chags brel man ngag gsum la thug// rdzogs chen snang ba thug phrad nyid// bzung bas zin par ma 'gyur te// rnam dag jo bo lnga la thug/ rdzogs rjen rtog med gsal gdungs nyid// chags pas don dam ma
169b4(rnying rgyud): sa shes ma/ sa
169b5(rnying rgyud): mim gsum la drug gas rten 'grus pa dang mangs nyid// bsdebs pam thob par mi 'gyur te// hU~M thacag cig sapas pa / rdzogs chen gsung ldanas pa nyid// mchod pas dngos thab thung ste// pa gnod rnam pa gsums
169b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ldan ga da phyinas nyid// ga mas pas dang 'i mi tho // bsnyun pa byung pa gsam rna// ma can dang dngadags da// smras pas mthong bar ma 'gyur // don ni bsam la can/ des ni rgyags
169b7(rnying rgyud): tsan mtha' ma rgyal// rang rig ston pa de bzhin no// me mata// snang ba chen pams yang rtse// ya nas gnas pa'i gas sngags bcud// rdzogs pa chen pal shes ni// sangs rgyas pas kyad me nyid// chags chen mthar cag yonan rdo/
170a1(rnying rgyud): bran gyi stong po yin pasdun// gsang sngags rnams kyi mngon nam na// yang dag gas dgas pas// babyung brna ma gas 'a dugs pa// rgyags pa meng pa ma nas na// rtogs dang matags gnyis du
170a2(rnying rgyud): med// sangs rgyas nyid kyi snang ba ni// phyogs dang ris stug la yod// kun tu bzang por yi sems// dngos po med la rtogs mtha' bral// mtha' dang dbus su mi 'byed na// rig pa'i ye shes snang ba nyid// sems dang bral bar rtag tu bstan//
170a3(rnying rgyud): yangs pa'i grong khyer gting mtha' yas// gsal ba'i grong khyer thug pa med// rdzogs pa chen po'i ye shes ni// nga dang bdag tu mi rtog na// ye shes snang ba rdzogs par 'gyur// mtha' la mi gnas rdo rje'i sku// rkyen gyis mi shigs stong nyid rje//
170a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rig pa kun la khyab// e ma blta ba'i don la thug pa med// zug med ye shes ngo bo nyid// snang ba bzhi yi dri ma bsal// sangs dang ma sangs gnyis med kyang // ltar snang nyid la gnyis su byung // rdzogs chen lta ba'i zhe phrags la// sangs
170a5(rnying rgyud): dang ma sangs gnyis dang bral// rdzogs chen lta ba'i brgyalas ni// yang na ci yang med pa la// yang na sna tshogs 'byung ba'o// yangs dang dog pa gnyis su med// yin dang min pa gnyis su med// 'das dang ma 'das gnyis su med// rtogs
170a6(rnying rgyud): dang ma rtogs gnyis su med// bzang dang ngan pa gnyis su med// mtha' dang dbus su gdags su med// gol dang sgrib pa gnyis su med// dge dang sdig pa gnyis su med// bsrung dang mi bsrung gnyis su med// de ni gnyis med lta ba'o//
170a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen rang gsal ngo bo la// mun dang sdang ba med shes na// yang dag don gyi snying po rnyed// byar med lhani rdzogs chen po ste// sngags dang phyag rtse ma bsgyur rdzogs// ting 'dzin yig 'bru ma bsgoms gsal// snying po bzlas brjod ma
170b1(rnying rgyud): byas grub// gzung 'dzin gnyis sna med par rdzogs// bskyed rim ma byas lha tshogs mthong // gom pa gcig gis pha rol phyin// ting 'dzin gcig gis sa rnams gnon// blta ba gcig gis gyi nang mthong // bsgom pa gcig gis
170b2(rnying rgyud): chags med rnyed// spyod pa gcig gis rang snang rtogs// 'bras bu gcig gis 'dod pa grub// dper na khang stong mun nag nyid// snang ba gcig gis sel ba ltar// ma rig 'khor ba'i mun pa rnams// snang ba gcig gis thams cad sel//
170b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // sems can kun gyi rig pa gnyis// gcig las med par mgon pos bshad// sangs rgyas snang ba dmigs med dang // sems can snang ba dmigs pa can// gcig nyid yin par rgyal bas bshad// gsal ba'i
170b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'od zer ni// mu khyud rab zlum por gnas// sku yi 'od snang 'di lta ste// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer kun tu 'gro ba'o// mdog bzang ldan yangs dkyil 'khor 'gyur // sna tshogs sku las 'byung ba'o//
170b5(rnying rgyud): ye byab ldan brdul kun gsal shar// ye shes 'gag med 'chang ba'o// ye shes dang ni yang dag sems// spu ni sna tshogs 'phro ba'o// rdzogs chen ye shes snang ba nyid// sna tshogs su ni 'byung bar bshad// stong pa dang ni gsal ba'i sku/
170b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba dang ni me 'byung med// shes pa dang ni mi shes med// mtha' yas dang ni 'gyur med dang // mthar thug rtags la zad pa med// mtshan ma'i tshig la thug pa med// rang rig don la 'gyur ba med// gsang sngags don la
170b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs lhung med// sems can lus la stong pa med// sangs rgyas skul skye 'bri med// ye shes don la skye 'gag med// 'khrul snang nyid la zin pa med// 'od zer nyid la chags pa med// rdzogs chen don la tha snyed med// rang
171a1(rnying rgyud): rig su la gzung 'dzin med// kye ma phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med// reg dang bral bas kha dog med// brjod gzhi med pas snang mtha' yas// e ma// dkyil 'khor yangs pa kun tu
171a2(rnying rgyud): gsal// rang rdzogs ye shes snang du rung // thog med dus nas rang snang bas// gsang sngags rtogs pa'i mchog tu bstan// dgongs pa rnam dag ye shes don// tha snyad ma yin gcig pu nyid// gsang sngags rdzogs
171a3(rnying rgyud): chen ye shes nyid// dper na 'dam gyi pad+ma bzhin// rig pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid// mun pa nyid las snang bar 'gyur// snang ba nyid las ye shes mun pa 'byung // 'khrul pa nyid las ye shes skye// dag snang nyid las 'khor bar ltung
171a4(rnying rgyud): sa cha gnyis las bral ba'o// sangs rgyas nyid las sems can te// sems can la yang sangs rgyas 'byung // rgyu nyid 'bras bur slong ba'i phyir// yang dag ye shes thugs nyid las// gsad pa'i ye shes 'od du gsal// son
171a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i snang ba mtha' las 'das// rang rig ye shes brjod pas stong // stong pa'i ye shes 'gyur ba med// mtha' gnyis spangs pa rdzogs chen don// 'gyur med snang ba rdzogs pa'o// gcig dang gnyis su med snang bas// yul du ma
171a6(rnying rgyud): yin rang byung yin// bya btsal nyid dang rab tu bral// klong yangs don la mtha' yas pa'o// zhes seng ge rnal rdzogs chen po'i rgyud las/ seng ge rtsal chen gyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge
171a7(rnying rgyud): bzang po des// chos nyid rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas skad cig la rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas phyogs bzhi nas lhags nas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// kye kye bcom ldan 'das// bdag cag 'dus pa'i
171b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams la// rang snang dkyil 'khor baspyan du gsol// ye shes rtags dang rab tu ldan// ming dang mtshan ma las grol ba'i// thabs chen yan lag bstan du gsol// ting nge 'dzin las rab tu bgrangs// da skad krub phul ba dang /
171b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan kun bzang seng ge des// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas ni// rigs kyi sangs rgyas de rnams la// rdzogs pa chen po nyid kyi dbyings// snying po don gyi rig pa'i sku// sems can kun la yod pa'i don// rab tu gsang ba 'di gsungs
171b3(rnying rgyud): so// kye ma sangs rgyas rig pa'i sku// nga yis bstan gyis nga la nyon// e ma ho rig pa'i ye shes nyid// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul du gnas// de yang gnas lugs 'di lta ste// tsit+ta rin chen gzhal
171b4(rnying rgyud): yas dang // rin chen rtsa yi gzhal yas dang // rnam dag dung khang gzhal yas dang // b+h+r-i gu ta yi gzhal yas so// gzhal yas chen po de rnams na// rig pa'i ngo bortsal ltar spang // de yang bshad pa 'di lta ste// la la dag na zu ru gnas/
171b5(rnying rgyud): la la dag na thig le lte// gcig la 'od zer tshul du gnas// gcig na lu gu rgyud du 'byung // de ni gnas pa'i mdo nyid bstan// sangs rgyas ye nas gnas pa'i don// sems can kun la gnas pa'i don// rgyal ba nyid kyis rab tu bshad// rig
171b6(rnying rgyud): dang ma rig snang ba nyid// bya byed gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// yangs pa nyid dang sku ltar 'phro// gsal ba nyid ltar sku ltar byung // stong pa nyid ltar zer ltar byung // sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis// rig pa so so ma yin te// snang ba so so nyid
171b7(rnying rgyud): du bstan// snang ba so sor ma gsal na// sangs rgyas pa la don go med// su yi mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// 'gyur ba med dang gsal ba dang // stong pa dang ni rtog bral lo// rig pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// phra ba nyid dang 'gro ba dang // lu gu chud
172a1(rnying rgyud): du 'gul ba'o// dbyings kyi mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// yangs dang ldan sdug gtang mtha' yas// gsal dang drod dang bsil ba dang // yang zhing g.yo ba'i bdag nyid 'dzin// khyab dang chu khyad ra ba'o//
172a2(rnying rgyud): shes mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// 'byung dang byung dang rang gsal dang // ye dang shes dang rtogs pa'o// gsal dang 'tshor dang 'jam pa nyid// sdang dang mun dang go 'byed pa// stong dang gsal ba'i ye shes mchog/ gsang sngags mtshan nyid dag tu 'dod//
172a3(rnying rgyud): e ma ye shes thabs la mkhas// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi skal pa'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' gsang mdzod ston// ye shes sgra dang sdang mtha' yas// ye shes chags pa mi mda' yang // sems can blom
172a4(rnying rgyud): snang ba rnams// gsal bar bya phyir rgyud 'di bshad// e ma sngags 'chang thugs rje che// 'byung ba lnga yi drab nas// ye shes lnga yi snang ba shar// stong pa'i ye shes bdag med cing // gsal ba'i ye shes tshig las 'das// snang mtha' yas
172a5(rnying rgyud): kyi zhing khams su// rig pa'i snang ba mthong bar 'gyur// rig pa'i ye shes rtog med nyid// yang nas yang du 'dris par bya// gsang sngags lam gyi ye shes nyid// chags pa med pa'i sa bon gsal// bcos pa med pa'i rang byung nyid// mtha' yang
172a6(rnying rgyud): don la 'gyur ba med// sems can ye shes snang ba nyid// gsal dang mi gsal gnyis su med// chos dang chos min snang ba med// rtogs pa'i ye shes tshig las 'das// 'das dang mabyon da ltar gyi// dgongs pa ji snyed yod pa de dag ni// rig
172a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes snang ba yin// the tshom gnyis kyi rtog pa med// yul dang sems med dgongs par bstan// ye shes thabs la mkhas pa yis// rtsol sems gnyis su med pa la// rtsol sems gnyis kyi snang ba 'byung // dri med gsal ba'i
172b1(rnying rgyud): drangs pa na// dper na man shel lta bur bshad// yangs pa'i ye shes tshig mtha' yas// stong pa'i ye shes 'grib pa med// 'od gsal dkyil 'khor yang dag bya// reg pa'i ye shes 'od la ltos// rang snang thabs kyi rgyal po las// stobs kyi
172b2(rnying rgyud): rig pa ma 'gags pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rig par bshad// ye shes don la rtog pa sangs// e ma ye shes sems dpa' nyid// sku yi snang dakho na'o// kye ma klor yangs don rtogs na// yang dag ngo bo mthong bar 'gyur// gsang sngags
172b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba nyid la yang // rig pa'i ye shes zabs gsang bas// snang ba dang gis med pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las// gsal ba nyid kyi 'od zer byung // nga ni rig pa'i rgyal po la// yul rkyen dang ni dri ma med// e ma yangs pa'i sdang ba kun tu
172b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar// gsal ba'i ye shes thug pa med// don gyi ye shes gtir mtha' yas// mthun pa'i ye shes rab snang bas// rtags kyi ye shes mthong bar snang // thabs nyid ma 'gags rin nyid yang sa// mtshan ma med pa'i rig pa nyid// 'bras bu
172b5(rnying rgyud): len shing lta bu// sna tshogs bskyed pa'i ye shes skye// rang gnas yin par nyid kyis bshad// thug pa med par kun tu rtogs// / nga ba len rdo la sngags 'du ltar// shes rab chen pas don rtogs na// rig pa'i sdang ba thams cad sdud// e ma su dang rig
172b6(rnying rgyud): ldang yang // rang byung nyid kyi cho 'phrul lo// shes rab nyid kyi snang ba mthong // rig pa nyid la rig pa mang// ci rgyar sna tshogs mtshon pa'i phyir// chags pa'i ye shes chu bzhin no// snang ba'i ye shes me bzhin no// bstod pa'i ye shes chung bzhin no//
172b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba thabs kyi yan lag nyid// nyi shu rtsa gcig dag tu bstan// ye nas ye shes rang gsal bas// dag pa'i ye shes mtha' dbus med// 'byung ba nyid la byung ba med// rig pa nyid la byung ba yod// gsang sngags don gyi snying po la// tshig
173a1(rnying rgyud): dang dadapa sadan mnan/ nan mamanas tan ma/ rnam ga pas nga sa// bdag pas rdzund/ dusas 'dadu bldan pa marjon/ gos rab nga byung ba nas ma/
173a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes su nyid rnam par dag/ snang ba med pa'ir gsal ni// dri ma phyogs sum ltung ba'o// som zhug pa nal ma nyid// gnas pa'i dus na de bzhin no// rig pa'i gnas lugs rgyag pa ni// sems can kun la yang dag gnas// stong
173a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mu la mi gnas shing // gsal yad saca ba'i rang la de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas nyid kyi snang ba la// rnam par rtog pa'i phyogs dang bral// ye nas rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nyid// ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// mun pa las
173a4(rnying rgyud): ni sdang ba 'byung // rang rig gnas nas bde gnas pa// shes rab tha snyad rnam par dag/ g.yeng ba'i phyogs su ma lhung na// ye shes dri med mthong ba yin// lam la bcos su med par bstan// gzhi la bzang ngan med par bsten//
173a5(rnying rgyud): chos la che chung med par bstan// gsang ba dang ni mngon sum pa// byad med gcig tu de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rig pa'i ye shes rtogs dka' ba// rab tu gsang ba 'di bshad do// yang dag nyid las
173a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag rnyed// dkyil 'khor nyid las dkyil 'khor 'byung // dgongs pa'i gnas lugs rgyas pa'o// kye ho ye shes lus kyi gzung // snang babs kyang mun pa che// kun nas mun pa sdang bar 'gyur// 'khor ba'i bag chags sbyang dka' ba//
173a7(rnying rgyud): yang dag nges don 'di mthong na// skyeb med pa thob par 'gyur// rig pa'i ye shes lus las 'das// bag chags dag gis ming sleb pa// dper na sprul lkog sbyar ba bzhin// skad cig tsam la me bgrib pa'o// bag chags dang na
173b1(rnying rgyud): pa das pa sas// gnas da do// na / lag chun
173b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba 'dzin pa med// rige pa'i rgyal ba 'argya snang // sa ni rnamigs sna byung// gsang dgas rgyal po thangs mkhas// tsamapa sa rgyas dag sa pa ni// nang mang nang nas maung ldadzin pan mdzo byung pa// 'gro da
173b3(rnying rgyud): gnas sa yang dug zim// bzhar med bu las tsho 'phrul rna tshogs chung // nags med dug pas snang po'i dkyil 'khor mthong// sangs rgyas nyid kyi ye shes rin po che// snang ba nyid dang gnyis med rnams par ngarjegs// ga' gyin
173b4(rnying rgyud): pas mkha' yi nye bar 'dzin// ye shes zhugs pas thams cad dbyings su srud// bcom ldan mgrini ser bzhin gshegs pa'i sra// snang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ma dbang bskur zhing // ye shes rol pa mkha' la nyi rang bzhin// sngang
173b5(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul gcig tu mdzes te// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul cing yang ston par mdzad// ye shes sdud pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor// mtshon bral lung gi bcwa sna tshogs gsal// 'byung ba'i chen bral chos nyid mkha' la rnam par ro// / skye med
173b6(rnying rgyud): chos skye gdong nas bas ma dang bral// yin mi ni chom na gas dang gis med// sangs kyis rnams kyi garnaMs pa'i thugs \u0f7f// 'grob kun layang bzhin le nas \u0f7f'o// gsang ba'i rig pa zhal las d+mar na// snang ba 'dod sngam than/

174b2(rnying rgyud): thabs las byung // thabs med sangs rgyas 'ga' yang med// don dang rtags dang tha dad la// ye shes ngo bo 'gyur ba med// sems kyi snang ba tha dad kun// gcig gi ngo bor ma shes na// gsang sngags lam gyi gtan tshigs med// rig pa'i ye
174b3(rnying rgyud): shes 'gyur ba med// rig pa'i snang ba kun tu snang // rig pa'i thugs rje kun la khyab// rig pa'i shes rab thug pa med// rig pa'i spyod yul cir yang snang // snga myi med par dus gcig 'char// rig pa'i snang ba gcig nyid la// sems can spobs ma
174b4(rnying rgyud): ma nges pas// du ma tha dad dag tu rtogs// gcig gi ngo bod shes gyur na// thams cad snang ba mthong bar 'gyur// gcig dang gnyis su snang ba yang // sems can 'khrul pa nyid du bstan// sangs rgyas nyid kyi ltung ba nyid// gcig las med par
174b5(rnying rgyud): bas gsungs// gsang sngags kun gyi dgongs pa yang // de ltar shes na rab tu bsngags// rigs sngags dang ni gsang sngags dang // de bzhin gzungs sngags nyid las kyang // mdo don 'di ltar bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas mad me mdzad
174b6(rnying rgyud): kyis kyang // dgongs pa 'di ltar rab tu bshad// rig pa'i gnas lugs de lta bu// kun gyi gsad don de bzhin no// zhes seng ge rtsal rdzogs chen po'i rgyud las/ seng ge bzhugs thabs kyi dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// /
174b7(rnying rgyud): de nas rigs kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan kun tu bzang // rang gnas rdzogs pa chen po yi// don gyi rnam pa gsung du gsol// de skad rab tu zhus pa dang // kun bzang seng
175a1(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma rigs kyi sems dpa' dang // gtso bo nyid du bcas pa nyon// mtshan ma'i rdzogs chen tshig gnas kyang // yang ngag rdzogs chen cho ga las 'das// tshig dang yi ge'i rnam grangs rnams/
175a2(rnying rgyud): sems can grol snang ba yin// da yang don bkrol 'di lta ste// rdzogs chen seng ge sal sngags la// mtshan mar snang ba'i yul med de// 'on kyang sems can rtog pa la// rmod dang kyil gyi snad par shar// e ma togasang ba'i theg pa ni// 'thung
175a3(rnying rgyud): par shin tu dka' ba yin// des na khyod kyis legs par nyon// thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes su// 'byung ba'i dri ma med par gsal// gsang dang mi gsang gnyis su med// rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting 'dzin ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'asam yas
175a4(rnying rgyud): so// dgongs pa'i don la rab gnas na// nyams kyi ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dgongs pa'i// theg pa 'og ma'i rigs rnams ni// rang snang ting 'dzin ma shes par// phyogs gcig dag la gnas pa'i// ye shes chen po'i snang
175a5(rnying rgyud): ba nyid// phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med// dper na nor bu rin chen ltar// zad pa med pa'i yon tan 'byung // de bzhin rig pa'i sku mthong na// yon tan srul bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes lnga// nyi zer bzhin du rab tu 'phro// snang
175a6(rnying rgyud): dang mi snang tshig las 'das// reg pa'i ye shes don rtogs na// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ji snyed pa// thams cad rang snang nyid du yol// dper na chu dang 'phags pa bzhin// chu nyid bkar kyi rang bzhin pas// sna tshogs thabs kyis spun du 'gyur// de bzhin//
175a7(rnying rgyud): rang rig 'od gsal bas// sna tshogs mtshan ma ci 'phros kyang // thams cad rang gi bar grol// dper na gser 'gyur nyid kyi rtse// rtsi btang nor gyi dbyig 'grub ltar// rig pa'i ye shes rang snang la// gdams ngag don gyis thebs gyur na// rig pa'i
175b1(rnying rgyud): nga ma nam nacan 'bab// sa dang sa ma dang tshigs mad pas// byas pas nathang bar ma marjong// gas byu zlam drug ldan nas// nga ba / drug tu chu snang ba mam la na gnas pas// 'ag nasas dang
175b2(rnying rgyud): byung // 'khrul ba'i dus ni gcig sar 'gyur// gnas pa'i dras ni gsum snang gnas// rtogs pa'i dus na gnyis gang spyugs// rdog pa'i dus na gsum skar ldog/ snang ba'i dras na lnga stir snang // rgal ba'i dus na gcig gar grol// danig
175b3(rnying rgyud): mnas so// dang mi byangs ma shes na// tham thog pa'i sngon du 'thar// bar du gnams ma shes na// thams blangs phyogs gcig snang bar 'gyur// rnga ma'i 'gros ma shes na// rang mig sdang ba stong par 'gyur// de nas dmyalas ma shes na// rig
175b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma shes brlag par 'gyur// de la dbye ba ma shes na// snang brtsam byed par 'gyur// rang gi snang ba ma he sa na// gnas skabs bzhi la sdug par 'gyur// srung ba'i 'char tshul ma shes na// ye shes mthu 'jol bar 'gyur// de nas rang yul
175b5(rnying rgyud): ma shes na// 'khong bar byung thag chad par 'gyur// bdeni brtse gcig ma shes na// rang spang yul la the chom 'gyur// de ni snang ba'i rtse tshul lo// oM maho// rtogs pa'i zhes rab ma pa' lags la// mdags nas rab gting nags// rnam
175b6(rnying rgyud): rab la zhes rnam par dag/ rig pa'i ye shas rtags par dka'// dper na sdib shing no bu sbyar// snang ba'i ma shes lus kyis bslabs// rtogs pa'i ye zhes snang ba ni// gzhil gnas dang las 'char// de bzhin mtha' la grol bas// bzhi
175b7(rnying rgyud): gadres pa ga ni// yanas dkyangs na mug tum smras// chen sa gyi chu badzin/ sa byas gas la sa // lam 'byung ba gdon// dab na nga con sas sdus/ sa tshul ba gsas// da ma
176a1(rnying rgyud): ldan na na rna smra su nan na na
176a2(rnying rgyud): su du sa
176a3(rnying rgyud): byung chub mas dpa ma ga / pas gas/ thung rgyas sa da rgyu du man panas sa la/ nga
176a4(rnying rgyud): dra ma smang zhing sna tshogs skyed// dzA tsam nu dpar mags ni// gang bzang de gzhan gyur// gsang ba'i mags pa gnas pa ma// dem ga rnams pa ga rgya tho / rdzun pa drug ma sa// lenas rang ga 'dugs labs// mun pa
176a5(rnying rgyud): kyis ni bzlog// rang dag pa thams tang nu pas// ra ba byugs kyis ma me// sran pa dang ba ya dus byedan/ shi pa na// sus ny+tsa mi da can / na maman tamags // spang ba dang
176a6(rnying rgyud): stsas pa nyis// gto gsang la chu pa dadage pa'i na la mun srung mun// sa sa na kyi lam sa/ ma gis spyod yus / ba gis // sanas gnas pa ma nyi 'a/
176b1(rnying rgyud): sha shasadomasas // ba byab sa dang phran pa thugs// gcig dang gnyas su ma yin// / su pan rtag pa maza par/ zag pa mapa la 'ang ma 'thur/ gang bam nas gas dku'adas/ zag grungs 'ad
176b2(rnying rgyud): dang gdon yang na// drang ba rnamapa nyid las// rdzus snamatsha thal ma/ da ba snam rnya nal ston// tha gas lnga la rnams bslabs// mthong bas sems pa dang rig pa// dra btsal med pas dang byu da// da
176b3(rnying rgyud): rjem gnyis pa med// thugs dang ngas su 'a rjo kyang / 'ang ba'i mags mamamangon// yang dag ris dan rags ma 'gyur/ zab 'i nyan gnas ches kyi// zag mang yul gyi ladzin ma med// chos nyi rdzogs pa'i yul las 'das
176b4(rnying rgyud): sang pa'i lenas mtha' yas kun// rang ga kyi lal mdzi bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas nyid lus 'ang byung bas// sems can rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur// gams pas rig pa gci mur 'thung // rtogs pas srang ba su drang chur
176b5(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i ci rnams kyad/ gas na mi nas ponyid// nga pa 'dum pa ngas payis// ngan pa'i mnas des 'dzin pa'o// b+hubyud pasan pa'i theg pa rnams// rang ga rig pa nyid 'jogs// bsang sngags le shes mngon sum /
176b6(rnying rgyud): ma la sag sam na gas nag da rgya thang napas// rim par byu // na ba // gli da
176b7(rnying rgyud): cad kuni// bral dang spang ba nyid du bstan// ye shes rje la gnyis med pas// shAng dang mi spang gnyis su med// ye shes lam la 'gyur med pas// gal ba dang ni sri pa med// yegs rkyen med snang ba la// byang chub sems kyi rtags snang ba/
177a1(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i dbyings nyid las// 'od gsal thogs med rig bzung // snang ba'i dus na 'od snang ste// rtogs pa'i dus na rang snang ngo // goms pa'i dus na 'gyur// shes rab tharas dang 'brel pa 'i
177a2(rnying rgyud): don dam da kyil gtod nam na mdzad// mad kyining gzhan / bran mas 'byung can pa'i bden// reg pa'i shes pa'i bu gnas// snang ma'an ma sa gyi da// 'i byings pa gnas// gang dang
177a3(rnying rgyud): chen zur brgyad mdzod// rig pa'i ye shes yab yum tshul// srog 'dus rin chen gzer bzhi'i mdzod// rig pa'i ye shes thig ler gnas// don 'khyil b+han d+ha'i gzhal yas mdzod// rig pa'i ye shes khro sung gnas// 'gag med gas
177a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgo gnyis mdzod// dbyings dang lu gu rgyud du gnas// stong pa mtshan bral nam mkha'i mdzod// rig pa'i ye shes 'od du gnas// de ni gsang ba'i mdzod du bstan// 'gyur med rang byur sku yi mdzod// chags med rnam nag gsung gi mchod/
177a5(rnying rgyud): rtog med bsam bral thugs kyi mdzod// mdzod gsum rin chen lde mig stor// de nas rang rig gtso bo des// thabs mkhas man ngag ma gar ba btsal// de nas lcags btsal lde mig brdungs// nges pa gnyis kyi lde mig gis// ye shes
177a6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i mdzod phye bas// nor gyi phul du rin po che// yon tan gang ltar bsam pa 'byung // yon tan nor bu rin chen de// gang du bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs su// ci bsam thams cad gser du 'gyur// yon tan gter chenA rab zab pas/
177a7(rnying rgyud): thugs ni dri med rab gsal lo// yan tan 'gag ma kun 'byung // rnachags mi shes don du byung // 'dus pa'i dus na pa pre ste// gyes pa'i dus na dru shar// sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba nyid// thugs kyi dkyilan rapag
177b1(rnying rgyud): pas// rang bzhin gsang ba chen por bshad// mtshon pa'i dpe yis rab bstan pas// thugs kyi ye shes mthong bar 'gyur// gsang ba ye nas don gnas pas// de ni thugs med spa bas ma 'das// thig le gcig la phru ltar shang /
177b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes lta bu ma yin te// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // the tshom blo dngos gnyis med pas// snang ba lam gyi ye shes gsal// kun gzhi yul gyi snang ba nyid// rtogs pa'i ye shes rab tu bstan// bskyed pa med cing rdzogs pa med//
177b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs gnyis dang bral ba'o// e ma ho// don dam theg pa rab bshad pa// mtshon bral dkyil 'khor rnam par dag/ brjod med tshig gis snying po bstan// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid las// rab tu gsal bar bstan pa 'di nyid do// gar grag
177b4(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i don bstan pa// ye shes rtogs pa khyad par che// theg pa gsum gyi dbu 'dren la// ye shes lung gi khyad par te// gnas pa'i 'khor lo nyer bstan pa// gsang sngags thugs kyi 'khor lo dang // snang ba yul gyi 'khor lo dang // rtsol ba
177b5(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i 'khor lo ni// yang dag lung gi 'khor lo bstan// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang // gud na yod pa ma yin te// rig pa'i ye shes nyid du bstan// rgyud kyi rgyal po bshad du med// lung gi dngos po rtsol babral// man ngag dngos po don
177b6(rnying rgyud): la 'brel// rang rig rtsa ba'i rgyud chen ma shes na// sems can rtsol bral dgongs pa thob par gA la 'gyur// thams cad tshig la yan pas don la thug pa med// 'gyur med rtsa rlung ma shes na// sems can tshig la rten 'cha' bas// lung
177b7(rnying rgyud): thug pa med par 'gyur// stong pa'i shes rab ma shes na// chos la thug pa med par 'gyur// dbyings dang rig pa ma shes na// don la thug pa med par 'gyur// snang ba chos pur mi shes na// dkyil 'khor thug pa med par 'gyur// 'gyur me
178a1(rnying rgyud): dgam shes na// phral thag pa med par 'gyur// 'tha thul rtagasangs mnas na// thugs la thug pa ma par 'gyur// thag gang 'dun ma dam shes na// gsung 'a jug pa med par 'gyur/ 'byu
178a2(rnying rgyud): mtshogs ma gsan// man tan rnagapa med par 'gyur// ma la ldan thanas shes na// phrin las zag pa da par 'gyur// rlung bcig cod ma gas na// zhib drug pa med pa 'gyur// ring cag zhags shes na// brnam
178a3(rnying rgyud): pa med par 'gyur// 'gag med shugs 'byung ma shes na// spyod pa thug pa med par 'gyur// lu gu chud du ma shes na// 'bras bu thug pa med par 'gyur// stong gsum gyis 'debs ma shes na// dam tshig thug pa med par 'gyur// 8
178a4(rnying rgyud): byung gzhi rdzogs ma shes na// dbang la thugapa med par 'gyur// chos nyid spos bral ma shes na// dbyings la thug pa med par 'gyur// dmigs med zang thal ma shus na// tshas su zug pa med par 'gyur// 'gag med cig char mi shesan/
178a5(rnying rgyud): longs su thug pa med par 'gyur// sna tshogs gcig sdud ma shes na// sbrul sku thug pa med par 'gyur// sems dang rig pa ma shes na// sangs rgyas thug pa med par 'gyur// yid dang shes rab ma shes na// rtogs pa zug pa med pa
178a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// kun gzhi chos sku ma shes na// gnas la thug pa med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sems can ma shes na// gzhi la thug pa med par 'gyur// 'byung ba dngas snyigs ma shes na// lam la bzang ngan med par 'gyur// e ma ho//
178a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyi mang dadun// ci yang ma smin cir mi byug/ sams can da sngags pa ni// slongs pas da par mi 'gyur// nga tu tha~Mng bye gnyis me na/ dang byung gdang mang bar 'gyur/
178b1(rnying rgyud): na/ rkyen mdang nan mad/ rgyanang mdang ces la 'angs/ nag sa tag gcigaces su su 'das khrigs dgagacog chos man na/ nga bam gas 'dags langs sa tungang su grogs
178b2(rnying rgyud): sngags bdag po Alak+Sha/ a ni rabatu brtan shAr sa// kun gyigazhal gnas par 'thud// a ni yig 'phruldan bye te/ shal sogs pa'i yan lags// rab tu brtan pa 'dir bzhud bya// sems nga ba /
178b3(rnying rgyud): gyis nyid kyis bstan pa'i phyir// a la sogs pa'i mi gang ba zhide// yan lag sa ldan yi ge ma// skye med sku ya rang bzhin bskrun// yi ge sa nyid gsal gyu na// chos rnams kun gyi stan du 'gyur// sa ma mtshan ga
178b4(rnying rgyud): gzhag dan bag dgas pag/ gos rgyags gas ba gas// yan 'ab ba shing kyisam sa/ ni dag sum du
178b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i dus na su sbyar rtogs// gsang sngags nges pa stan pa na// gcig dang dum ma yin te// spang ba gcig pa na rnams na// ma sa tha dang dag tu 'byung // khyimathong yangs bcor ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i mgon po dadapag med//
178b6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi spyan mnga' bos// sgra med snang ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rang snang thabs kyi zhugs pas bzung // gsang ba'i ye shes 'od la 'dug/ mthun pa'i ye shes sgra ltar shar// snang ba'i ye shes yul la snang // gsang sngags theg pa rnams phyim
178b7(rnying rgyud): dang 'dus don kyi rdzo gags la// rtogs dang 'ad gas tsha sa rdzub // ri mtha bla mjug pa rjems// dpyang kyang nganam na bzhin// btang rnams stong po'i mun par 'gyur// bkas kyang byam chad lal bar 'gyur// gas sams
179a1(rnying rgyud): sa
179a2(rnying rgyud): zab mo 'dus ma byas pa'i ting de rjengan la rnams pa gzhugs so// de nas yang rigs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di sa kris gsol to// kyes bcom ldan seMng ge'i bdag/ ting po 'dzin las rab tu bzhengs// bdag rgyag rjes mthun sangs rnas la/

179a7(rnying rgyud): dam gnyen gnyis kyis nga mi bsgrib// mtha' dang dbus su mi 'byed pas// gol sgrib gnyis kyis mi bsgrib// gsang dang mi gsang gnyis med pas// sdug bsngal nyid kyis nga mi bsgrib// rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas// mun dang ldang bas

179b2(rnying rgyud): dang ma 'das mi rtog pas// 'khor 'das gnyis kyis nga mi bsgrib// gsal 'grib gnyis su mi 'dzin pas// yengs dang rmugs pas mi bsgrib// e ma ho// rin chen rnam dag byang chub sems// bskyed pa mi mnga' rang la
179b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rdzogs pa ma yin ye nas don// bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi mtha' dang bral// 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas// bsgyur ba ma yin lhun gyis grub// gsang sngags don la de bzhin gshegs// tshig gcig bstan pas

179b5(rnying rgyud): ni rlabs bzhin du// bder gshegs thams cad sku las 'byung // don dam dkyil 'khor bsam yas grong // ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu 'byung // mtha' yas dkyil 'khor 'gyur ba med// sems dang rig pa mi shes shing /
179b6(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i yul la zhen gyur na// thar lam byang chub ring bar bshad// ye shes rtse gcig ma shes shing // chos la rtsol ba'i phyir 'brangs na// rtogs par mi 'gyur yun ring gnas// sangs rgyas dgongs pa gcig pu nyid// sems
179b7(rnying rgyud): cin blo yi nad mang yang // theg pa gcig las med par gsungs// theg pa gcig gi ngo bo ni// rang rig gtan la 'bebs par bshad// gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi sku// don dam ye shes ldan gyis grub// gsang don sul phra rags
180a1(rnying rgyud): gsal// zag pa'i mtha' ni gcig gum gnyis// du ma med par rgyal bas gsungs// yi ge gcig dang theg pa gcig/ rig pa gcig tu thams cad 'dus// yig rnams kyi rang bzhin no//
180a2(rnying rgyud): yi ge a la rdzogs par bshad// theg pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// a ti nyid la rdzogs par bshad// rig pa nyid kyi dngos po ni// lu gu chud la yod par bshad// thabs mkhas ye shes thugs rje can// 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon
180a3(rnying rgyud): gyur pas// gsang 'dus theg pa'i spyi bor bshad// a ti shin tu ngo mtshar che// des ni yang dag don rtogs 'gyur// thams cad thar lam 'thob par 'gyur// skye med chos su rnyed pa'o// oM ma a 'bri rab tu gsal// thig le klong
180a4(rnying rgyud): las 'das// mtshan ma'i yul med pas// sdang ba 'od du gsal// ye shes mkha' la khyab// rang byung rtog mtha' chod// dgongs pa'i don la gnas// thugs rdo'i nyi zer ldan// thams cad kun la snyoms// ye shes rnam par dag
180a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bral rgya chad med// mtshan med dngos snang min// gsal 'char ldan lug ldan// snad med mapa' lagasal// yul med gcigs nyid// don dam yangs pa che// thogs med glang gis bstod// cig char don la 'jug/ mtha'
180a6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu sdud// rgya che gting zab cing // zang med nor bu ltar// dgos 'didi sna tshogs 'byung // yin min rtsis las 'das// 'byung ba'i shes rab che// gsal ba'i snang ba che// rang snying goms pa che// srid pa dus gcig rdzogs// mtha'
180a7(rnying rgyud): yas kun tu chub// thugs rjes thabs mkhas spyod// rang sder dkyil 'khor sbyin// dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// bas ma 'das dngas pas stong // shes rab don la byed// stor pa nyid kyi sku// 'dzin tog yul las 'das// me long gzugs
180b1(rnying rgyud): brgyan bzhin// gza' gtad chos dang bral// gnyis med rang sangs rgyas// bsgrub med gcig pu nyid// phyi nang gnyis ka med// rnam dag dgongs pa che// stong pa'i mu mtha' bral// rang byung bcos pa med// 'dzin chags gnyis dang bral//
180b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don la 'jug/ mthun pa'i yul du sdang // byas pa ma yin te// byung bar lhun gyis grub// tha snyad tshig las 'das// kye ma yang dag bsrub med gcig pu nyid// mkha' la nyi shar 'dra// dri med pas ma las 'das// thog med dus kyi tshe/
180b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad// sku dang 'ong ltar snang // shes bya'i yul du med// chos sku brjod dang bral// longs su smos dang bral// grul su 'dzin dang bral// ngo bo nyid kyi sku// bsam med yul las 'das// bsam pa dngos bral sku// theg chen zur
180b4(rnying rgyud): du 'bral// phyi nang kun gyi sku// dngos po'i yul las 'das// stong gsal rig pa'i sku// bsam yas brjod du med// rdo rje snying po'i sku// yul sems gnyis su med// snang ba ka dag sku// 'byung ba'i rkyen dang bral// gsang sngags thabs
180b5(rnying rgyud): mkhas nyid// kun gyi snang bar 'dod// yangs pa chos nyid sku// re dogs gnyis dang bral// brdal ba dbyings kyi sku// yangs dog gnyis dang bral// gsal ba'i shes rab su// snang rung ming dang bral// gcod pa thogs med sku// dang du ma yengs
180b6(rnying rgyud): gsal// rdo rje 'chang gi sku// thogs med kun tu gyu// skye shi gnyis dang bral// stod pa rdo rje'i sku// mtha' dbus gnyis su med// rnal 'byor don gyi sku// g.yeng ba'i bdud dang bral// dmigs med zar thal sku// phyogs cha kun dang bral//
180b7(rnying rgyud): gzi brjid 'od 'bar sku// mtshan ma'i chos dang bral// mnyam nyid stong pa'i sku// gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral// brtan pa ri bo'i sku// spobasu gnyis dang bral// kun 'brung nam mkha'i sku// tha snyad chos dang bral// sra ma bregs rdo rje'i gru//
181a1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa kun dang bral// thig le snang ba'i sku// dbyings dang yul las 'das// rdo rje mtshon cha'i sku// thogs med kun tu rgyu// e ma snang ba 'od po che// gting gi mun pa sel// rig pa thogs pa med// don
181a2(rnying rgyud): gyi snying po mthong // dper na rlung dang mtshungs// chos dbyings spos bral nyid// nam mkha' sprin dengs 'dra// mtshan nyid lnga ldan pas// so so'i don rtogs 'gyur// ye shes rang snang nyid// 'byung ba'i phyogs dang bral// mtha' yas gcig
181a3(rnying rgyud): don dam kun rdzob gnyis// gcig dang du mar med// sa dang lam med pas// ye shes 'dzin chags thal// stong pa bdag med sku// dbyings dang rig par gsal// sangs rgyas snang ba ni// don gyi stong gsal ldan// 'gyur med thig le'i su// /
181a4(rnying rgyud): don dam 'gyur ba med// yang dag mtha' yas nyid// phyogs dang ris su med// rtog med sdang ba sangs// yul sems gnyis su med// sku gnyis mthar phyin pas// ye shes don la zhog/ stong pa chos nyid su// 'dzin pa'i phyogs dang bral//
181a5(rnying rgyud): med dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes su shar ba// snang sems yul dang bral// rdo rje sems dpa' las// sprul pa'i tshogs byung bas// sems can rtog pa sel// bag chags sgyu lus las// rig pa'i sku byung bas// dang gsal 'dzin med
181a6(rnying rgyud): skyes// 'byung ba nam mkha' las// lu gu chud shar bas// kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur// yang dag rig su las// ye shes don gsal bas// rnal 'byor don chen 'byung // tshes lnga rang sbyang bas// snang ba thug phrad byung // de gzhi nanas mi tog se cang kyang //
181a7(rnying rgyud): ni mkhas pas thabs su bstan// de las med par gsungs pa'o// e ma ho// nang med nang nas ye shes gter byung bas// 'byung ba'i ye shes sna ra ba kun las 'das// rtogs pa'i shes rab don la rnam par bsgyur// yangs pa'i skul gyi nang kun gsal
181b1(rnying rgyud): sugasum ngan lamathar byin tshig tshad pa// skong ba'i ngang las rgyag 'jur// gsal ba'i dang las gsu ba ma mnyad rdzogs// skye grag med pa na tha na pa bya// soms dang la pa' sa nyid dang da
181b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyang mtha' dang bral// sangs rgyas gsung bar dam pas rab bsngags pa// rig pa'i rgyal po ye shes kyi zer gyis// sems can b+hU yi rtag pa'i mun pa rab tu bsal// thogs med gsal ba'i mar me bsam pa kun da dz+ra sa/
181b3(rnying rgyud): cad mkhyen nyid chos sku'i spyan dang ldan// sdang ba'i ye shes rtog mtha' rab tu spangs// tha skad gnyis dang bral ba'i chos su byang chub la// dri ma'i skyon dang sdang ba'i phyogs cha med// sangs rgyas lus kyi rgyan bzang ba// sems can kun gyi rang bar
181b4(rnying rgyud): gyur/ chos dbyang maphyogs sum srung sa bas// ris pa'i mashes kun turjong / dengs bas partags chus can dang // dbor gnas dgrangs pa gnyis/ rkyen byed ma yin na ma dang / hU~Mmi drug pa grangs mang yang / se
181b5(rnying rgyud): nyid mthong ba med// snang ba'i ye shes phyogs med pas// ci yang ma yin sngon gyis grub// so sor ma yin gcig tu gnas// byas pa ma yin gyi 'jig zal// de yang lci spyod sgom par bshad// ri re ni la gsum gsum te// ngo 'o sa tshig
181b6(rnying rgyud): ba dang // rngam 'a gsum du kun tu grags// lta ba'i ngo bo mthong bar bshad// sbya das tshig go bar bshad// dpyo ba nges pa med par bstan// de yang 'dod pa 'dag ste// chos nyid yul gyi lte dang // spyod pa thabs kyi lba ba dang // rang rig
181b7(rnying rgyud): ga dang // mni lu pang/ sa da yul gyi na// chos sha dadang cas ca no// spyong ba bangs kyi 'an/ na// rig pa na / sa
182a1(rnying rgyud): ma nor lung gi lta ba ni// rtags chen a nyi lo gar bstan// des ni kha' don nyid bstan// spyod pa la yang don gsum ste// spyod pa'i ngo ba mi chags pa// nges tshig 'dzin pa thongs par bstan// dbye ngas
182a2(rnying rgyud): pa ma yin te// 'on kyang gsang don 'di lta ste// 'dzin med yul gyi spod pa dang // rang snang zabs kyi spyod pa dang // zhen med chags bral smod pa dang // stong pa lam gyi spyod pa dang // rtsol med sdang ba'i spyod pa dang // brtul zhugs dbang gi spyod pa
182a3(rnying rgyud): dang // 'dzin med 'khor ba'i spyod pa dang // rnam pa bdun du grags pa'o// 'dzin med yul gyi spyod pa ni// dper na smyon pa lta bur bstan// rang snang thabs kyi spyod pa ni// dper na ri dwags lci bur bstan// zhen med chags thal spyod pa ni// dpe
182a4(rnying rgyud): na bu chung lta bur bstan// stong pa lam gyi spyod pa ni// rgya mtsho gza' skar lta bur bstan// col sems snang ba'i spyod la ni// glang can smyon pa lta 'ur bstan// brtul zhugs dbang gi spyod pa ni// dper na stag mo lta bur bstan// 'dzin med
182a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i spyod pa ni// nam mkha'i mdud bskor lta bur bstan// sgom pa la yang don gsum ste// sgom pa'i ngo bo mi rtog pa// nges tshig 'du 'phro cod par bstan// dbye ba'i don la ma nges kyang // gsang ba'i don la 'di ltar gsungs// rnam rtog rgyan
182a6(rnying rgyud): gyi bsgom pa dang // stong nyid mtha' med bsgom pa dang // mtshan ma gzung 'dzin bsgom pa dang // gzung 'dzin gsal bar bsgom pa dang // rtsol bral bzhag thabs bsgom pa'o// rnam rtog rgyun gyi bsgom pa ni// dper na spre'u lta bur bstan// stong
182a7(rnying rgyud): pa mtha' med bsgom pa ni// bya long nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol 'dra// mtshan ma gzung 'dzin bsgom pa ni// me la chu ru bsgyur ba 'dra// gzung 'dzin gsal bar bsgom pa ni// 'bengs kyis rje ru 'chos pa 'dra// gzhag thabs rtsol bral bsgom
182b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni// dper na seng ge lta bur bstan// de bzhin lha sgom yig nas don// sus kyang mthong ba ma yin te// rang rig thabs kyis glo bar bstan// e ma ho bde gshegs dgongs pa nyid// gsal ba'i 'od dang sku yi mkha'// gsung gi ze
182b2(rnying rgyud): gyis kun tu khyab// byang chub sems dang rdo rje'i bdag/ skye ba'i snang ba ma yin te// yul gyi rkye nang du rnam par grol// phyogs cha ma yin yun gyis grub// bya ba dang ni byed pa rnams// snang ba goms pa'i phyogs su blta// rig pa mun pa'i phyogs rnas pa
182b3(rnying rgyud): ma rig snang ba'i phyogs nas blta// ye shes stong pa'i phyogs nas blta// 'od snang sku yi phyogs nas blta// chos nyid dngos po'i phyogs nas blta// chos can dngos med phyogs nas blta// 'khor ba stong pa'i phyogs nas blta// myang 'das nyon mongs
182b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs nas blta// snang ba mun pa'i phyogs nas blta// mun pa snang ba'i phyogs nas blta// e ma ho sangs rgyas ye shes su// kun snang dang ba'i dkyil 'khor ston// thabs nyid las ni ye shes sku// dus dang mtha' la mi gnas shing // phyogs cha'i
182b5(rnying rgyud): snang ba ma yin te// sems dang ye shes bag chags dngos ma yin// ye shes bag chags kun dang bral gyur kyang // sems kyis sna tshogs bag chags sdud par byed// sems dang ye shes gnyis su maphyen// snang ba yul gyi rtsa ba mi chod pas//
182b6(rnying rgyud): rkyen bral chos nyid kun gyis rtogs par dka'// de yang yang dag don dam nyid du bstan// sems dang ye shes sna tshogs rkyen dang bral// yin min gnyis kyi sdung ba'i phyogs med pas// tha snyad gnyis la nga yi chos mi gnas// yang dag dkyil
182b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab ste// chos kyi skul rnam rtog ming med kyang // 'dzin pa'i yul la bag chags skye med kyang // sku dang ye shes snang ba'i phyogs med ltar// snang ba'i ye shes gtan tshigs kun dang bral// chos su nyid la bsam gtan
183a1(rnying rgyud): ye nas gnas// mtshan ma nyid la mtshan ma nyid gnas pas// grol lam mi thob rtag tu yun ring gnas// rtogs pa'i ye shes skye tshul de bzhin no// zhes seng ge rtsal rdzogs chen po'i rgyud las/ snang ba'i song na
183a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u skye bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang rigs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dgongs pa'i bdag/ ye nas gnas pa'i gsang sngags don// rab tu
183a3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa ji ltar don// gzhi yi ye shes rang snang ba// lam gyi ye shes thug pa med// 'bras bu'i ye shes rgyu mthun sdang // de ni go ba'i dus yin pas// nges par gtan la phebs ma phebs// mos pa'i 'khor la bstan du gsol// 'khor gyi tshogs
183a4(rnying rgyud): kyis de skad zhus// de nas kun bzang seng ge des// mos pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// kye ma rigs ldan sangs rgyas nyon// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ni// sna tshogs cir yang mdzad pa ste// don gyi dgongs pa gcig las med// sangs rgyas
183a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi sku dang ni// gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang // yon tan phrin las lnga ltar spang ba'o// de rnams la yang gsum gsum ste// ngo bo dang ni nges tshig dang // rab tu dbyen mchog tu gsungs// de yang bshad pa 'di lta ste// mu yi
183a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba med// su yi ngas tshig gisal 'tshor ldan// dbyen rnam pa gsum du bstan// chos su longs su sbal sur bshad// chos bu'i mtshan nyid bsam pa bral// longs su'i mtshan nyid gsal tog med// skal bu'i mtshan nyid rje tshogs nyon//
183a7(rnying rgyud): gidon nyid 'dilta ste// gsung gi bo grags pas stong // gsung gi nges chag sna tshogs 'byung // dbye ba rnam pa drug gis bstan// sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i gsung dang ni// tshangs pa lha yi mchog gsung dang // 'gro drug 'bral ba'i rang skad dang
183b1(rnying rgyud): sems can mos pa'i 'dul skad dang // gsang ba yul gyi brda' skad dang // grags pa sna tshogs gsung du bstan// de ni gsung don byas pa'o// thugs kyi ngo bo 'khrul pa med// thugs kyi nges tshig bsam par snang // dbye ba rnam pa gsum nyid bstan/
183b2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dran pa sangs pa dang // rdo rje 'gyur med bstan pa dang // sna tshogs pa yi thugs su bstan// yon tan la yang rnam gsum ste// yon tan ngo bo thams cad bskyed// yon tan nges tshig sna tshogs 'grub// dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis bstan// gzhi
183b3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i yon tan dang // lam la snang ba'i yon tan dang // mtha' la stsol ba'i yon tan no// phrin las la yang don gsum ste// phrin las ngo bo grub par byed// phrin las nges tshig bya ba byed// dbye ba rnam pa bzhes bstan pa'o// e maho// zhi ba dang
183b4(rnying rgyud): ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang drag por bshad// zhi bas chos nyid dbyings su sdud// byas pas sna tshogs ngo bor rton// dbang gis ma smin smin par byed// drag pos thams cad tsher gcod pa'o// de yang thams cad smin mdzad pa// dbang gi dkying
183b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen por bshad// chu bo rnam bzhi ma shes na// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba chod mi 'gyur// brgyud pa rnam bzhi ma shes na// gsang ba'i dbang bskur shes mi 'gyur// babs lugs rnam bzhim shes na// rig pa'i ye shes don mi mthong // bskur
183b6(rnying rgyud): thabs rnam bzhi ma shes na// dam rdzas don la sbyor mi nus// dbang gi rdzas bzhi ma shes na// rig pa'i ye shes mtshon mi nus// bsrur ba'i gnas pa zhi ma shes na// rtogs tshed don la bsgral mi nus// dus tshod rnam bzhi ma shes na//
183b7(rnying rgyud): rdzas dbang rnams la don med 'gyur// phyi nang dbang bzhi ma shes na// ye shes gnas lugs ston mi nus// thob pa'i rtags bzhi ma shes na// don dam yid ches med par 'gyur// bar don ma bzhi ma shes na// rig pa'i rtsal mi 'a
184a1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// gnas lugs nam bzhi ma shes na// mtshan pa'i dpol don med 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rnam bzhim shes na// rngal dbang bskur ba don med sgyur// 'byung ba rnam bzhim shes na// smon pa la
184a2(rnying rgyud): shes ston mi nus// 'dug pa'i dus bzhi ma shes na// dbang bskur gdams pa ston mi nus// 'byung ba'i dus bzhi ma shes na// rig pa'i 'pho tshul ston mi nus// bsgom thabs rnam bzhis shes na// tshe dbang rgyas par bskur mo nus/
184a3(rnying rgyud): bstim pa rnam bzhi ma shes na// dbang bsrung ba la don med 'gyur// gdams dge rnam bzhi ma shes na// bu la nges shes skye mi nus// rang byung dbang la de ltar rdzogs// de yang rab tu bshad pa ni// rdzogs lugs rnam bzhi ma shes
184a4(rnying rgyud): na// theg chen don la sbyor mi nus// thob lugs rnam bzhi ma shes na// rig pa'i ngo bo mthong mi 'gyur// grol lugs rnam bzhi ma shes na// skye ba rnam bzhi'i don mi rtog/ rang byung dbang la de bzhin gnas// rig pa'i dbang la de bzhin no// /
184a5(rnying rgyud): e ma dang byung rdzogs pa'i dbang // lam la byang chub rim gnas pas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// ma smin pa rnams smin gyi'i phyir// bcom ldan thugs rje thabs mkhas pas// gsang ba'i don nyid bstan pa'o// oM ho//
184a6(rnying rgyud): e ma ho// ma grol ba rnams grol bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i ye shes dkyil 'khor bstan// dkyil 'khor ye shes gsang ba'i don// 'das pas mtshon par mi nus pas// de lta nyid du dkyil 'khor rnams// rgyal ba yab nyid thabs mkhas pas/
184a7(rnying rgyud): thabs mkhas thugs rjes yang dag bzung // brgyad khri bzhi stong theg pa'i sgos// gsang ba'i ye shes ston mi nus// de phyir gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// rang snang ston phyir tshul bas gsungs// bcom ldan pa d+ma he ru kas// gsang ba nges pa'i dbang rnams
184b1(rnying rgyud): dpyan// a mang mtshang shing tum// A sbe kyil 'bar thams cad 'dus// gsang ba phyi rtags bstan pa// yangs su rdzogs pa rang lus mthong // rig pa'i ye shes dkyil 'khor na// lus la rdum pa pazhir gnas pas// 'di thod du yang da
184b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// gsang sngags thabs kyi gtan tshigs las// rang lus mtshon phyir dkyil 'khor bstan// oM dang a dang gnyis ston pas// yi ge 'khor lo bsgom par bshad// nam tog yi ge hU~M ru bsdus gyur na// reg pa'i ye shes yi ge hU~M
184b3(rnying rgyud): gnas// dag pa'i dus nu yi ge A yi rang bzhin no// 'byung ba'i dus na yi ge aM du 'gyur // rig pa'i rang // bdan pa nyid ldan pa te/ bzhin de bzhin rab gnas pas// gnas pa'i dus na yi ge phan du 'byung // mthong ba'i dus na yi ge sta r+ya b+hu // shes pa'i
184b4(rnying rgyud): dus na yi ga d+har gnas pa'o// rig pa'i chos su rkyen dang bskal na// dge pa'i dang bzhin btsal na ma rnyed de// mas kyi rang bzhin rdzog na tam// rnying gi rang bzhin pachags brtags pas spyong / mir ni phyogs ming dang /
184b5(rnying rgyud): bral// sngags kyi rang bzhin pazlas brjod skal las 'das// chos kyi rang bzhin ye nas bsgrub dang bral// sku yi rang bzhin ya nas rnam par dag/ ye shes rang bzhin ye nas sto / mtha' bral// 'od kyi rang bzhin ye nas thug pa med// tsha
184b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin brjod pa nyid du med// bdag da'i gzhan sdang gnyis kyi mtha' dang bul// zad med nor bu rimachen rin zung med pa yang // zung zing longs spyod sna chags rab sna dpas// sems can dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba ltar// rang byung ye shes yon
184b7(rnying rgyud): tan la tshogs kyis// marig nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed// e ma ho// sangs rgyas ye shes dbang rdzogs pa// 'gyur ba med pa'i da'ang chen thob// yang dag ldan rdzogs dbang ldan pas// yig nas ldan 'thams cal dbang theg/ rtog seM
185a1(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i dbang rdzogs pas// dbyings rig gsal ba'i brda dbang thob// zan med thig le'i dbang rdzogs pas// ldan 'byams snang ba'i rtsal dbang thob// dgongs pa cig tshad dbang rdzogs pas// ye gsal
185a2(rnying rgyud): ldan mnyam rtsal dbang thob// rig pa ye shes dbang rdzogs pas// bya bral lhun rdzogs rtse lde dbang thob// sangs kyus gru yi dbang rdzogs pas// gsang ba'i yi chu'i rtsal dbang thob// gru dang ye shes rtsal la gosang gnas// nam mkha'i
185a3(rnying rgyud): mthong nas nyi shar bas// sems can thad ka'i mun pa bsal ba ltar// gsang ba'i dus na rig pa rang gnas pa// ye gnas dgongs pa chu bo'i gzhung dang 'dra // de lta bu yi rtsal dbang thob gyur na// stong pa'i ye shes rang gnas rdzogs par gsungs//
185a4(rnying rgyud): phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rdzogs na// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rig pa'i dbang // ma bskur ye nas rdzogs par 'gyur// snad pa rlig kyi lung lta bu// byur med lhun mnyam dang du rdzogs// ye shes dbang bskur dam pa 'di// sems can rnams
185a5(rnying rgyud): gyis thob bya'i phyir// thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bus bshad// de ni rtsal dbang rdzogs pa'o// zhes seng ge rtsal rdzogs chen po'i rgyu di was/ seng ge rtsal rdzogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang kun rig chos kyi rjes 'di
185a6(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan kun bzang yab// bdag cag dad pas zhus pa la// don gyi dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// bdag gis zhus pa'i tshig rnams kun// ma nor legs par gsung
185a7(rnying rgyud): gsol// de nas kun bzang seng ge des// rnam pa bsgyings te bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i sgron ma yi gnas pas// dgongs pa'i don la rnam par brtags// kye ma sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'khor// byed la gzung 'dzin mi mnga' yang // sems
185b1(rnying rgyud): dran ma rig yang ba rnams// dpar ba nyid las bskul bya'i phyir// ngad yis bstan gyis/ khyed kyis gzung // khyad kyis nus par 'gas sa// legs so legs so rigs kyisra// snang ba'is shas mtha' mad kyang // dag pa lags dri ma med//
185b2(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i ngang la gang gnas pa// rang byung ye shes de dang nye// rtogs pa'i shes rab yul la 'gyur// 'byung ba lnga yi drims kyang // dag pa'i ye shes sgrib nus na// ma rig la sogs nyon mongs kyis// dag pa'i ye shes skye dbang med/
185b3(rnying rgyud): rig la sogs 'dzin pa rnams// dz+nyAn dang bral na dang rig thogs// pra mi 'od dang gsang gi / rkyen mongs nyid las b+hab 'gyur// gas ba'i ye nas thong bamyal ba// dper ni dbul ma gta mtshungs// rig sa'i ma shes
185b4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba// dper na nyi zla'i 'od dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas yo shes su mnga' ba// ye shes rmig chod rnam par dag/ gsang ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba// kun gyis gob ma yin te// gsung sngags thabs kyi sgro mar yang / de dag pa'i ye shes
185b5(rnying rgyud): gab med// lu bru~M rgyud du rtog pa med// yang gsang nges pa'i lung chen 'di// dri ma gnyis dang rab tu bral// e ma ye shes dag pa'i sra// 'gu' dang 'ga' la snang ba las// kun gyis mthong ba ma yin no// yang gsang rig pa'i sngon ma nyid//
185b6(rnying rgyud): ting bzhag gnyis su med pa'i phyir// thabs ldan shes rab ldan pas rtogs// gsang sngags ye zhes tshogs kyi sgra// mthun pa'i 'od dang bcas pa 'o// dzin pa med pa'i sa phyogs nas// dag pa'i ye shes ngos gzung // nyin rje chen po'i thabs
185b7(rnying rgyud): 'angs// sems can thams cad gzung bya ri spe la/ la zlab 'od bral// snang ba thams cad rdzo // yan rang gisu la chos nyid ni// gas ba'i ye shes mkha' lags la// donangs kun rdzob gnyis med ni// dus gsum sangs
186a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi lta bar 'dod// thabs mkhas rtogs pa'i klong gnas pas// ye shes thugs de rgyun mi 'chad// ye shes thabs la mkhas pa yis// rang gi de nyid nyams su blangs// de la gams te nyams lon na//
186a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes skye ba'i rim pa dang // ye shes gnas pa'i rim pa dang // rig pa 'char ba'i lha stangs brtags// ye nas gnas pa'i snying po'i sku// rgya ma chad pa'i ye shes yin// lhun gyis grub pa'i bud+ha dang // gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs// yang
186a3(rnying rgyud): dag don gyi ngo bo la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med kyang // sems can blo yi 'khrul tshul la// rnam pa gnyis ltar sdang du zad// snang ba'i go na rig pa nyid// mthar lhung nyid du gnas pa yin// gcig dang gnyis la sogs pa yi// mtha'
186a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i dri ma phra rags kun// bsal nas ye shes don la 'jug/ 'byung ba'i ye shes thabs kyi sku// kun gyi snyir por gnas pa'o// e ma ho// yangs pa'i grong khyer shel gyi khang bu'i nang // dgongs pa rang gnas nyi zla lnga shar bas// rnam dag rtog med /
186a5(rnying rgyud): lngar ldan gyis grub// thugs rje'i zer ldan ye shes lnga rtogs pas// sda ba kyis 'debs snang sring dbang du 'dus// ye shes stobs kyi khyad par ni// gang gis snang ba bcad pa dang // gang gis snang ba 'phrog pa dang // gang la snang ba 'dus pa'o// gang
186a6(rnying rgyud): snang bya chos kyi sku// phyogs dang ris su mi sdang bas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs na// thabs kyi yan lag chos kyi sku// shes rab dang bung don la spyor// thugs rje gnyis su med par grol// gsal ba'i ye shes yi gnas don// mtha'
186a7(rnying rgyud): dang dbus su mi 'byed pas// mtha' gnyis togs na dbus kyi dang // skyon nyid rtogs na yon tan rdzogs// nyon mongs ye shes nyid du rtogs// gsang thabs rdo rje'i lus tshogs ni// don dam kun rdzob ltar snang ba'o// ye nas chos srur rang gnas
186b1(rnying rgyud): pas// mtha' dang dbus su mi gnas pa// chos nyid rtogs pas thabs la mkhas// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsam yas rnams// ma bcos bsam yas lhun gyis grub// bde ba pas ma yas dkyil 'khor che// snang ba'i ye shes skur gnas
186b2(rnying rgyud): pas// bde ba'i sku gsum rdzogs par bshad// snang ba'i sku gsum 'od gsal bas// shes rab su gsum don la spyod// 'das pa'i sku gsum yul du med// ma 'ongs su gsum snang mtha' yas// mtshon pa'i sku gsum dang re spro// sangs/
186b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas ye shes sku gsum gsal// shes rab ye shes gnas lugs ni// don dam ye shes thugs la rdzogs// gsal ba'i ye shes mtha' las 'das// rtog med ye shes kun tu snang // yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang // skye med ye shes nor bu'i
186b4(rnying rgyud): tshul// 'gag med ye shes snang ba'i tshul// e ma ho// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni// sems can kun gyi thugs la gnas// lam dang rig pa'i gnas la mkhas// snang ba'i rig pa shin tu che// sgron ma'i ye shes dang gsal ba//
186b5(rnying rgyud): dus med chos nyid snang ba ni// phyogs cha med pa'i yul la sdang // 'dzin pa med pa'i rnam dag rtogs// bgrong du med pa'i lam dang 'phrad// bstan du med pa'i lung chen rtogs// bshad du med pa'i rgyud la gnas// thob med rtsal rdzogs 'bras
186b6(rnying rgyud): bu thob// yang dag nges pa'i snang ba zin// shes rab su lnga lhun gyis grub// mdzad pa lam du su lA shar// thig le chos min rang phyung shar// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis// gcig pa la ni gnyis ltar snang // sru gsung thugs ldan rdo
186b7(rnying rgyud): rje'i sku// kun la yod pas snang mtha' yas// brjod du med pas rtsal gsum rdzogs// mtshon du med pas the tshom bral// yid du med pas dpyod byed med// sems su med pas bag chags med// ma rig med pas rang sa grol// rtog pa med
187a1(rnying rgyud): pas rdzus las 'das// mthang chung mod pa 'ang du dang // lathal bas yon sa gnas// yon mon padapas dang lus cu/ nyid yonas rang gnas pas// gzhan nas rnyed par 'gyur ma par/
187a2(rnying rgyud): sngags gas la pa'i shes rab ni// gcig tu snang dang dra mar med// snang ba'i ye shes bri ltar snang // mtha' yas ye nas rang la gnas// don srung dkyil 'khod rnam lnga byung // ye nas rtswa nyid mchar par// mu grub chen po'i snang bar rtogs
187a3(rnying rgyud): sa dang lam la rab gnas pas// dri mar bzung ba'i dngos po med// byas pas rnyed par myi'i gyur ro// snang ba'i ye shes ldan drug ldan// sbyo ba'i ye shes zla bres mtha~M ga yas// 'thun zla med pa'i nyag ga tsug pa// mtshan nyid med
187a4(rnying rgyud): rangasar gro la// ye shes gsal ba'i chung chen gyis// dran pa sangs pa'i mkha'i leb sbyod// mdza' pa mi gnas yangs pa'i hUM// brdal ba chos nyid sngang ba'i sems// yul la rtog cing don du phreng // rig pa'i ye shes rang shar bas//
187a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes lhun mnyam gsal// dri med ye shes mkha' gsal gnas// hUM phyi med par bde gnas pa// phyogs cha med par don dam rtogs// srung thob med pa'i skul blta// gsal 'grib med pa'i sdang ba mthong // ye shes bde bar lus lagras
187a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// oM ma ho skye med rang bzhin gsal// 'dzin pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gsal// gnyis 'dzin thogs med gcig tu sdung // yangs pas bde brda la gnyis su 'dzud// reg bya'i ye shes 'gyur med pas// brtan pa'i ye shes thogs pa med
187a7(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i ye shos stong pa'i sku// 'das pa'i tshig tu med sdang bas// mtha' yas gcig tu thams cad 'dus// ra rdzogs dang las ma gnas sbyin gyis thung // bang 'byams chos nyid snying por gnas// sangs rgyas rig pa cig bzhag nyi/
187b1(rnying rgyud): bsangs pa'i nam mkha' la// lha dang bral ba'i lta ba ltos// rtogs bya ye nas mtha' bral la// 'dzin med shes rab go ra chug/ gnas pa med pa'i ldan 'byams nyid// stong pa chen po'i rgya yis thob// gsang sngags thabs nyid rtog med
187b2(rnying rgyud): pas// las rab rdzogs pa'i thabs su bshad// sangs rgyas rnams tha' 'byams pa kyi phyag rgya'i dbang // gsang sngags las kyi sku ltar 'phro// don dam ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// yang dag ldan rdzogs bde ba chen po'i sku// sems dang yid kyis
187b3(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i phyogs cha sgribs// snang ba'i ye shes stobs su ma gyur na// lhun rdzogs gsang sngags thabs mkhas pas// thugs rjes sems can thams cad la// blta ba'i don las mi 'da' zhing // rang rig nyams su blang ba'i phyir// bsam
187b4(rnying rgyud): 'das dngos po'i yul du med// gsang ba'i shes rab thug med pas// rig pa'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston// ye shes thabs la mkhas pa yis// dbyings dang rig pa ldan byas na// rang rigs la bde bar gnas// gsang ba'i ye shes lhun rdzog/
187b5(rnying rgyud): pas// bya ba'i yul du mi gnas pas// mtshan mguyengs pa'i dus med pas// rang rig dkyil 'khor rnam lnga rdzogs// gsang ba'i ye shes khong gsal bas// brjod pa'i tshig las 'das pa'o// ye shes sul rab gnas pas// dus dang mtha' la mi
187b6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// gcig tu med pas don dam nyid// phyogs su med pas lha dang bral// bcos su med pas sgom dang bral// yin min med pas spyod dang bral// rigs kyi kha dog lngar snang bas// ye shes lnga yi rang rtsal rdzogs// 'byung ba lnga yi rtsal snga
187b7(rnying rgyud): ba// rang byur ye shes ngo bor rdzogs// shes rab lnga yi don rtogs pas// lu gu rgyud kyi dang du rdzogs// rtsal gyi ye shes rang snang bas// dmigs pa'i yul med rnam par dag // med pa rtsal snang rig pa'i sku// 'dzin med ngo bor rnam par dag/ gsal bzang
188a1(rnying rgyud): thal ngo bar rdzogs// e mgasang ba'i khru blangs pas// ya nas can la rab tu sdung // las rab rdzogs pa'i chos spyan// bya ba thams cad zin pa'o// ba'i sbrul du med pa ste// brjod pa tshig las 'ad la
188a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' brel don dam mun grub dag/ gsang sngags phyag rgya chen po'o// thabs ldan las kyi phyag rgya yis// gsang ba'i yul dang ldan sgor bas// ye shes rtsal la 'gag pa med// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung // don 'byung bsam
188a3(rnying rgyud): spyan gyis grub// ye nas slob med ka dag klong // 'khrul med rgyud dang rang rtags bsten// sangs rgyas lam dang ye shes bstan// rig pa'i gnas dang longs khyod bstan// rang rig zabs dang lam nyid bstan// ye shes su dang sdang ba bstan// 'gyur ba
188a4(rnying rgyud): dang yul rkyen banyan// sanges rgyas sa dang sems can bstan// snang ba'i yul dang rang bzhin bstan// thig le sra dang rang dwags bstan// dgongs pa'i don dang rjes mthun bstan// bde ba'i zhing dang yangs pa bstan// yang dag sbeng ba chos spang snyan/
188a5(rnying rgyud): pa nyid dang rang lus bstan// kun bzung sems dang ye shes bstan// dkyil 'khor lnga dang gzugs su bstan// bslab pa'i dus dang rig pa bstan// ma kha' kye ba yang sa pe sku dang mnyam// tog med gsal bas yang dag rnyed// sangs rgyas ku na khasan
188a6(rnying rgyud): ni// rab tugs ba 'di nyid de// sems can gyi yi theg pa rnams// 'di bstan pa yis mig tu 'gyur// mgrol ba rnams grol bar bshad// ma smin pa rnams smin par bshad// theg chen gsang ba'i don 'dri yis// thams cad pa ra
188a7(rnying rgyud): srol// ye shes thabs kyis don chen rtogs// thabs mkhas pa yi skyes bu yis// don dmad kyi 'khar rang la rdzogs// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsam yas 'grub// sems kyi snang ba bsam me khyab// ye shes snang ba gcig las med/
188b1(rnying rgyud): dran da pa// bsu na ma mngan pas// dun pa man du gas// mamang margyang na u// 'ad mas thams cad tha ba gyur/ / gas bya
188b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgerdzos 'dra dang drug sa da do// byin pa ban pa ba sbyin gyi gnas su' bar rnams pa dag pa'i thabs brtan pa/ nga drug sa sun pab sabu 'a/ mnor ba da/ sa'ag
188b3(rnying rgyud): ga pa nga mugs su baspyad pa/ dge ngan yong bajogapa pa na'i drung ba gi sa 'jogs ldan po'i thud ci/ ste/ thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'du ni ma rdzogs // 'jig nyid lam ba// / pa bang da dang /
188b4(rnying rgyud): nyid du / dang / ma ba/ dang / ma na/ dang / @
188b5(rnying rgyud): tu ba dad/ sa dug na la byed pa'i rgyud yang
188b6(rnying rgyud): ga / ba sa sa
189a1(rnying rgyud): 'das so/ nam ma'i 'od gsal ba'i gzhal yas na/ reg par nga gi su dang / chos nyid dpag pa dgangs pa la thubs cig tu bzugs so// de'i rgya 'dus pa ma chags shin tu mang bar gyur te// de nas bamam
189a2(rnying rgyud): 'das das larlobs pan nyid pa did smranaso// kyibacos pa'i bangs na ming mchen na pa/ 'du gas dab mdang dgal// rlung ba drugasol// gar rdzogs pa/
189a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad du gsol// brten pa lagacung drugasol// snang ba bstan du gsol// zhes rang nang gdon mnor bar smras so// de su com nan dzis 'dus pa chen rdo sa matel gnang nas/ 'khor chen po rnams ba 'dral pa/ in to// khyod kyis thus ba de ga
189a4(rnying rgyud): so// don kyi dgongs pa thugs kyi kyil 'khor ni phyin / gas dgas kyi dgongs pa nyid/ ma nor ba bshA gyi legs pa nyid mi// gsang 'ing kyi khor byin don sa/ shes byung dz+ham 'gag med par gsal la yin pa pan
189a5(rnying rgyud): thagrus rje wa dkri bkol med par gnas pa ste/ ye shes kum khyab kyi sdang ba yul kun la shar nas/ stong pa chen po rang byung gi slong du thim pa'i rtsa/ ye shes kyi lha mi dbyings gas la par byed pa'i rtsen ma la brtag par bya'o// mkhas pas lce zhes rang snang gi bas 'thugs
189a6(rnying rgyud): mon ma gsal bar mthong nas/ don la 'jug go// thabs kyis ring rang gi den mthong bar 'gyur te/ kun da mthu' las so// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs de rnams kyi nang nas/ ye shes kyi namo rgyan rab tu 'bar ma zhes byabs/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye rtse
189a7(rnying rgyud): na 'das nam thol bdag/ myos nyid rtogs par 'dod pa mo// sems can thugs rjes yang dag zung // ma rig mu khang gzhi ma dragasol// zhes zhus so// de nas thugs kyi dbyi sa nas pa 'phrul ba// bas ldan po zhes sgron nyon// rang ba stan legs par yang
