227a1(rnying rgyud): pa mkhyen// rnam snang rang las gzhan snang med// rang byung rang shar rang snang rang gis mkhyen// rang gsal rtse gcig 'gyed pa med// ces gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ shes ra
227a2(rnying rgyud): kyi sku gdul byal sku phyag rgya gsal lugs dang / gdul bya'i bu rdzogs shing mkhyen par 'chang tshul bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// grwa kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // gnas dang
227a3(rnying rgyud): chen por de bshad do// der bzhugs gdan gyi khyad par ni// rtags dang khyad par chos kyi gdan// rtags la rnam pa lngar bshad de// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags// rtsal gsum rdzogs pas seng ge'i gdan// sku gsum chos nyid dang na gnas/
227a4(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur glang chen gdan du bting // dngos med brda yi chos nyid dang la bzhugs// sku gnyis thugs rjes bskyod pa'i rtags// bskyod pa'i shugs 'chang rta mchog gdan// mtshon pa'i brdar byed thugs rje'i shugs kyis bskyod// thugs rjes 'gro la 'tshams
227a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don byed las// mdzes pa'i rma bya gdan du bting // des mtshon dpe yis mthun par sdang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis phrin las thogs med mdzad// de yi rtags su mkha' lding thogs med gdan// de rang ma yin ches mthun mtshon pa'i dpe// dngos su thugs rje
227a6(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan// thabs ma 'gags pa'i ye shes dang // shes rape 'bur ba med pa'i chos nyid gnyis// gnyis med sku dang ye shes gsal// de rtags nyi rna rnam gnyis gdan// brjod tshig sba ste rig pa ye shes dngos// rang rig long na
227b1(rnying rgyud): y-i shar rnams gas pa med// demathar pa lha'i gdan da dngas mad ngan la gyur// zhes gsungasas// thag la kun gas ma tshan po las// bzhugs pa'i gnas dang gdan brgyan pa ste la na nyi shu kya nab na/ danas yang gsang pa'i bdag pas smras pa/
227b2(rnying rgyud): byed com ldan na ji 'chang // gdan gyi rab ngas tshig dang // dkyib dpo rnams gsung drugaso// zhes gus so// ston pas bkrung bral ba// ngab chos nyid 'gyur med yin// dbus pa de las med mong gyi// dbye ba'i blanas mchod na nga // rtags kyi
227b3(rnying rgyud): lanam pa la// tha pa dgadan la rnam pa gnyis nyid ku kying dang chogadon gyi rgyunamatshan pa gas kyi ga // dbyen pa pa gsum yi // rtags dang zad pad gsas// de la kyi
227b4(rnying rgyud): dpa thas pa ga danal bzhugs pa bzhin/ sa ma 'o// dekyi la dang ga dan tha~Md nga sha pa tan pa tham nyi sa/ da ky-i la gas pa'i bdag pas zhus pa/ la nga
227b5(rnying rgyud): gdan ma rdzogs pa'i gas pams// 'khod ci snang pa ltar lags// cho ze'i dkyil 'khor ji ltang lags// dzas 'dug khyong la bshad drugs pa// zhes grangs// brnam lan 'das kyis pazhal thal pa// ngarje chen ba tan mag/ tsham ldan rjem
227b6(rnying rgyud): las// sa snying byams pa g.yas dang g.yon// thugs rnga thabs kyi su ru shar// yum chen sangs rgyas ldan dag las// lA s+ye pu l+le g.yas dang g.yon// thabs dang thabs kyi cha 'dzin dang // shes rab shes rab cha 'dzin pas// ror la yang gnyis gnyis snang /
227b7(rnying rgyud): bu'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gsal// de bzhin rin chen 'gyur ldan las// kun bzang nam mkha'i snying po gnyis// g.yas dang g.yon du shar zhing gsal// mA ma ki las g.yas g.yon du// ma khye hUM we gnyis sugs la// chom bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po
228a1(rnying rgyud): makun snang ba mang sa stsa// sman sa gnag da mdapalan tu/ gagasagasus dad ga gan duganas/ nan sang du smra/ da du// sa sa dang/
228a2(rnying rgyud): gnas/ mthad kyil pa na pag ga/ ma ldan nan yo klub pa'aM/ rgyag na rnaM tha~Mb pa sa// sapa da ga pan rnam pa gas// ma cid dam cag tshul na las/ d+hAgs pa dang ga na/
228a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen mogacig/ yab rnams kun na bzang po la// yum rnams pa te bzang mayin// da yis can pa pa de lab sum gsal// de rnams kyi cho la gu ng+gA'i mtha' las rab 'das shing // d+hag cha mapa' drini rnam par dag pas na// ga skyab pa
228a4(rnying rgyud): pa brgyad// yon tan nal chags bzhi bcuganyis// mtshan dedang ba byud ma lus sngal rdzogs// thugs rnas mngad stong rgyan dang rol pa shA// nam tog mi mnga' tsa yangs yad mnan// ye shishes las can chos kyi spa mang rab// mang dbar rdzogs pa
228a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen// ma 'gags dang byung ye shes gsang // mi 'gyur ba me yi ge drug/ thugs rje sbrul zhwa 'dzin pa'i gzhim 'gags// zhes gsungs so// thig le kun gas pa chen po las/ mongs su 'khor bstan pa skye ba
228a6(rnying rgyud): shrun drug pa'i// / de nas napas bka' ma pa/ des maldan tshig rnams sa ba shad legs par byung // rgyang dang gra na sangs bshad pa'i// ngas sngagasas kyang na de skad bshad// dkyilal po shes su 'byung ba dang // gtsa 'am
228a7(rnying rgyud): zhes su 'byung ba dang // wa ldan rdzogs sbyin zhes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa dang // rigs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa dang // sems dpa' sems ma zhes pa dang / 'dagasapa kyi snang rnas pa dang // mtshad rdzogs rdo rje chang gisazhes pa dang /
228b1(rnying rgyud): mthon mang yang mdar bsdus bstan pa yin// skul mtshan dbus rab brgyan pas// mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang zhes so// 'bod skad thabs gsum ngon gyi khog sdebs la// long+ka bu'i sdang ba de bzhin bshad// ces gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen phra
228b2(rnying rgyud): las// longs sku'i mtshon tshig 'dor bsdus nas bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// sangs rgyas su lnga'i bdag nyid can/
228b3(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// longs spyod rdzogs pa sku yi rgyal// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od gsal ba'i// spyi yi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// rang dang don la ji ltar sbyar// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ spyi yi mtshan
228b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes lnga// byed pa med par rang byung bas// longs sku ye shes 'od kyi sku// grub tshul mtshon tshig bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas sgra lnga'i bdag nyid can// mtshan gyi rnam grangs gtso bos bsdus// rnam snang ba sogs rigs lnga'i sa
228b5(rnying rgyud): me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin// sdang la rang bzhin med pa'i sku// thun mong mtshan dang ldan pa ni// sku re la yang yongs rdzogs pas// thun mong spyi yi mtshan dpe bstan// longs spyod rdzogs pa sku yi tshul// sku yi rngams dong gzi brjid kyis// srul sku'i mtshan ma
228b6(rnying rgyud): zil gnon pa// che ba de yon tan mdor bsdus yin// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od gsal ba// rang dang lha yi don bshad na// sku gcig sku lngar gsal ba rnam par snang mdzad yin// de las 'gyur ba med pas mi bskyod pa// yon tan phyogs med 'byung bas don chen 'byung
228b7(rnying rgyud): ldan yin// dri mas mgos thugs rje'i rtsal snang bas// 'od dpag med de badz+ra sku// gang la thogs med bdag gzhan don grub pas// phrin las mthar phyin don yod grub pa'i sku// yon tan chen po kun tu rgyas pa dang // shes rab rnam gnyis rnam gcod yongs
229a1(rnying rgyud): gcad pas// thugs kyi dang bzhin 'khar ba rtsibs brgyad gsal// sbrul la shAs lnga ldan ma 'gyur mi byed pas// thugs kya rang bzhin rdo mgyur gnas// dab ma 'gyur rang bzhin po 'gag pa // thug man tad thams cad byung
229a2(rnying rgyud): pas na// thugs kyi rang bzhin nor bu rin chen gsal// rang gi ngango bo dri med rnam dag pas// thugs kyi rang bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad gsal// thugs kyi dgongs pas mtha' bzhi las 'das shing // tshad med ye shes phrin las rnam pa bzhis// 'gro don ma lus rdzogs
229a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas// thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje rgya gram gsal// yum ni ye shes snang ba ste// sku mdog phyag mtshan yab dang mthun// gnyis med ye shes 'od du gsal// ma bcos rang bzhin yongs la khyab pa'i dbyings// yum gyur kun du bzang mo'i don dang sbyor//
229a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin mi 'gyur ngo bo 'gag pa med// yum gyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas spyan gyi don dang sbyor// yon tan don bsdus rang bzhin mnyam par sbyor// yum 'gyur bA ma kI yi don dang sbyor// yon tan smin byed rang bzhin kun la dro bas 'od kyi mdangs ldan ma/ dri mas
229a5(rnying rgyud): mgos mos pa so sor sbyor// yum gyi rang bzhin gos dkar mo yi don dang sbyor// rang bzhin paskyod par byed cing mi ldog gnas su sgrol// mi 'da' 'gyur med dang du gnas pas na// dam tshig skos ma zhes kyi don la sbyor// zhes gsungs so// thig pa
229a6(rnying rgyud): kun gsal chen po las// spyi yi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang // rigs lha yab yum don la sbyar ba bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// rtse rtse bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'khor rnams don la
229a7(rnying rgyud): ltar sbyar// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// kye rdo rje 'dzin ma nyon cig/ 'khor gyi rnam grangs mang mod kyang // yab kyi cha 'dzin yab la sbyar// yum gyi cha 'dzin yum la sbyar// yab yum gong du sbyar ba bzhin// zhes gsungs
229b1(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba'i bdag pas zhus pa/ kye kya bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'khor rnams don dang sbyar ba gsungs// zhes lus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// ming skrod chen po'i zhal gzigs pas// me long ye shes don rig pa'i// sa yi steng ba
229b2(rnying rgyud): gyi mtshan// gsal ba'i rten gyur ma skyes byams pa'i don// gzigs pa ma 'gags gsol ba'o// de gnyis dus mtshungs gsal bas lA s+ye kung+ge'i mtshan// rin 'byung chen po'i zhal gzigs pas// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rig pa kun tu ba
229b3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i rten gyur ma skyes nam mkha'i snying po'i don// don gyi dri bsal mA le nu bo'i don// 'od dpag med pa'i zhal gzigs pas// so sor kun rtogs ye shes don rig pa// spyan ras gzigs dang don dang sbyar// gsal ba'i rten gyur ma skyes 'jam dpal don
229b4(rnying rgyud): skye ba'i yum gyur gI te ma// ye shes don rnams so sor bstan// ji ltar bskyed du mar me gsal// don grub chen po'i zhal gzigs pas// bya grub ye shes ngan rig pas// phyag na rdo rje'i don gyi mtshan// gsal ba'i rten gyur ma skyes sgrib pa
229b5(rnying rgyud): rnam sel den// suM bya skyed byed dus des ni d+h+r-i ga N+DI ma// brjod bya mang yang mdor bsdus so// gnyis med dbyings dang ye shes rig pa kun bzang yab yum don// mtha' bzhi las grol bdud bzhi dang gis bcom// sbyin ci log las grol ba'i sgo ba bzhi
229b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes tshad med bzhi mos don mdzad skom bzhi// sku ldang po nyid kyi sku dang drug/ mi 'gags thub pa drug gi don dang sbyor// zhes gsungs so// thig la kun gasngal chen po las// longs su'i 'khor don gyi ngo bo la sbyor bar bstan pa ste le'u d+ha
229b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // longs su shar lugs de ltar na// sprul pa'i phru yi zheng khams 'dir// stan po srod lugs ji lta lags// sprul pa'i sgra rnams
230a1(rnying rgyud): lha shar// zhes zhus sa// ston pas bka skal bya// kyi rdo rje dzin pa nyon mig/ rdzas sku 'ong gyur longs sra bzhi bcu gnyis// dpa gsang las ral par 'gas sprul lnga rnams// gdul bya drug la sa ma #
230a2(rnying rgyud): bar bshad// ces gsungs sa// yang gsang pa'i bdag pos thub pa// skyon pa rtson gzhi de lta na// yaM le khungs rten gang gis bgyis// rtogs pa'i ba~M zhes skar skyes// zhes zhus pa// rten pas sha khyab pa// pad+mad ma lam brten
230a3(rnying rgyud): par// bung ba me tog 'jib pa ltar// u dum+ba ra'i me tog la// reg pa'i ye shes yas zhugs nus nas skyes// zhes gsungs so// par bkar sprub pa/ kye rdo rje 'dzin po nyon cig/ ras len ma myong de'i lus blangs pas/ mthong mamyong pa'i yul
230a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis mthong / shes ma myong ba'i gtam shes/ brjod ma myong ba'i tshig brjod/ de tshe rtogs pa'i shes rab skyes/ zhes gsungs so// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// rtogs pa'i rdzas rab ji ltar skyes// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal
230a5(rnying rgyud): pa// nga nyid chos su rnam dag pas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes shar// longs su ma bskyed lhun rdzogs pas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par shad// da rang sprul pa'i sku yin pas// chos rnams rang byung chen por shar// nga yi gzhi la dbang bzhi
230a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// chu bo chen po bzhi ru bcas// de tshe rang dbang rang gis thob// thugs rje'i sgo lngam 'gags pas// gdul bya'i zhing dag thugs rjes zir// yid kyi rnam shes rang byung bas// shes rab 'byung ba'i gzhi ma 'gags// lce yi rnam shes sa
230a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i skus// tshig rnams rang rang don la sbyor// zhes gsungs so// thig la kun gas pa chen po las/ sprub pa'i sku 'jig rten du byon tshul brtan pa ste'i'u sum du pa // de nas yang gas ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/
230b1(rnying rgyud): ldan no rje 'chang // sgra gsum ngan rnams gaspyang du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ chos kyi sku mdza ba ni phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab dang gnyis su med pa'o// mongs sku 'ang ba na mtshan nyid 'dzin par
230b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes gsal la mi rtog pa'o// rdul sgra'i ngo bo nyid ni thugs rje ma 'gags pa'o// chos sku'i des tshig ni khyab pa dang rten byed pa'o// longs sku'i jim tshig ni zhing dag pa dang / 'khor smin pa longs spyod pa'o// sbal bu'i ngo'i tshig ni/ ma 'gags pa'i
230b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje sna tshogs pa sprul pa'i phyir sprul sgra'o// mthun par snang ba'i phyir sprul pa'i sku'o// ma nges pa'i phyir sprul pa'i sku'o// dbyen chos sku lnga gsum ste/ rig pa ngos bzung dang bral zhing mi 'gyur bas/ chos sku'i chos sku'o// rig pa shes rab kyi sku
230b4(rnying rgyud): lnga mkhyen pa ma 'gags pa/ chos sku'i longs sku/ gdul bya la sdang po'i sku lnga ni/ chos sku'i sbrul sku'o/ rigs kyi bu de la ni ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum zhes kyang bya'o// gzhi la gnas pa'i sku gsum zhes kyang bya'o// 'bram bu gzhel gru bcas
230b5(rnying rgyud): kyang bya'o// sku gsum dza log chen po zhes kyang bya'o// 'bras bu'i ngang la gnas pa zhes kyang bya'o// longs su'i chos su chen po ni/ rnam snang chen po'o// longs sku'i longs su ni rigs bzhi'o// longs sku'i sbrul cu ni/ sems dpa' dang / sems ma rnams
230b6(rnying rgyud): so// rigs kyi bu de rnams la mtshan gyi bye brag/ 'bras bu mngon par gsal ba zhes kyang bya'o// sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes kyang bya'o// longs sku'i sku gsum mo// sprul pa'i sku gsum ni// rigs bzhi chos sku'o// sems dpa' dang sems
230b7(rnying rgyud): ma longs kyu'o// thugs rje'i 'od zer sbrul sku'o// kye sems dpa' chen po de la ni/ thugs rje 'byung ba'i sku gsum zhes kyang bya'o// sku gsum mtha' la bskyal pa zhes kyang bya'o// de rnams rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs la gnas shing ston pa'i don mdzad pas/
231a1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sku gsum zhes bya'o// grwa gsang ba dag nges par zur zhig/ nga rdo rje sems dpa' ni sprul pa'i sku'i chos sku'o// de'i dbu'i thor tshugs dang / mdzod spu'i bu ga dang / shangs kyi rlung sbom la sogs
231a2(rnying rgyud): pa nas byung ba'i sgra/ 'jam dpal dri med gyi mos sogs pa rnams ne/ sprul pa'i su'i longs skye'o// thub pa drug dga' rab rdo rje la sogs pa rnam su ni/ sprul ba'i sku'i sbrul skya'o// zhes gsungs so// thika la kun gsal chen po la s+ye/
231a3(rnying rgyud): gsum bye brag bstan pa ste le'u so gcig pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdagu pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // de mtshon tshig rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon
231a4(rnying rgyud): cig/ kye gsang bdag ngas bstan rgyud lung thams cad du// ngo bo des tshig dbye ba rnam grangs tshig rnams gang byung yang // ngas bstan gong bzhin shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ rnam grangs don rnams
231a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo ni ma byas pa/ ma bcos pa// ma bskyed pa/ mi 'gyur ba/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa/ 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes chen po// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid/ stong pa rdo rje'i
231a6(rnying rgyud): chos can/ rig pa dngos med/ ye shes zad thal chen po'o// rang bzhin ni gzhi gnas kyi ye shes chen po la mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes chen po lnga ma 'gags par ngo bo'i nang nas 'od du gsal ba'o// thugs rje'i snying po sku lnga
231a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya mi 'gag gsal ba'o// rigs kyi bu ngo bo chos kyi sku/ rang bzhin longs sku/ thugs rje sprul sku ste/ thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi ma 'gags par gnas pas/ gzhi la gnas pa'i sku gsum mo// rgyu dag pa chos kyi sku las/ 'bras bu
231b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa gzugs kyi sku gnyis medagasal du gnas pa ni/ yon tan du grub pa ste/ gzhi la grub pa'i sku gsum zhes bya'o// sku gsum nga log ces pa ni/ mtshan nyid sde gsum las dza log ste/ 'dus byas kyi chos ka nas dag pas/ rang
231b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'o// sngags kyi nang las dza log ste/ rig lnga gdul byal sdang ba'i sbrul mU s+t+wa~M/ longs sprul sbrul sru dza log go// rdzogs pa chen po la sogs pa/ spyi thun mong las dza log ste/ bdag gis ma bsgoms/ mi bsgom
231b3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chen po'i dgongs pa dang // mi 'bral bar gnas pa'o// 'dug tshul ji log ste/ myos sgyu yis gzum sku gnyis kyi lus byas te/ bdag med pas ma 'das kyi sku yin pas/ chos srung log go// longs su sbrul sna rang log cing /
231b4(rnying rgyud): sku lo d+ha skur dza log pas na dza log go// rigs kyi bu de ni longs sku man chad nas ltos pa'i brjod tshig gi// de la byed pa med par rang bzhin gyis gnas pas chen po'o// sku gnyis rang gi gzhi'i ngang la gnas pa na/ 'bras bu'i ngapa la gnas pas/
231b5(rnying rgyud): don 'gyur ba med par gnas par bya'o// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ rnam snang la longs sku'i chos skur bzhag pa ni/ rnam snang la rigs bzhi 'byung zhing / rnam snang gi yon tan gyis khyab pa ste/ rigs bzhi'i gzhi ma'am shes kyar gyur pa'o//
231b6(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi yang yang rnam snang gi thugs rnam par dag pa la longs spong / mar 'khor du smin pa sems dpa' dang sems ma longs spyod pa'o// des na rigs bzhi'i longs su'o// de las thugs rje'i bye brag mi 'dra ba mkhyen pas/ sems dpa' dang sam
231b7(rnying rgyud): mar sprul bu'o// de bzhin chos sku'i sku gsum gyi bzhag lugs dang / sprul pa'i sku'i sku gsum gyi bzhag lugs kyang shes par bya'o// spu'i che ba yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ gdul bya 'khor smin pa rnams la yang mngon par snang bas/
232a1(rnying rgyud): ga dusags / nan gas spyan / pas/ shA gas// sa dgas 'anal 'ad /
232a2(rnying rgyud): par bzhag par// chos ste gan kyis rgyam tshag mi mang 'gazigs pa/ zhal gyi ba nas smig drug 'od cing du rdzas pas/ ma tha~M \u0f7fba sreg brtan/ nga pa dang / 'gro ga 'i gan / phreng ba dag gan
232a3(rnying rgyud): pas/ thugs rje 'byung ba'i sngags sa ni// thugs rnam lus par gcig las 'byung ba'i gyur ro// de sems can gyi na dngas su mdzad pas na sprul b.ranaH/ 'grab 'dul ba'i gragasam ma// ma gnyis pas la pa'i thuH/ tshal lam
232a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje ltar snang ba'o// de rnams ni chos kyi sku zhes pa dang / longs sra zhes pa dang / thul ga zhes pa dang / zug rdzogs pa dang / mgan pa zhes pa dang / dpal zhes pa dang / skabs zhes pa dang / ston pa zhes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sngon ma zhes pa'i dong bsdus nas
232a5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// thig le ban gsal chen po las/ sbags ma'i rgyan tshig dang / sku rnam grangs mdor bsdus nas bstan pa ste le'u mo gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag gis zhus pa/
232a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje 'chung // su gsum ma nAs sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas rab ngas tshig dang // dbye ba mtshan gyi rnam grangs gsungs// zhes zhus so// ston pal bkang stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ sangs rgyas bo ni dri ma med pa'i
232a7(rnying rgyud): shes sa// nges tshig ni nyon mongs pa'i drims nga shing / mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyas pas na'o// dbyen gnyis te/ gzhi ldan grub dang / rtogs pa mngon sum zhes bya'o// de yi ni gong gi gzhong don de'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas na/ sangs rgyas zhes
232b1(rnying rgyud): chos sus yangs su la'achad cing / ngas srul sku la snyan pa ste/ sbrul sbas 'gro ba la 'chad cing / snyan pa'i phyir daston pa'o// rtags pa'i shes rab kyis log par rtog pa'i bdud bcom pa/ mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa ste/ gzung
232b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mtha' las 'das pas na/ bcom ldan 'das so// de ltar mkhyen pas na/ rtogs pa bdag gi dpal lo// kun la don de 'chad pas na/ thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo// 'gro ba'i mun pa sel bas na sgron ma'o// zhes gsungs so//
232b3(rnying rgyud): thig le kun gsal chen po las/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang / mtshan mdor bsdus pa ste le'u so gsum pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // ts+tshas su'i
232b4(rnying rgyud): bdud bcom ji ltar lags// longs sku'i bdud bcom ji ltar lags// skal su'i bdud bcom ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ chos su skye med 'gag pa med pas 'chi bdag gi bdud
232b5(rnying rgyud): bcom/ mtshan ma med pas phung po'i bdud bcom/ de gnyis su med pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang lha'i bu'i bdud bcom/ de ni ngang gis bcom pa yin/ srog med sku lngas 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom/ ye shes sgyu mas phung po'i bdud bcom
232b6(rnying rgyud): sams rtog med kyis nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang lha'i bu'i bdang btsam/ dza rje sems dpa' sprul pa'i sgras/ chos mya don ldan rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud btsam/ nyon mangs bdud dang lga'i bu'i bdud kyang de bzhin btsab/ phongs bu'i
232b7(rnying rgyud): ldan rtogs pas phung po'i bdud btsam/ zhes gsungs so// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ chos bu'i ldan lpags ji ltar lags// longs su'i ldan lugs ji ltar lags// srul grwa'i ldan lugs ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so//
233a1(rnying rgyud): ston pas bka'astsal pa/ ga tanan yangs // bag/ 'a smral// langs sum can dang dab zang ldan// dgongs pa ma shes lnga dang ldan// man par shes pa sa rdun lam/
233a2(rnying rgyud): sku rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul ldan// zur tsam bsdus nas bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ lha gsum 'das lugs ji ltar lags/ zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ chos sku mtha' rnams ku
233a3(rnying rgyud): las 'das// langs sku gzung 'dzin 'khor ba'i chos las 'das// skul sku shes rab chen po thugs rje'i thabs ldan pas// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi mtha' la mi gnas 'das/ 'das lugs mang yang bsdus nas bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs
233a4(rnying rgyud): so// yang gsang ba'i bdage pos zhus pa/ chos sku'i sangs rgyas ji ltar lags// longs su'i sangs rgyas ji ltar lags// sbrul sra'i sangs rgyab ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ mos phram che ne ma'i chos dang gnyis su
233a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba thams cad sangs// rang gsal gnyis med ye shes rgyas// longs sku 'khor ba'i chos rnams sangs// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / skra yi che ba'i yon tan rgyas// skal sku ma rIg log rtog sangs// 'khor bar rang rgyud sdang bsangs//
233a6(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs dang thugs rje rgyas// zhes gsungs so// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ sku gsum dri ma ji ltar dag/ zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ chos sru ngo bo nyid kyi dri ma dag/ longs su shes bu'i dri ma dag/ spel su nyon
233a7(rnying rgyud): mongs dri ma dag/ ces gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ sku gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das dang / sangs rgyas dang / dri ma dag tshul bstan pa ste le lus bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gas raba'i bdag pos zhus pa/
233b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// sku gsum thugs rnga ma 'gags pas// 'gro don mdzad lugs ji ltar lags// zhes zhus sa// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dang babyis pa lo brgyad lon pa'i tshad du skyes so// de nas lo brgyad kyi bar du
233b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyi srog shing la/ ye shes lnga'i 'khor lo nang du bskor nas/ rtogs pas bdag bsgral te/ dgongs pa nyid la grol lo// de nas lnga brgyad kyi bar du sprul pa mang du phyur nas 'gro ba'i don byas te/ lhag nas dang ngor 'khor rnams kyi sdug
233b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal gyi gdung ba bsal te/ rin po che'i dar skud la/ mu tig gi phreng ba brgyus nas/ 'khor lo phyir bskor te/ thugs rjes gzhan bskal ba'i phyir/ ldem po'i don la dgongs nas/ theg pa thun mong pa rnams bshad do// de nas tshe ring bor ba'i
233b4(rnying rgyud): rtse mo la/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa nges par mthong nas/ snang ba stong pa'i chos rnams bshad do// de nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ rgyud chen po gsang ba rmad du byung ba rnams/ thugs las bkrol/ mgur gyi bum par dril/ ljags kyi pad+ma las
233b5(rnying rgyud): kyang bsgyur/ yon tan sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa la bkram/ rig pa'i khu byug gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa gcig tu bshad de/ 'khor gyi blo'i the tshom dang smos pa bcad do// lo nyi shu rtsa bzhin/ mya ngan las 'da' kar zhal tshams
233b6(rnying rgyud): rnam gsum bshad de rjes 'jug gi don du ngas thig le kun gsal dang kun 'dus gnyis bshad de/ nga'i rjes su ni gzhol/ nga dang 'phrar ba'i sprul ba med pa rnams kyi don du ni bzhag go// nga'i sku gsum gyi gdung rten de bzhin du bzhag nas/ nga yongs
233b7(rnying rgyud): sum ngan las 'das so// rjes ma 'ongs pa'i don du de skad spros shig/ ces gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ sbrul sku'i don mdzad lugs bstan pa ste le'u so lnga pa'o// / de nas yang ston pas mtshon pa
234a1(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgangs pa la bzhugasas// de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye bcom ldan thabs kyi bdag/ rnam pa'i don la dgongs pa yi// theg brgyad do// rnams gsung
234a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes zhus so// rin po che'i mchod rten pang rim dgu pa'i steng nas ston pa g.yu'i bu khu brang // skad lan bzhir 'angan pa'i man ngag/ sarba yAn pra ga ra du pa yA/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rtse gyi gsang ba
234a3(rnying rgyud): legs par zung zhig/ nga dang nga yi sprul pa yis/ thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi/ 'khor du gyur pa'i gdul bya rnam pa gnyis la/ ldem dgongs gnyis su bstan pa yi/ ldem po'i blta ba 'di lta ste/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems dpa' dang /
234a4(rnying rgyud): yog sde gsum bskyed rdzogs gnyis/ bden pa phyogs ra ngos bzung nas/ gza' gtad bcas pa'i ltab brgyad/ blo yul gnyis kyi mur 'dzin pas/ rang rig ye shes la me zlos/ de bas phyin ci log pa yin/ don la nyams dang ga
234a5(rnying rgyud): phye zhe 'dod po yi blta ba yin// kye gsang ba'i bdag rje// zhe 'dod chas pa'i lta ba brgyad// gang zag bdag med rtogs kyang nyid ba ma spangs// chos kyi bdag ni gzung 'dzin gnyis su snang // 'dzin pa'i rgyan rtog
234a6(rnying rgyud): cig 'dagags// rtag chad gnyis las 'das pa ltar// dper na chu bo gang gA bzhin// gzung ba bran rdzob phang bsal nas// don dam rdul ldan rdzas su 'ad// dper na ga yag rjen sing bzhin// mdo rje me brag rnami gnyis 'dod// nyan thos
234a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod yin pas na// gnyis med 'de men don dang 'gal// gang zag bdag med gong mthun ngas rtogs nas// chos kyi khams la phyogs gcig bdag med pa// de nyid mtshan ma ngas 'dzin pa// rang rgyal na 'dod b.la' yin/
234b1(rnying rgyud): mad 'ad chen don mas dgal// bdag gnyis bral bar bal zhing bden gnyis tshul du 'dod// don dam sems su blta ba dang // sems las 'das par blta ba dang // kun rdo bslar ba mi 'debs pa/ dper na mil ma smig rgya bzhin// b+ha
234b2(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa'i blta ba yin// gnyis med pade chen ye shes don la grol// mi tog skye 'gag brel ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // sems dpa' rnam gnyis rje dang bran du lta// gr-i ya'i lha bzhi 'dod pas// kun bzang 'di chen dran dang
234b3(rnying rgyud): 'gal// mi rtog dang las ma g.yos skye 'gag bral bzhin du// sems dpa' rnam gnyis spun dang grogs por blta// u pa yo ga'i lta bzhi 'dod pas// dbyer med bde chen ye shes don dang 'gal// ma skyes 'gag pa med cing mi rtog g.yo
234b4(rnying rgyud): ba med bzhin du// khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mor rabalta// ma hA zhe 'dod mtshan ma'i su ru 'dzin// spos bral bde' chen po'i don las gol// ma g.yos mi rtog skye 'gag med bzhin du// dbyings dang ye shes lha dang lha por 'dzin// a na?'i
234b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod lta ba yin// dngos mod zang thal rang snang bde chen don las gol// zhes gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ zag pa brgyad kyi grub mtha' bstan pa ste le'u so drug pa'o// / de nas yang gas
234b6(rnying rgyud): bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // theg brgyad lta ba gsungs pa ste// dgongs pa nyams su ji ltar len// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung zhig/ dmi
234b7(rnying rgyud): gtad bcas pa'i bgos pa brgyad// rtsol ba zla yi yul bzung bas// rtsol bral blo las grol ma rtogs// de bsgom pa shes 'dod pa pa sgoms// de yang ji ltar bsgo bzhin// nyan thos pa ni 'di ltar bsgoms// rang lus rdos bcas phung po la/
235a1(rnying rgyud): gtsang rdzas su 'du shes bskyed// rnam par sngo dang bam pa dang // rul pa myags par bsgom pa ste// gzugs lung zhin pa'i mtha' las zlog// zhi gnas yan lag bcu gnyis ldan// tshogs drug yul dang rtog pa spang //
235a2(rnying rgyud): rang rgyal 'dod pa 'di ltar bsgom// dang po ma rig la sogs nas// tha ma rga shi la zug bsgom// rang gi dpral bar sems gtad de// keng dus dkar po mneb long tsam/ de la sems 'dzin brtan pa dang // de las mched nas keng rus blta/
235a3(rnying rgyud): de nas rim pas 'gag par bsgom// byang sems 'dod pa 'di ltar bsgom// de yang blo yi 'dod pa yis// sems tsam sems nyid rang gsal bsgom// dbu ma bden pa dbyer med nam mkha'i dkyil ltar bsgom// kri ya'i 'dod pa 'di ltar bsgom
235a4(rnying rgyud): stong pa la sogs sngon song nas// rigs gsum phyag rgya ldan par bsgom// yo gA'i zhe 'dod 'di ltar bsgom// byang chub rnam lnga sngon song nas// sum cu rtsa bdun phyag rgya bzhi ldan bsgom// ma hA yo ga'i sbom pa ni// ting 'dzin rnam gsum
235a5(rnying rgyud): ston song ba'i// zhi khro rab 'byams bsgom par byed// phyag rgya bzhi ldan bsgom pa'i mchog/ a ru'i zhe 'dod sgom pa ni// snying po tshig tsam brjod pa sngon song nas// phung po lha yaM phyag rgya bzhi// dper na chu las chu bur dang /
235a6(rnying rgyud): tsha tshe brkos phor nus bton bzhin// skad cig ma las gsal bar bsgom// bsam gtan yan lag sngon song nas// dngos gzhi bye brag de ltar bsgom// dgos ched mthar phyin 'bras bu thob// ces gsungs so// thig le
235a7(rnying rgyud): kun gsal chen po las/ theg pa brgyad kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u so bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rang rang don la bsgom dus su// spyod pa'i
235b1(rnying rgyud): byA brag ji ltar spyad// ces zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa res zung zhig/ thag brgyad rang gi spyod pa brgyang // sdug bskul rtsong bsgrub bcas par spyod// klod pa blang dor med par ma rtogs pas// thun mong ma kyar zlang /
235b2(rnying rgyud): drodor spyod// nyan thos spyod pa'i khyad par ni// ma byin len dang me tshangs spyod// srog gcod pa rnams spangs pa ste// lus kyi spyod pa rnam par dag/ ngag gi spyod pa dag pa ni// rdzun dang ngag 'khyal phra ma dang // zhegacod tshig rnams med par spyod// yid
235b3(rnying rgyud): kyi spyod pa dag pa ni// brnab sems gnod sems log lta bral ba yi// dge ba bcu rnams rang gi don du spyod// rang rgyal ba yi spyod pa ni// rdzu 'phrul ya ma zung 'ga' yis// 'gro don shas tsam spyod par byed// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa ni//
235b4(rnying rgyud): tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi// gtso ru gzhan gyi don du spyod// kri yA dag gi spyod pa ni// phyi nang rdzas gsum dag par spyod// yo ga dag gi spyod pa ni// phrin las rnam pa bzhi dag dang // kho na bzhi nyid spyod pa byed// ma hA yo ga'i spyod pa ni// thabs
235b5(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis sgo nas// 'gro don mtha' ru phyin par spyod// a nu yo ga'i spyod pa ni// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis su// dbyings dang ye shes rnam pa gnyis// gcig la gcig rdzogs yongs su spyod// ces gsungs so// thig le kun
235b6(rnying rgyud): gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ theg pa brjod kyi spyod pa bstan pa ste le'u so brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// ston pa thugs rje thabs kyi bdag/ de yi 'jug sgo bsrung mtshams dang // sgrub pa'i thabs
235b7(rnying rgyud): rnams ji ltar lags// so so'i 'bras bu ji ltar smin// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa ras zung zhig/ zhugs nas de mthun spyod pa ni// so so'i 'jug sgo spyod par bslu// lta ba'i don la mi 'da' bar// so so'i
236a1(rnying rgyud): dpe ga lta ba ban// sos gas pa bsgrub pa'i mchog/ debs nyid dang 'grus par // zag pasapa'i 'bras zin// mas tu gyung pas 'grus bya nachog/ nyan pas dag gi 'bras pan// / sram thod pa
236a2(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin pas// 'bras bu zung bzhi lnga brgyad sprin// rang rgyal dag gi 'bras bu yang // la/ nam pyong pa mthar phyin pas// dgongs pa 'bras bu rnam gnyis thobo// dper nan tsob ga ru bzhin// byang byams dag gi 'azas bu yang // sto ba
236a3(rnying rgyud): pa spyod pa rnams// mngon gyur sa bcu rim sbyangs nas// kun tu 'od la gnas par 'dod// kri yA'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa ni// rang gi lha sgom dogs chod pas// rigs gsum skra gsum ngo bor 'dod// dza 'dzin pa'i sa rlon pa'o// yo
236a4(rnying rgyud): dag gi 'bras bu ni// lha sgom spyod pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ sum cu rtsa bdun mngon rdzogs te// sku gsum rang bzhin lhun grub pa'o// ma hA yo ga'i 'bras bu ni// lta ba la sogs mngon gyur nas// phyag rgya chen por mngon rdzogs pas// bcu bzhi rdo
236a5(rnying rgyud): rje 'dzin pa'i sa la mngon gyur to// a nu dag gi 'bras bu ni// lta ba dag gi dgos pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa chen po// ma chags pad+ma can gyi sa la gnas// zhes gsungs so// spos thal don gsas las cu gcib can tu dzin
236a6(rnying rgyud): dang ngog yayul ma chags brlanan spyang pas dpyad/ thig le kun gsal chen po las/ theg pa so so'i 'bras bu dang / 'jug sgo bsung mtshams sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u so dgu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom
236a7(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chang // theg brgyad lta sgom spyod pa dang // 'bras bu mthar phyin de ltar na// yang dag nges pa'i lta ba gang // zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nges zung zhing // bltar med lta ba'i don bstan pa// a ti'i
236b1(rnying rgyud): lta ba gzang gtad bral// dngos med ye shes zang thal bas// dang rig ye shes ldan gyis dzub// de las ma gtogs gzhan med pas// saso rang dag ye shes la// cer sbyang ye shes chen po'i gdangs// ye nyid bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang //
236b2(rnying rgyud): de bas gzhi snang rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas yul med gzung 'dzin rnam par dag/ rang rig ye shes rang gi gdangs la zhugs// 'byung bzhi rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// chos nyid dag pa'i nam mkha' ye nas khyab// chos nyid don gyi nam
236b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' la// rang rig ye shes nyi ma shar// phyogs ris med par kun tu gsal// yid kyi rnam rtog ci 'gyu yang // ma pang mtsho la gser gyi nya mo rgya// ma 'gags rang bzhin med pa'i don// bltas shing gsal ba mthong rnyed bral// phyi nang
236b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka phyi nyid nang // zab mo cha shas rtog yul bral// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// byis pa'i skye bo rnams la ljang mod kyi// lta ba rang rig ye shes dngos med zang thal la// dngos po mtshan ma'i sgrib pa ye nas rnam par dag/ kun bzang
236b5(rnying rgyud): zhal ni phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs// yum gyi b+ha ga bde klod gcig tu 'khyil// de bas khams gsum ma lus thig le chen po gcig gi dang // lta ba rnam dag rang rig ye shes la// sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med// sems can
236b6(rnying rgyud): med pas khams dang 'byung ba med// man shel sku ltar rang rig rgyud dag pas// dri med zang thal dag pa chos kyi sku// sa chu me rlung nam mkhar snang ba yang // ma rtogs blo la mtshan mar sdang mod kyi// sdang la rang bzhin med de ye shes gdangs su shar/
236b7(rnying rgyud): dper na mkha' la 'anga' tshon gsal ba yang // mkha' las logs na med kyang logs ltar snang // nam mkha'i dang na gnas shing mkha' dang ni phyed ltar// chos nyod chos sku dbyer med don gyi nam mkha' la// rang shar rang snang rang gsal ya
237a1(rnying rgyud): shes na dang // man shing dag bad // gsapas nag pa 'an na/ sa na// lan pa gnyis ma
237a2(rnying rgyud): sa dang rnam thar byang chub mchog la dring // bgrod du med nga chos nyid byang chub mchog/ bgrod par 'dod na ye shes mtha' la ring // ma bsags bzhin du cho ga gnyis ye nas rdzogs// ma stangs bzhin du sgrib gnyis yenas byang // ma byung ma
237a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// dgod pa lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom mi dgos// dkyil 'khor lo gnye cha lugs kyis// khro bdag chen po'i lha bskyed nas// sku gsung shugs kyi bzlas pa dag/ rba ba'i rgyun ltar bzlas na yang // rang rig ye shes rgyab kyi
237a4(rnying rgyud): ye nas byas zin bya mi dgos// ched du byar med ched du dgag tu med// mar me'i snying po rang gi 'od la gnas pa ltar// rang rig ye shes rang gi gdangs la gnas// 'das dang ma byon da lta sangs rgyas dang // gnyis med ro gcig chu la chu bzhag bzhin// zhes
237a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba ma nor bar bstan pa ste le'u bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje sems// bsgom du yod med bye brag
237a6(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pas des zung zhing // ngas bstan gnyis med bde chen la// bsgom du yod med tha snyad rnam par dag/ shes rab stobs can rang rig don rtogs pas// gnyis med bde che
237a7(rnying rgyud): ngang du 'du 'bral med// ma btsal bzhag pas ngang las ma g.yos gsal// rgyan chad med pas chu bo gang gA bzhin// dbang po yang rangab don du de bstan no// rten gyi gang zag shes rab 'bring rnams la// mi bsgom sgom par bstan pa yin// rnal
237b1(rnying rgyud): 'byor shes rab rtsal chung la// ma bsgoms sangs mi rgya bar bstan// kye gsang bdag des zung zhig/ pad+ma 'dam na gnas kyang skyon gyis ma gos ltar// phyi dang 'khrul pa shar kyang ni// rang rig ma 'khrul ye nas gos pa med// ma 'khrul pa
237b2(rnying rgyud): yi sangs rgyas yin// rigs kyi bu gzhi dag pa chos kyi sku la 'bras bu dag pa gzugs kyi sku gnyis kyis brgyan nas/ don sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa ni/ bum pa'i nang ge mar me ltar// ye shes nang na rab tu gsal ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzugs kyi phung po
237b3(rnying rgyud): da kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na/ sku gsum gyi rang bzhin gdangs 'gag pa med pa/ ye shes kyi gzhal med khang yang 'od du gsal lo// de'i nang na sku bzhi sku gsung thugs dang ldan te/ rang bzhin rnam par dag
237b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor/ 'gag pa med par gnas so// de'i thugs rje he ru ka lngar snang la mi 'gag pas/ thugs rje rang pung gi dkyil 'khor te/ de ltar gnas pa ni ma 'khrul pa'i sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu ma 'khrul pa'i sangs rgyas la/ ma
237b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos nyid bstan pa ni/ thugs kyi me long yin te/ dper na zag bcas kyi phung po 'di/ byas pa'i me long gis gtan la 'bebs pa ltar/ zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'gag pa med par gsal pa/ kun gzhi me long lta bu'i ye shes gsal la dag pa/
237b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi ma 'gags pa'i don/ mgar ba'i lag gi 'du byed kyis ma byas par/ snang ba mtha' yas kyi thugs kyi klong nas/ rang byung du rang shar ba'i shel kyi mchod rten khri 'phang lnga pa thugs kyi me long du gyur pa de/ brda' bstan pa
237b7(rnying rgyud): tshe/ zag bcas kyi sgrom bus/ zag med ci ye shes mi thub par/ thugs/ ye shes kyi me long la ji lta ba bzhin du snang ba'o// de'i 'khrul gzhi man ngag gi ti ka chen pos gtan la phab pa'o// don de rang byung gi ye shes chen po yin pas/ du
238a1(rnying rgyud): gsum du gyur ma myong te/ mi gyur bang nga bathong na la chen par// da ni 'khrul pa log nas ya shas skye ba de kho na nyid kyi tig rgyan pal// de ni rtags kyi sgon mas ma 'gyur ba gzer gdang pa'o// lung gi tig ldan papa dang
238a2(rnying rgyud): la sbyar ro// bdag nyid chen pos de kho na nyid kyi ti ka la gzhi bca'o// de'i don rtogs nas bsgom du med de yon tan no// de yang rang zas su gnas pas 'du 'bral med do// yul dang yul can bsgom bya dang sbom byed/ dngos po dang mtshan mar dmigs su
238a3(rnying rgyud): med de/ dper na gar sprin la sbrang ma'i 'dab ma chags pa lta bu'o// chos nyid kyi don tha mal gyis mi rtogs pas// so so skye bo'i tha mal gyis mi go ste/ gong ltar rtogs dgos pas/ yongs su med de skyon can no// nges par rtogs can/ yengs
238a4(rnying rgyud): pa med de yon tan no// yengs pa med pa ni/ 'dug kyang chos nyid rang snang gi ngang las ma g.yos tsam du 'dug/ 'gro yang ye shes kyi rang gdangs la/ rang bzhin ma 'gags pa tsam du 'gro ste/ mar me'am nyi ma dang snang dang chas nas 'gro ba bzhin no//
238a5(rnying rgyud): nyal yang dang las ma g.yos pa'i klong / rig pa zang thal gyi ngang na rtsal gzhi la 'dus te/ rang bzhin gzhi la thim/ mtshan ma rang sar grol/ don la 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ro// langs kyang dang las ma g.yos pa las/ rig pa rang shar te/ rang bzhin
238a6(rnying rgyud): ma 'gags par gsal lo// kye rigs kyi bu legs par yid la zung zhig/ spyod lam rnam bzhi ni spyad kyang rang gi gdang ma las be 'da' zhing / chos nyid dang las pa g.yos pa/ dper na bya yis gar 'phur kyang mkha' las 'da' sa med/ nya yis/
238a7(rnying rgyud): gar 'byos kyang chu las 'da' ba med pa dang / mi yis gar phyin kyang sa las mi 'da' ba bzhin/ rnal 'byor rtogs ldan dang pas g.yos pa med/ rigs kyi bu bsgom bya ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni logs na med de/ rang rig
238b1(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku kho na'o// shar ba thams cad ni rang shar te/ rig pa chos su stong pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / de gnyis dbyer med pa dang / da ltar shes pa'i shes rab mi 'gag pa dag / de la thog pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid sngar shar ro// de lnga ye shes sngar shA
238b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes la 'ong du shar ro// 'od lnga rigs ljang shar ro// rigs lnga sgo lngar shar ro// mu lnga yum lnga mi 'gag so// yab yum wa la sems dpa' dang sems ma yi 'gag go// sems ma rnams la yul du shar ro// ser ma dbang rnams
238b3(rnying rgyud): la dbang po dang rnam shes su shar // de ni rig pa rang shar gyi dgongs pas// sdang ba la rgyas btab ste/ rang snang gi ye shes las gzhan sdang gi rtog pa med do// 'gags pa'i dus su mtshan ma rang grol gyi dgongs pas rtsal gzhi la 'dus te yul
238b4(rnying rgyud): lnga sgo lnga'i ngang du thob/ sgo lnga sems dpa' dang sems ma'i ngang du grol/ sems dpa' sems pa rigs lnga yang yum gyi ngang du grol/ de lnga yang ye shes lnga'i ngang du grol/ ye shes lnga yang rig pa'i mtshan nyid lngar grol/ mtshan nyid lnga rig pa
238b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med rang gsal du grol/ dbang po gnas sdud kyi man ngag te// 'byung ba ma la zha/ ye shes dbyings su thim pa'o// de ltar grol nas ngang las ma g.yos pa ni/ shes bya bum par chud pa ste/ chos nyid chos sku dbyer med zang thal gyi
238b6(rnying rgyud): bum pa na/ rang rig pa'i ye shes mar me rlung gis mi bskyod pa ltar gsal bas/ shes bya bum 'jug gi man ngag/ gte mug gnyid la sogs pa/ shes rab kyi don de kho na nyid la dbyar pa'o// thams cad 'byung yang rang las 'byung / sdang yang rang
238b7(rnying rgyud): las sdang / gsal yang rang las gsal te/ dag cing grol yang rang gi ngang da grol bas na/ ye shes rang dag chen po'o// de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sdang ba rang sdang las gzhan sdang med pa'o// sprin dang khu rlangs byung yang / nam mkha' rang las byung //
239a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba nam ma lang dang pa snang // gnas kya napa mkha dang la gnad// dag kyang nam mkhang dang dudag/ sa kyang rnamamapa ngang duthos bu 'ang/ zhes gsamaso// zhig la kun gas rgya
239a2(rnying rgyud): po las// bsgom du yod med blo dang sbyar bang bstan pa dang / blo 'bring la rkun g+hi ting nge 'dzin gtan tshigs dang bcas pa bstan pa ste le'u bzhi bcun gcig pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos zhus pa/ #
239a3(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chung // bsgom du yod pa bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ blo zhan rnams la bsgom pa bstan// bsgom du med par ma shes na// mtshor yid la byed pa dang //
239a4(rnying rgyud): 'das par mi rtogs te// rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis don mi rnyed// bsgom du yod par ma shes na// skye bo rnams dang khyad par med// tha mal dang mya dgol bar 'gro// me bsgom bsgom pa'i don shes pas// sangs rgyas nyag gcig ngan dang 'du
239a5(rnying rgyud): 'bral med// bsgom la mi bsgom don shes pas// dmigs gtad blo yi mtha' yas log/ gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas// phyogs ris 'dzin pa'i mtha' dang bral// bsgom du yod pa'i don bstan pa// bslab zabs bslab bya las
239a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshad// rnam pa gsum du bsdus la bstan// bslab thabs rnam pa gsum du bstan// gyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o// gyi ni lus ngag yid gsum stong // b+ha ba btang la bsdad pa yid// nang ni rtsa yi rlung sgo bsnam// rang byur dbyings kyi thig
239a7(rnying rgyud): le las// dang po lus kyi srid pa chags// de las yar mang rtsa gnyis chags// rtsa gnyis 'dus nas rtsa mdung lte bar gyur// de nas gya bran rnams kyis lus byings bsgred// de nas snying la sogs pa'i nang khrol rgyas// de la dbugs yod
239b1(rnying rgyud): da smon pa tag shing // dab tus rtags mig san sa// co klung dang mang yin gyis ram rtag ma byed cing // rtags sa bskul bas danas rig pa'i rtsa ba mi na// chas dang ma 'phrog pa rlung dang sar ba // sa ba sams nga na
239b2(rnying rgyud): de dus la gyur / sa la nas 'i gang sa// kyi na na/ nga du nga/ dubs pa shA
239b3(rnying rgyud): bzhig pa dang / tshad du 'ang bdang // dpe rnams cham la dbub pa dang // thugs kyis das/ gyibacom ldan du 'dzin pa lags par byu ga// rnam pa ni nga pacos kyirnagabya hU~M
239b4(rnying rgyud): pa dag pa'i nam mkha'i yul du byung ba/ don ni dbyings kyi thig le yul sdang ba 'di'o// de nyid kyi ngan pag dang bral ba de// dbyer sa rnam par dag pa rig pa'i ye shes bzhugs pa'i gdan na/ de ltar byang chub sems kyi rlon mni/ dz+ha'i
239b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dra dag cingags pa ga la bya'o// de yang 'du ga zul gyis gnas pa dang / snang tshul gyis 'grams pas/ dper naH/ khwag nas thag gi nang na gnas bcas nas/ rdo po rjod bya bya na// dbang bzhin du dag pa'i ya shes
239b6(rnying rgyud): ched pa zhugs / na da rtags la ma ma ldan// ngan gi zhim sangs pa shas gas bcing bab po// dpas sh+tha na pa par dag pa'i bags tsun pa / rang ma gang dupa
239b7(rnying rgyud): tha 'od drugs la bas // gdan de la bzhugs pa'i la shes kyi snang ba ni// ye shes chen po'i theg le ma 'gags par gas pa pa // pa gyis kyi snying po rig par gnas shing dag pa sa ma zhes gas papas/ lhun gyis grong
240a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan mdang nam rtog 'joms pa'o// de ltar mi 'gyur bar gnas shing rang snang las gzhan snang med pa 'o// nga ni lhun gyis grub pa'i rdeg ma ste/ ngan sdang btum blor bstanan/ mthong tha rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' na/
240a2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dag pa'i rang gdangs yin/ de'i ngo bo dag pa dang / mthong byed chu'i sgron ma ni/ chos nyid dag pa'i ye gdangs so// rig pa yul la shar ba ni/ ye shes dag pa'i ther gdengs so// kye mnam mkha' dag pa'i nga gdungs ni/ mtshan mo'i
240a3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' lta bu'o// chos nyid dag pa'i yi ga dngas ni/ nam langs pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'o// ye shes chen po'i zer gdangs ni/ nam mkha' la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'o// rgyal po gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ spos bral gyi dbyings 'gyur med kyi dang
240a4(rnying rgyud): nas rig pa ye nas dag pa ste/ de las ma g.yos par bzhag go// 'chi bdag bdud kyi sgo nas/ ye shes kyi rlung rgya ba'i rtsa gsum gnas pas/ de gsum btsun te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa la zug pa med pa dang / mtshan ma la mi
240a5(rnying rgyud): gnas pas/ spyan nam mkha'i dbyings su blta ste/ rtsa ba'i rlung sgo bsdam mo// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi bar na gnas pas/ spyan par snang du blta'o// mgrin pa cung zad gcu ste/ dpung ba'i
240a6(rnying rgyud): khar og ma bzhag go// rtsa gsum rlung gi chu srang bcad pa'o// lha dang mi'i bsam gtan dang sems 'dzin ni/ mtshan ma shas che bas/ gong ma gnyis po bas dpa' ste/ stan sbal blta'o// de ni mgrin ba cung zad bkug ste/ oM ga ma thang la
240a7(rnying rgyud): dag la khang du gyur// 'a rdus po gdin pa bzhugs shing / gdan du bting ba'i thabs so// ngas rig pa rtsub po dang 'dra ste rang sa zen par// blon po ni sems te/ rig pa'i rtsal drung thog tum sha rang sa/ rtog bcas su men/
240b1(rnying rgyud): drag na dbang na bla pa bcad du zan pas/ gras zla dang ba bzad pa'an pa pas bu// lus dang mthal bar dbugs yod / rig pas te ya pas bla pa gzung // brtso na pa dang ste/ rtag dung rgya yangu la lham nus pa // rna
240b2(rnying rgyud): 'bangs dang 'dra ste las byed pa yin/ dus der gsal la rtog pa med pa'o// des ni 'bangs cham la phebs pa lta bu'o// kye kye rigs kyi bu bsrab par bya ba ni// rang dang rang bzhin pa dag nyid chen po'o// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' dang // chos
240b3(rnying rgyud): nyid dag pa'i nam mkha' gnyis// rtog dang bral ba'i rig pa gsum// dbyer med stong zhing me rtog pas// ma bcos pa yi rang zhes bya'o// rang rig ye shes gsal ba dang // 'byung bzhig dngas su shar ba gnyis// rang bzhin ma 'gags ye shes
240b4(rnying rgyud): gdangs// gsal bar snang la rang bzhin med// stong par mi snang rang bzhin yod// dbyer med bdag nyid chen po'i don// mdor na rang rig ye shes don// lobs pa'i tshad ni/ shes pa rgan dbang du mi 'gro zhing / rnam rtog rgyun chad mtshan ma zil
240b5(rnying rgyud): gyis non pa'o// drod rtags mi 'dod bzhin du 'byung // 'dus byas zheng khams chen por ldog/ lung ston rim par 'byung ba yin// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro las// dngos dang 'byung ba'i sgra la brten// de yis nges pa rgyud la skye// zhes
240b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las// bsgom du yod par bstan pa dang // bsgom thabs rgyas par bstan pa ste le'u bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye bcom ldan
240b7(rnying rgyud): 'chang // spyod pa'i bye zag gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges zung zhig/ blang por med pa'i spyod pa ni// srang rgyu med pas spyod pa'i mchog/ chos nyid don gyi spod nga ni// mtshan ma med pas
241a1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' bzhin// chos zan mtshan mar ma ba khang // rnal 'arjor zag mad shes rabagyis// dang gra ma rnam ma'ang bzhin du spyad// ga bshas byu pa na// dab man ma par gyid//
241a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ma 'gags par// rang snar rang shar chags sngang bral bar spyad// blta ba'i don gyi spyad pa ni// khung chen mkha' la ldings pa bzhin// bya bral lhun rdzogs chen po spyad// dgongs pa don gyi spyod pa ni// dper na chu bo gang gA bzhin
241a3(rnying rgyud): rgyun gyi rnal 'byor chen por spyad// 'bras bu don gyi spyod pa ni// nyi ma 'od zer bcas pa bzhin// sku gsum 'du 'bral med par spyad// dgongs pa'i ngang las la yengs par// shes rab chen po'i don la smad// rnal 'byor yid kyi
241a4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa yin// rnal 'byor ngag gi spyod pa ni// dper na thag cha sgra sgrogs ltar// sgra rnams zhen pa med par spyod// lus ngag yid gsum spyod pa ni// 'jig rten 'khor 'das chos 'di dag/ dper na me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// sdang
241a5(rnying rgyud): la zhen chags med par spyad// dran pa med pa'i spyod pa ni// rnal 'byor tshul 'chos mi bya bar// glang chen smyon pa bzhin du spyad// bung ba me tog 'jibs pa bzhin// gcig tu zhen med rnal 'byor gang bder spyod// thugs rje chen po'i spyod pa
241a6(rnying rgyud): ni// dper na nyi ma'i snying po bzhin// lus ngag yid kyis 'gro don rdzogs par spyad// thugs rje gdung ba'i spyod pa ni// bu gcig pa yi ma bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis 'gro don spyad// gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa ni// ched du mi 'gag ched
241a7(rnying rgyud): du sgrub pa med// ched du mi sbyang ched du mi spang ste// ma bcos dang la rang bzhin 'gag med spyad// ces gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ spyod pa bsdus nas bstan pa ste le'u zhe gsum pa'o// / de nas
241b1(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// gya kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs zung zhig/ 'bras bu blta ba mngon du gyur pa ste// de yi gnas lug
241b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// chos nyid phyi nang med par gsal// reg pa phyi nang med par khyab// gnyis med chos su rdo rje'i lus// rang gsal 'dzin med dang du gnas// de las mkhyen pa ma 'gags pa// rang rig ye shes longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sra/
241b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ye shes spyan gyi bum pa lnga// snang la dngos med nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// de yi nang na sprul pa'i su snga gsal// gsal la mi rtog/ bum pa'i nang gri par me bzhin// sku gsum nang gsal 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la gnas// rig pa rang
241b4(rnying rgyud): snang gsal bzang thal bas// sku gnyis yul du mi snang zhing // yon tan ma 'gags 'du 'bral med// sku gnyis ma 'gags yod pa'i med pa ste// chos su mi 'gyur med pa'i yod pa ni// 'khar gzhong bcud dang me long gzugs brnyan bzhin//
241b5(rnying rgyud): snying la rang bzhin med pas mtshan ma'i skyon dang bral// mi snang rang bzhin yod pas chad lha stong po'i smon las 'das// mtha' bzhi las grol 'khor ba rgya yis theb sa// don la 'gyur med rig pa rangs zin// zhes gsungs so// thig le kun gsal
241b6(rnying rgyud): chen pa las/ yang dag pa'i don gyi 'bras blanges par bsted pa skyele 'u zhe bzhi pa'o// / de sa yang gsang ba'i bdag pos nus pa/ saM kyai bcom ldan rdo rje chang // zab pa jig sa tshig dang // dbye ba dpe rnams gsung
241b7(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes zhusas// sbyin pas bka' phul pa/ rdorje 'dzin pa ras zung zhig/ theg par pa shes rab snying rje yin// deganyis che chung theg pa 'a chung snang // theg pa'i rim chog 'dasas dang bskyod pa yid// dkun mang yang badz+ra da gnyis pas seM
242a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu rkyen lamakhyer mtshan nyid theg pa dang // 'bras bu lam khyer gsang sngags theg pa gnyis// sgrubazla sogs mtshan nyid theg pa'i dpe// zam pa sa gzhi gsang sngags theg pa'i dpe// zhes gsungs so// thig pa
242a2(rnying rgyud): kun gsal chen po las// theg pa'i dbye ba kun bsdus pa ste le'u zhe lnga pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // theg pa so so'i lta skom dang // spyod pa 'bras bu'i don gsungs pa//
242a3(rnying rgyud): de yi ngo bo des tshig dang // dbye ba mthun dpe gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// gyon pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ lta ba'i ngo bo so sor dbye ba las shes par bya'o// nges pa'i don lta ba dang rig pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni/ phyogs
242a4(rnying rgyud): lhung med pa'i shes rab bo// blta ba'i nges tshig ni/ yang dag pa'i shes bya grub pa'i mthar gyur pas na lta ba'o// dbye na gnyis so// yang dag pa'i blta ba dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta ba'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni a ti yo ga'o// yang dag
242a5(rnying rgyud): pa ma yin pa'i lta ba ni an+ya yo ga man chad do// lta ba'i dpe ni gnyis te/ yang dag pa'i dpe ni man shal snang ba lta bu'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa'i dpe ni brgyad do// rigs kyi bu legs par zung zhig/ nyan thos dang rgyal tu kun de'u meng bzhin
242a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i dpen nam mkha' sgyu ma dang // spa shad chu zla la sogs med snang bzhin// kri yA rje dang 'bangs lta bu'o// yog spun dang grogs kyi dpe// ma hA lo ga rgyal po mnga' dang bzhin// a nu yog po mo snyoms 'jug byed po bzhin// a ti khyung
242a7(rnying rgyud): chen mkha' la ldings pa bzhin// zhes gsungs so// yang zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // des mtshon chag rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngas bstan rgyad lung thams cad du/ lta ba zhes pa'i cho ga rnam
242b1(rnying rgyud): dang // thab mtha' zhes pa'i chog rnams dang // yang dag / zhes pa'i chog rnams dang // mthar zag pa dang mthar phyan dang // 'bras bu zhes su gang byung yang // dmamon chog tu bsdus pa yin// s+yasa'i gnas skabs shes par bya// kye ze sems dpa'/
242b2(rnying rgyud): chen po// gzung 'dzin gnyis su brjodan nyan pos lta bar bshad// 'dzin par yod pas gzung du med ro zer na rang rgyal lta bar bshad// sems dang sems kyi rnam par smra ba dang // don dmatha dzo slab ni// byang chub sems dpa'i blta bar bshad//
242b3(rnying rgyud): don dam thams cad mthun pa la// reg gsum 'dod pa kri yA'i lta bar bshad// cha gnyis 'dod pa u pa yA yi lta bar bshad// sems dpa' sum du rtsa bdun chog byung na// rnal 'byor yo ga'i lta bar bshad// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lnga bcwa
242b4(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad sogs// ma hA yo ga'i lta ba yin par bshad// ma ba byed rdzogs pa'i tshig tshogs dang // dbyings dang ye shes tshig byung na// u nu yo ga'i lta ba yin par bshad// bya btsal las 'das pa'i tshig tshogs dang // rang byung ye shes tshig
242b5(rnying rgyud): rnams dang // lhan grub ye sangs rgyas la sogs// 'di rnams rdzogs pa chen po'i lta bar bshad // zur tsam mdor bsdus bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ lta ba'i don bshad pa mtshon pa'i tshig dang
242b6(rnying rgyud): bcas nas bstan pa sA l-i'u bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye tshe bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // dgongs pa bsgom pa rnam phye bA// de yi don bshad gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas
242b7(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des cung zhig/ rdo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang // mthun dpe brjod pa'i tshig tu bstan// ngo bo rtsa gcig gnas pa yin// bsgom pa'i nges tshig rnam pa bzhi// don la dmigs pas bsgom pa yin// ma yengs pas na
243a1(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa yin// mi 'bral pa yis bsgom pa yin// goms shing 'dris dang mi 'phro ba'o// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su bstan// mtshan bcas mtshan med gnyis yin no// mtshan med la yang gnyis yin te//
243a2(rnying rgyud): rtsol bral chen po'i bsgom thabs dang // rtsol ba ma thal bsgom pa'o// mtshan bcas la yang de bzhin no// mdor na bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis yin// bsgom pa mtshon pa'i dpe bzhi ste// mar me'i sdong bu mnan pa dang // chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa dang /
243a3(rnying rgyud): na ba / yang ltu // sdig du nga// dag pa'i sgyu gyung nga// rnaM pa sa dang // / 'bral ba / gsu sa nga rdzum pa
243a4(rnying rgyud): rnams gar byung 'bod skad bsde ba la bshad// ces gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ bsgom pa'i don bshad mtshon dang bcas pa bsdus nas bstan sa ste le'u zhe bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos nyu
243a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ kye kyai bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // bsgom med don bshad gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ bsgom med ngo bo des tshig dang / dbye ba mnyan dpe brjod tshig bshad// ngo bo dang rig rgyun
243a6(rnying rgyud): med pa yin// yid la mi byed phyir na bsgom med nges pa'i tshi / dang gnas mi byed phyir dang bya mi dgos pa'i phyir na'o// bsgom med dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// mtshan bcas bsgom du med pa dang // mtshan med bsgom du med pa'o// re re la yang rnams
243a7(rnying rgyud): bstan// gshis la bsgom du med pa dang // rtogs pas bsgom du med pa'o// ma bsgom tshun chad med pa'i dpe// chu bo la bur bstan pa yin// ma bsgoms don dang mi 'bral bar// sbyor rtsing spang 'dab 'byur ba bzhin// ma bsgoms dang ga
243b1(rnying rgyud): gsapa ro// sus pa dang shom byung po dang // bya gsang ba'i bdag pongs zung zhig/ ngas bstan byang lung bams cad nas// bsgom med zhes pa'i chog rnams dang // gnas mi dgos par thog rnams dang // bapras ta med pa'i tshig rnams dang /
243b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra 'bral med pa'i rtag rnams dang // dngang nga rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po dang // ye nas 'dra 'bral med pa dang // b+ha btsal rnams lus 'das pa dang // lam la bgrod du med pa dang // tog pa mngon ltar sangs chos dang // pa byung ye shes chen po
243b3(rnying rgyud): dang // lhur thub yi sangs rgyas pa dang // yid la zla dra med pa dang // dazegs pa'i yul dang bral ba dang // de sgo ma med don pa tho bzhag ces pa dang // bsgom du med pa'i tshig thams cad de/ 'bod skad kyis bsdebs la/ dus 'dir bstan pa bzhin du
243b4(rnying rgyud): shes par gyis sheg/ ces gsungasas// thig le kun gas la byen pa las/ bzhim med don pa shad brjod pa'i tshig dang bcas pa bsdus nas bstan pa stel skyon brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pos zhus pa/
243b5(rnying rgyud): com ldan zabs pa mkhas// spyod pa 'don pashad gsung drug sol// zhes rgyas so// ston pas b+hakA myal bya// gsang ba'i bdag po legs par nyon// spyod pa'i rab sa tshig dang // dbye ba dpe dang tshig bca pa sha de/ spod pa dzu
243b6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa ma 'gags par don dang 'byor pa'o// spyod pa'i nges tshig ni/ don so so dang mthun par 'jug cing longs spyod pas na'o// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin te/ gleng dor dang bcas pa'i spyod pa dang / blang dor med pa'i spyod pa'o// dpe ni
243b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'asgyur ba gar mkhan lta bu'o// bzo mkhas pa'i skyes bu'i lag gi 'du byed lta bu'o// rtse gsang bdag ngas bstan chud lung thams cad nas// spyod pa dang ni srin las dang // bya bapyod pa'i cho ga rnams dang // rnal 'byor rab 'bring rdzam
244a1(rnying rgyud): dang // gzhos sa mas// nga smra na ston bshad// sa gsu sa dgas na pams pa don pa shang bangs nas brgya pa na ma 'ong gras
244a2(rnying rgyud): das yang gsang pa'i bdag pos gyu pa/ 'du bsani 'bras bya pa sa jig pa// zhes rnams/ dul pa/ byed du 'dzin pa lagasagadang/
244a3(rnying rgyud): mthun rjong pa'i chos rnamapa dang // bsdus par khris ngas par bshad// 'bras bu bo ni/ ma ma'i ltab yongs rdzogs pa'o// ngomachog ni/ srin mo 'jigs dang mthar gyen kyar mi ldog pa'o// dathe ba ni zag bcas dang
244a4(rnying rgyud): pa med par/ rim spen cig car rdzogs pa'i dpe// shing tog lo tog sbyin pa dang / u dra ma tha ra'i 'bras bu bzhid// rtse kye gsang bdag nges par byed// ngas bstan nang yang thams cad du// so so 'bras bu ga dbyar yang /
244a5(rnying rgyud): bstan bzhin du shes par bya// 'bras bu mtshon pa'i chog tshogs ni// mthar byin pa dang rdzogs pa dang // smin pa dang ni grub pa dang // grol dang phyir mi ldog la sogs// dang po dgra bcom zhes pa nas// tha ma rangs zen ces par/
244a6(rnying rgyud): ngas bstan bzhin du shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// thig le kun gas la chen po las/ 'bras bu'i don bshad bstan pa ste la'u lab sa pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo
244a7(rnying rgyud): bsta bsgra ma spyad pa yangs rdzogs pa'i// theg dgu'i nges chog gsung du gsol// zhes zhus sa/ ston pas bka' bral pa// seM so'i nges chog ni/ ngas bstan khyod kyis yid 'azung // ston pas gsungs pa dzad na rdzag rnams/
244b1(rnying rgyud): dang yos nyan cing yang kyang bang bas thos/ rang ma yod nas mi 'char par gon pa'i gsung bar gangs pas// dedu na gzhan lkog byed pa// nyan thos ci gdes rdzog yin// ston pa gnad pa ma nyes par// goms pa'i mthums
244b2(rnying rgyud): brlabs pas rang sa sa rgyas/ 'du rgyal meng shings cho ga yin// saspangs dang ye shes blags rje dang // phrin pas phun sum tshogs ldan pas// byang sems meng gli tshig yin// khrus gtsang sa gas 'dong rgyang rag rtsong narna bas// @
244b3(rnying rgyud): ge des tshig yin// spyod pa mas 'dzegs lta ba yas 'bubs pas// u pa ya yi ming gi des tshig yin/ rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas don gyi rnal ma la// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum sbyong zhing gzhan don d+had// yo ka'i ming gi ngas tshig pan/
244b4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rnam gsum thabs dang shes rab gcod bton don la 'jug pa'i phyir// ma hA yo ga'i ming gi nges tshig yin// ma bskyed rdzogs dang de yi don la 'jug pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa a nu'i ming gi nges tshig yin// spang zhing srid pas bltas chos thams
244b5(rnying rgyud): cad kun// tshes slar ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas// gnyis med tshul gyi 'jug pa ni/ rnal 'byor rdzogs chen ming gi nges tshig yin// ces gsungs so// thig le kun gas la chen po las/ theg pa so so'i ming gi des tshig dang gtan tshigs bstan pa

251b6(rnying rgyud): dang du grol/ ye gnas chen po'i dbang gi chu bo bzhi// ma btsal ma bslar gzhi la yi nas rdzogs// de mtsho na gsung gi ngo bo ni// rin po che yi yi ke lnga// ma btsal gzhi la ye gnas pas// dpa' bo 'bru lnga dbang gi chu bo bzhi// ma btsal ma bskur
251b7(rnying rgyud): rang la rdzogs// de lta bas na gzhi'i ye shes gzhan la dag mi lus shing / rgyu rkyen gyi dbang du 'gro mi srid pa'o// rigs kyi bu rim pas babs lugs bshad pa ni/ shes rab kyi sku bzhis/ de bzhin gshegs pa kren snang gi ye shes la/ dbang gzhi rdzogs
252a1(rnying rgyud): su gnas pa ste/ mkhyen pa'i stobs ma 'gags pas/ gzhi 'gyur ba med pa'i chos sgra la/ shes rab 'gag pa med pa'i dbang thob bo// shes rab 'gag pa med pa'i sku bzhi pas/ gdul bya la snang ba
252a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi shar ba'i tshe/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i sgra bzhis/ zhal gzigs pas thugs mkhyen te/ shes rab rig pa'i sgra lnga las/ rang dbang yas babs su thob bo// de bzhin du rigs bzhi las/ sems dpa' sems mas rang dbang yas pa bsresu thob
252a3(rnying rgyud): so// nga sprul pa'i sbrang shar te/ spen cing rdzogs pa'i tshe/ thugs kyi grong na rang chas su gnas pas/ ngas mthong zhing gsal te/ de'i tshe ngas rtogs pa'i ye shes rang dbang skad cig la thob bo// de bzhin du khams gsum pa thams cad la dbang gzhi rdzogs su
252a4(rnying rgyud): gnas pas/ rim pas rig pa rtsal dbang 'thob par 'gyur bas ngas lung bstan to// zhes gsungs so// kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ dbang gi dngos gzhi ni/ sbyar thabs gnyis te/ khyad par gyi dbang bzhi shes rab la brten nas/ gzhi rdzogs
252a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa rtsal dbang du bskur ba dang / thun mong gi dbang rdzas bzhi la brten nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi gdams ngag dang sbrel te// bslang zhing thob par byed pa'o// khyad par gyi dbang nas gzhi shes rab la brten nas/ gzhi rdzogs pa chen po'i rig pa rtsal dbang
252a6(rnying rgyud): du bsrung ba ni/ brgyang 'dzin brim pa'i dbang lnga stong nyid du bskur te/ mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i ngang na/ yum ye shes kyi spyan ma 'gags pa/ 'od kyi bum pa lngar gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bzhugs pa'i rten du gyur pas na bum pa zhes bya
252a7(rnying rgyud): ste/ ngo bo dbyings stong pa nyid du gnas pas/ don stong pa nyid du rig ste/ dngos po'i mtha' las log go// rgyal po dang rtags phyag rgya'i dbang bsrung ba ni/ bum pa lnga'i klong na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bzhugs lugs bshad de/ shes rab kyi bdag
252b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa par gsus na/ gas pa'i ba rgyamya gas papas/ 'ad bar dadus pa ngas dub ba sa da cig tus da pa 'du zhon gagasapa pa dang / thug byas pa bad pa na/ shegs pa nga/ ngan /
252b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i nas rgyags pa yin pa la yin par dag ste/ dngos po dang mtshan ma mthus par sna dang ye shes sa dag ste/ mdza ma pa'i rjes gdon 'o// tshul nyid ri po che sde brji mye dbang ni/ 'phags pa'i nang bdun te/ dab na ma thong los sbyar ba'i rgyal pa
252b3(rnying rgyud): ma'akhrid dong bdan yong bya dang 'dra bdu/ rang gang po gang la yang byeg nas shing yon tad cing yang snang / sbyin pa gyi ci/ da'i byi kyi do ba su rig gi/ dang dag pa'i la shes rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa thams cad 'byub na /
252b4(rnying rgyud): pas tun sa byung 'a ba par 'ang khye pa na/ ga pachis la nan pa da/ ga pa de sa
252b5(rnying rgyud): med pas/ yul gyi mtshan ma dang gis bcom ste nyon mongs pa med pas/ bzod pa'i yuros tu phyin pa dang ldan to/ dmag pon rin po kyi ste bur rig go// rang rig pa'i ye shes dbye btsal mi mnga' bar yon tan dang la rdzogs te/ thugs rje shugs
252b6(rnying rgyud): gyis 'byung la/ bang+ged+ya pa chung pa'i gzungs tho pas brtson 'grus dang ldan pa te// rta mchog rin po m+b+ha phung rig no// rang rig pa'i ye shen dzaM/ ga bu ma 'da' bas sa ga yo gnasangs/ byas ma gtan te glang po na po rje lta bur dgas/
252b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa ces pa pa gang bags kyang med pa'i shes rabacig / rtogs pa'i zhes sapar datho sa// shes rabagyi sa tu byung pa / 'the mad po kyig sung nas/ sa pa bzhes pa
253a1(rnying rgyud): sa smra nga/ smra / na/ sa rlan/

253b4(rnying rgyud): pa bkyis gagris pa'i de nas par gas pa'i brnyag pa ma/ byebacwa pa ldan rje 'jud// dpacigasasu bshad dag // 'as thas sa// spyo pas shang rtsas pa/ rnyegle kyi brings pa ma na
253b5(rnying rgyud): dmi gdu ba mthobasan// pa bzung ba pa na / nga bdang gzhin// ma sa skye sa dang rdza/ du'ad gags bad// rag pazhes pag/ ca byed
253b6(rnying rgyud): tungs gnyis su med/ theg brgyad bcos pa'id mthog sangs// mim srung bas na med ces bya// 'ag ma'i dmachog pas thob cing // ngadag sgo ga sum pangs pas na/ yul ba zhes sa btags pa par// bzung du byed dang po chog sa/
253b7(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i bsrung bas // rang ngag ye shes gcig thabs// gcig sa ces su bstan pa phyir/ rang rig pa zhes gcig phul/ bya btsam med par ye 'drangs pas// sbyin pa zhes su brtags pa na// zhes gsungasas// jig kun pas parjod pa
254a1(rnying rgyud): lda/ da tsugs/ na pa stil 'ang bzhin// de nas yang bsrung ba'i bdag pas zhus pa/ ga ban la na rje 'chang / gdun bshad nga lags/ chu / rnams pa
254a2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ dam tshig ngo bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba mthun pa'i dpe ru bstan// dang po ngo bo bshad pa ni// 'da' mi srid pa'i ngo bo ste// lta ba rang rig ye shes yin// bsrung ba don gyi nges tshig yin// 'da' du med pas dam
254a3(rnying rgyud): yin// mnor nges pas dam tshig yin// de las mi 'da'ad ma tshig go// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin te// bskyang mtshams bcas pa'idam tshig dang // gsung du med pa'i dam tshig go// gong dang 'og tu shes par bya// dam tshig don las me 'da' ba/ thams cad
254a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i ngang las mi 'da' ltar// rang rig ye shes don las 'da' ba med// 'da' mi srid pa'i dam tshig yon/ zhes gsungs so// thig le kun gsal chen po las/ dam tshig gi don bshad bstan pa'i le'u ste re snga pa'o// / de nas ya
254a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // dkyil 'khor phrin las ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs byung zhig/ dang po dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// ngo so dpa ni nges tshig dang // dkyi
254a6(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i dpe ru bshad// dbyen rnam pa gsum du bshad// mtshon pa brda' yi dkyil 'khor dang // dam tshig ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // rang bzhin grub pa'i dkyil 'khor // ngo bo rnam pa gsum yin te// mtshon pa brda' yi ngo bo ni// bris dang
254a7(rnying rgyud): 'bur du btod pa yin// dam tshig ting 'dzin ngo ba ni// gang bsgoms yid la gsal ba yin// rang bzhin grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// mu gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// rig pa dkyil la ye shes 'khor// chos lnga'i ngo bo ngas tshig yid// gcas
254b1(rnying rgyud): las mas pa sargyas pa khod// mangs zla' dpangs rgyag so// bdag zhid kyil latshogs pacad la'or// sgrub sgo bangs ga yod// da rnag 'gyur shar da du// brjod pags mar yang bzlas pa yin// zhesugasu //
254b2(rnying rgyud): len gas la dzin po las/ dkyil 'dong bstan pa stel du drug pa'o// / de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal bya// gnang ba'i 'dag po legs zung zhig/ mkhris ma bskyed ma pa rnams par// rang bzhi rtags pa pa'i da hU~M la
254b3(rnying rgyud): bcol 'das pa'i sbyin las kyis// thog pa med pa'i don med de// sku gsum rgyal ba dkyil 'khor du/ smyon pas sku gsumangon mdzad pa// rgya 'i 'od dang gsung gi 'od zer las// ston ba cu gsum btsal du grub// byin rlabs dang bzhin chog sbyor gyis
254b4(rnying rgyud): glen pas 'godon phyogs med mdzod// byas parjod par sman gyis zla'o// ces gsungasas// yang gsong ba'i bdag pas zhes pa/ phyin las don pa shad gsung du gsol// zhes smras so// sbyirna pas bka'aphral ba/ de de'i ma leg sa slong 'is/
254b5(rnying rgyud): phyin las ga gi na ni// byab brab pa'i ye shes yin// phrin las ngas chog brtan pa ni// rang bzhin du btsal las 'das pas// moma'i don mdzad zin las yin// dbyen rnam pa gnyis yin te// rdol ba yod dang med par// chol tha la phrin las rnam pa ni/
254b6(rnying rgyud): chos sgra dngos ming spos dang zab// rtogs pas smos pa thams cad ni// zhi ba'i phrin las zhes subya// yon tan nor bu bzhin du 'byung // rgyas pa'i phrin las zhes swaH// thams cad 'byung yang de las 'byung // thams cad gnas kyang de la gnas// thams
254b7(rnying rgyud): cang thim yang de la thim// thams cad mnga' mdzad dbang bskur bas// dbang ga srin las zhes su bya/ rig pa dngos med rdos pa'i chos med pas// phyogs med gang la'ang thogs pa med par 'chad // thugs rje'i stobs kyis snang zhing bsdus pas na/ dzag/
255a1(rnying rgyud): da nas sa gastsa ma / sa sa ma can pa da pa tu/ nags nga pa ga na po / da pa na pang sa
255a2(rnying rgyud): ces gsungasaso// thig les nags laldan pa lA/ na las dang bya tsam med pa don pa shad pa 'i ba / sa pa gas ga dag pas smras pa/ ma ldan ched// mdzad padapal
255a3(rnying rgyud): ljang lags// smyon sa bka' stsa ba// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs zung zheg/ chos nyid dag pa'i pho brang ni// rang rig ye shes ma 'gags shar// ye shes dbyings pas shu ga yis// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis myong de gyur// ye shes gnyis med mchod
255a4(rnying rgyud): yin// mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gisar// yub bum bzhib rgyaH gnyis 'gro// ye shes lnga y-i nga la rol// mu 'gags gnyis med marjod pa yin// sbal cu'i bachod pa rnam pa lnga// mchod rgyas gzugs su nga dag/ sems dpa' lce'u lngas blangs
255a5(rnying rgyud): rig byed dang du gnyis med zim// rgya mtshon po'i 'gro 'dra bzhin// mchod pa rgyun med chad pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdul 'byor gsungs pa/ sbugasum 'du 'bral med pa ni// don la mas byed rnapa 'byor yin// rnal 'byur chen po bsgom
255a6(rnying rgyud): 'das par rtogs// rtogs pa'i don labya l-i mi mang bang / ra ga ngas chen po'i nga pa gnas pa ni// nal 'byong dbang drug chen po kyi rtsol 'das pa 'in// de dang dul ga das pa ni// 'byong byin med pa yin// rnal 'byor dag ga na yang / gnyis
255a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dges paman// rdul 'byer dgas ngas chog cad / rmo sa nyis de byong dang // lcags pa byer byed gyur bas 'byor nas bya// dpyid da me// nyis yinan// ring dang don dung yis bzhed// dod rtsen la 'byung gang bstan bzhin// zhes
255b1(rnying rgyud): so// ga so canags btsun pa sa/ mdzad pa da dul tshor ba// nas sbrul byud pa / de nas pa dgas pa ya gags sapa/ nga / shA pags// sa tha so// napa sag
255b2(rnying rgyud): legs cung zhig/ dang po rdzogs kyi don pa shad pa// mchog tu myung bas sngags den no// ngo bangs chog dbye ba bstan// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// gsang sngags dag thugs gzungs pags gsung// gsung lags dag gi po ni// shes rab nyid rje
255b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su bstan// rig sngags dag gi dpon// shes rab dang ni ye shes yin/ gzungs sngags dag gi ngo bo ni// shes rab dang ni ting 'dzin yin// sngags gsum dag gi des tshig ni// shes kyob phyir na de brjod pa'o// sngags gsum dag gi shin las
255b4(rnying rgyud): gzhiganas bag tshe gsel dang marig log togs la// 'phral 'byung bag chag sel bar byed pa yin// zhes gsungs so// smyon pas yang phyag d+hA bkang spel pa// phyag rgya chedan po'i ngo bo ni// 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin/ chen po das
255b5(rnying rgyud): mi 'da' bas na phyag rgya yin/ dbye ba byinang bkrus pa yin/ phyag rgya bzhe dang rtsel yod// 'di ru 'asdus te bzhi bstan pa// chos dang bral ba chos kyi su// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// rang ga ye shes dbyings las shing // dper pa nyid rigs dang ldan pas
255b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ni// dam tshig phyag rgya yin par bshad// rang byung ye shes ma 'gag par// gsal bas chos kyi phyag rgya yin// thugs rje'i spu gnyis mi 'gag par// rtog med thugs rjes don mdzad papa// las kyi zhag byer
255b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// phyag rgyab dpe ni nam mkha' dang // rgyal po'i phyag byas btab pa pa// de las 'da' bar mi nus bzhin// gsang sngags ma yin shes rab ma 'gags pas// phyag rgya ma yin thugs rje ma 'gags pa'o// zhes gsungs so// thig la kun
256a1(rnying rgyud): gsasadzar sogs/ sngags da ga tu bstan pa se la bar dbang // de nas yang gsang byung bdag pos lus pa/ bsnyen bapa'i byung ba dang pas pag sdub pa/ nga
256a2(rnying rgyud): nirdo rje lags zung zhe// sgrub dang rig po shed de// de spyod bzhims gtan la 'bebs// rang gi mtshan nyid nyams sa myong // de ni bsnyen pa'i rang du bstan/ lam la grangs par nyi skyed pa'o// lam grol khyer ba sgru pa ra// @
