323a7(rnying rgyud): sman rdo rje sems dpa' la// gus pa'i tshul gyis bdag 'dzing ngo // nam pa bcu'i gapon po dga' ba rdo rjes 'dzin no// badz+ra khrel ba'i rjed las/ rje rjem mas pa'i tshum mongs su rdzogs pa'i 'dus nyi pa//
323b1(rnying rgyud): su la nan ma/ ga sa rnam du ldan dun sa na to//
323b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ pa
323b3(rnying rgyud): su na sa ga sa
323b4(rnying rgyud): ra/ sa da sa ga na
323b5(rnying rgyud): 'i / 'a sa ga pa ma
323b6(rnying rgyud): sa
323b7(rnying rgyud): yu du na su
324a1(rnying rgyud): phying// de gnyi gang ltang ma dag pas// ma ga pa zhes rnyon pas btags// ngan la gdags par bya ba med// de las rags par byung ba yang // phag ci yin khyab tsam// dbyangs nyid stong pa pra ba tsam/
324a2(rnying rgyud): de la log par blta bar dbyung // de bas rig pasrung ba yang // sngang la lus sems nga yir 'dzin// rkad cig tsam las log par rtoH// phyi lang yi yul tsamarba// glang po nan pa byung ba ni// dbyings las yul du gzung ba yis// yul tsam
324a3(rnying rgyud): bdag la rtogs// gzung dang 'dzin pa sdang zhes bya// de bas rags pa log par zhen// de ni nang ging yin te// nyer len phung po lnga po la// zhen par snang ba'i yin te// chos kyi phung po skye mched khams// gzugs la sogs pa thams cad
324a4(rnying rgyud): la// log par zhen par byed pa'o// de nas log par chags pa'o// de las log par zhe sdang ste// de nas dmyal bar song ba'o// se sA yi dwags lus len cing // gti mug byol song gnas su skye// 'dod chags mi la nga rgyal lha// phrag dog lha
324a5(rnying rgyud): ma yin du 'khrul// 'khor ba lugs su 'jug pa'o// 'khor ba ldog na tu nas ldog/ ma rig pa nyid zad nas bcad// rang rig dang po'i so la bzhag/ 'khrul pa log par the tshom med// chos kyi mtha' yang gang yin na// chos sgra gnyis mad
324a6(rnying rgyud): ni// gnyis pa dang sas sa nyid 'di// chos rnams can gyi chab yin/ brjod pas thog tung ba sangs/ mthong lam blang bya zlas// sngags pa rtsi sangs nas dang // matsu dang bzung la byu ba// de las lag kyi 'dag pa
324a7(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa thams cad chos can no// de rnams kun gyi mthas gtugs pa// chos kyi mthar thug ces bya ste// 'khor ba lugs las ldog pa'o// sgo lo ngo bo gtugs pa ni// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma 'gyid de// 'od gsal sgyu ma'i chu yin pas// gnyis
324b1(rnying rgyud): med brjod par mi nus so// chos kyi dbyings kyi mdor gtugs na// rig pa'i yul ltar snang ba yang // shin tu phra ba'i stong nyid 'di// rig pa stong pa dbyer mi byed// brjod par rab tu dkang ba'o// dbyings ni ma mtha' bral bar byug/ rgya mang bor
324b2(rnying rgyud): gtugs pa na// kun rdzob ldang ba 'khor ba'i chu// 'das par snang ba don dam chu// 'khor 'das gnyis su snang ba'o// rgya yi ngo bo chos nyid yin// chos nyid skye ba med par thug/ lam gyi stobs su gtugs par bya// theg pa rim pa'i lam rnams kyi//
324b3(rnying rgyud): nas lam stobs gang chen// sru las lam du byed pas na// 'bras bu nyid las lam shes pas// lam nyid sku la thug pas na// lam la bgrod du med pa'o// 'grod med lam la gnas par bya// spang bar bya ba'i rgyu gang yin// ma rig pa dang log lta dang /
324b4(rnying rgyud): log tog gnyis 'dzin po tshom rnams// cad tshad nas ni rang dngas 'gro// 'bras bu'i gdeng du gtugs byas nas// ma rig kha ni nang du bltas// rig pas 'khor 'das chos rnams can// chos kyi sgra las byung bar shes// sun rdzob rnam grangs brjod 'das
324b5(rnying rgyud): kyang // 'khor ba'i chos la 'dus pa yin// mya ngan 'das pa don dam nyid// don dam grangs med 'di ru 'dus// de dag thams cad sdang ba yang // chos kyi sku las tha mi dad// yul gyis ye shes klong brdol ba// bag chags sbubs kyi sdang ba la/
324b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes bzhi dang ldan pas na// bya ba grub pa'i chal gnas// sgyu ma'i lus la ye shes wa// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// yon tan sgra yi grong brdol ba// thun mong yon tan sdang ba yang // 'gro 'ong med dang 'du 'bral med// skye 'gag
324b7(rnying rgyud): med dang 'phel 'grib med// gcig pa tha dad med pa'o// thun mong ma yin yon tan ni// log pa'i yon tan sdang ba yang // lus dang ngag dang yid gsum mo// yang dag pa yi yon tan ni// sku dang gsung dang thugs su snang // 'khor 'das gnyis
325a1(rnying rgyud): su snang ba yang // kun la khyab par gnas pa dang // gzugs can ma yin 'gro 'od med// dus ni thams cad pa yin no// sems hUM ba dang sha gcad par bya// lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes kyis// ma rig par
325a2(rnying rgyud): gdang sha bcad// chos spyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis// the tshom gdar sha gcad par bya// lam dang bya ba'i ye shes kyis// lam dang ye shes gdar sha bcad// bsgom pa'i dmigs ni bstan par bya// 'khor 'das gcig par gyur pa yi// rig pa
325a3(rnying rgyud): chos sku stong gsal bsgom// ye shes chen po'i ngang la bzhag/ sgrib pa'i skyon yang bsal bar bya// skyon yang rang bzhin bas pa mi dgos// mi dgos pa yi dpe gsum bstan// mar me dang ni nyi ma dang // nor bu chu 'dang sa lta bu'o// des na sgrib
325a4(rnying rgyud): pa rang dngas 'gro/ 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tu gcig pa// btsal mi dgos pa'i rang bzhin gnas// da ltar bag chags las gnas pas// 'od bzang 'bar ba'i dpal be'u// de nyid sbubs 'pho mkha' la 'char// ye shes snang ba lam me ba/
325a5(rnying rgyud): de dang mi 'bral 'grogs pa ni// lag na 'od 'bar sdang ba'o// rang gi rang ngo shes pa ni// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// rin chen sbubs su gnas pa ni// gzi brjid chen po blta na sdung // de kun thig le gcig tu gnas// rang bzhin ldan pa'i
325a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'o// man ngag rjod chen rnam pa gsum// 'bras bu'i gter gsum sba pa'o// byang chub sems kyi rdzong la ni// thig le nyag // cig gter rdza'o// thig le phyi nang rtsal rjong la// kAn bzang rol pa'i gter sla'o// yid kyi rnam shes rdzong chen la//
325a7(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes gter sla'o// mnyam pa chen po mi g.yo bas// rdzong la gter sbas rgyas gdab bo// stong thun ma gzhi'i man ngag 'di// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// dga' rab rdo rje nyid la bshad// chos rtse mo gzhi zhes bya'o// de nas ba
325b1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gang zag lam gyi cha rkyen yang gsungs pa/ dang po thugasar gcugs pa dang // bar du 'gro sar btang ba dang // tha ma 'dug sar bzhag pa'o// 'khral gzhi rtsad nas bcad pa dang // 'khrul pa gzhi la ldog pa dang sangs rgyas pa
325b2(rnying rgyud): rus mnyam mo// chos nyid ma dang 'phrad pa'i dus dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rang dbang thob pa'i dus dang // ye shes rangs zin pa'i dus so// zhes rin po che dra ba'i dgongs pa mig mang ris zhes bya bar gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos
325b3(rnying rgyud): rin po che gter gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba gang zag lam gyi cha rkyen 'di gsungs so// rdzogs pa chen po phyin ci ma log pa'i man ngag mngon du phyung ba 'di la lnga ste/ chos nyid byang chub sems las 'khrul pa byung ba'i tshul bstan pa dang / de gang la brtags te
325b4(rnying rgyud): byung bang bstan pa dang / brtags nas nges pa'i don la bsgom pa bstan pa dang / rang byung ye shes mngon du shar ba'i dus bstan pa dang / dbu ma sems tsam gyi go las bcad cing rgol ba phyir rgol gyi the tshom bcad par bstan pa'o// de la yang gsum ste/
325b5(rnying rgyud): dang po dngos po'i gnas lugs bstan to// bar du gzung 'dzin gyi 'khrul pa bstan to// tha mar 'bras bu thob pa'i dus bstan to// man ngag gsum ste/ rgyal po'i gdung mi 'gyur ba'i lta bas yid ches bskyed/ 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i man
325b6(rnying rgyud): ngag gi gzer gdab/ phyir mi ldog pa'i snying po sems kyi 'bras bur gnas so// 'di la go las gsum ste/ blta ba'i golas dang / man ngag gi go las dang / 'bras bu'i gol sa'o// 'di la bsgom pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa ni gsum ste/
325b7(rnying rgyud): kun bzang dang la gnas pas ngang kun tu bzang po// mkha' dbyings klong kun tu bzang mo// rtogs pa kun tu bzang po'o// rang bzhin gsum ni/ rang bzhin snying po med pa/ rang bzhin bde ba chen po// rang bzhin snying po can no// la bzla ba
326a1(rnying rgyud): gsum la chu 'a tshas sprul bzla ba dang / 'bras bu cos sa pa bzab dang / sta bras gnyis mang dul ba rnab pa// zhas ngon pa tshig tAr te 'byung gnas sa gsungs // brda byol ba'i chud zin pa dang /
326a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa la// dgongs pa brgyad nas bshad pa yin// 'khor rnams dgyes nas rab tu bstod// rgyal ba dgongs pas brgyad pa yis// gyi dbrarnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams// sangs rgyas zhal nas gsungs pa ni/
326a3(rnying rgyud): yid ches 'gyur bas rab tu dang // rig 'dzin rig pa'i brdas brgyad pas// zab mo'i man dag rgya cher 'gyur// gang zag stani khung brgyad gsungs pa'o// man gzugs kyi rgyud chen zing // nang stor lnga yi man ngag dang // gsang skor lnga dang dgu pa dang //
326a4(rnying rgyud): gang zag cha rkyen rnam gsum gyi// rgyad chen rab zab rgyud gsungs pa// ma 'ongs don du lung bstan gsungs// rdo rje 'chang chen khyod la 'dud// ces bstod nas/ ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams chos kyi dbyings thig le nyag gcig tu dbyer med par
326a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs/ zhub po dga' rab rdo rjes zhus nas/ skal ldan 'ga' zung la brgyud do// pad+ma 'khyil pa'i rgyud las rjes su yi rang ba ste le'u rtsa gcig pa'o// sku'i rgyud pad+ma 'khyil pa rdzogs so//
326a6(rnying rgyud): k+Sha/ rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal mgon po ye shes kyi sgra dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ 'khor chen po 'dus pa'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams/ legs par nyon cig
326a7(rnying rgyud): ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don phyin ci ma log par bstan/ sku gsung thugs gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i rgyud kyang bstan par bya'o// sku gsung thugs gsang ba rmad du byung ba/ sku gsung thugs yon tan rmad du byung ba/ sku gsung thugs phrin las rmad
326b1(rnying rgyud): du byung ba las/ gsung rmad du byung ba gsung gi rgyud/ phrin las mthar phyin pa rdo rje rtse mo'o// don thugs su chud pa zhes bya ba 'di la/ bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam mgon pos/ bye 'dus pa'i tshogs dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dus ma
326b2(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nam mkha' med pa'i sngon rol/ gnas mi mnyam pa chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang / ston pa mi mnyam pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ chos mi mnyam pa gsang ba rig pa bkod pa'i rgyud lnga/ 'khor mi mnyam pa rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dus
326b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs mi mnyam pas bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye 'dus pa'i tshogs nga yis bshad/ nga yis bstan nga la nyon cig/ e ma ho// ngo mtshar che ba'i chos/ brjod pa kun las rab tu 'das// chos rnams kun la rab tu
326b4(rnying rgyud): mi gnas so// chos sku snang ba 'khrul pa'i chos zhes bka' stsal to// nga dang byung gi ye shes chen po la// sku gnas pa'i sku bstan pa/ ye shes kyi sgra dri ma med pa'o// nga'i gsung 'gag pa med pa rang byang gi ye shes so// nga'i thugs rdo rje lta bu 'gyur/
326b5(rnying rgyud): ba med pa'o// nga'i yon tan nor bu rin po che ltar zad mi shes pa'o// nga'i phrin las nyi ma'i snying po ltar lhun gyis grub pa'o// da rang byung gi ye shes chen po la chos mi gnas pa'i chos bstan pa'o// 'khor chen po lnga/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la rang nge
326b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i don du gsal ba'i rgyud lnga gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon/ da ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku/ ye shes lus can dri ma med// da ni sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // yi ge med pas tshig las 'das// nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi
326b7(rnying rgyud): thugs// dran rtog med pas mya ngan 'das// nga ni yon tan dpag med sku// nor bu rin chen dri med mnyam// nga ni phrin las mthar phyin sra// 'gro ba'i mgon po de bzhin gshegs// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// rang rang rigs kyi
327a1(rnying rgyud): tud nas ngas// mthun ga cagasal mamanya thugs lags sa dpa ga nag pan/ 'gas sa 'gas ma dalagasas// rngub zad pa'i byung bya // sungs rgyas drag sa thugs sa jug
327a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i mgon po de bzhin gshegs// 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams dbugs 'byin pa// legs so ye shes dri ma med// gcig tu gsungs pas don shes pa// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid 'dzin// chen po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// mgon pa
327a3(rnying rgyud): med ye shes sgra// rnam dag gsung gi tan+ta las// gsang ba'i sgron ma bstan pa ni// rig pa'i khu byug bstan pa yin// rin chen dra ba'i sgo mo la// 'byed pa'i rje mig bstan pa ni// mun pa'i sgron ma bstan pa yin// rin chen spangs pa'i rdzong chen la// gnas pa'i rangs bstan pa ni//
327a4(rnying rgyud): ra bu dri ma med pa'i rgyud// zhin mang yis brtan pa yin// de phyir mnan ni dri meng dang // mi gnas shes rab parol phyin// rdo rje 'dzin par latsan// zhes chos pa ba rgya sbyin pa lnga las yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ dri ba dang po pa rnams rten gyig// de ni shi
327a5(rnying rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te/ mos kyi sulas 'das pa'i sna rnam par dag pa mi 'thab pa// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud na/ pharol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
327a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra gras mu dA ya tan+tu/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs las bkrol ba'i rgyud/ zhal na
327b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa'i phyir lung / rna ba nas rna bar brgyad ba'i phyir man ngag 'di la/ spyi don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te/ rjes mo 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di la rgyud yin pa'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa rdzas bstan/ lung yin pa'i phyir lung gi che ba lngas bstan/ man ngag/
327b2(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir man ngag gi mdzod gsum gyis bstan to// de la dus phun sum tshogs pa snang ba bkod pa'i zhing khams gnas phun sum tshogs pa ljang lo can gyi zhing khams/ ston pa phun sum tshogs pa sangs rgyas 'od spangs/ chos phun sum tshogs pags
327b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud lnga/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sangs rgyas rabs bdun no// lung yin pa'i phyir lung yin par rdzas bstan te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i phyir/ lung gzhan las brten pas lung gis yid ches pa'i tshe bA'o// snga rnam par
327b4(rnying rgyud): dag pa dang po rgyu med/ bar du rkyen med/ tha mar mi 'gyur bas/ 'gyur ba med pa nam mkha'i lung gis che ba'o// ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig 'bru gnyer legs shing don de bzhin nyid las mi 'gyur bas lung gi che ba'o// mi las
327b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par du gyur pa dga' rab rdo rje'i don du/ ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa las/ lung ma nor ba rin po che gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya zhun mas dang nan du bris pas lung gi che ba'o// bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i
327b6(rnying rgyud): tshul du chu dang 'bras bu tha mi dad du bstan pas/ gsang sngags mtha' dag gi lung 'dus pas lung gi che ba'o// man ngag yin pa'i phying man ngag gi mdzod gsum gyis bstan te/ spu'i rgyud nas sku rin po che 'dra ba'i mdzod phyur ste 'khor bcos mtha'
327b7(rnying rgyud): bcad/ gsung gi rgyung nas gsung rig pa'i 'u'ug phyung ste yi ga dang thugs su smad/ thugs kyi rgyud nas thugs nor bu rin po tshe dri ma med pa'i rgyu phung ste chos min gyi chos la bzhig go// sbyin pa dga' bo rdo rjengs/ rdo rjesems dpa'i thugs pa
328a1(rnying rgyud): ma / nanan du chung chub sa skul ra// kyang napa byu ba'i rgyas
328a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig sa mi gas ga tu di/ rnyed dus pameng pa pa yin zung gis // dpa na na na po ma // thugs kyi nas chud 'byung // snang rdzas lnga ma rgyad kyis / na tshangs kya
328a3(rnying rgyud): ba sa// nus rnam par dag pa thar// rdoji dzin pa bka' stsal// / de nas pa sa sa rdo rje na na tu'i dgangs pasems can gyi bzhi lag hU~M/ sku'i dru pad+ma khyis pa brtan/ bla ma gal nas rdzas da sh+tsa
328a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bIr/ gsung gi rkang dzo ce mo 'jas pa bstan/ sangs sa byu gongs pa la brla / thugs kyi rgyang rin ma rgya spangs pa'i rgyud bstan/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can yid zhes par byab dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs
328a5(rnying rgyud): na nyid du bstan pa'i phying/ yon tan+da rtsi rgyud gi mang rnams byams pa 'a mags pa bstan/ sems can rnams la 'bras bu'i bstan pa rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir/ phrin las kyi rgyang mkha' gsal gyi khyi ma bstan/ spyir sangs rgyas kyis gsungs
328a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud dz+wa la/ sgo brtsegs su kye 'i khyo bum chung rtsi shu rtsa gcig tu byi sti dun no// hU~M d+hang lnga lA/ man ngag gi rgyang gsu ma~M/ gdams pa'i rgyud bcu drug/ bshad pa'i rgyud gnyis ti nyi shU rtsa gcig go// byang chub kyi sems pa
328a7(rnying rgyud): khyil ba'i rgyud 'di/ rgyud kyang yin lung yang yin/ man dag kyang yin/ na'i ka yang yin no// kun tu'i zang po rtsa ba'i rgyang chen po yi ga med pa'i rgyung nas gsungs te/ gang zag gin pa nang na bar bachud pa'i phyir chung kya
328b1(rnying rgyud): dru dan rta rgyun par na nas gsungs par lungs na tu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mnang bar byas tu phyis dbyung bar bstan pas lung yang yan na// ljang gang zag rnam par sprul ba'i la shas thong bar byed pas man dag kyang 'angam
328b2(rnying rgyud): man nga ga de spyong du mi ster ba'i mu rtogs log lhacan tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ srung thabs kyi le lag bstan pas no be ka yang yin no// de yi phying bad+ma 'khyil pa'i rgyud ni/ sangs rgyas kun d+hi r+m+ma k+ta'i chab yin no// byang chub sems pas
328b3(rnying rgyud): ba bsdus pa las/ rgyud ci ltang byung ba'i byung khungs dang / yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub kyi sems mun po'i sgon ma zhes
328b4(rnying rgyud): byA ba ni/ chu tho sin+na dang / chu bo chen po ga d+hA'i mtshams su sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gzigs pa rnam pa gnyis su gzigs te/ sems can gyi b+h+rUM'i bye brag dang sbyar nas/ rgya 'bras kyi chos gnyis bka' stsal te/ las kyi mthing brdzi ba dang / la
328b5(rnying rgyud): kyi mtha' mi brtsi ba sa gnyis las/ de la yis kyi mtha' brtsib la// las kyi mtha' rdzogs pa dang / las kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'o// de yi las kyi mtha' brtse ba la/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i bsgom lam nas 'jug ste/ chu'i chos su bstan
328b6(rnying rgyud): las kyi mahA 'jogs pa la thabs khyad par can du gyur pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bstan te/ lung gser gyi phur pas bstan to// las kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi lung gis bstan te/ ji ste las kyi dbang bur nan
328b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig gis bstan te/ las kyi mtha' la mi gnas bya ba tsam la yang gnas su med/ rang bzhin chen po tshig gi mtha' dang bral ba ni/ re zhig bstan na byang chub sems rin po tshe spangs pa nas bstan to// don de thugs su chud par byed ni/
329a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems pad+ma spel pa dbu zhabs na bzhugs te/ dbang byang chub sams na byas 'das pas dgrol bar bya'o// man dag gi rgyud gsum gtan la dbub cing med chas par bya bar kyang drugadam du nga /
329a2(rnying rgyud): chud 'thadrag gis brtan nas/ bshad pa rgyu gAnyis kyi mtho dman thong du bad de snyams tu ga mas 'o// des ba 'khril ba'i rgyu ni na bya mamar la bzlas pa bzhin bshad de/ mo 'dus pa'id n+de/ bye bang zlog
329a3(rnying rgyud): sa du sa rgyas pa nas
329a4(rnying rgyud): shAs / na pas pa/ ga yang
329a5(rnying rgyud): sa?swa pa nA~M/ byang chub kyi sems can po'i skyon ma 'di la gra'abs su ma pa kyi ma thas brgyan \u0f7f/ sangs chu ji gangs pase byung pa dang / rlig 'dzin parda yis brgyad pa dang / gang zag rnabs brgyad pa dang gsum las/ @
329a6(rnying rgyud): nga gyis kyi ba bang / sang ban pa kyi po 'gyur bas// 'i spyod kyigs pa'i sa bang ga sheb sa pa masaso/ the shad cangs pa nyis bshad/ can yangs ma nyes mdun no// don mo'i gamed kyi gnas dbyeng
329a7(rnying rgyud): kyil nga rigs pa ba dring gi shegs pa rnam pa bya/ langs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' bas pa/ bshad blangs mnyis bshad/ man yangs mnyis mnyan na// denas sa
329b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang du sprul pa'i sku sangs rgyas 'od srungs la/ 'chi med rdo rje'i lung bstan nas/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// paN+Di ta'i brda'i sgo nas bstan pa la
329b2(rnying rgyud): gsum ste/ badz+ra sgra'i sgo nas bstan pa dang / ngag dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas bstan pa dang / shes rab dang rang rgyud kyi sgo nas bstan pa'o// brda rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bstan pa dang / sgra rnam pa drug gis bstan pa'o//
329b3(rnying rgyud): ngag 'jam pa'i sgo nas bstan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'o// shes rab ni theg pa thams cad kyi sgo nas bstan pa yin la/ rang rgyud ni gdams pa'i sgo nas bstan pa yin no// de nas bod kyi dge ba'i bshe
329b4(rnying rgyud): gnyen skyes chen zad par can gyi gang zad / sems dang chos su 'dres pa rnams kyis bshad pa mang yang / spyi don gsum ste phye nang gsang ba gsum du bstan no// de la yang phyi ma gsum ste/ lung dbus su bshad pa dang / lung /
329b5(rnying rgyud): ngag tu bshad pa dang / man ngag man ngag tu bshad pa'o// de la lung dkyus su bshad pa spyibatsan/ lung man ngag tu bshud pa skabs bzhi pa/ man ngag man ngag tu bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i skabs gcig pa rin po che sgron ma
329b6(rnying rgyud): snang byed du shes par bya'o// nad ltar bshad pa la gnyis te/ nang gi phyi dang / nang gi nang ngo // nang gi phyi ba kri ba drang gi don du bstan to// nang gi nang la don bstan to// gser myig nas dus mnyam bdun pa yan chad/
329b7(rnying rgyud): ngag ni thugs kyi rgyud dam pas/ khong 'grel lo// rang re'i skor tshoms dang 'bru de ni dkyus btsan la dpe chung dang sbyar la shes par bya'o// de bzhin du gsang skor kyang shes par bya'o// don gyi man dag khong 'grel/ gsang bar
330a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ladun du sa nata/ del snang nyon zhugs gsun tu/ rgyas pa bstan pa dang / dadu N+ya stan ngan mang// dul nus pa ni/ dub shA
330a2(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa dpe chung du bstan/ shin tu bsdus pa ni lung gser gyi phreng par bstan no// de lnga don badzin gyis bstan pa dang ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' gi zhi'i gnas thugs sa 'khor ba thog mtha'i btsang / rin po rgya zam tog stag saMm+b+has c+doMg
330a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i sangs rgyas de spyad / lta ba kha 'byams kyi rgyal pos gnya' gnon/ rin po che sgribacings kyis don nyams su blangs/ pad+ma lakhyil pa'i dpe nyi shu rtsa gcig gis donaman dag tu bsdus/ lung gser gyi phur pas tshig dang yi go
330a4(rnying rgyud): thug bcang/ mngon ma pa gnyis kyis las kyi mtha' dudu'o// byang chub sems padri kyil ba kyi ba mad brdzus ta btsun par/ slob pa ni dga' ba gyis yin pa'i smon gyi brnyan pa'i 'i gas mi 'o//
330a5(rnying rgyud): zugar skad du// rat+na dz+wa la ko Sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin po che dra ba'i mdzo rjes bya ba/ sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro mgon 'jam dpal gzhon nu ngas// thog mau sangs rgyas ngo bstan pa// mgon po dri med
330a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes skye// rin che ni ba'i mdzod na gnas// 'gro drug kun gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ye shes sgra gcig kun tu shar// yi ge lnga la phyag rgya ste// rdo rje'i sku gcig kun tu baM sdus// yon tan so so'i dpe ru bsta naM// mgron po dri madri ye shes
330a7(rnying rgyud): hUM// 'khor ba zog mtha' bdag med pas// gzung dzin gnyis med mya ngan 'das// phye nang sdod bcud ring grol la// gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin// glang chen 'dim 'byung ba dang // skyes bu ring gis bcings pa gnyis/
330b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis yang dag ga la 'gyur// snang srid rnam dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor na// rang byung ma bcos rdo rje snying po'i sku// dus gsum 'gyur ba med par rtag par bzhugs// bde ba chen po bde la rtag spyod pa// rnam par snang mdzad rtag
330b2(rnying rgyud): pa kun tu bzang // ji ltar brjod pa tha snyad rtsol ba'i nad// chos kyi yang dag don de brjod nus kyang // chos kyis yang dag don la gnas mi nus// de phyir chos spyod sangs rgyas don la bsgrib// chos kyis blo yi the tshom kun bsal la//
330b3(rnying rgyud): chos la mi gnas tha mal shes par bzhag/ tha mal shes pa blo yis bcos pa min// bde dang sdug bsngal blo la rtog pa med// mgon po dri med sku ni de bzhin no// zhes rdo rje sems dpa' gzhi'i gnas lugs rin po che dra ba'i mdzod kyi le'u
330b4(rnying rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ rat+na sA mA n+ya bad+hAm+b+ha ya/ bod skad du/ rin po che spyibacings kyi man ngag/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa la phyag 'tshal lo// man ngag 'dus pa'i spyi bcings
330b5(rnying rgyud): ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs pa ste// rnal 'byor kun gyi thugs la gnas// man ngag 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra yin// tshig dang 'bru gnyer dkyus btsen te// sku yi rgyud du shes par bya// yang dag don gyi sgri bcings ni// 'jam dpal/
330b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'dus pa yin// mgon po dri med ye shes skye// skra 'jam gsung 'jam thugs 'jam ste// sku ni ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// gi drod ma'i mtha' dang bral bas 'jam// gsung ni brjod du med pa'o gsung // tshig dang yi
330b7(rnying rgyud): ge'i mtha' las 'das// thugs ni dran rtog med pa'i thugs// gzhi la rang bzhin med par 'jam/ sangs rgyas ye shes sku yi mchog/ mgon po dri ma med pa yin// mgon po dri med ye shes sku// sangs rgyas
331a1(rnying rgyud): kun byagang ba // 'khor ba dang bzhin med pas na// 'jam dpal ye shes rnas pa lan// brjod du med pa'i don shes na// 'jam dpal ya shes 'das bya ldan// man nam nga sa
331a2(rnying rgyud): shes na// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// chos la blo ni mi gnas na// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// zhes 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pas bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'
331a3(rnying rgyud): kyis zhus pa// legs so dpal ldan mgon po che// byams pa'i thugs rje ma bral bas// sa gzhi lta bu'i ye shes sku// snying rje'i thugs rje ma bral bas// rgya bo lta bu'i ye shes sku// dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes
331a4(rnying rgyud): pas// nyi zla lta bu'i ye shes sku// btang snyoms thugs rje ma bral bas// nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes hUM// sku bzhi 'dus pa'i 'jam dpal ni// theg pa kun gyi snying po yin// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas//
331a5(rnying rgyud): lung bstan skyes bu dam pa de// ye shes bzhi la nAg spyad na// bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa'i lam// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// 'jam dpal ye shes dri med sku// rang bzhin lhun gyis thub pa'i phyir// bsgom
331a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig dang bral ba yin// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas// spyod pa'i mtha' dang bral ba yin// snying po rang la rdzogs pa'i phyir// grub pa'i mtha' dang bral ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa las//
331a7(rnying rgyud): rin po che skyi bcings blta bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra satwa~M rat+na ka ra d+ha ka sad+ha m+b+ha ya/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che'i za ma tog sngags ming man ngag// bskal pa dang po'i sangs rgyas
331b1(rnying rgyud): mau shAng gyub tshul pa// 'azlal pa gsas smras rgyas gas byug tu/ nga chu sa gangs// rdzu smras khrag// nas smras/ bags garnags ldan
331b2(rnying rgyud): nas ma pal 'dugs pasan dam ga tu / rtog/ sem sa sa 'dzid/ dpab me gas nga shin de/ thagasas pa 'dags ga
331b3(rnying rgyud): shug ga sa pa / sa nga sa/
331b4(rnying rgyud): me'i tshur du byung // de ny-id shes pas bzlas pa las// rkang rtsegs yi nus pa 'byung // dmas sa pas kyi nam pa d+he // gang cig sa sa rnam pade// gcig dgag gcig ste gcig gnas pas// maud rtseg phyim ba // rnams
331b5(rnying rgyud): ldan// de sa padag snang ba'i nga/ rlu nga 'phrul pa'i na na~M shang // ma rgyas nga bag ma/ g+sa lab la/ spyan// ya shes nga ba na mtshums/
331b6(rnying rgyud): sgrupa sa sa// du'abri sa pa'i sas mi babyung pa sa nga/ pa shes 'i gan gi/ zugs na/ sa pa shA sa das bye pa rdzu / rnam na nga
331b7(rnying rgyud): bachags so// gzugs pa kyi thagams thang nga gsu / babyud pa sbrul sabyud pa sgyu / nas sa gdangs su ma chen cir su slo /
332a1(rnying rgyud): dang sems can rgyab gyis te bstan pa gnas so// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi skur snang / bar gyi sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bur snang / gyis 'byung gi sangs rgyas gzugs kyi skur gnas so// de rnams kyang
332a2(rnying rgyud): don so so tha mi dad do// phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung ba lnga dang bcas pa/ dang po 'od dpag med pa las byung / mi bskyod pa'i bskal pa chags/ 'od srungs kyi bskal pa la gnas so// bskal pa gsum du gnas mod kyang / snying po'i don la 'gyur
332a3(rnying rgyud): ba med// rdo rje lta bu'i sku brnyes pas// bcom ldan rdo rje dbyings mi bskyod// rang byung lhan rdzogs sku gsung tugs// sku gcig kun tu khyab pa'i sku// nyi ma'i snying po lta bur gnas// man shel lta bur rang dag pas// snang ba'i bye brag sngar mod kyang //
332a4(rnying rgyud): rang gi ngo bo 'gyur ba med// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cing // rnam par dag pa'i sku bde ba chen po la/ ye shes kyi thogs byar med do// rang rig pa'i ye shes dngos po'i mtha' las 'das pas/ nyon mongs pa'i rnam tog gis sgrib pa med do// rang gi ngo bo
332a5(rnying rgyud): shes bya ba ba kyis grub pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan gyis bstod du med do// ka nas dag pa'i ye shes dang snang ba la/ bslad par bya ba'i chos med do// thabs kyi rgyal por stobs kyi rig pa shar bas/ che ba'i yon tan gzhan gyis dpag tu
332a6(rnying rgyud): med do// shes rab zab mo chu bo gang gA'i rgyun bzhin mi 'chad pas/ thugs rdul dbri bkrol med do// rig pa ye shes su gsal bas/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang dbyer mi phyed do// snying rje sna tshogs su snang bas/ khams gsum sems can
332a7(rnying rgyud): dang 'brel lo// rgyu 'byung ba chen po lngam springs gnas su dag pas/ snod bcud kyi gsos byas so// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa chos med do// ci ste ngan song gi mtha' las grol ba'o// yang dag pa rdzogs pa
332b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas la lam mA da dA// rbastu dgrod par bya ba'i mtha' las 'das so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshogs bsag tu med do// rba sta dngos po'i mtshan ma gang la yang mi gnas pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sgrib pa srung
332b2(rnying rgyud): du med do// ci b+ha nyi ma'i snying po la mun pa'i gzhi med do// zhes rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che za ma tog sngags ma'i man ngag/ rdo rje thugs kyi ting khur gyur pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// / dru gar skad du/ bo d+ha tset+tadu thA
332b3(rnying rgyud): bod skad du/ byang chub sems thugs kyi nyi ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa ched la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub kyi sems thugs kyi nyi ma la bzhi ste/ gzhi yi gnas lugs bstan pa dang / de la 'khrul pa
332b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i rkyen bstan pa dang / 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i thabs bstan pa dang / rang gi dpe la 'bras bu dang bcas par bstan pa'o// de la gnas lpags la drug ste/ rgyas kyi sgra'i gnas lugs dang / rang byung ye shes rkun po'i gnas lugs dang /
332b5(rnying rgyud): sgor gnas lugs dang / gsung gi gnas lugs dang / thugs kyi gnas lugs dang / dbyings kyi gnas lugs so// rkyen bstan pa la bzhi las/ byang chub kyi sems nor bu dri ma med pa'i rgyud dang / thugs kyi nying khur blta ba'o//
332b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba bzlog na gzhi nas bzlog/ ma rig pa nyid rtsad nas bcad/ rang rig dang po so la bzhag ces 'byung ste/ de'i don la bdun te/ chos kyi mthar gtugs/ man ngag gi klong brtol/ sems kyi gdar sha bcad/ lam gyi ro bstan/
332b7(rnying rgyud): gyi mtha' bas la/ spyod pa'i gdeng du gzhug/ 'bras bu med par thag bcad do// de la chos kyi mthar gtugs pa la jug ste/ sku'i ngo bor gtugs pa dang / dbyings kyi mur gtugs pa dang / kyu'i ngo bor gtugs pa dang / @
333a1(rnying rgyud): stobs sa gtugs pa dang / nga myo gtugasu pa dang // 'anas na' gdang gtugs pa'o// ldan bdugags grong grol ba laganyis te/ yul gyi ma shas nga ba dang / nang du
333a2(rnying rgyud): snong brtol ba gnyis/ yul gri lce shes kyi klong brtol ba ni/ ye shes lnga ste/ de ltar ni ldan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dbyung med do// cha lnga yin/ yon tan gyi sku'i klong brtol ba lag nyis te/ bzhi'i 'jug tshul bstan pa dang / yin
333a3(rnying rgyud): gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'o// gzhi'i 'dug tshul bstan pa la gnyis te/ nga ci / yon tan gyi rnam grangs bstan pa brgyad do// sems kyig dang sha bcad pa la gsum ste// lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes kyis ma rig pa ga dang shi bcad pa dang / chos
333a4(rnying rgyud): spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis the tshom gyi gdang sha bcad pa dang / lam gyi ye shes kyis lam dang ye shes kyi gdang sha bcad pa'o// man ngag gi rdzong chen po gsum la/ 'bras bu'i gter chen po gsum smra ste/ byang chub sems kyi rdzong la thig le/
333a5(rnying rgyud): lkog gcig gi gter sgra/ thig le gyi nang gi rjod la kun bzang rol pa'i gter sgra/ yid kyi rnam shes kyi rdzong la rang byung ye shes kyi gter sra ste mnyam pa chen po mi g.yo ba'i rgyus btab bo// byang chub kyi sems thugs kyi nyi ma zhes bya ba/ slob
333a6(rnying rgyud): dpon chen po ro langs bde bas/ chu bo ni tsA ny+dzana'i 'gram na/ shing chen po bzhi 'dus pa'i gnas su/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen la bdaka' stsal to// stong thun bye ma gzhi chung shos las man ngag tu bstan pa ste la'u
333a7(rnying rgyud): bdun pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha ba sh+tsa n+d+ha ba bA da ni k+She ba nA maM/ bod skad rje/ sangs rgyas kyi dud lnga gdams par bzhag pa zhes bya ba/ b+ha ga bAn 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma 'das
333b1(rnying rgyud): pa'adus ma 'ongs pa ston dor na/ gsang ba'i rgyud snang nga bzhin gyo ba chen po lngar gnas te/ zang mi gsung cang mi smrab blud pa'i mtha' las 'das so// dmang pa'i dus su snang ba nyung mad// bye pa par mad la/ dang
333b2(rnying rgyud): myu gur gnas pa bzhin te/ sa bon myu gyur gnas pa'i tshe/ sa bon gyur med la 'bras bu kyang mi snang par myu gu 'ba' zhig tu gnas so// de bzhin du bskal pa dang po las bon gyi tshul du gnas so// bskal pa bar ba la m+ba bu'i tshul du gnas so//
333b3(rnying rgyud): bskal ba tha ma la 'bras bu'i tshul du smin no// ste rigs kyi bu 'ongs pa'i dus su chud chen po lnga dang la snre t+pa la ring las grol/ rang gi rnam pa lnga po yang // rang gi phyag rgya 'du snang // de ni rgyung rkyen lnga po yang // de byi badzin du de 'aM ru gsungs/
333b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i ma// de bye 'angon pangs// sems ca rnams pa pan gdags kyi/ drim med pa'i drang mabarjod/ thegs par yid la gdung ba sa/ thon bajim med dngas// maskyes pa thod phyistsan /
333b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud lnga bstan pa 'di// chos sku gcig la tha dad pas// lta ru kye ste bstan pa yin// phyag rgya lnga ru bstan pa yang // don du bdag nyid chen po'i sku// gyad chen lnga yi mdor bsdus pa// nor bu dri ma med pa'i rgyud// mgon po yis
333b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa yid// de phyed drang srong nga la nyon// legs so legs so mthon po dri med sku// ye shes dri ma med pa'i chos// drang skyong bdag la bstan du gsol// sems can rnams la sman slad du// bdag gis de bzhin bsten par bya'o// sems ca/
333b7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dang rgyud la// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra gnas pas// spu ni dri med 'od kyi sku// dngos po'i mtha' las 'das pa yin// thog med rang sa bstan pa'i phyir// sku mi chung du bstan pa yin// rnam par snang mdzad khyod la gtad// sems na
334a1(rnying rgyud): na/ rang gyud la// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gnas pas// gsung ni 'gag med tshangs pa'i dbyangs// brjod pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i phyir// gsung gi rgyud du bstan pa ni// snang ba mtha' yas khyod la gtad// sems can kun gyi rang /
334a2(rnying rgyud): rgyud la// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs gnas pa// rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ba med// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs 'dus pas// thugs kyi rgyud du bstan pa ni// rdo rje mi bskyod khyod la gtad// sems can kun gyi rang rgyud la// sangs rgyas yon tan ma 'gags pa// rtogs
334a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i don la yid ches phyir// yon tan rgyud du bstan pa yin// rin chen 'byung ldan khyod la gtad// sems can kun gyi rang rgyud la// sangs rgyas phrin las 'gag med tshad// nam mkha'i mthar nas nyi shar bzhin// de phyir phrin las rgyas pa'i rgyud//
334a4(rnying rgyud): don yod grub pa khyod la gtad// de phyed mgon po dri med ngas// dra de srong khyod la gdams pa yin// dper na song ge dkar mo'i 'o ma 'di// rin chen gser gyis 'dzin gyur gyis// snod ngan gzhan du blugs pa na// spyod 'jig 'o ma 'pho bar
334a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de bas gzhan du bstan pa med// kye kye rigs kyi bu khyod nyon cig/ ngas gdams pa'i chos la don thugs su chud par mi byed cing / tshig dang sgra phyir 'brengs nas ngas tshod dang gzu lums su byas na// rdo rje lta bu'i sku rdo rje dmyal ba chen por
334a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang // 'khor ba'i 'damadza' chen por 'gyur ro// tshad med pa'i thugs rje chen po bzhi 'chang ba yang / lta ba'i bdud chen po bzhi du 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings mtha'i klas po'i ye shes kyang /
334a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mun rum chen por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnam pa lnga yang // rang gi rgyud la dug lnga'i ma chen por 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyang / bdag tu rtog pa'i bag chags kyi gzhi ma rig pa kho nar
334b1(rnying rgyud): r-i// kya rdza lan pa nyon cag/ khyad par bu rje theg pagacig tu bzlas shing // dam du bla nas rje'i dmangal na// 'jig rten 'dir yang mya bde pa dang sdug bsngal dang nad ma bzad pa lus la 'byung zhing // tshe thang rab tu 'phos nas kyang / 'jig rten 'dadapa
334b2(rnying rgyud): yAng // nyi 'brel dag tu sle bar 'gyur// de la tshan pa bas par// dgra yi dam par gyur nas kyang // 'jig rten gyi mngan gro ma// gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur// zhes gas sa // rje pa nyon cig/ de bzhin gzham
334b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra bstan pa ni// ung ma thara'i mi tog lta bu ste shin du dgon no// pogacag gnyis po gsum du byi nang rjod bcud brtags la sems kyi dam pa bstan// bcu nang u dus wa rigs// gcig gam gnyis sum mngan gsum yang rung // grong nga
334b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang ni gang tshal dkon pa ru// de nyid rnam gsum rna ba sems la spang // phyi nang gsang ba'i dbadi chen rab rdzogs pa// rdo rje lta bu'i sku gsum smad pa yin// yid bzhin gter ston tha ma la// gus pa'i tshul gyis lus dang srog kyang phul//
334b5(rnying rgyud): zhes lung bstan to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas zhus pa// kye kye dpal lhun mgon po dri ma med// rgyud kyi skyon yon bstan pa legs// rgyud kyi che ba bstan du gsol// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa la nyon cig/ rgyud kyi che ba rnam pa lnga// ye shes m+b+ha ste
334b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rje dbyings mi 'gyod// mun pa la sgron me ye shes sgra// rdo skye skye ma rgyud// ye nas ma med// rlung bye da bang bzhag pa len// mtshan gyi smonas che ba ni// spug sun dum du rkyen du zhes b+hA ste/ rlung kyi hU~M /
334b7(rnying rgyud): gsung drugs kyi na kun pa/ dza gyi ma dus pa rgyud// 'gag mas dpa // mi gags shes rgyu ni// rig pa'i khrugag grang gas bshad// lcags kya nga / 'i yi shas na/
335a1(rnying rgyud): ma' bang dngas pa med// gang / d+hag zud du na su nadu gnas/ gnan mas ma gan dun myed ba byung ban// dag sdug pa dal ston yul yin// ngang dang thabs kya gas pa sa rtsa la gsum lus lachud
335a2(rnying rgyud): mthong man klong du mnyam pas ye shes bdag med sba// sa dang lam gyis bgrod min ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// rtsol bsgrub zil gyis gnon pas bde 'byams ye shes sra// byang chub sems sa dge 'khyil ba'i rgyud kyi che ba'o// sangs rgyas tsha ba'i yon tan
335a3(rnying rgyud): skugasung thugs// sangs rgyas rol pa ma 'gags ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas thugs rjem 'gags 'byung ba lnga// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod spyan mnga' bcu drug pad+mod 'khyil// dgos dgu rang la rdzogs pas nor bu rin po che// mtshan mchog mo sor bstan kyang yon
335a4(rnying rgyud): tA na gcig tu snang // sku gcig kun tu khyab pas snang gsal thug rje 'od kyi ma~M/ zhes pa ni rgyud kyi che ba'o// nam mkha' stong / la g+ha sprin gr-ite bas pa bzhin// chos sku gcig pa yon tan don brjod pa// sku gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mthar phyin sba// rgya mtsho
335a5(rnying rgyud): che la chu bran 'du ba bzhin// byang chub sems la ye shes dpag mod 'dra// ma spangs ma blangs ched du byad med kyang // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// bstan pa'i snying po gang na gnas pa na// dus gsum pa der gshegs rnams kyang rang bzhin
335a6(rnying rgyud): yangs kyis 'dre// gang zhig bsnyen pa'i b+h+ring po med pa na// dus gsum padang gshegs rnams kyang mi nags mi gnas ni// phya gsung thugs kyi d+hang rje na gnas pa ni// chos rnams kun kyang de bzhid cid la spyong// yon tan chen las 'bras bu ma
335a7(rnying rgyud): sru// rgyu 'bras chos sgra shes rab pha rol phyin// rdo rje n+ya bram mapa'i dbyings dag dang spyod// phrin las mthar phyin pa ye shes kyi chu kyiche ba'o// byang chub kyi sems rdon rtsemo 'dus pa'i chud ces bya ba/ gdams pa bstan pa dang /
335b1(rnying rgyud): rgyun kyi ba bstan pa'i lo sgru btud pal// 'dud gshegs rnal ba'i man dgadan bstan pa// mchong pa'i phyag tu gsum thos dang na spyad// grong zad mtha' da nags rdul dgan pa na// maN+Dal 'das gangs can 'gas
335b2(rnying rgyud): brtsigs te// thos dang tsan+dan dri chug rjeng dang 'o ma dang // ba yi rnam lngas kyi dang legs byas la// me tog 'bru dang rin chen tshom zas bkang // de nas nub gsumadzam la// maN+Dal khrag dang chung gis chag rgyag gdab// mchod pa'i yo byang chags
335b3(rnying rgyud): dang rol mos mchod// A d+ya sarba a pri ta tsakra e ka sa pa'i b+h+yo d+hU ba te a br-i ti tsakra e ka ma hA mchis nga nA lo ga d+hAr+m+ma d+hA du a pri ti tsakra e ka/ dri ba dang po la tshogs bsags/ de nas thog ma'i sangs rgyas ngo sprad/ de nas sku gsum gyi snang bar sgra
335b4(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyang dang man ngag gi ngo sprad do// rig pa rgyal gyi dbang bskur te man ngag tu shes par bya'o// nor budri ma med pa'i hU~M kyis dbang bsgyur/ lung gser gyi phung bas gdams ngag gi mjug bcad/ lung ma bstan pa'i spyod pa rnam par dog pa'i ye shes
335b5(rnying rgyud): so// chos su sna ba ni sems can gyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas la chos med do// chos kyis sangs mi r+g+ha'o// mos kyis bde ba tsam thob par nus kyi/ chos las 'das pa na rnam par grol zhes dga' rab rdo rjes gsungs sa// nga ni byang chub sems
335b6(rnying rgyud): dpang rnams mi ga yo ba'i sa las/ snron gyi thugs dam dbang gis spyan dradu byur bya ste/ mag yed ma 'a'adas ye shes pa// sbrul po'i ga brang dag dang rin chen yod pa na// btsam dri mye dmag dpung tshogs kyang de ni rab tu 'dra ba bzhin// gang zhig
335b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i snying po med cing mchags mi gnas gnas de na// dam can gyi mtshe tshogs kyang den yod mi 'dra// gang zhig bstan pa'i snying po chags shing yod pan// dam can nu margya'i tshogs kyang doni rab tu 'du// nyi ma'i rnying po gang na shar ban/
336a1(rnying rgyud): na nga ba / sa nags shAn// na gas na zhugasapa// na// / dam na
336a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'ang // rgyam chechen por rgyu blan 'du ba bzhin// mamr-i mgyi tshogs byung 'di m+b+hi ka sheg+sas// spyan gyis sgrub pa'i jig 'dzin mag mal ci// phyug sa ma skyes de bzhin gshegs pa'i dag 'dzin dadung // 'dun kyi sbyin gyi ge 'dzin dang // bak+Shu
336a3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i reg 'dzin ma g.yel cig/ 'bras bus ston rig 'dzin ma g.yel cig/ yog tshe yi rig 'dzin ma ga yol cig/ slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje dang // slob dpon 'jam dpral pa shes gnyen gyis// rkyen thung ba bo la// bya
336a4(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// de yi 'khor du ma mos chad pa ci ste gcid// rgyal bo d+ha na ta lo dang // sras d+ha bo rA dza ha s+t+ri yis// chu bo gang gA'i brag phug tu// byang chub sems ca
336a5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gseng ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs/ da ltad// bla yi rgyal po 'jog po dang // gnod sbyin du byang chub kyis// chu
336a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin drug zug tu// byang chub se mas kyi gongs pa gsol ba bzhin// de dang ldan pa na la byo bdag bsgruban// gsang badzugs kyad ni mi ming kyi byid kyis // kyai'i mkhan por rab snang dang / man pa dag med mas/
336a7(rnying rgyud): yul te chen 'ardal ba'i dur khrod du// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag paslab ni// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs// sbyinan mkhan 'i man rA dang // sras mogo mni \u0f7f
336b1(rnying rgyud): yis/ u mun gyi yul a su ra le brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs// A tsaR+tha mar ma mdzad dang // drang srong chen
336b2(rnying rgyud): po b+hA She ta sa// de rab rtan 'dzin gyi brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs// A tsAR+Ya rA dza dang // smad 'tshong ma sangs
336b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas dngos grub kyis// za hor yul gyi dur khrod mtha' yas ri yi brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs// slob dpon ku kuR+Ya
336b4(rnying rgyud): dza dang // srin po pu ru shas sA la'i yul// gsang chen rol pa'i dur khrod mA ri 'bar ba'i brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs//
336b5(rnying rgyud): slob dpon 'jam dpal phyi ma dang // rgyal po de ba rA dza yis// chu bo ni ra ny+dza na'i brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlo bas// slob dpon pud+d+ha
336b6(rnying rgyud): gu b+ha dang // swA sti dpal phrang ma zhes pas// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal// g.yang ri gong gi brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs/
336b7(rnying rgyud): slob dpon shrI sid ha dang // dge slong ma ni kun dga' mos// sing ha'i yul dur khrod chen po sbrul rdzogs// sid+d+h+ya rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi
337a1(rnying rgyud): // dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs// slob dpon bi ma mu dra dang // slob dpon gnya' na ku mA ras// rgya nas bod du byon pa'i tshe// bal yul yangs le shod kyi brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag
337a2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlobs// slob dpon par can dang // rgyal mo g.yu sgra snying po yis// tsha ba yul gyi mkhar shod du// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang mthun par rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na// gsang ba thug+sa
337a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ ga // na rnyen pa 'i na na pa yis// mat+yainas thathe klu gapa'i dan tan/ na pa sems kyi dgongs pa rjes paltar// de dang mdzin pa 'byor byadag bsgru na// gas
337a4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis rlabs// de yan chad rgya bod 'brel ba'i chos so// de man tshad rim gyis skul ba man dag dang sbyar ro// byang chub kyi sems rdo rdo rje mo 'dus pa las gdams pa bsgrag pa'i dus/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rgyud 'dzin
337a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bo brad nas skul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa dga' rab rdo rje ngas// bya rgod phung po'i bo la// lung lo can gyi 'o byung du// rdo rje sems
337a6(rnying rgyud): dpa'i thugs bsnol te// byang chub sems kyi lde mig gis// gsang ba'i man ngag rdo gyi nanus// rgyud sde lnga yi rti phal// rig pa'i ye shes sgra yis bsnyad// ro snod gsum po'i me pho zhon// shes rab 'gyur med lam du zhugs// 'khor ba'i 'phreng chen brgal
337a7(rnying rgyud): nas su// lu la ni skyeb med pa'i dbyings// mabang ni 'gyung ba med pa'i mkhang // te ni dag pa'i rgyal po yin// ma ni shes rab tu med len// bra ni dang byung ye shes yin// de lta bu yi sangs rgyas la// nga la rtogs pa'i ye shes 'di// 'jam dpa'i
337b1(rnying rgyud): ba shasu gtan spyod la gtud// 'od ma 'tshal gyinags na ladu// mthul drug sems su nag/ sams pa' mams cab// rgyu \u0f7f/ danas ngam par brgyud pa na/ las sprul bar ldan pa 'bru brdzun sang ga bdag/ yinam na pa dang drang
337b2(rnying rgyud): thob pa yis // sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pa nyid brgyad pa// sems can ma rig sgo 'i sbubs 'byed pa// mun pa snang bar bsgyur ba'i rgyud sde lnga// mthong ba tsam gyis shes rab pha rol byin// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sdug suM zugs kyi rgyud// bskar
337b3(rnying rgyud): bgrangs na sa gter gsum brjod pa yin// me nu baN+Dal mtshan gter gyi 'byung gnas 'di// sa dang lam du bgrod pa'i chos min te// shes rab tshangs pa 'chi bdag bdud pas 'jigs// skar stan rnams kyi btsas su bzhag pa yi// gsang ba'i rgyu gsum man ngag ma/
337b4(rnying rgyud): byu // sems snang ba rje brgyad 'chang pa'i sbyin pa n+de// rang brjo rigapas la zhing na// gsang rgyad gsum zhes bya mtha batha nas// bcwo cud dkyis dang na gas na// rin gyin gas da la ga su la tha zug // sa
337b5(rnying rgyud): snying gi pa ti smug chung gnyis// rlung dang se bus thos su mi rung ste// sangs rgyas sbyin gyi dbyings su sbas te bzh-i / rdo rje sems dpa'i byas btang ngo // thugs kyi dgongs pa shes rab blo ldan pa// dad ldan brtson 'grus che ba'i
337b6(rnying rgyud): hU~M pA la~M// nyid nas myed du gdams te rgya yis btare/ sems spya bcwa ba myang man rig mdor bsdus pa// blo sten shes rab can la bstan par bzhag/ ces rdon tsam 'jas pa'i rgyud lhas/ steng zag la gtad par
337b7(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa'i 'i'u sa brnapa 'o// / gsung gi rgyud kyi ma 'dus pazhes thugasmeb nga natha man mi rnye ga cig gdum bye rgyu cing zhus ti gtan la lababarjegasos// mtshang gnyis pa na srung
338a1(rnying rgyud): was/ k+Shaka/ rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyAn b+ha nam hA tan d+ha/ bod skad du/ ye shes bla mchen po'i rgyad/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsham pa// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ phyogs brgya rgyas gsum/
338a2(rnying rgyud): gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji skyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / ldan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs te/ mi dang ma ma yin
338a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs snad pa bku da nga dam gnas shing gyi stong bdad ga thams ca na ba rtsigs pa / stong gas pa spyong nas/ 'ag ta rnamam pas rna ma dun po 'is byung bas ga yong kyis/ khyed thug bsngal ba sabyu ga/ sems tham pa
338a4(rnying rgyud): ma byed cig/ yid 'joms par ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches byung bur bkang ba ni zad cing stongs pa yod kyi/ rigs kyi bya byang chub kyi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zad cing stongs pa med pa/ bri zhing brlag pa med
338a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ yid bzhin gyi zas zad pa med pa'i gter ngas bstan gyis nyon rjeg/ rigs kyi tha sangs rgyas kyis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'grib la bgrod pa'i lam med/ chos kyi sunas ye shes kyi su thob par byed pa la ye shes med/ rigs kyi bu 'bras bu bla na med pa'i ye shes
338a6(rnying rgyud): pa yang med/ mthob pa yang med do// shes rab kyi rob tu sbyin pa'i phyir/ rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis marig pa ga dang na bcad nas sangs rgyas kyi che ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phying la shes kyi pa ral tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang sa
338a7(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa pabadag dang gzhan gyi don mthang byin par byed pa sa rgyams kyi rab tu phyin pa 'danas macom ldan 'das kyis gangs kyi rdung na mdzad cing rnam pa lnga sa te/ dza par da'i snying po gsang pa'i bdag pa lag / gru por bzhag nas bka'
338b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dbyings nas rang byung ba// stobs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chad// lagan rdzod ba che// log lta shugs kyis bsgral bar byos// zhes brjod nas/ rang byung gi bcom ldan 'das ni snying pa byang chub du 'bral med par bzhugs pa/ phyogs brdu dus
338b2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgra/ thugs rdo'i 'od zer gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'dig rten gyi khams ma lus me lus lus pa med par bzhugs pa// sdug sung thugs tshanga'i yon tan rmad du byung bas
338b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi phrad kyi stong chen por grags so// sku rmad du byung bas skra'i dkyil 'khor gsang barmad du byung ba dang / gsung rmad du byung bas gsung gi dkyil 'khor rmad du byung bag sang rig pa'i khwa byug sdig pa dang / thugs rmang du byung bas thugs kyi
338b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mkhyen pas gzigs pa'o// thugs rje che ba/ thabs mkhas pa/ stobs kyis pha rol dpung 'joms pa/ shes rab zab mo rig pa'i grong nas 'char bas chos thams cad de bzhin byed la sbyor ba/ gsang ba shA na med pa/ thun mong ma yin pa/ blta
338b5(rnying rgyud): bakhyad par gyi ye shes rdzogs pa/ 'bras bu thA na byed pa rgyud la sbyin pa/ 'byed pa med par grong gcig tu 'khyil pa/ shes bzhin du mi gnas pa/ ma yin pa thams cad yin par sbyor ba/ yin pa la bdag med/ che ba'i ye shes dpag tu med par gnas pa/
338b6(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad la 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab zab rgya klong yangs pa de ni rang byung gi ya~M shes rkyen po rang snang ba'o// stong gsum gyi stong rten pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni/ nga'i nabs g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i 'og tu nan tes sdus so// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
338b7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni/ nga'i zhes ba zab mob pa/ dka' ba me tog su pra ta 'bru log par 'thus mo// ji gro rigs drug gi sems can malus pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad ni/ nga'i lag pa gi yon pa'i mthi la drab zhag te/
339a1(rnying rgyud): dper na skya ngur lag mthil du bzhag pa lta bu'o// chos kyi sku'i gzhi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos shes bya bab kyis grub pa/ thig le nyag gcig chos thams cad ye shes kyi snying por gnas pa dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/
339a2(rnying rgyud): yod med rtag chad kyi mtha' thams cad las grol ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal chems 'di stug po bkod pa'i gnas/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la gnas nas/ chos kyi sku la gnyen po gang gis kyang mi shigs par bstan pa'o//
339a3(rnying rgyud): zhes ye shes bla ma'i rgyud las/ le'u dang po gtsor bzhag pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi gsungs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
339a4(rnying rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mi gnas pa'i klong nas rig pa rang byung gis 'od gsal ba/ shangs kyi rlung sgro ma nas/ rang byung gi 'od lnga las/ sprul pa'i sku gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rang du byung ste/ rdo rje 'chang chen gyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod nye
339a5(rnying rgyud): cig/ sangs rgyas kyi sa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i tshe/ chos kyi mtha' las grol bar byed pa'i dgongs pa la bzlab pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas 'dus pa ye shes bla ma chen po'i rgyud 'di la spyi don bdun gyis bstan
339a6(rnying rgyud): le'u dang po rdo rje sems dpas zhal chems gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i dgongs pa la gnyen po med par bstan pa dang / le'u gnyis pa gsang ba'i bdag pos rdo rje 'ching la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dri bar bstan pa dang / le'u
339a7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams par bzhag par bstan pa dang / le'u bzhi pa rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag gi rtogs pa khyad par can thos las grol bar la 'bar bstan pa dang / le'u lnga ma rtogs pa'i gang zag rdo 'i gangan la
339b1(rnying rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar bstan pa dang / le'u drug pa sangs rgyas med par bstan pa dang / le'u bdun pa sangs rgyas med pas rnal 'byar chen pa la 'bras bu med par bstan pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dran pas dri ba dris pa/
339b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po chos thams cad de bzhin nyid ces bya ba/ ma bcos pa lags sam/ gnyis su med pa lags sam/ mnyam pa nyid lags sam/ mi g.yo ba lags sam/ ldan gyis grub pa lags sam/ shes pa gsal ba la rtog pa med pa tsam
339b3(rnying rgyud): lags sam/ dngos po gsal ba la rang bzhin med pa tsam lags sam/ stong pa nyid lags sam/ dngos po'i chos thams cad la sgyu ma tsam du shes pa de lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho lta bur g.yos pa med pa dang / shes pa rtog med du 'char
339b4(rnying rgyud): ba de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid lags sam/ de ji ltar lags bdag gis ma shes ma 'tshal to// kye thugs rje dang thabs su ldan pas bdag la lung bstan du gsol/ zhes dri ba dris te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje
339b5(rnying rgyud): nyon cig/ khyod kyis dri ba dris pa de legs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam mo// rgya mtsho chen po pas gting zab bo// me tog ku mu ta'i sa bon las cha phra'o// lung dang rigs pas rjes su mi dpog go//
339b6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de yang chos thams cad ni mtshon pa'i tshig bla dgas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// de yang byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams
339b7(rnying rgyud): kyis shes bya la nyams su myang ba'i chos ni/ rang gi ngo bo ma bcos pa nyid chos nyid du go ste/ chos nyid ma bcos pa des bdag dang gzhan du mi phyed pas/ gnyis su med pa zhes bya'o// gnyis su med pa'i don la rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pas chos
340a1(rnying rgyud): nyid mnyam pa nyid ces 'o// byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa la dazhag par nga/ sa shA ya gangs nas 'dul rnam ngas/ na nas // sabya mas mnam pa'i dang las shes
340a2(rnying rgyud): d+hal d+hA tshogs / sgrub ng+ge da rang gI shes pa las mdad pa la tshogs dang b+hU she ye shes sngags ba'i ldan nyan gyis thub pa'i phyinas na ts+tsha // zhes pa byed gas lapa rtag pa med pa ni pe ma ma rmang gyis m+b+ha brjod pa ltar gnas pa de da
340a3(rnying rgyud): zhes kyi mayin gyis dngas pan ma yin na// dngas phyogs la badzin lnga'i rnam par rnaMs pa ma jugags ba tsam lam yin / hrI pa na bya ba d+hA tsa ma dang ga rgyas ma gas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byung ba rnam yin nga mas dpa
340a4(rnying rgyud): pas smad pa'i spyod pa'o// sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni stong pa yang ma yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin na stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin cang ltar me tha yis zhe zhing ngos po zhin pa bzlon pa'i ched du stong pa nyid ces gsungs so// stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'go pa ni/ chos
340a5(rnying rgyud): nyid / dngos pa mgrub pas spyong la/ ye shes lnga spyi 'gug med pas ny-id ces byung // jirjes po ma tsamadu zhes pa dngangs pa grum gas tsam gyis zhes pa bye ba yin la/ sems pa rnaMs pa tsam gyi khams la zhes pa rtog meng du 'char ba ni bsam gtan chung chu
340a6(rnying rgyud): ma sa yin pa ste/ du sna byingam du ma // ga bye mthamasas byed pa nyid zhenasams mgag pa chos byeda' brjid ma par dag pa/ smras pa'i mnya' maspangs par smos pa'i bani
340a7(rnying rgyud): brjod pa'i mtha' ma spangs par brjod pa las 'das pa/ dbang po'i sgom 'gags par dbang ba'i spyod yul ma med no// gnas dag pa'i mishes teg med du gas la pa/ gsal ba bdag med pa'i rang bzhin ni mangs pabyud med sbyar rdzogasum bslang ma 'gags pa'o/
340b1(rnying rgyud): drugs rje sprul pa'i sgra ni 'od zer gyi phung por gnas so// rang bzhin dag pa'i ni dngos po'i mtha' las 'das te rang bzhin med pa'o// mtshon pa'i ye shes ni thig le nyag gcig a tir 'dus so// zhes ye shes bla mchen po'i rgyud las/ lag na rdo rjes dris
340b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i lan rdo rje 'chang gis bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje 'chang gi rjes su 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ gdams par bzhag pa'i thabs bstan du gsol/
340b3(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas mar me mdzad stong gi gtsug phud rin po ches chu bo chen po bzhi 'dus pa'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la ye shes bla ma chen po'i rgyud bka' stsal nas/ sdud pa
340b4(rnying rgyud): bral rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin 'od gsal chos nyid rnam par dag/ ma spros ma bkod zhing khams rnam dag nas// rang byung ye shes ma bcos mkhyen mda' ba// sku gsum lhun grub shes rab pha rol phyin// gzung 'dzin gnyis med mi gnas mya
340b5(rnying rgyud): ngan 'das// thabs kyi rgyal po stobs mchog byang chub sku// 'thob yongs la dpal mgon nyi shar ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod byang chub sems// thugs ka'i ye shes 'od zer 'bum gyi gzi// kun tu bzang po rang byung bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba yongs la nam
340b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' lta bur shar// mkhyen pa'i ye shes stobs bcu pha rol phyin// rnam par grol bas pha rol bdud bzhi 'joms// dbyings kyi thugs rje ma bsgribla mkhyen mnga' ba// snying po ma bcos kun gzhi byang chub sems// sa dang lam gyi bgrod pas pha rol phyin// rang
341a1(rnying rgyud): mnag na sa/ nas gnan ma na na su rgyu /
341a2(rnying rgyud): hUM ye shes ma bsgribs ma khyen mang ba// thugs rjerje rje ma 'thob yongs la shar// zhes bkang phyul to// rigs ni busangs rgyas kyis gdams pa bstan pa'i dus sa/ rgyud thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ngab bsnyen pa'i dus su 'khor ba
341a3(rnying rgyud): thog mapar gtsang pa'i gdams ngag chog gsum gyis bstan par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi bden pa mthong ba'i dus bstan pa'i tshe/ swAng TIg ma gsum gyi man dag shes par bya'o// zhes phye shes bram chen po'i rgyud las/ rjes su 'jug pa 'i sems can rnams la
341a4(rnying rgyud): gdams par bstan pa'i 'a'u ste gsum pa ma// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad kyi bzhin nyid 'od du kyang de/ skye ma dag pa'i gling nas thugs rje'i 'odagarlab// mi nA~M d+hal mtshan rdo sems dpa'i nal// rtse ba'i ye shes
341a5(rnying rgyud): dan me pas pa las // srung ba na du swa srA ba rgyang chub sems// gsang ba'i bdag ba rdzu 'phru rnams pa na// sprin gyi thugs can ba cing zang babs pa// theg 'i zhag bcig dang byu ye shes sgra// ma ga yas rgya dzA m+b+ha thur ljang sa
341a6(rnying rgyud): mu dum thar 'i me tog 'bras bur bcas// mi skyes skyeng po me tog 'azas bur sbyin// b+ha med dbyings nas skye ba'i spring bstan pa// rdo rje sems dpang sgyu stsal mkhyen mnga' ba// ro langs bde ba rang byung yi shes su// mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma
341a7(rnying rgyud): rna ci ga 'dra// mtshangs mkhyen pang zhes rab pa sagyid// bsad rnams sa phyo rgyagam tsho rdzogs pa'i blo// them byeng nu spong ba mi byed gsu ma // thabs pas bas pas bdag dngagazhanango ma mdzad pa/ rtsegs ba'i 'den po
341b1(rnying rgyud): bsas gas pa/ yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs tas thamasas kyi zlag sang rnams mamatshan pa rnyan pas sas par byu ba/ zag pazad pa thos sa ma sa pasmras du pas na pa na bag/ lags ngam dang /
341b2(rnying rgyud): rnams cad bye ba/ mun dag thams cad kyi mas/ mi can pa rgyang na pas 'das so// sa byal brten pathams ca mas spyong/ rnam par dag pa nga 'byu ste y-i shes su sha ba/ drim med pa na she sa hU~M b+h+yaHTa/ rang dag pa na pa
341b3(rnying rgyud): gsala'/ rang gi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o// shes byal sgrib pa med pas can mangs pa la sdug pa med // sbyin ci lag gi rnam par rtog pa rnams cung chos nyid kyi slong du la bzlas pas/ byed mi ldog pa shin tu 'das te/ zhwa b+ha ga sod pa stong pa chen po
341b4(rnying rgyud): dun du byang napas 'dasaso// gsung ston pa mang pa skabasam padza med myeng rnalas 'am so// thugs pa chen pa gangasas nga / yangs spangs pa yongs su gags pa/ nga ba byang chu yongs par blags pa'i mar gyi /
341b5(rnying rgyud): pa mang pa gas pa'i sbyangasas yin med // sengs rgyas pa sa mod / sa meng // zhes pa shes na brgyungalas/ rang dz+nyAn sa nas cas lasu smras pa sbya pa'i 'gyung napal/
341b6(rnying rgyud): chu sam sad pa sems dpa chen po rdo rje ga dang nga mngon par rdzogs pangs rgyas skye lus pa na pa 'ad can gyid kyi 'khor du/ ngan mthar ba tshangs pa'i sran spyan su tshogs par sangs rgyasas// yid dag pa med byer du byung ga zugs thas pad kyi rlom
341b7(rnying rgyud): bamathar byin pa sangs rgyams// mad bzun du mchags pa thub mad pa'i blang sangs rgyas so// phrin pamams byen pa pa rtsal bar thub bar mang brgyas // tshas thams cad ca ma dpa grang sa sa tu so// phyi da kyi byung ba cwas
342a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad skye med ye shes kyi klong mkha' slong rnam par dag par sangs rgyas so// nang brgyad pa 'jig rten 'gro ba rigs drug ga sems can srog gis bsdus pa thams cad la shas rnon po snga mi gnas pa ye shas rgyan po dang drug tu sangs kya //
342a2(rnying rgyud): ga gas sa mas sa nga bye pa ra gas pa / smranas klag ci badzin med/ zhugs su mi gas she / byang myi rnam pa
342a3(rnying rgyud): sa
342a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bzlog par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // thugs rje mgon po 'od dpag med// shA sha pA rA ma ta hrI// gsang bdag lag na rdo rje khyod// sA ri sa ri pra swaH// nges bstan khyod kyis yid la zung // ma kA yA i hi \u0f7f// spos dang bral ba'i chos nyid
342a5(rnying rgyud): a mu pA ri k+Sha yA ne// rnyed du brjod med skabs ma 'das// d+ha ma su bA ri/ swa gA b+ha/ sangs rgyas med par bdag 'dod pa// i Ni a Ni a ti a// nam mkha'i ri mo'i phyag rgya 'dra// oM kar a kar// lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i snyan mnga' yang /
342b1(rnying rgyud): yang dag sangs rgyas ngan rtsi gzugs// nga yis sangs rgyas ngan mthong na// mthang bzhid na 'gag par 'gyur// 'jig rten khams gan sangs rgyas kyang // nga nyid gcig pu rnam par dag/ nga med gzhan med gcig pu nyid// rang byung ye shas nyi kyang chog gi mtha' 'ang/
342b2(rnying rgyud): 'das// 'das pa'i chos la sangs rgyas gal yod// ces ye shes bla ma chen po'i spyad las/ sangs rgyas med par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas med par 'bras drug pa 'byu
342b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi snying po byang chub nyid du shar te/ byang chub kyi snying po las byang chub log tu bsgrub tu med de mi gnas so// rang byung gi ye shes nyid gzugs kyi skur 'byung ngo // rang byung gi ye shes las log pa'i gzugs kyi sku med
342b4(rnying rgyud): de mi gnas so// de bzhin du 'bras dang til la sogs pa yang / sa bon nyid 'bras bur 'byung ba las/ sa bon las log pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung gi/ de phyir rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag las/ rang byung gi ye shes chen por rang snang / rang shar/ rang
342b5(rnying rgyud): las grub/ rang gis shes/ rang la rdzogs te/ rgyud dag pa'i dbyings nas 'bras bu ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang snang ba'o// de phyir sa sbyang du med la ma bgrod du med/ 'bras bu gzhan la re ba med par thag chod pa'i ye shes so// zhes ye shes bla ma chen po'i
342b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ 'bras bu med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // 'og min gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs chen pos gsungs/ zhu ba po lag na rdo rjes zhus/ sdud pa po dga' rab rdo rjes bsdus nas/ sa non pa'i byang
342b7(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' mi bzhi la brgyad de/ 'jig rten du ma 'phel lo// rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes bla ma'i rgyud/ bskal pa thog ma med pa'i sngon rol nas/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i thugs nas thugs su brgyud/ snyan nas snyan du bsgrags phyag
343a1(rnying rgyud): nas phyag tu gtad de rgya yis btab// rgya gar ngan sngags 'bru gsum 'phyongs su btags// ras chod gzu lus byed pa'i slob ma la// sdig la mi 'dzem gnag pa'i las la sbyar// bu lang rin chen gser gyi rten btsugs kyang // brtag pa'i ngan
343a2(rnying rgyud): sngags 'bru gsum shor ra re// bi ma mi d+ha mkhas pa'i skyes mchog khyod// sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pa rgyud bdun po// rdo rje dbyings kyi pho brang bter du spos/ zhes shI sid has gsungs nas rgya yis btab po// rdzogs so// // de nas be ma la bod du byon
343a3(rnying rgyud): nas/ dbang bsgyur chos bshad nas/ rje 'bangs gnyis la bka' bsdams pa/ sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pa nyung brgyud pa/ rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas seng ge smad r+g+ha shrI sing has bdag la brdzangs pa 'di// stobs chung rnams kyis seng ge me thub kyi// rgyal blon
343a4(rnying rgyud): phyag tu gtad kyi shor ra re// rgyal po snyan khung chung pa dang // blon po gdug pa che ba dang // chos pad ma la mi gnas pas// thugs la dachongs la gter du spos// zhes gsungs nas/ slar gter sbas so// i dzi/ bi ma mi tra dang / skra cog zhang gsum gyi 'gyur//
343a5(rnying rgyud): spar rje seng ge mi 'gyur rdo rje thig le rtsal gyis brnyes so// bang de yid legasas med su mthAH/ shuk+taM/ rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sat+ti bo d+hi satwa d+h+wa dzA gra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rgyud ces
343a6(rnying rgyud): bya ba/ sangs rgyas mar me mdzad stong gi gtsug phud rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ sangs rgyas mi g.yo ba'i bskal pa dang po la/ yabs pa chen po'i grong khyer ma bkod par sdang ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs
343a7(rnying rgyud): po 'ad kyi brang po zhes bya ba mad da par 'dus ma byas pa/ chos nyid dang snang gi nam mkha' dang mnyam par bzhugs pa/ snying du byang chub la mngon par byang chub la/ chos thams cad smos pa med par rang gi rgyan du dgad pa/ shes byal ma mongs pa/ mngon par
343b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus ma byas pa/ kun d+ha bzang pa thams cad rgya mtsho dang rgya bran gyi tshul du 'byung zhing 'jug/ las thams cad ma btsal bar grub pa/ byed pa po med par grong gcig tu 'khyil ba/ sku'i ring bsrel chen pa snang ba 'od kyi phung por bzhugs pa/ gsung gi ring /
343b2(rnying rgyud): bsrel chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo lhur nub pa med par sgrogs pa/ thugs kyi ring bsrel chen po rdo rje lta bu 'gyur ba med pa'o// zhes byung chud kyi sems rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i rgyud las/ dang po'i byang tshul bstan pa dang / rang gi 'dug tshul bstan pa'i le'u
343b3(rnying rgyud): ste dang po'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa bstan pa'i ting nga 'dzin las bzhengs sde kyi gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ chos chen po gsang ba rmad du byung ba 'di ni stobs mi mnyam no//
343b4(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul mi mnyam mo// thugs rje'i bye brag mi mnyam mo// bzhugs pa'i klong mi mnyam mo// lag na rdo rje legs par yid la zung zhig/ de ltar yin te de ltar ma yin no/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid mnyam mo// ci ste gzhi rang gi ngo bo gcig pa'i
343b5(rnying rgyud): phyir ro// rtsal mnyam mo// ci ste byed pa tha dad med pa'i phyir ro// thugs rje mnyam mo// ci ste ye shes lnga mi 'gag pa'i phyir ro// bzhugs pa'i grong mnyam mo// ci ste chos nyid tha dad med pa'i phyir ro// de'i phyir nga'i shes rab zab mo ni/ rgyal mtshan gyi
343b6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra ste nub pa med do// nor bu rin po che dang 'dra skye zad mo shes so// nam mkha' dang 'dra ste mthar thug pa med do// ri bo dang 'dra ste 'gyur ba med do// pad+ma dang 'dra ste skyon med do// sa gzhi dang 'dra ste thams cad 'byung ngo // shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus brtol
343b7(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra ste/ sred pa gsum du nub pa med cing dang zhing rgyas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan/ mi 'gyur ba'i g.yung drung / ma bslad pa'i ye shes/ rgyun gyis rtag pa'i shes rab/ mtshon po med pa mya ngan las 'das so// rigs kyi bu
344a1(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rdo rje rgya gram ni bkod legs/ chos kyu rdo rje rtse mo ni brtsegs legs/ thig le mi 'gyur ba'i rgyal mtshan ni dpangs mtho/ thugs rje sprin gyi char khebs ni khong snyoms/ ting nge 'dzin mi g.yo ba'i dang 'phyang ni mnyen 'khyer
344a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po bzhi'i me long ni 'od gsal/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad phun sum tshogs pa'i dril du ni dbyangs snyan/ zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor mkhas/ byang chub kyi srog shing ni 'gyur ba med/ zhi gnas lhag mthong gi bre
344a3(rnying rgyud): phral ni brtsegs legs/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod ni tshul shes/ sangs rgyas kyis che ba'i yon tan rje dpag tu med pa'i rab sa ras kyi mdu 'phung te dam pa'i chos mtha' nas rgyas pa ni rang byung ldan rdzogs kyi dgongs pa'o// zhes byang chub kyi sems rgyal mtshan
344a4(rnying rgyud): gyi rtse mo'i rgyud las/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // thugs rje mgon po 'od dpag med// nga la dang po rgyu med pas// tha ma rkyen gyis bshig tu med/
344a5(rnying rgyud): da la bsgrub pa'i chos med pas// dngos grub gzhan la reb med// da la bstan pa'i chog med pas// sbubs ma yul las 'das pa yi ni// da la bla ma rje med pas// ye shes khyad par 'phags pa yin// nga la gdul bya gzhan med pas//
344a6(rnying rgyud): rnga chen po cing mi mdzad// nga nyid 'od kyi rang bzhin pas// thabs kyi ye shes dbyings na gsal// nyi ma'i sgyed por dang shar bas// 'byung ba lnga pas gtso chen yin// nam mkha' dag/ ri rab lta bur gzugs che bas// gom pa gcig gis
344a7(rnying rgyud): pha rol phyin// kun gzhi kha dang zhabs med pas// snang srid lto ru zos kyang nga mi 'grangs// nam mkha' gos su gon kyang nga mi logs// sa gzhi gdan du bting yang ngam 'dus// nyi zla bar du blangs kyi'ang ma dros// kye rtse gsang ba'i bdag po
344b1(rnying rgyud): gas// gsas 'das pa la// gas par ldan byung san// rnas dad pa nas su gzung la/ btan ba shA da po rnam ma man// rkang bags dgag pa dang pa
344b2(rnying rgyud): yenas gos pa med// gol dang mgo la tshig gi za snyad yin// rig pa'i rgyal po gzhig nas dag pa la// bsgribs dang mi bsgri bang lo dogs pa med// snying po gdod nas rdzogs sangs rgyas pa pa// bsam gtan dang la gnas pa dpon pa'i tshi ga dang bri//
344b3(rnying rgyud): lun du ma bstan pa'i sgrib pa'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi bar du bla ma dam pa la dri bar bya'o// bden pa ma mthong ba'i bar du bsgon pas mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes byang rgyab kyi sems rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rgyud las/ che ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum
344b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ skye don lnga bkrol ba'i gdams ngag bstan pa/ dbang po gzhi bru/ chos spyod srung / rlig pa gas gan/ ye shes mA pra srad/ nor bad+ha lA sa brdung ngo // dbang po gzhi badz+rab la
344b5(rnying rgyud): na/ sa su sa sa sa sa
344b6(rnying rgyud): dag papa/ de'i phyir ni dang pa lce gas kyi skye can zhes bya ste/ ba'ing bzhin ni mings ba ni pa da bar zhes bya ba yin te/ sa ci rnams mdzad mi pa bzhe gas pa ma phyu slob ba'i gyu lhamangon tan la nga bzhin dag pa phyir gyu
344b7(rnying rgyud): zer 'byung bas nga'i sprul pa'i sgra 'od zer du snang ngo // de'i phyir stong gsum gyi snong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyis snang bar nus pa'o// de'i rtsal snang ba nam mkha' la sprin gyi kha dog dkar dmar du snang ba dang / sa gzhi la rin po che dang / sal ba dag
345a1(rnying rgyud): nga gas pa dpang / sa sa da/ sa ngas sa su na
345a2(rnying rgyud): rnapa rji kyi nub pa nga rnyas stong pa sa kyang byed/ nga nga byed pa'i byu pa 'a / nga rji blangs sa sanas dus/ gnapa tha nga 'dzi/ byung nas/ da m+b+ha ma shes
345a3(rnying rgyud): sras sam brtan na dab dang rang bzhin bzhin ga shegs pas mi gzigs mi mkhyen no// de thugs rdo sprul pa'i grwa 'od d+ha bstanupas/ sems can rnams kyi shes par bya ba'i rme dang/ dbu' thor tshugs dang / mdzad sdi zug dang / sharas kyi rlung skom du/
345a4(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi pad mi dang / thugs kyi dpa pa dza dang / bskya thag yan cang nas 'od zeng rba zla drug tu 'tha~Md pa'o/ 'di ze ring yang dpag tu med pa pablang du med pag// zhes dri ba gnyis pa // de nas yang bke'i sgyul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mams
345a5(rnying rgyud): dbye chen byung kyis dris par lags sa// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas kyis la zugs rjed 'phrul pasamamis mi thu cing brjod shes mi langs pa da ga kyang tshang las babyung bar 'gyur ro// ci ti sengs sus ny-id kyi sprul ba'i rgyu yin pa 'gyur/ de'i phyir
345a6(rnying rgyud): khyo gyis chen pa zla sangs nas pas/ sangs rgyas y-i shes kyi las can zhes byeste/ kyi ba bzhi ngas pa'i mtha' las 'das // khyong kyi thugs rdo ska pong thar bstan / don mo dza dza // A mra k+Shar sna gzhal yang na
345a7(rnying rgyud): bad dang cing ba dra// ting brgyang chub tu pa gas// sems ca byed// gsapa pa'i mam 'ang na/ rtags kyi cug tu ga sa kyir// mnyes pa'i snyoms brjod s+ho// de'u rgyan rgyam nga// 'ang
345b1(rnying rgyud): dril bu 'dzin// rtags kyi phyag rgya dmyur la 'tshor// las kyi lha mo shugs 'chang la// rtags kyi phyag rgya stsol 'chor// dbyings kyi lha mo rnam dag su// rtags kyi phyag tu mthong la 'chor// 'od zer mtshogs phyogs brgyang ba / chos byed byings tu
345b2(rnying rgyud): pho brang du// sgrib med gsal ba'i ngo bor shud// dkar da mar 'od zer b+ha wA yAng // ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal ba'i phyir// gsal ba dang / dro ba dang / bsil ba dang / yang ba dang / yangs shing khyab pa sangs rgyas kyi snyad mthar phyin pa ma
345b3(rnying rgyud): long gi ye shes/ mchod pa gzugs kyi mchod pa la spyod do// de rnams so sor thim mo kun la des 'dre/ khye'u phyag na rdo rje las kyi rigs/ rlung gi rang bzhin snga sangs rgyas don grub kyi sprul pa/ rang gzhan las kyi sgrol ma/ mthar phyin pa bya ba thub pa'i
345b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes/ mchod pa sgra'i mchod pa'o// khye'u nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ lha snang mdzad kyi skal pa/ rang bzhin gyi med/ mthar phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes/ mchod pa dri'i mchod pa'o// khye
345b5(rnying rgyud): spyan ras gzigs rin po che'i rigs/ chu'i rang bzhin/ u sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyi sprul pa/ rang bzhin kun khA ba/ mthar phyin pa mnyam pa nyid 'byed pa med pa'i ye shes/ mchod pa ro'i mchod pa'o// khye'u sgrib pa rnam par spel pad+ma'i
345b6(rnying rgyud): rigs/ me'i rang bzhin/ lha snang ba mtha' yas kyi sprul pa/ rang bzhin nu bza' dkar mo/ mthar phyin pa so sor smin pa'i ye shes/ mchod pa reg bya'i mchod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i khye'u lnga po de khye'u snang ba'i rig byed la so so ga gon
345b7(rnying rgyud): gnas su tham nas gnas so// de nas khye'u snang ba rig byed/ rigs med pa'i rigs a'i rang bzhin/ sku 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin ma bcos pas/ mthar phyin pa mi gnas pa'i ye shes/ mchod pa bya ba med pa'i mchod pa'o// ches nyid
346a1(rnying rgyud): ngo sprod pa la gnyis te/ dbyings dang ye shes kha sbyor ro// rig pa gos gon la gnyis te/ rig pa 'od kyis lus la 'jug pa dang / 'od rig pa la 'jug pa'o// ye shes ma bu smad pa la gnyis te/ sngon byung gi sangs rgyas la
346a2(rnying rgyud): zhe su sa ga pa'o// na las rjin / sas s+ho// dbang pos brnas sa dang zung da nga zung sa sa / ga pa gas
346a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin thob/ ye shes mthu smad pas/ thugs rje 'byung ba'i sgom 'gags// nor bus rgyal sa zin pas sangs rgyas mya ngan las bzla'o// zhes byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i chud pas/ ngo spang bzhi la sri mdud lnga bkrol ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
346a4(rnying rgyud): kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ da mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ 'khor gyi mi pho bzhi la/ gang 'dul ba'i chos bzhis ston pa mngon par mthong ba bzhi ston cig/ gsang ba bla na med pa'i 'dul ba'i 'khor la/ pu btsal med pa nam mkha'
346a5(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i chos bstan/ mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i 'khor la/ chu zla'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i chos bstan/ mos pas spyod pa'i 'khor la/ gdung sha rI ra ma rin po che'i chos bstan/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor la/ sman gyi bla bi DU R+Ya 'od kyi rgyal po'i
346a6(rnying rgyud): chos bstan no// rigs kyi bu ngas 'jig rten gyi khams su rang lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi len no// sems can gyi lo stong brgyad brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi sprul pa'i sgrar bzhugs so// zhes byang chub kyi sems rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel gang zag la
346a7(rnying rgyud): gdams par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// rdzogs so// rgya rim pa brgya yis btab bo// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA san+ti taM la ga gu h+ya ti tA ni ya ma tan+t+ra nA ma bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po thig le gsang ba de khon nyid nges pa'i rmad ces
346b1(rnying rgyud): com ldan 'das dpal bran tu bzang po la phyag 'argyal ma// 'das dpadag gis thos pa'i dus g+ha TIg na/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i theg pa ma klung / rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i pho brang na// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ yod bzhin pa
346b2(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / khyeng dag pa'i rdza ma nan pa rdzogs pas/ nang thar napa na nyim byed par gyur bam// da nyid las mi gzhan pa'i dbang gin po dang / thugs rje dbyung dbang minu po dang / ye shes nam ltung bang gi 'ad / dpa' ba'i bu
346b3(rnying rgyud): dbang gi chu bo bzhis/ reg pa'i rtsal dbang rdzogs pa'i rang snang po/ 'khor dam pa'i dpal bzhi dang / mkha' 'grom lnga byang chub sems dpa' gsum dang / sbrul pa bdun dang / de'i tshe thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas la gan rdo rje gdan las
346b4(rnying rgyud): bzhengs te 'di skad gsol ba/ theg le nyeg gcig mtshan pa yi// gzhi lam 'bras bu dri med pa// sku gsum ye shes rdza rdzas te// namathangs rim pa gsung dri gsol// zhes zas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ spyo na yongs su byung ba zhes bya
346b5(rnying rgyud): nga na la nyams par thugs te da grasungs so// rig pa yon pargyan na // ga legs pa'i lam can na// thang mang smras pa lam// ye shes hrI shA // senas panas pa'i gnas na 'dang // ma gas larnam pa
346b6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul tshul dang // 'khrul ba log pa'i grol tshul gyis// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por 'gyur// bskyal pa dang po thog ma ni// sangs rgyas 'od du mi 'gyur bzhugs// ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba la// ngo bo nyid kyi sku shang ba// nam mkha' dang ni nyi ma bzhin// sa/
346b7(rnying rgyud): po rno gzhi la rdzogs pa'i dus// mchad pa ye yul can ni// snying po bcung du dril par gnas// mabyon sngon pol 'das pa'i dus// gzhi snang chen po'i gnas lugs yin// chos nyid yul gyi 'khrul gzhi dang // 'od rje lus kyi 'khrul gzhi dang // rig pa
