347a1(rnying rgyud): sems kyilakhrul gzha nga// gnas dang bas la rtog byas nas// ma ga lhan cig skyes pas bsgribs// ngan brtags ma dag pa las bskrad// su la byin dang bdan pa byaH// dmigs pa'i rten dang mtshungs pa'i byan//
347a2(rnying rgyud): drin byed kun tu tshol ba'i yid// nges par 'jog dang gtan la 'bebs// chom nyid 'byung ba dngas snyigs 'byed// snyigs ma lnga las snod ngadu chags// dngas ma shes pas ma bzung bcud// mchog tu sred pa'i sgong gnyis// me tog A du ma wa rang 'khrungs//
347a3(rnying rgyud): sems can sangs rgyas skye ba'i rten// bar gyi bskal par byung ba la// ye shes snang ba nad de nug// 'khrul ba'i snang ba ma shar te// ring so gnas pas yid baspyod pa// gzhi 'phags 'bras bum smin dus// sangs rgyas ye shes snying po can// rgyal
347a4(rnying rgyud): myu gu shar bya ni// migs la gsal ba'i bdag nyid can// 'khor 'das skye mdu'i ma grol bas// thabs dang shos rab sbyor ba gsum// sman gyis gzigs nas thugs kyis mkhyen// zhal gyi me stag dkar dmar blo// dkar po'i gzugs ni sa las
347a5(rnying rgyud): thob// tshor ba ser pos chus brtan// 'dra shes dmang po ma yis smin// 'dra byed ldang bu spa gis g.yos// rnam shes mthing gnam mkhar mi// nor budri ma med pa dang // nyi ma rab tu snang bar ston// 'ja' snang yul snang khang pa dang // rtang rdzi
347a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod 'ad ba// shing thoganas pal shing ldan dang // rang snar bcad rnams dag pa yi/ 'dod chags rlos kyi dga' sems las// 'jig rted bye bo meng spring sags// rim pa chags pa nyon mos // ngo badrug dang 'bras bu rtag/ mas
347a7(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba'i 'phrul bsrung // sprul pa'i sangs nas 'di srungs byu// bskal ba zam dganas pa'o// yul la thig pa 'od lnga dang / dang me ni rnam pa las// shes pa ye shes gdu shes// thub rgyal ma nyid spyo//
347b1(rnying rgyud): napa pa dbral// lanam mang pa'i lus dngas ngas// gas dang gasbyin pa yin// mthang kyang ba yul mnang bas// mam tid ma dang thad pa yin// shas ma myong bar gtamags pas// rang sa dus ngag/ pa na
347b2(rnying rgyud): 'di sa gsol// mnyam pa'i rgyal po kun rig chos kyi rje// 'og min rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems dpa' rang sems rtogs bya'i phyir// bla med ngo mtshar che ba'i sangs rgyas 'di// rtsa ba bcad pas sangs rgyas sems las ts+tshan
347b3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi bsam pa bdag la bstan du gsal// rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal ba/ sems pas sangs rgyas dad pa ni// mA ga sungs ma gsang gsung mi 'gyur// ma gsungs pa nyid kyi cher bshad// mi bskyod pa nyid
347b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gzhi// thugs la zhim bzhi shar ba// snga gsum ye shes rtswa ldan pas// ngan gyir spyod pa dmas par bzhag/ rin 'byung don ni dri bzhin ma// thugs la 'od lnga'i spro babyung // kun la thim pas rtags su bzhag/ snang ma pa'i dbya
347b5(rnying rgyud): ni ji bzhin ma// dngos su shel gyi mchod rten babs// rdo rje sems dpa'i me bang ste// dpe yi ye shes yongs su spros// don grub blani de bzhin ma// phyag rgya lnga yi 'khor lo las// dngas phyogs 'byed dang srog 'dzin pa// snying rje med pa'i
347b6(rnying rgyud): rlung bskyod// sems dang ye shes khyab gyes pas// sems ni nam mkhar dwangs shes bya// ye shes 'od du 'char zhes bya// snang ba lnga dang lam ldang de// nga bo thugs rjes rgyun thogs pa// nyi shar sngon ma thogs pa bzhin// chos nyid par de'i spang du
347b7(rnying rgyud): 'char// ye shes ngos gzung gdams ngag bya// dbang po rab la bar de med// 'dug dang snang dang shes las grel// mthar phyin pa rnams dus mtshungs gcig/ dbang por ba 'og skad cig drung // dang po 'khor ba dod nas drug/ gnyis pa rda

348b1(rnying rgyud): par shes pa drug dang ldan// rdzogs ldan dgangs pa sbyor ba gsum// spyan gyis yang gzigs mang la stang // thad ka rang la gsal ba dang // thugs kyi gang 'dul las mkhyen gzugs// rgya grAm pad+ma'i kha sbyor gyis// chos nyid 'dang chos can
348b2(rnying rgyud): aH/ ye shes ha dang shes rab sha// ngo bo mi 'gyur sa dang ni// mnyam pa nyid kyi yi ge ma// zhal sbyar yig drug rdo rje'i sgra// dkar dmar srad bu 'od du 'gro// las dag gang zag spyan la 'jug/ thig le gsumo ru 'du 'bral med// 'brel ba drug ne
348b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes rlung // rig pa byang sems rgya ba gsum// kun rdzob byad sems gnas pa gsum// rgyu dang 'bras bu bsgom pa gsum// 'dug tshul snang tshul gnas pa gcig/ 'chi ka gsum du 'jug pa ga ces// rgyud lung man ngag 'khor lo bskor// rtogs pas
348b4(rnying rgyud): bdag sgrol srid pa shar// rje blon dmangs kyi dpe ru bzhag/ dam pa'i lha gnas rnam gsum du// brda' sbra ngas pa'i 'khor lo bskor// rin cheni dbus su mya ngan 'das// dgongs brda' dag gi brgyad par gyur// rnam rtog mthus brnyas bag chags sbubs//
348b5(rnying rgyud): rin chen stug po'i gzhal yas ni// rig pa rtog med chos kyi sgra// dag pa'i rgyal shar 'od lnga'i grong // rigs lnga'i skur bzhugs longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje 'od gsal rang bzhin te// rang gi lus la khyar par gnas// de ni sprul pa'i sgra zhes bya// dbo stong pa'i
348b6(rnying rgyud): dang gnas pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yin// 'gags pa med par 'od gsal ba// me long lta bu'i ye shes yin// de dang ma bral mnyam pa nyid// shes rab ma 'gag chos rnams mkhyen// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes yin/ tshig ga ga can// bya ba grub pa'i
348b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes yin// mngon du ma gyur cha lnga yin// zur gsum sku gsum rtags yin te// dkar smug rtag pa 'od kyi rtags// rtsa bzhi ye shes bzhi ru bstan// ma 'khrul pa yi sangs rgyas te// don gyi ngo sprod zag chod yin// 'dug tshul 'od du 'dug pa la// sdang
349a1(rnying rgyud): tshul phyi nang med par snang // rgyang zhags tshul 'od gsal ba// rtags kyi ye shes tshon ga ba// mi 'gyur ba yi blta ba yin// rtags kyi ngo sprod yid ches 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i me long ni// ma byas pa yi chos yin te// rab dang ye
349a2(rnying rgyud): gsangam pa yin// sa kyai me kyis// chos spang gnas rtogs shing // rdzogs partson pa'i dgangs tshad// sems dang la ga nam pa // sems kyi mau dugs men te// bzugs pa'i gnas na ga la// d+hU ba'i gan nimakhyen pa la// dz+nyAn
349a3(rnying rgyud): kha dang sna bug gnyis// skyon ni 'khor ba'i chos su snang // de yi yul ni 'khrul pa ste// ma dag 'khrul pa'i snang ba yin// gzigs pa'i spyan ni shes rab po// rtog bcas don dpyod shes rab can// ye shes ngo bo gsum brtsegs yin// ye shes bzhugs gnas
349a4(rnying rgyud): tset+ta yin// lam ni dar dkar skud pa ste// de yi sgo ni spyan lam 'char// yon tan sku dang ye shes so// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ngo sprod ni// 'dra 'bag mched sku gnyis la sprad// longs sku lnga ldan do sprod kyis// longs sku dang gnas don rtogs shing // ma hA yo
349a5(rnying rgyud): ga'i dgongs pa chod// sbrul sku 'od 'khyil ngo spyod kyis// skul sku dang gnas don rtogs shing // a nu yo ga'i dgongs pa chod// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa ni// nyi ma'i snying po gnyis la skad// 'du 'bral med pa'i rdo spyod kyis// dbyer med rang gis rang
349a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs shing // rdzogs ldan chen po'i dgongs pa chod// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do la// rang rig lta bas zug bcad de// de ltar shes na the tshom chod// blo yi sa the tshom bcad pa min// grol ba'i dgongs pa dam pa yin// the tshomachod pas blo las grol// bltar
349a7(rnying rgyud): med blta ba'i gdeng la gnas// bgrod med lus ngag bya ba glod// rtsa dang rlung gi dag sgo bsdams// rgyal po gdan la gzhag par bya// blon po btson du gzung bar bya// dmangs rnams cham la dbab pa dang // srod la dbang po gnad du bsdu// nam phyed shes pa bum par
349b1(rnying rgyud): gzhug/ dza rangs dbang po dang krol la// nyin mo snang ba rang shar bshad// bshad po rnam dag pad baH// ting 'dran par dor gsal gdab cing // dbugs 'phos dus na sems sgo bcad// lam gyi mthung ni zad pa'i dus// snang ba sems kyi dbang du 'dus/
349b2(rnying rgyud): sems ni ma yengs dbang du 'dus// ma yengs tshan gyi grub 'dus ltar// 'degs byed khyab byed me mnyam rlung // mdebu dang 'brel gyur na// ma li brgyad kyis bugs ltar// bdun phrag grangs rnams ma rdzogs par// rlung gis las rnams rim par byed// sa
349b3(rnying rgyud): bar bla dgu bcu bzhugs// rigs drug gnas gshegs mdzad pa rdzogs// bcu gnyis mthar phyin chos skur thim// 'khor ba rang grol ste yi med// dbyer med don ni shes pas shes// shes rab 'grags med rnam par grol// mi 'gyur kun 'byung rin
349b4(rnying rgyud): chen skabs// rdzogs ldan chen po'i dgongs pa ni// shes rab mkha' la dngas pa yin// stobs ldan shugs kyis spyod par byed// sbyor skyel srung gnas mi rtog gsal// 'byung ba mA la zhu ba yis// sa chu me drung nam mkha' lnga// mtshan ma rang sar
349b5(rnying rgyud): grol bar byed// sgra gsher tshad dgayo mtshan med// ye shes dbyings su thim pa'i mkha'// chos dbyings dang nas ye shes gsal// rtsal stobs bzhi la 'du bar byed// gtso 'khor mi gtsang mi gzigs gsal// shes rab mkha' la gsal ba yis// thim
349b6(rnying rgyud): gsal bdag med mi 'byed gsal// sku gsum ye shes na 'i gsal ston// sgra gsum ye shes 'byings nags la// rig par dngas zin pa yis// sgra 'dus dgongs pa ldan pa dang // dgongs pa 'pho 'gyur med par byed// 'gyur med 'ag/ med 'du 'bral med// sku gsum
349b7(rnying rgyud): dza log dgongs pa ni// gsal ba gsum ldan rdo rje'i// dbyer med rtsigacig ye shes spyan// mi brjed gzungs bsgrims zos las grol// dus der yul gsum gcig tu 'dus// rang bzhin rnam dag snang ba yin// lus gsum gcig la rdzogs pa ni// 'gyur ba mid
350a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rin chen sbubs// spyan gsum gcig tu 'khyil ba ni// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// grol ba'i dgongs pa mthar phyin pa'o// chos kyi mtha' las grol ba'o// sangs rgyas la nI yul med do// ya shes la ni chos med do// 'bras bu
350a2(rnying rgyud): med do// dgongs pa de la thun med do// yang dag mthar las grol ba yi// mi bskyod stobs kyis gcod byed pas// mya ngan 'das la gom pa gcig/ gsum rdzogs mthar phyin lnga nyid dag/ mthar rdzogs gcig pu lhun gyis grub// rang bzhin ma bcos ji bzhin gnas// rdo rje'i gad
350a3(rnying rgyud): la grub mthar phyin// zhes gsungs so// de nas lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / 'jam dpal dang / mkha' 'gro ma za byed shAn ti thod pa'i phreng ba can dang / rdo rje khro gdong ma dang / nam mkha'i bu mo rdo rje rlung gi gshog pa can dang / gtsug gi rgyan gcig ma dang / bu ra Na nye bar ni
350a4(rnying rgyud): ga dang / rig pa 'dzin pa rnams dgyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ gzhi snang chen po'i gnas lugs kyis// yang dag lta ba gtan la phebs// ma rig 'khrul pa'i byang tshul gyis// sems can sangs rgyas dang du shar// 'khrul pa log pa'i grol tshul gyis// rdos bcas
350a5(rnying rgyud): la las grol pa ni// rang dngas dag pa chen por gsal// sha khrag lus las grol ba ni// rin chen gsang pa'i skyabs su gsal// dran rtog sems las grol ba ni// rig pa rang dngas chen por gsal// thig le rang 'das bcu gnyis kyis// dus bzhi snang bas rin
350a6(rnying rgyud): par phye// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos lnga yis// ma bskyod mkha' la de bzhin gshegs// byang chub sems dpa'i chos drug gis// yul sems lus dag byang chub sku// nges pa'i don la bdag cag 'dud// ces bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par
350a7(rnying rgyud): bstod do// rdzogs pa chen po thig le gsang ba'i nges rgyad rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+rarbak+Sha sa tISh+Tha ba dz+ra Sh+T+rI t+tan+danA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje srin po no brdo rnga mchu can gyi rgyud ces kya ba/ rgyad thams cad kyi skye
350b1(rnying rgyud): pa'akhor ba dong sdug chen po'i rgyud/ he ku nag po chen po zor tshu bra gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal chems/ sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa'i sku rten du bzhag pa/ chos nyid rang snang gi nam mkha' la/ rin po che gsar gyi glegs bam la/ ny+dza
350b2(rnying rgyud): zhun mas dang nan du bris te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas mi g.yo ba 'od kyi phung po la brkyang phyag phul te/ yan lag lnga sA la btsugs te/ yi dam gyi lha la gsol ba btab ste/
350b3(rnying rgyud): gzigs pas/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po yang gsang byung ba'i rgyud/ spyan gyi rgyal po ngur byed lta bu/ chos chen po gsang ba rmad du byung ba/ chos thams cad kyi zug rngu rab tu phye ba/ rdo rje srin po 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa/ gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge lta

350b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzam bu gling gi grong khyer chen po bzhi gzhom par bstan/ gsum pas 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can thams cad kyi srog bcad par bstan/ bzhi pas ri bo thams cad khyur ming du bza' bar bstan/ lnga pas nyi zla gos su gon par bstan/ drug
350b6(rnying rgyud): pas dam chos thams cad chu bo chen po la dbo bar bstun/ bdun pas sangs rgyas thams cad dur du gzhug par bstan no// A a/ gdong cig gsang ba'i bdag po ngas// khyed la legs par bstan par bya// badz+ra satwa g+hu ru pa la pra be sha ya// ma rig tu
350b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i kha 'byed nyi ma'i 'od po che// kun la snyoms pa'i zer ldan byams thugs can// dpag bsam shing bzhin zad med yid bzhin gter// dgos dgu phun sum tshogs pa'i srid gsum gnyen// thugs rje'i zhags pas rigs drug sems can 'ching /
351a1(rnying rgyud): nga 'dam nas 'dren mdzad lcags pacad// sems kyi mun pa kha 'byed rtsal mda' ba// sgogs ma dang bas phyag 'tshal sems dang ye shes dbye// sems dang ye shes gnyis kyi khyad par bstan pa yang // sems ne chu dang 'a
351a2(rnying rgyud): skye thams cad sdud// ye shes me dang 'dra ste thams cad bsreg/ chu yis ldan ljin len byed bsreg pa min// me yis ldan ljin sreg byed srung ba min// me yis sbur bsreg chags par byed mi srid// chu yis sbur sdud bsreg par byed mi srid// de bzhin sems
351a3(rnying rgyud): kyis dge sdig bag chags sdud// ye shes me yis rnam rtog bag chags bsreg/ sems kyis bag chags rnam 'phel bsreg mi nus// ye shes bag chags bsregs nas slar mi skye// chu yis spur sdud gzhan drang 'grogs par byed// me ni me nyid sreg byed
351a4(rnying rgyud): 'grogs pa med// de bzhin sems ni rnam rtog bag chags 'grogs// ye shes bag chags bsregs nas slar mi 'grogs// ci ltar me yi rtse mo la// sbrang bu 'du rug la rung // de bzhin sangs rgyas ye shes sgrib med la// nyon mongs bag chags 'du rug
351a5(rnying rgyud): la rung // des na sems ni rnam rtog bag chags bslad// ye shes bag chags bral ba'i rig pa'o// sems dang ye shes dbye ba'i thabs bstan pa'o// / lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dang gnas pas// mu stegs 'khrul pa'i lam
351a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra// sangs rgyas lus kyi rgyan bzang ba// ye shes lus can dri ma med// nga la 'dun na ye sangs rgyas// ya tha rgyal ba'i 'jig rten nas// ma pra dmyal ba'i gnas yan chad// rig pa'i ye shes rang ngo ma bcos lhun gyis grub la btsal du ye nas med/ khro bo'i
351a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'khor ba'i khrag zhag dathung ba po// nyon mongs skyed pa'i chos rnams ni// rang byung ye shes bdag med sku// mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin// thugs rje sbrul sku'i zhing khams kyang // skye med dag pa'i klong du 'das// ngo bo nyid
351b1(rnying rgyud): kyi sdung ba yang // mi gnas ye shes grong du 'dus// ci ltar gling bzhi'i rgyal po yang // bsod nams longs spyod mtha' blas kyang // bram ze gdug pa'i dmod pa yis// ci ltar brlag par 'gyur ba bzhin// 'khor ba'i bag chags kyang dka' ba// thA /
351b2(rnying rgyud): de brgyangs / da sbyig gsum la bral ba 'gyu// zhes la ba ba nga drug cid drud pas/ ma pa'i dbar ni srog pa'i 'a dpang// rnaMs bajas d+hangs dang/ gal tha
351b3(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom phran rdo rje 'ching// brtul lpags kyi ting nge 'dzin pas bltengs la// bshig par dka' ba'i grong khyer chen po bzhi// thabs mkhas thugs rje rdzu 'phrul
351b4(rnying rgyud): stobs ldan pas// sangs rgyas zhing du yang dag bskal ba'i phyir// lag na da'i bdag la bskrun du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das brtul zhugs kyi ting nge 'dren las bzhengs te/ gsang ba'i bdag ma khyod nyon cig/ badz+ran pa ni bas sbyiHhU~M/
351b5(rnying rgyud): kAn d+ha ni khe gA t-i re/ snying g+han/ ga ba nga na lan phyogs bzang na drug zigs// yus byigag pad kya gcig tu 'khril// gnyis med pa de bas thams cad yangs su zab// de nyid las byung spags ma sems kyi dang // drag rnam pa rje nas
351b6(rnying rgyud): sa na 'du ba / bya / sa// 'a na pag na nungs bad ga// ma nas mga' ga/
351b7(rnying rgyud): las g.yas pa med// grags pa'i bdag pa na sbyin pas gzigs pa/ byeng na nas nalasas gzigs pa te/ tshad med pa la gzigs pa te/ rang rig pa 'i ma shes la gzigs nga ngam par dgra pas/ gzu chu'i gli khams
352a1(rnying rgyud): lagan rnan khyod nyon cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi don du 'di skad smos shig/ sems kyis lon b+ha/ dran n+dog rtswa gzhil/ dbang ba ljon pa rba/ snang ba'i ngaskad/ ye shes ngos brgyung rtogs pa'i rjes bcad/ 'khor ba gzhi bzlog/
352a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba rang lugs su bzhag go// srid pa gsum ni bde ba'i gzhal yas khang / rang byung ye shes mi rtog nyon mongs bral// nyon mongs zhing dag sku gsum lhun gyis grub// dbang bsrung rgyas btab sku gsum ming gis mtshon/ cha lugs phyag rgya ma lus srul rdo ga/
352a3(rnying rgyud): sku bstan yig 'bru 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// gsal ba'i 'jig rten grags pas dbang du 'dus// shin tu dkon pa'i chos nyid zab mo'i yul shes shing // mya ngan 'das la mi gnas 'khor la mi gnas na// byang chub sems dpa' di ni yongs su mya ngan
352a4(rnying rgyud): 'da' bar 'gyur// zhes 'khor ba dod sdug chen po'i rgyud las/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong khyer chen po bzhi gzhom par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas ye shes kyi mgon po chen po nyid snying rje med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
352a5(rnying rgyud): de'i drung na gsang ba'i bdag po nyid phyag spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/ zhabs kyi pus mo sa la btsug te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag med/ snying rje rab tu mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs shig/ khams gsum gyi sems can ni nad pa lta bu ste/
352a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bsgral ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po nyon cig/ skye shi med par srog 'dzin par 'dod na/ mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i sku longs shig/ ma nu sa nA tset+ta e ka mar
352a7(rnying rgyud): na hU~M a/ lag na rdo rje zhus pa legs so// thog ma rang bzhin spun gyis grub pa'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba nyid/ sdig pa'i 'gran zla med par 'khor bar ltung ba de nyid rang gi ngo bor ma shes pa lhan cig gnas pa'i ma rig pa'o// lhan cig gnas pa'i ma rig pa rang
352b1(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi mu mi snang bas mthong ba'i yul la shes pa'i rig pa ma shor ro// de las kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sangs rgyas mang me mdzad stong gi gtsug phud rin po che ngas/ dbye ba'i grogs med pa'i mthong ba'i yul la
352b2(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i rig pa skad cig mas shes so// nga rang byung gi gzhi la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rtogs pa khyad par du gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rtogs pa'i don thugs su ma chud par/ tshol ba'i bsam pas sangs zhus na/ rang byung gi ye
352b3(rnying rgyud): shes rdzun par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi bden pa ni gar phyin la skang 'dab chags pa lta bu mi gtang na sems can gyi bsam pas ci ste bzung / de lta bus na byang chub kyi sems muMn sel bde ba'i skul rig pa'i sku rdo smad pas snang srid gsal ba shar ro//
352b4(rnying rgyud): don gyi ngo sprad pas/ tshig dang yi ger 'brel lo// yul chos nyid la ngo sbed pas/ snang ba rang bzhin med de/ me long lta bu'i ye shes so// kye gsang ba'i bdag po/ byang chub kyi sems rang rig pa'i klong la khyab gdal thub chub spyi spyad don klong / phug
352b5(rnying rgyud): rduthugs 'byams las nyag gcig go// 'khor ba dong smug chen po'i rgyud las/ khams gsum gyi sems can bsad par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ thabs mkhas pa/ med
352b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du snang ba/ nad thams cad sel bar byed pa khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus su gsang ba'i bdag po lag ni rdo rjes zhabs gnyis kyis nyi ma dang zla ba brdzis te/ rdo rje
