353b4(rnying rgyud): med don rtogs na// man shel sku ltar rang gi rgyud dag pas// dpe don rtags dang gsum gyis tshad ldan pas// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin thob pa yin// lung gi rgyal po rig pa'i khu byug ltos// zin pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te// sman gyis gnas par bzhag pa
353b5(rnying rgyud): yin// a ti rangs raganas pa'i lung // rgyal tsha ba chen po bde ba'i bka'// bslab med rtsal skrag smon pa med pa yi// byang med lun rdzogs snga ma de bzhin nyid// rtog dpyod rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings la// log tog bying pa'i spyod pas ci zhig bsdu/
353b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dgongs pa ye nas gnas pa la// da lta nga la gnas par byar med de// byang sems bsgom pa chu bo'i klung 'byams nas// bsgo ma dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis med na// don dam nga la bden par bzhag pa ni// chu bo klung 'byims dgongs pas zin pa yin//
353b7(rnying rgyud): rgyun gyi ting 'dzin yengs bral med par ma shes na// khyung chen gshog rdzogs bka' 'di dang du longs// mi g.yo rang bzhin gnas pas smad n+te n+yA ma byas na// mtho ris bgrod pa'i lam des nyon mongs zin par 'gyur// lam med lam du 'jug pa rnams kyi
354a1(rnying rgyud): nad chab// phyin par 'dod pas ri dwags sdig tu brtag pa 'dra// brtag pa'i yul med 'jig rten gsum las yongs mi 'byung // chos las 'das pa'i sla ma shes na// nAm mkha' cha lung nges pa las// rang gi mthA lA swA
354a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa las// chos 'di gzhan las 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes// rgyud thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir ro// 'khor ba dong sdugs kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lung thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir/ lung gi che bas yid ches pa'o// 'khor ba dod sbugs chen po'i
354a3(rnying rgyud): na dus sa na /
354a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs shig/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'byung ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ ngas khams gsum gyi sems can la ci ltar 'od zer gyi phung po 'byung ba bstan par bya/ zhes
354a5(rnying rgyud): zhus par/ bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i 'od phung gi ting nge 'dzin pas bzhengs te zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod kyis dri ba dris pa legs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ ye shes lnga'i rtsal
354a6(rnying rgyud): me 'gags pas 'od zer gyi phung por gnas so// 'byung ba chen po lnga la ma btsal bar grub pas yongs la khyab par gnas so// rigs kyi bu gang gis mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ kyai'i 'byung ba wa snang byed kyi blon ma la 'dus so// rang gi 'byung ba
354a7(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i sgron ma la 'dus so// snang byed kyi sngon ma rig pa la 'dus pa'i dus na/ ye shes kyi nyi ma rang la snang ste/ dus rtag tu lhung de lhan ni nyin mo dang mtshan mor ma yin no// de bzhin du bde bar gshegs pa thams cad lha dang lha mo nam mkha'i ri mo la
354b1(rnying rgyud): sogs te/ 'od thams cad dang po byung yang rang rig pa las byung ngo // tha ma yang rang rig pa la 'dus so// nam mkha' che lung nges pa las kyang / de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pa// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla 'og grub// ma nges kha dog sna tshogs las//
354b2(rnying rgyud): rig kyi khyad par mngon par snang // zhes gsungs so// kyi gsang ba'i bdag po go bar dka' ba'i tshig 'di yid la zung zhig/ ma hA da ny+dza sarba dug+ha a ta/ dak+Sha a yu 'ad+ha Ta/ gadz+ra bad+ha du/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po/ lag na rdorje che/ bas
354b3(rnying rgyud): gyis pha rol dpung 'joms pa// sku mdog nag cing 'jigs pa che// gzugs che yan lag rags pa ste// khro gnyer bzhin mi sdug pa'o// phyag mtshan rdo rje 'bar ba yis// 'jig rten khams kun 'joms par byed// ye shes me dpung chen po yis// srid pa
354b4(rnying rgyud): gsum yang bsreg par byed// hU~M dang phaT gyi sgra sgrogs pas// gdug pa thams cad dpa' yang bkod// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// 'gro ba'i mgon po de bzhin gshegs// bka' ni nyon cig rdo rje 'chang // khams gsum dpa' gang ma gyur na rdo rje don
354b5(rnying rgyud): med dam/ nga yi bka' 'di rngan nam ni// nyon cig ltos shig rdo rje 'chang // 'jig rten khams ni 'khrugs par byed// rdo rje lan cig gsor ba yis// bdud dang srin po khrag tu skyug/ rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis// rdo rje 'chang chen gan srub 'gyel// spyi
354b6(rnying rgyud): 'drar lus zhum pa spu gzings// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje rigs gser 'phreng // stobs bcus pha rol dpung 'joms pa// dal khro ba'i sems ni bgyi// bdud dang srin po mi ma yin// sgying rje med par tshar chod cig/ lag na do
354b7(rnying rgyud): khros pa yis// lan cig rdo rje gsor ba yis// bdud dang srin po mi ma yin// gan srub snying 'dar khrag lkugs shing // ci bgyi'i bka' nyan gsung sdod de 'bangs su mchis nas lag na rdo rje mi bzad par shin tu 'jigs skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das
355a1(rnying rgyud): thugs chen pa dang ldan pa/ bdag cag bsrub tu gsol/ bdag cag gi srog mi gzhom dugasol/ lag rdordo rjes smras pa bzhin rjes sra bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sgrub pa/ lag nad du
355a2(rnying rgyud): thas / ngas sas sa sa pa / badz+ra pa da gyus // nga ba sa
355a3(rnying rgyud): zhing yongs su dag par byin gyis brlabs zin gyis/ nang bcud kyis bsdus pa 'gro ba rigs dag gi sems can thams cad kyang ngas byin gyis brlabs pas/ khyod sdug bsngal bar ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa'i
355a4(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhes 'khor bdod spug chen po'i rgyud las/ TI gla gos bu gon pa dang lag na rdo rjes bdud btul ba'i le ru ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // zlog ma rang bzhin ldan gyis blang// rgyu
355a5(rnying rgyud): rkyen med par mya ngan 'das// chos med shes rab rang byung ba sa// mi gnas rdo rje skyid po'i sku// bya btsal med par 'de gnas pas// da ni rang byung ye shes yin// tshig dang yi ges dam bskyed// nam mkha'i klong nas rang byung bas// mi gnas
355a6(rnying rgyud): bde ldan phun sum tshogs// chos kyis yang dgra don brjod du// snying po dag pa'i klong nas bshad// kye gsang ba'i bdag po rang byung gi ye shes bya ba bab kyis grub pa las/ byas pa'i chos ka nas med do// pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sarba b+ha dar ni A pA rA 'bre ShA
355a7(rnying rgyud): yAM/ de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal chos yin gyi// chos la gnas par mi bya'o// bde ba chen po'i sku mnga' bas// ma btsal bzhag na rdo rje'i sku// 'gyur ba med pa'i sku mnga' bas// bya btsal med pa ye shes bya// sna
355b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs dag pa'i sku mnga' bas// ma bsdad bzhag na ye shes sku// sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sku mnga' bas// ma bkag bzhag na dang byung sku// snying po gdod nas dag pa la// chos spyod bcu yis sangs mi rgya// mA btsal lhun gyis grub pa la// yon tan bcu
355b2(rnying rgyud): yis gsal du med// bka' lung phyi mor rang shar bas// chos kyis shes rab bskyed du med// sangs rgyas chos las ma byung bas// rgyud lung man ngag da yi dug/ kyi gsang ba'i bdag po chos las 'das pa'i sku rlom shes na/ rang gi rig pa la dris
355b3(rnying rgyud): shig/ de mtshon pa'i dpe ngo ma shes na/ rdo rje sems dpa' me long la dris shig/ sangs rgyas sku rang la gnas pa'i rtags ngom shes na byang chub sems kyi sgron ma la ltos shig/ kye sems dpa' chen po mtshon pa'i byang chub chos yin kyang / rtogs pa'i
355b4(rnying rgyud): ba rang rig pa'i ye shes kho na'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / chos las 'das pa'i sku snying po byang chub la 'du 'bral med par dag par gnas so// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad chos nyid rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i ngang du bya
355b5(rnying rgyud): btsal med par snyims shig/ ces rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal to// 'khor ba dong sdug chen po'i rgyud las/ dam pa'i chos rgya mtsho chen por dbab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
355b6(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus su gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs shig/ ngas phyogs btu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku
355b7(rnying rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bla ma chen po mtha' gang la bskyal/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i mtha' gar gtugs/ khams gsum sems can thams cad 'khor ba ru log pa'i dus su dang de'i zhing khams gcig gamatha dad / lung rgyud man ngag gi
356a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' gang bskul/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab zheng gang la spyad/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal bye brag zugs rje chen po'i rtsal gang la sbyar/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ dgongs pa'i mtha'
356a2(rnying rgyud): tsam la bzhag/ mya ngan las 'das nas mthar thug pa'i sa gang du bzhag/ ces zhus pas/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnam chen po'i mtha'/ sangs rgyas thams cad k+Shi mes po sangs rgyas nyag gcig tu bskyal lo// sangs
356a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes skyug tugs so// 'khor ba ru log pa'i dus su mar me'i sdong bu la ma dA me brten pa'i tshul du zhing khams gcig go// klung lung man ngag gi mtha' ni brjod bya dang rjod byed med par bskul lo// 'khor ba'i
356a4(rnying rgyud): 'dam rdzab ni rnam par dag pa'i zhing bde ba chen po la 'god par spang bar sbyang ngo // sems can gyi sdug bsngal ni/ rig pa'i rtsal ma 'gags par sbyar ro// sangs rgyas mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'ja' tshon lta bu la mthong ba'i yul
356a5(rnying rgyud): nyams su myang bar bya'o// mya ngan las 'das nas mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen por gzhag go// zhes 'khor ba dod smug chen po'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas ngur du gzhug pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // rdzogs so// / mkhas pa'i mkhas pa slob dpon
356a6(rnying rgyud): bi ma las// dka' dang bsngos nas don gyi man ngag btsal// rdo rje gdan nas shrI sid has gnang // rang gi rgyud sbyangs 'gro ba'i don byas nas// sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pa ma nor rgyud// thugs kyi klong nas 'bru gsum spros pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' re
356a7(rnying rgyud): ri'i rgyud du bzhag/ rgyud kyi snying po man dag gzer bzhi po// sde dang tshogs su bcad nas rgya yis btab// 'tsho med bdud rtsi theg le nyag gcig po// rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas bzhes pa 'di// spu rgyal btsan po'i don du shrI sing has gnang ba cu drin che// bod kye rgyal
356b1(rnying rgyud): khams chos lugs ngan pas slar la gter du sbas so// zhes gsungs so// bi ma las gdams so// sras rgyats+tsha// rgya gar skad du/ rat+na b+hA bAn+d+ha rA lo kaH/ bod skad du/ rin po che srid pa bar mdo sdang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan
356b2(rnying rgyud): 'das dang snang kun tu bzang po lnga phyag 'tshal lo// dus bzhi mnyam par gcig par snang ba'i dus// rgyu gyen ma bskyed ye shes snang ba'i dus// lus sems gnyis po tha dad snang ba'i dus// rang gi rnam rtog dbugs la brten pa'i dus// 'khor
356b3(rnying rgyud): 'das gcig par snang ba'i dus// chos sku skye med rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas// ye shes ma skyes reg pa stong pa'i gnas// lus dang sems gnyis srid par snang ba'i gnas// snang ba thogs med spyod yul ston pa'i gnas// 'khor ba'i
356b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'das snang ba'i gnas// chos sku'i snying po brjod med ston pa dang // ye shes snying po mi garjod ston pa dang // lus kyi snang tshul sems kyi ston pa dang // dbugs kyi rnam rtog snang ba'i ston pa dang // 'khor ba'i lam dang mya ngan 'das pa'i lam ston pa
356b5(rnying rgyud): rang byung chos sku ma 'gags 'khor de dang // rang byung ye shes 'gags med 'khor nyid dang // lus kyi 'khor dang sems kyi 'khor nyid dang // blags kyi rnam rtog lam tshol 'khor nyid dang // tha mi dad pa da cig snang 'khor nyid do// rang byung ye shes mi
356b6(rnying rgyud): brjod bstan pa dang // ming dang brda' ru byung ba'i bstan pa dang // brjod pa'i ngag med sems brjod bstan pa dang // brjod med mi brjod dbyer med bstan pa'o// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // srud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis//
356b7(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// lus med lus su grub pa sems can lus// dang po lus 'di rgyu nyid ci las byung // bar du bskyed lugs ji ltar grung// tha mar lus kyi 'bras bu 'khrul pa ci ltar rgyas// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po yis//
357a1(rnying rgyud): dang po lus med lus kyi rgyu 'di ni// rang byung ye shes ma 'gags dag las byung // bar du lus kyi rgyu 'di ni// ye shes gzugs kyi yon tan las// zer gyi yan lag 'od snang lus// rngog mar lus kyi rgyu 'di ni// rgyal
357a2(rnying rgyud): lus dang rkyen gyi lus// rgyu yi lus ni rnam gnyis te// rang gi skyed dang tshogs pa'i rgyu// rang gi rgyu yi lus la yang // rig pa 'gags med 'od kyi lus// rkyen gyi lus la rnam gnyis te// 'dun pa'i sgo nas lus btsal te// bzung ngan med pa'i lus dag
357a3(rnying rgyud): la// thob pa ni 'du shes byis pa yis// 'dun pa'i sems kyis btsal te 'dug/ chu mthun snang pas pha mar mthong // pha'i rdo rje'i byang sems las// rang gi lus de'i rgyu mthong// rmA yi ridi chen pad+ma las// gnas kyi sgonas bskyed byar mthong // dargya
357a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu bskyed bya gnyis snang las// rang gi lus de grub par mthong // mthong ba'i 'dun pas snang ba'i lus btsal nas// khu ba khrag las lus nyid mthong // mthong ba'i shes pa brtas pa'i bag chags kyis// bag chags rang snang lus de bskyed par snang // snga
357a5(rnying rgyud): po'i shes pas dngos su yod par grub// nan nan nur nur nus pas lus nyid bskyed par gnas// ltar ltar lhur gyur lus kyi gzhi ru krung // gar gar gor gor lus kyi dngos por chags// sdud pa'i lte bar dri za lce 'khor lus// dbang po yan lag tshang ba'i
357a6(rnying rgyud): lus su gnas// lus su smin pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal bcu gnyis myong // dogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyi med dmyal bar 'dra// dbang po yan lag sdug bsngal khyad par re// rnam shes dbang po sdug bsngal lhog pa de// 'dun pa'i 'dod chags dag gis
357a7(rnying rgyud): lus nyid grub// pha la zhe sdang skye zhing ma la 'dod chags skye// rig pa po yi lus su grub pa'i rtags// me la zhe sdang bye zhing pha la 'dod chags ste// rig pa mo yi lus su grub pa'i rtags// lus nyid mthon po mngon du rgyas pa na// 'khrul pas rig
357b1(rnying rgyud): bzhananaH kau rgyas// 'khrul pa bzhi brgyan bzhi las// drug brdal bzhi bcang bzhi rgyu // sems can lus su thab pa bstan pa'i la ma gnyis pA// dz+ra dang byigasung bdag rngu rdzas mas dpan yas// ston pa ston pa ldan
357b2(rnying rgyud): bzang po la// sems can lus su grub pa la// ye shes kyis ni bzlog pa dang // ye shes nyid lus thob pa ci lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po yis// ye shes lus nyid thob pa'i dngos po ni// ye shes pa yang rnam gnyis te// rig pa'i ye shes
357b3(rnying rgyud): lus dag dang // dig med ye shes lus dag go// rig pa'i ye shes lus kyi dngos po ni// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du cig/ lus kyi dngos po shing bal 'dab pas yang // sems can lus la sangs rgyas dgongs pa can// tha mal pa yi//
357b4(rnying rgyud): lus nyid bzlog par byed// ye shes snying po ma 'gags 'gag med lus// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad gsal// ma 'gags mi g.yo thogs pa med pa'i sku// brjod med mi brjod g.yos pa med pa'i dang // lus nyid snang bas byang/
357b5(rnying rgyud): sems grol ba sel// shes bya'i sgrib pa gting dpag dka' phra mo// sku nyid snang ba tsam gyis sel bar byed// thogs med 'od kyi lus su grub pa ste// thogs bcas lus kyi snang ba bzlog par 'byed// rig med ye shes snying po'i lus de ni// ye shes
357b6(rnying rgyud): snying po 'gagapa med 'gag pa med// yul dang yul can gnyis su mi rig cing // mtshan ma rnam rtog gnyis su rig pa med// rig med lus de chos nyid nam mkha' 'dra// chos nyid nam mkha' gzugs su grub pa med// gzugs su ma grub dngos
357b7(rnying rgyud): por thogs pa med// ye shes rang dbang chen po'i lus su grub pa yin// gzhan la mi ltos khyad par chen po'i lus// rang gi lus de rang gi dbang thob bo// chu rkyen bral ba'i lus su grub pa yin// sems can lus de ye shes lus su grub pa'o//
358a1(rnying rgyud): shes lus nyid grub pa'i yon tan ni// lus deng nas dang na ba med par 'or// lus de yang zhing bcos su btub par 'ongad// shrI ba med cing ye shes 'pho 'jug shes// dmigs pa'i lus med lus dacing yang snang // sems
358a2(rnying rgyud): can lus de gyen gyis bslab par yod// ye shes lus de rgyu rkyen bral ba'i lus// gzugs med nam mkha'i lus kyis bzlog par byed// gzugs khams 'od las grub pa'i dngos po de// gzugs de thogs med ye shes 'od kyis bzlob// lus med lus
358a3(rnying rgyud): de lus kyi mchog chen po// lus kyi mtha' nyid rtogs pas lus kun rtog/ gzugs su bzung ba'i lus de 'khrul lus so// sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs pa'i lus chen po// sems can lus kyi ye shes ma 'khrul bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum
358a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pakun tu bzang po la// sems can lus cu brud pa thams cad la// mi rtag 'chi ba'i lus de snang tshul grang // rton pa 'i ston pa kun tu bzang po yis// sems can
358a5(rnying rgyud): lus su grub pa thams cad la// rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa yin pas na// rgyu mi nus pa zad pras 'chi bar snang // nus pa dzad pa'i rtags ni 'di rnams dbyung // 'byung ba lha yis ngaskyed pa'i lhas yin pas// sa yi nas bzad pas skam por snang // rgyu yi
358a6(rnying rgyud): bzad pas lci bar 'ong // me yi nus pa zad pas grang bar spyod // rlung gi chus pa zad pas lngar mi nus// nam mkha'i nus bzad pas bklag medangs nyams// 'chi ba lta bu'i snang ba 'byung ba yin// dge sdig byas pa'i 'chi ba'i snang pa gang // dge ba byas
358a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i snang ba 'di rnams 'byung // rang gi snang ba lha dang lha mo yis// 'dod yon mchod pa 'bul ba'i sdang ba 'byung // kha dog dkar po 'od dang bcas par snang // zhing khams ma lus gsal zhing me dam gsal// bde gshegs sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras
358b1(rnying rgyud): medam par byed// lha dang mkha' 'gros yun dang grogs por byed// gshan rnga sha zamang pos khur zhing rje po na mthong // lha sran sna brgyad bran dang galag par snang // dbugs kyi drod de dang mthil nas yal nas// suM gzug tshangs pa'i gnas su thud par byed//
358b2(rnying rgyud): skye yi dbugs de reng du rgyas pa las// rtog med nam mkha'i dang la sed cher thong // sdig pa byed pa'i 'chi ba'i sdang ba de// sha za gshin rje mang po mthong ba dang // mi sdug gzugs nyid sna tshogs ston par byed// tshe srog dbugs kyis brgyal bami togs te// du ni
358b3(rnying rgyud): dmang po 'don par byed// zhags thogs mtshon thogs mang po'i gshin rje yis// de 'dod zer zhing khyab nas phul bar byed// tshe srang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mang po myong bar ston// srid pa'i 'khor lo nyin 'dun mtshan bdun bskor// rang gis sdug bsngal mang po
358b4(rnying rgyud): zhar la snang // bskal bar bsags pa'i sdug bsngal ston par byed// rigs drug snang ba thams cad ston par 'ong // rang gi mtshan ma nag por mthong // rang gis ngus nas pha bos ma pos kyang // mun nag chen por rang nyid gcig pur 'khyams// srid par
358b5(rnying rgyud): 'khyams pa'i sdug bsngal mang po mthong // lha srin sde brgyad sha dang khrag la za// lus kyi drod de spyi bo nas bzung nas// rkang mthil bar du drod de yal bar byed// rang gi snang ba 'khrul pas dmyal ba mdzong // 'chi ba'i lus snang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
358b6(rnying rgyud): sdud pa'i gsad bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// srid pa bar mdo snang ba'i lus de ci lta bu lags// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// byung ba'i bar do 'byung ba'i bar do dang // gnas pa'i bar do rnam pa gsum du
358b7(rnying rgyud): nga // bar dor phar cher zhags ni bdun la 'byung // bdun tshe bdun la bar de thengasar 'byung // bar do rang la gnas pa'i sdang tshul ni// lus kyi snang tshul sems kyi snang tshul lo// lus kyi snang tshul 'di ltar snang ba ste// dbang po kun tshang thogs med lus//
359a1(rnying rgyud): tron 'thung srid pa'i shAg zugs can// rdzogs med mus dathams ca 'grams// dbugs d+ha la gan // 'das dang ma dngas rnams pa na// ra ga chags 'bras pa gas pa// dgu thog rgyas gsus dang/
359a2(rnying rgyud): snang // smon du 'dris pa thams cad can// gdung ba'i snyoms kyis gsal bar spyad// 'dres pa'i tshul gyis thos pa'i 'o// lam de zhi pa nas mal la 'dod// sngon gyi gyis rnam par gsal// 'dris pa'i dngos po pardad mi byud// dang rtog
359a3(rnying rgyud): dbugs kyi rta la zhon// kun tu 'khyams te kun tu 'khor// sa ma la dus rtags med pa ru// rang gi snang ba gcig pur mthong // shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje yis// sdig khyed lus la gnod par byed// sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar byed//
359a4(rnying rgyud): 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka gsal// gsal ba'i ye shes phra mo de// ye shes gsum du 'gyur ba yin// rig pa'i ye shes chos rnams gsal// rig pa mi g.yo ye shes gas la// rig med snying po chos nyid gsal// ye shes gsum la gnas par
359a5(rnying rgyud): bya'o// sems can dus dunas med// theg pa'i na sems nyid yin// sangs rgyas sun lag da// dgas la brten pa'i shes pa de// / ba dgas// rlung rgyang cung rdzogs pabapyod/ nas /
359a6(rnying rgyud): nga thams cad gsal ba ste// ye shes gsal ba'i rgyu yin pas// dmigs bya dmigs byed med pa ru// chos spu nam mkha'i ngang la bzhag/ thog ma med pa'i lus de ni// ming tsam med pa'i lha 'grub pas// thogs bcas lus po chos nyid thog
359a7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin med par gzhag par bya// sna tshogs gzugs su gsal bde// ye shes yon tan ma 'gags pas// ma dgags 'gag pa med par bzhag/ mtshan med chos nyid mthong ba med// brda dang ming gi mthong ba ste// mthong med don dam mtho
359b1(rnying rgyud): chos sri mthong danamamakha' 'dug// bar bo dang spangs la smras pa'o// / rgyud+hA pa'i gsang bdag N+DI rnamams dpa' mas// stan pa'i ldan pa sa bzang po la// 'dadu sa shes pa dadagral// bcom pa'i thabs na dadu
359b2(rnying rgyud): bar do'i shes pa de dag la// bcos pa'i thabs ni rnam gsum ste// ma chags mi g.yo btsos pa ni// longs spyod lus la ma chags pas// dmigs pa med pa'i 'bras bu thob// longs spyod la ni rnam gnyis te// dbang po lnga yi
359b3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod la// chags na 'dod pa'i khams su skye// rang gi lus la chags pas ni// 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha ru skye// rang sems dang la chags pas ni// gzugs khams gnas su lus len te// zhe sdang rgyun chen drags pa na// dmyal
359b4(rnying rgyud): 'i gnas su lus len te// 'dod chags rgyan chen dregs pas na// yi dwags gnas su lus len te// gti mug rgyun chen drags pa na// dud 'gro'i gnas su lus len to// nga rgyal rgyun chen drags pa na// mi yi gnas su lus len to//
359b5(rnying rgyud): phrag dog rgyun chen drags pa na// lha min gnas su lus len to// le lo rgyan chen drags pa na// lha yi gnas su lus len to// ye shes g.yo ba med pa'i rtags// 'gags na longs spyod rdzogs skur skye// chos nyid mi 'gyur nam mkha' la//
359b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin med par rtogs pa na// sangs rgyas chos sku'i snying po thob// 'tsho ba dbugs kyi bar do ru// chos rnams thams cad dran mi bya// dran rtog med pa'i nam mkha' la// dmigs pa med par sing der bzhag/ bag chags mi g.yo ye shes
359b7(rnying rgyud): te// rang bzhin med par bzhag par bya// rang bzhin med par rtogs gyur na// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po thod// chos rnams nam mkha'i snyi po la// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog ci byung yang // rtog med nam mkha'i dang du bsgom// chos rnams thams
360a1(rnying rgyud): nang lbu bas gcod// lus ngag skad pa chen po de// sras kyi thug bsngal rje zung yang // rig pa'i shes pa de dag kun// rig med dbugs kyi rol// nam rtog bcas dmakha' la bzhan// rnam rtog tu dang na
360a2(rnying rgyud): yin pas// yid kyi ye shes med mi bsgom// lo dang bkal pa mang po chu// nyon mongs bag chags mang yod kyang // bar de'i ye shes skad cig gis// gas la bas thams cad dag par byed// 'chi ba'i ye shes stobs drags na// gang
360a3(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog nyon mongs kun// ye shes mad cig dag gis sel// dzAchi kha'i ye shes stobs 'anan// lo dang bskal pa'i bag chags kun// dus de nyid du rdzogs par sna // bar de'i shes pa ye shes su bcos pa'i thabs bstan pa'i lar+tha
360a4(rnying rgyud): drug pa 'o// / spyang po gas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu babang po la// mthe ris ngan myong gAr 'grob// dbugs dang drod kyi chayis shes// drod dbugs brtag pa de lta bu// nyon pa'i smon pa dun
360a5(rnying rgyud): bzang po ngas// mtho sa 'gro ba'i drod don// rkang mthil dag nas dzad yal ba// sring pa chags pa'i lte barba/ lus kyi drod ni der 'dras na// khyad par lha yi gnas sa b+he// de nas nyi rjod yang bsdus te// mabyin pa'i dag she
360a6(rnying rgyud): dang rgyu// lus kya nga ni du ni// gdu bar lnga na gangs sukyi// badzin pa'i rjod dayang bang smradus/ sna ba 'ongs pa'i gnas nga/ sa drugs stong sa/ mtha thang banyi dus
360a7(rnying rgyud): rtags ni// nang du sum drub pa na// lha dang mim khyad par zab// bye rjesus gnyis smrab na// rig pa 'dzin pa'i du // ngan song skye ba'i drung don/ ba 'didrug nas drod lal te// lte ba'i gnas su rjod thus na// rje grags byol ga gan
360b1(rnying rgyud): lte ba nas bzung drod yal te// rkang mthil gnas su drod yal na// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar ngas// lus kyi phyin dro bros nas// thang khar rang rang yal ba na// bkres skom yi dwags gnas su ste// ngan song 'gro ba'i dbugs
360b2(rnying rgyud): ni// nang du sum gnyis rngub pa dang // phyi ru sum cha spo ba ni// ngan song gnas su skye bar des// mtho ris gnas su skye ba na// chos su rig med nam mkha' bsgom// ngan song gnas su skye ba na// ye shes rig gsal stong pa bsgom// mtho ris ngan song
360b3(rnying rgyud): brtags pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// mno res ngan song rigs pa la// dran song gnas nas 'dren pa la// phyag rgya ting 'dzin ldan pa la// dmigs
360b4(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i thugs rje yis// nyon mongs drangs shing gnas nas 'gugs// nyon mongs dbang gi skye ba sbyong ba'i thabs de gang // ston pa'i ston pa kun bzang gis// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu de yang // dri ma rus pa'i rten dag la// rin chen dar dang tshon
360b5(rnying rgyud): kyis// legs par rigs drug snying po 'god// yi ge AHhUM phaT dag gis// rgya yis gad ba ste gur chen dbus// nyon mongs spyad phyir bkug la bstim// ye shes phyag rgya kun bzang gis// thugs kyi yi ge hUM bton nas// AHyis bstim
360b6(rnying rgyud): te phaT kyis spar// phaT kyi 'od zer nag po yis// nyon mongs sbyangs pas ye shes gsal// ye shes de yi byin rlabs las// byang chub sems de yi ge AH// dmigs pa med pa'i chos nyid bsgom// de yi khyad par yon tan la// nyon mongs
360b7(rnying rgyud): sbyangs te ye shes gsal// rkang bzhin med pa'i chos spu thob// bar do'i nyon mongs sbyong ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / srud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// bar do'i sems nyid dri ma de// dag
361a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags kyi mijig 'byung // na pa'i stan pa kun tu bzang pa das// dram dag rtags gsum 'byung te// nyan mongs dri ma dag // rlu ba tan mangs dris dang // 'byung ba 'i rtan sangs drim dang // blang nas gnas
361a2(rnying rgyud): pA'i nyon mongs dri ma'o// byung ba'i nyon mongs dri ma ni// ma rig pa yi na yin no// 'khrul dang mal thul mi shes pas// mA rig pa zhes de la bya// byung pa'i marig pa des ni// byed pa'i shes pa skyed par byed// rang byung ye shes migs pa pas// bar
361a3(rnying rgyud): de'i gnas su shes pa phye// 'byung ba'i nyon mongs dri ma des// nyon mongs rgod pa'i rgyu byas te// chos rnams thams cad ming du snang // ming tshig zung du 'brel ba yis// chos rnams thams cad brjod byur mthong // mthong ba'i don la rmo chags pas//
361a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs gzugs kyi snang bar byung // snang ba'i don de 'khrul pa yis// bar do sna tshogs 'khor ba las// nyin mtshan dus su lus nyid bral// 'bras bu sdug bsngal mi 'dod 'du// byung nas gnas pa'i dri ma ni// rang gnas shes pas rgyu byas te// 'bras
361a5(rnying rgyud): rigs drug sdug bsngal myong // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog re re yis// nyon mongs stobs dang ye shes stobs// stobs kyi khyad par be de las// rang stobs ring gnas 'bras bu thob// drar do'i shes pa de dag la// nyon mongs
361a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i rtags// 'bras bu skyug shad lhag ma tsam// dkar la 'tsher ba'i rgyu nyid 'byung // nyon mongs sgrib pa dag pa'i rtags// kha dog dkar po 'od nyid 'byung // shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pa'i rtags// sha rI ra ma dang nya d+hi ngam// gdung ni rkun 'brum tshad tsam 'byung
361a7(rnying rgyud): kha dog skrag cing mdangs che ba// byangasams 'bras bu thob pa'i rtags// gsang sngags rnal 'byor lha bsgoms pas// sdug dung ring brel rnam lnga 'byung // phyag rgya thob pas sku gzugs 'byung // gsung nyid thob pas sgra 'od 'byung // thugs nyid thob pas
361b1(rnying rgyud): 'ja' 'od 'byung // gsang sngags 'bras bu thob pa'i rtags// 'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ye shes yon tan ma 'grags pas// 'bras bu thams cad thob pa'i rtags// gru gzugs kha dog ci yang snang // cha chung mthe bong tsam du 'byurang/
361b2(rnying rgyud): 'ja' dang 'od dang khu blangs 'byung // sla dang na bun skar mda' 'byung // chos sku longs sku sprul sku yang // tha dad med par lhun gyis grub// nyon mongs sgrib pa dag pa'i rtags// 'bras bu mngon du 'grub rtags yin// bar ngo'i dri ma dag pa'i rtag
361b3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dgu pa'o// / sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'dus lus kyi phung po la// sbyong ba'i thabs ni ci lta bu// lus de sbyangs pas ci la phan// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bza
361b4(rnying rgyud): yis// lus kyi phung po skyong thabs gsum// ye shes me lhas sbyang ba dang // yig 'bru sngags kyis sbyang ba dang // chos nyid ting 'dzin gyis myang ba'o// ye shes me lha rnam gnyis te// dam tshig me lha ye shes me lha'o// dam tshig me lhas skyed pa ni//
361b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// rig pa ye shes chen po de'ang // 'dzin rtog med pa'i thugs nyid las// rang byung ye shes me sbar bas// rnam rtog bag chags mkha' la thim// ye shes me lhas sbyang ba ni// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// skyes
361b6(rnying rgyud): dang ma skyes gnyis med de// rang la gnas pa'i ye shes der// mnyam par bzhag pas lus nyid sbyangs// lus kyi rnam rtog pas chags kun// chos nyid nam mkha'i dad la thim// 'byung ba'i me yis lus nyid bsreg/ yig 'bru sngags kyis sbyang ba ni// rkang
361b7(rnying rgyud): mthil gnyis su yaM gnyis bsam// gsang ba'i glo ru raM bsam mo// lte bar rigs drug yig 'bru bsam// snying gar phaT gyi gdan dag la// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po bsam// ye las ye shes rlung byung bas// raM las ye shes me sbar nas// rigs
362a1(rnying rgyud): thunags thams cad badzin/ lasna nga ngag myed mags byugs su gyu// blun mas nasan na gnas sa 'dang// skragasung thags su dug za// bla gas log 'bras kyang ba'anan// glang mang na mayin
362a2(rnying rgyud): 'bru ni// mtshon du med pa'i chos nyid yin// gnas pa med pa'i yig 'bru ni// 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ye shes yin// shi ba mad pa'i yig 'bruni// badzad du med pa'i nam mkha' yin// sngags kyis sbyang ba rnam gnyis te// dgra pa'i sngags dang ma dgra
362a3(rnying rgyud): ljags// dag pa'i sngags kyis sbyang ba ni// sgra dang tshig tu ma brjod kyang // chos rnams thams cad stong par srung // chos nyid bden pa'i sngags 'di yis// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog stong bar dag/ ma dag sngags kyis sbyang ba ni// chos rnams thams cad stong
362a4(rnying rgyud): bar sprul pa ste// bde gshegs gsung gi sprul pa yin// su dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin las sngags kyis sbyang // gsung nyid rnam rtog bag chags kun// bder gshegs gsung gis sbyang bar bya// lus kyi rnam rtog thams cad kun//
362a5(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs sku yis byung bar bya// sems kyi rnam tog thams cad kun// chos rgya chen pos sbyang bar bya// thog ma med pa'i sreg sgrib kun// ye shes 'od zer dag gis spang // chos nyid ting 'dzin spang ba ni// chos klu sprul pa'i yul dang bral// sbyang dang pa
362a6(rnying rgyud): spangs gnyis ma pus// chos rnams thams cad nam mkhar bsgom// lta bul ba'i lus nyid snang bsdu ni// gre bod lus su mngon sangs rgyas// lus myong ba bstan pa'i le'u sdebs pa'o// / sbeng ba'i gsang bdag dz+nyA rje sems dpa'
362a7(rnying rgyud): yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// 'khor ba bag chags snang ba yi// sems dpung ba ci lta bu// snyan pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po yis// sems sbyang ba la rnam gsum ste// thog ma'i sems nyid kyang ba dang // bar rdo'i sems nyid kyang
362b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang // gnas pa'i sems nyid kyang pa'o// thag mA'i sems nyid snang ba ni// rang byung ya shas snying po dang // rig mang nam mkha' yod pa la// rgayos pa med pa'i yon tan las// rig pa'i zer tshogs 'bum byung bas// sna tshogs reg par gyur pa san//
362b2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul ba'i rig pa 'bum tshogs shar// thog ma'i rig pa bzlog pa'i phyir// rigs med dang du bsgom par bya'o// bar do'i sems nyid sbyang ba'i phyir// rang nyid rmugs par gyur pa la// khyang par can gyi thams kyang // lta ba spyod pa sgom pa yis//
362b3(rnying rgyud): te lam la 'dug par bya// lta bas lhung ba rnam gsum ste// chos nyid stabs sbyang ba ni// chos rnams thams cad chos sku ste// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa kun// phyi dang nang med chos kyi sku// bcos su med de nam mkha'o// ye shes pa wa bas snang
362b4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// chos rnams thams cad gcig pa la// 'dod 'di med na ye shes so// rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad kun// rig pa med pa'i ye shes yin// thugs rje'i lta bas sbyang ba ni// da dang bdag tu snang ba kun// tha dad med pa'i thugs rje yis/
362b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i ye shes las la gzung // bsgom pas myang ba'i thabs de ni// chos nyid stong pas srung ba na// rtogs dang mi rtog gnyis med de// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog ci byung yang // brjod du med pa'i nam mkha' la// ming dang bral bar bsgom par bya// thabs/
362b6(rnying rgyud): kyi bsgom pas sbyang ba ni// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog thams cad kun// yid kyi rnam shes ngag las byung // yid kyi rnam shes kyun gcad de// brjod dang bral ba'i chos nyid bsgom// thugs rje thabs kyi bsgom pa ni// chos rnams thams cad snang ba ste// sdang ba
362b7(rnying rgyud): dral ming chags te// ming la brten nas nyon mongs te// nyon mongs de rnams bzlog pa'i phyir// rang byung ye shes rig pa de// ma btsal mi bskyed yul las bzlog/ babyed pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// chos rnams thams cad mnyam par gzhag
363a1(rnying rgyud): bar da'i spyod pas snang ba med// chos 'das pa'i rig pa d+ma// zhag bdun dag nas lus la 'jug/ lus de skyon nyid mi 'dzin pas// sred pa'i sdug brdal de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir// tshe 'das rig pa'i shes pa dgug
363a2(rnying rgyud): dri ma ming dang rus bris la// bstims te skyabs 'gro lus dbul bya// lus kyi sdig sgrib sbyang ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bde ba dpag med la// lus 'bul dag brjod sems gdung la// mtshon gyi yon tan mang po brjod// lus ngag yid gsum da
363a3(rnying rgyud): pa'is// brgyas ti pa'i lus nyid thog/ N+Di dang tshad ba mang po mas// lus dag dag pani nus mya// dmigapa med pa gas // zhi ba na tshu dun dag pa// zhag ni dge bci musahA/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i ng+ge stong ga/ ti 'dzin brgya rtsa tu kyis// sa bras bu bang rmi/ na na kyang kya rgyad thog/ sangs
363a4(rnying rgyud): bdun gyis thog/ sa~Mm+b+ha ma padasum myo mo rtse rgya meng // sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i nyon pa kun tu babang po la// srid pa'i lus de 'jos pa'o// ye shes tshogs de bsag pa'i phyir// rus pa sbyang ba ci lta bu// do
363a5(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun bzang gis// srid pa'i rus pa de nyid kyang // sku gsung thugs su sbyang ba ni// skya ru ngus pa sbyang ba la// lta ba sgom pa spyod pa yis// rang bzhin gcig tu sbyang bar bya'o// lta ba gdeng dang ldan pa yis// srog chags shes
363a6(rnying rgyud): chus de la// sku gsung thugs kyi yig 'bru yis// byin gyis brlabs te bskor ba bya// chos nyid skye med gtan pa la// rang byung ye shes gtun bu yis// gnyis su med par brdung byas la// rnam rtog bag chags thams cad kun// byang chub
363a7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi phye ru gnas// bde gshegs thugs rje chen po yi// thugs las ye shes chu phyung ste// byang chub sems su rab bran nas// gnyis su med par 'ji bar 'gyur// rang byud ye shes lnga yi rtsal// rten cing 'brel ba'i sngags de yis/
363b1(rnying rgyud): ba med pa'i sgra ru 'gyur// gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod rdzogs// srid pa'i rus pa sbyangs pas tshogs bsags pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / skud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i smon pa kun tu bzang po la// lus
363b2(rnying rgyud): 'phos sems can de dag la// srid pa'i thal bsrung btso ste bu// ston pa'i don bkun tu bzang po yang // 'byung ba rdza las bskyed pa'i lus de yang // ye shes 'byung ba lnga yis byung bar byar// ye shes 'byung bachu de yas// khrag chen drang ba
363b3(rnying rgyud): yas su// tha dang med par snang bar bya'o// snang ba mtha' yas nyid pa yis// thal chen chul rab btab ste// snang ba zed po'i skye ru bskyed// dz+wa lnga chen me la rab btab ste// rin chen 'thung ldan snying po yis// rgyal ba'i srudu myed par byed// dus
363b4(rnying rgyud): tshechen sa la rab btab ste// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yis// rgyal ba'i sku ru bskyed par bya// rnga chen rlung la rab btab ste// don yod grub pa'i snying po yis// phrin las rgyal bar bskyed par bya// sha chen mkha' la rab btab ste// rnam par snang mdzad
363b5(rnying rgyud): snying po yis// rgyal ba'i sku ru bskyed par bya// lus nyid bsregs pa'i thal ba yis// 'byung chen lnga yi rgyu dag la// bde gshegs kun bzang chen po yis// snying po brjod pas su ru bskyed// nyon mongs ma spangs dag pa'i rtags// rigs kyi gtso bo lnga
363b6(rnying rgyud): chu babyed// ye shes rnam lnga 'thob pa'i bya// 'byung chen rnam lnga dag pa'i rtags// gnyis med kyil ba'i mu chen po// tshe 'das thal chen byangs pas tshogs bsags pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / spyad pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis/
363b7(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// bde gshegs su gzugs de dag la// gnas khang brtsigs pa'i thabs nyid gang // rab tu gnas pa ci lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po yis// gnas khang partsigs pa'i rgyu gsum ste// chos nyid gnas
364a1(rnying rgyud): 'ang nan dA nA~M// chas nyid yangs pa'i bad nan // bcos su med pa'i gzhal yas dang // dmigs pa med pa'o/ klung du// mchags mas ya t+tha gdas// gnyis sa myed par bzhugs sun nas/ dang
364a2(rnying rgyud): shes gnas khang chen po na// rig pa'i ye shes bran khyab \u0f7f// sgra byen med pa'i gzhal yas khang // stong med pa'i ye shes des// dri med pad+ma'i gdan thog la// gzung 'dzin med par bzhugs su gsol// phyogs bzu ngas ga
364a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ngu// phyag rgya chen po'i sku yin pas// kun rdzob lha tshogs mdzad pa'i phyir// mchod pa'i bye zlag tshogs 'jal// dmigs pa med par thim par bya// chos sbru la ni chos snga rab tu gnas// khyad par sangs kyi btsal du med//
364a4(rnying rgyud): nas la ni maM shes gnas// khyad par gzhan nas pardol du med// swA yi phyag rgya chen po la// long spyor rdzogs pa'i rabu ga nas bya// tha me dad par gcig par bstis// gnas nga bcig cing rab tu gnas par bya ba'i leng ste
364a5(rnying rgyud): smad pa'i gsang ba dag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// son pa'i stan pa kun tu bzang po la// srid pa par rdo'i dus nyid du// lus sems spangs pa'i yom tan gang // sbyin pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang podes// lum snying spangs pa'i som
364a6(rnying rgyud): sbring pa thog ma med pa nas// lus kyis sdig pa che bsags kyang // dag pa'i zu ga zugs gcig shes byung // bde gshegs thugs kyi rnam pa bskor// byang sems lha dang rgyal po yis// ste ba dag pa'i lus nyid rdzob// srid pa'i lha 'i ma
364a7(rnying rgyud): yis// rje bor mthong ste 'khor du byed// dmyal ba'i cha grang mang po yang // skug rung gcig gis sel bar byed// dbul ba sel zheng longs spyod ldan// 'khor lo bgyur ba'i rgyal bar bya// lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel// nang ngan rigs
364b1(rnying rgyud): rnams mi 'byung zhing // shin tu gzhon pa'i lus su thob// sems nyid sbyangs pa'i yon tan ni// theg pa chen po'i chos rnams la// dmigs pa med par brjod pa 'ong // nyan rgyu med de don nyid rtogs// btsal rgyu med par las rnams 'grub
364b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom rgyu med par 'bras bu 'thob// rang gi ye shes rang la srang // chos rnams thams cad nam mkhar rtogs// sangs rgyas thams cad lhun gyis thub// rang bzhin kun bzang chen po 'thob/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan te bco lnga pa'o//
364b3(rnying rgyud): sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// rgyud 'di gang nas 'byung zhing gang la gtad pa yin// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// chos sku spos dang bral ba yis// rang byung ye shes che la gtad// rang byung
364b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po des// zer gyi kun bzang che la gtad// zer gyi ston pa kun bzang des// ston pa kun bzang che la gtad// ston pa kun bzang chen po des// sdud pa'i gsang dbang che la gtad// sdud pa'i gsang dbang chen po des// rigs kyi sprul
364b5(rnying rgyud): sgru sa nags
364b6(rnying rgyud): bris// rin chen sna lnga'i sbom bcug ste// yi ge hUM gi rgyas btab nas// rang byung mchod rten che la gtang // lha dang mkha' 'gro mang po yis// las dang dam tshig can la sprod// rin po che srid pa bar mdo snang ba'i rgyud par do spyod pa'i thabs dang rgyud gtad pa'i
364b7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gcu drug pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ a su ra na yud+d+hA nirA kr-i ti tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ lha ma yin g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po/ chos las 'das pa/ rtags mi 'gyur ba'i sku rdo rje lta bu bde ba chen po la phyas/
365a1(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bshad pa'i dus// rdo rje chos sna bla gos dang // mkha' 'grAnya sa'i seng ge dang // thabs cig pa yi byang sems rnams// klu la rgyal po 'dzag po dang // dga' bo la sogs brgyad po /
365a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i sku// bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po// sbalnga pa'i rgyu ste sgra yi mchog/ 'gro kun thabs kyis 'dul ba'i sku// ri rab ri yi rtsab ru// shing chen dpag bsam rtsa ba la// lham yin rnams 'du ba'i gnas// gnas der/
365a3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa thug zangs ris// de rje chos kyi sgro gros thugs las 'thon// lha yi b+ha yi bdud gzhom phyir// lha min g.yul bzlog rgyud 'di gsungs// lha ma yin rnams rab tu dgyes// ston pa chos kyi blo gros khyod// lha min bdud las rgyal ba'i phyir/
365a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chos min yangs pa nas// chos min 'khor lo bskor du gsol/ zhes zhus pas/ dpag bsam shing gi bus pa las/ d+ha ga par ta dang / a nud dang / rtsa li dang / bdud gud dang / shen dang / dzi b+haM ba dzi ba ka dang / tsakra ba ka dang / shas/
365a5(rnying rgyud): ra pA dang / ko ke la dang / shi ge dang / bka dang / gung rta dang / bi ha ra tsa dang / gre ru dang / ma g+har dang / ka lar+tha ka dang / tsi sa na dang / ka kA dang / ku d+ha dang / ka ran d+ha pa dang / !chos 'di sgra gcig grag pa yis// bya rnams de dag thams cad kyang // ri rang/
365a6(rnying rgyud): rtse yi dpag bsam las/ ka lA pa/ mu tra d+ya ta la ba/ gnas 'dir 'dus na sde skang sgrogs// bka' 'di bsgrags par gyur pa'i tshe// dus gsum bstan pa gcig las nya sa nyi ma da ma rdza ma med// yang dag sangs rgyas zhing khams su//
365a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun gyi mnyam par gzigs// rdo dang bong ba la sogs pas// thams cad chos min dang rdza swa// rang byung sgra yi gdangs dang bcas// thun gcig dag la go bar gyur// dang por sprul pa'i sgra mchog pa// srid pa gsum gyi rtse la babs//
365b1(rnying rgyud): d+hAr ra ba skad la gnas// da lta dang na par 'ongs// kun tu babang pa'i phyi tu dgapa// sbrul ma yongs la gas rdung babs// byang chubs pas dpa' dmas pani// bka' dang byin rlabs thugs spyad to// rig pa badzin pa'i byi rlabs bar// mdzes
365b2(rnying rgyud): ge sprul pa slar gyur med// dga' bo'i gtsug gi nor bu de// gdug pa klu yi dug dang 'grogs// dug med pa na nor bu med// dug la mi skrag mi spangs na// nor bu rin chen gter sgo phye// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya yi// chos min spangs pa bsgrib pa yin// sgrib
365b3(rnying rgyud): mad pal chos min med// skabya la snang bya med par rtogs// sleb pa bran las nges par grol// rjes midi yangs pa'i snong dri skabs// zhes gsungs so// de'i tsha 'i dris na/ lham snyed kyi rgyal po ston pa dang / dri ba'i tshul pa zung zang lta ba dang /
365b4(rnying rgyud): 'phye 'a rgyal po sbrul mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / gzhan yang dud 'gro// sed+d+ha dang / bya g+h+ra dang / d+hi bI dang / pa blang dang / bug ka dang / na na gardza dang / sam+b+ha la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dus nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ pus
365b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcug nas/ 'di skad ces zhus so// kye ho sprul pa'i sku ste sgra yi mchog/ khyed cag mya ngan 'da' ba na// bdag cag slob dpon gang la bgyi// bdag cag mched grogs gang lta bu// bdag cag chos ci chos 'de ba dra ltar
365b6(rnying rgyud): brtags// de yi dam tshig ji ltar bsrung // blta ba dri med rnam dag des// rkyen ma thub na ji ltar bgyi// bsgom pa 'od gsal rtog med la// byid rgod rkyen khar 'chor na ji ltar bgyi// spyod pa 'dod yon rnam lnga la// chags sdang rkyen ma thung na ji ltar bgyi//
365b7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu thig le chos min la// 'khrul pa bag chags rkyen khar shor na ji ltar bgyi// rang byung ye shes rgya chad med pa la// phyogs rtogs gzung 'dzin byung na ji ltar bgyi// zhes zhus so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog gi rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u
366a1(rnying rgyud): ste dang po'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// ri rab che nas nyi shar ba// 'od kyis 'dzam glid yongs la brdal// zer gyis phyogs med yongs la brdal// thugs rje chos
366a2(rnying rgyud): min yangs pa las// byin rlabs 'gro ba'i gnas su 'phel// ye shes khams gsum rang shar 'gyur// ri rab rtsa bar thugs rje nyi shar brdal// khyed ni dang pa'i tshul gyis nyon// slob dpon rnam pa bzhi yin pas// lung du bstan pa'i sde la gus
366a3(rnying rgyud): par 'dud// thun mong slob dpon thub pa drug/ khyad par ston pa nga nyid yin// mchog gi slob dpon rang la shar// rang grol slob dpon 'khor ba yin// rang grol slob dpon bsten par bya// sangs rgyas slob dpon dmyal ba yin// gnyis med slob dpon
366a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis snang yin// shes pa'i slob dpon ma rig pa// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog gi rgyud las/ slob dpon ngo sprod chos min gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// mched
366a5(rnying rgyud): kyi gdams pa 'di lta ste// de las mched po rnam pa gsum// khams gsum rgyud drug kyi yi mched/ grub mtha' gzhung bsrang nang gi mched// gsang ba'i mchad la rnamar bya// bag chab dang byung ye shes mched// rang rig rang byung rig pa'i ye shes mched// dngos po sna tshogs dngos med mchid//
366a6(rnying rgyud): chos can 'khor ba chos min mched// khams gsum sems can sku gsum mchod// sna tshogs ma 'gags nyag gcig mched// thams cad 'brel bas mched ces bya// mched kyi rtsa ba mched na// dam tshig gzhung bskyang shin tu dka'// dam parma
366a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i gdams ngag yin// tshig ni ngo sprod rin po che// dbang rnams ma lus dus gcig bsgyur// dbang rnams bsrung ba'i slob bu yis// dam tshig dbang ba lhur thub par gyis// dam pa'i gdams ngag thabs su shes// rtogs pa'i shes rab dbang gi
366b1(rnying rgyud): mchog/ rang la yod pa gsang ba las// ye nas yod pa ye shes dbang // thams cad gcig tu shes pas snang srid bum pa yin// ma lus rang snang 'gag med bum pa'i dbang // slob dpon slob bu mched rnams dus gcig rdzogs// dam tshig de las 'das
366b2(rnying rgyud): na'akhong bar 'khyams// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin ga yul zlog gi rgyud las/ mched kyi ngo stong dang dam tshig dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad b+ha ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// chos kye
366b3(rnying rgyud): brtag tshul bstan par bya// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stod la// gnyen por dgongs dang bsdu ba dang // nye bar bsdus te dril la bshad// chos nyid stong pa gnyen po'i sgo nas bshad pa yin// theg pa rnam pa dgu rnams ni// bsdu ba'i sgo nas bshad
366b4(rnying rgyud): pa yin// theg pa'i rang gzhung sgrub byed pa// nye ba'i sgo nas bshad pa yin// shin tu nye bar ngo spad pas// theg pa gcig tu bstan pa yin// de la dpe yi theg pa dang // rtag dang don dang nga/ sum du 'dus// de gsum nges par gcig tu 'dus// gcig po byin gyis rlabla su 'dus//
366b5(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs rang byung rang la 'dus// de yang mtshon pa brda yi byin rlabs dang // mthun pa dade yi byin rlabs dang // rang chas rtags kyi byin rlabs dang // yang dag don gyi byin rlabs so// de yang byin gyis rlob pa dang // byin gyis rlabs dang ldan pa dang // ldan dbang
366b6(rnying rgyud): 'phel 'grib byung ba dang // 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'o// de yang thugs rje'i byin rlabs dang // gsang ba sngags kyi byin rlabs dang // nus pa rig pa'i byin rlabs dang // chos skyod mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs dang // de yang brtan dang mi brtan pa// gdams
366b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i stobs dang mi ldan na// nyi ma sprin gyi go bar 'dra// bar chod bdud kyis byin brlabs na// 'khor du ltas ngan sna tshogs 'byung // dbang bsrung bgegs bslad ma byas na// skyo 'bog brgyal nad dag gis 'chi// des na drod tshad dbab pa dka'// zhes
367a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog gi rgyud las/ byar spyod bstan pa'i be'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo tho gros khyod// de yI da ma tshig bstan pa ni// slob dpon su gsung
367a2(rnying rgyud): thugs dag gi// dam tshig thub par ma bsrungs na// rdo rje dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// mched kyi dam tshig bka' phral na// dmyal tshogs 'jig rten 'tshod par 'gyur// rdo rje slob dpon dam tshig ni// sru yi dri ma mal stan la// nam yang 'gom par mi
367a3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// skyob dpon lus ni dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor 'gongs pas dngos grub med// mnar med dmyal ba'i yul du ste// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga la// dug lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// s+thir ni bla mdzel gnas// dbu sra mkha' 'gro bye ba gnas//
367a4(rnying rgyud): thugs la rdo rje mi bskyod pa// de ltar rtogs pas dam tshig bsrung // lung du bstan pa khyod la 'dud// bla ma'i gsung dbyangs drug cu la// mkha' 'gro drug cu rtsa gnyis gnas// ngag bcag rdo rje'i khab lhung nas// bskal par bzungs shing 'tshod par 'gyur//
367a5(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i thugs la chos min sru// phyi nang med pa'i zar thal gnas// thun gtam ku re la sogs pas// thugs dbugs par ni gyur pa na// nges par rdo rje dmyal ba'i khams// mnar med par yang ltung bar 'gyur// mched kyi dam tshig mig dang 'dra// slob
367a6(rnying rgyud): dpon dam tshig srog dang 'dra// des na pham ltung rab tu che// thub na rdo rje'i sku thob 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog gi rgyud laswa/ dam tshig shel gyi lu gu rgyud du bstan pa dang g.yu phreng mes sreg pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
367a7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// de ltar thub pa'i rtags dag la// thub na nges pa 'di bstan no// mi thub par ni gyur pa na// bskal pa stong gi mun pa la// sgron me 'degs bar ma gsungs so// rin chen gter gyi sgo
367b1(rnying rgyud): ma byed// des na brtag nas thub srid na// rin chen srog pas phadra te byin// gal te ma byin chad pa 'ong // gal te ma brtags par byin na// de yis gdam pa mthub na// sbal pa rma can ji bzhin du// rang phung gzhan yang brlag par 'gyur// gal te dam tshig thub pa na// nam mkha'
367b2(rnying rgyud): rgya che khab mig gang // bya brgya thal mo brdab gcig yin// mdung rtse brgya yang spo ba gang // de bzhin g.yul dor ral thabs gcig/ 'khor ba'i g.yul ngo rang grol rig/ des na lha min g.yul bzlog yin// lta ba'i ngo bo bongo sprod dang // lta ba'i nges
367b3(rnying rgyud): tshig spod dang // lta ba'i dbye ba'ing spyod dang // lta ba'i mthun dpe'i rdo spod dang // de yi log gnon po spyod do// ngo bo rkyen med zang bral yin// nges tshig ji med rnam dag yin// dbye bskye ba med pa dang // rnam dag brjod du med pa skyes su byag// mthun de nam mapa' da ro//
367b4(rnying rgyud): la log gnon gnad med na// sdug bsngal rkyen thub shin tu dka'// gnad dang log gnon do sprad na// gong ma shugs las 'byung bar 'gyur// a ti mU la pa la ma hA zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba'i gegs sel
367b5(rnying rgyud): ro sprad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// dam tshig med pa'i mi rnams ni// dkar po'i chos rnams mi chags te// rlung gis bstod pa'i sprin dang 'dra// gzung 'dzin byis par 'jams pa 'dra// dug
367b6(rnying rgyud): lnga nags la me shor 'dra// zhe sdang chu bo'i gnyer ma 'dra// bcu bzlog dra ba'i rdo ba 'dra// kha dkar snying gnag brag la gangs chags 'dra// kha 'dres gting ring mtsho la dar chags 'dra// de la brten nas dmyal bar 'gro// chu srin gre bar rin chen chud bzhin sdom// li ting de
367b7(rnying rgyud): dang mi ldan don ldan na// bsgom pa 'od gsal rtog med bstan// bsgom pa'i bo 'jo sprod dang // bsgom pa'i nges tshig rdo sprod dang // bsgom pa'i dbye ba do sprod dang // bsgom pa'i mthun dpe'i sprod dang // de yi log non ge gsel lo// de la ro bo rtog med dri med yin// nges pa'i tshig ni don
368a1(rnying rgyud): las pa g.yob// dbye bar dwags ma rtog pa med pa dang // bde la chags zhen med pa dang // stong la nyam pas myong ba dang // skud pa rang bzhin pad pa'o// dpe ni mar ma tsham tsha ga/ narnam par banaganang na// de la log gan
368a2(rnying rgyud): gnad med na// bying rgod byin zlab shin tu dka'// gnad dang log gnon po spad na// gong ma thugs las 'byung bar 'gyur// dpedun d+han ga glog chod ltar// thams cad shugs las thod par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul bzlog gi rgyud las/
368a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i gnang dang log gnon gegs sel gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dgra bshar bya ba// nyon cig rdo chos kyi blo gros khyod// dumatshig med pa'i gang zag la// 'bras bu bstan pa shin tu dka'// nags kyi gseb nas me bung bas//
368a4(rnying rgyud): yang bsres la gzhan yang bsreg// 'jig rten 'dir yang tshe thung sbyir// kha dbang chung zhing yag 'ong // nad kyang rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung // 'byung po'i gdon gyi dbang du 'gro// spro 'bog drag pos 'debs par 'gyur// des na bstan pa rab tu dka'// 'bras bu ye shes
368a5(rnying rgyud): zang thal de// dus kyis bsgribs pas rkyen khar 'chor// gzhi mo la ma du ma bslangs pas// 'bras bu rkyen khar shor ba yin// dus la ltos pa'i gang zag rnams// 'bras bu ma bsgribs dus kyis bsgribs// dus la ltos pas thob mi srid// 'bras bu gzhi thog shor ba
368a6(rnying rgyud): dang // tha snyad tshig thog shor ba dang // rin chen dpe thog shor ba dang // snang ba nyams chog shor ba rnams// 'bras bu blo sted yul du shar// 'bras bu phyi dus 'debs byed pa// yang ngagadon la gol ba yin// gnyis med rang grol bsgribs pa yin// ye grol gzhi
368a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs gdod ma rnyed// des na gnad dang log gnon gegs sel gsum// de gsum mi ldan 'bras bu stor// nyi ma 'dod la zla ston 'dre// thugs rdo'i 'od zer 'byung mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul ro bzlog pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu gegs
368b1(rnying rgyud): sil thal ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag ba nga byug na sa sa khyod// 'bras bu 'bras byags byab// thun ma khyad par mchog du gsum// degasam gan nas na da/ mo dang zlas pa rgyugasar te// dem na
368b2(rnying rgyud): bstan par bya// chos sgra skyeb med pa yin// rgyal ba longs su de 'i tshal// de yi snang ba skul sla'o// khyad par rang gi rgyud las shang // cir rdzing ma 'gags sprul pa'i sra// der snang thams cad longs sul// dbyer med ces su sum rdza ba yin// des ni gdams pa
368b3(rnying rgyud): gsum mo// rtags kyi sku gsum bstan pa ni// snying ga chos sgra rang chas rtags// rin chen po brang dang la skur // doni chos sku'i bzhugs gnas yin// rig pa ye dag dngos med de// bzhugs pa'i tshul du de bshad do// shes rab dri med dag pa de// rtogs pa'i tshul du
368b4(rnying rgyud): de bshad do// rang byung rang la shwar bde// grol ba'i dgongs pa de med yin// rma bA ma sA sti ma ya// mgrin pa'i rtsa la 'od 'gros bya// de ni longs spyi'i bzhugs gnas yin// 'gyu ba 'od gsal rtog med de// de ni longs su'i bzhugs tshul yin// 'bru bar nga grol
368b5(rnying rgyud): chen po de// dri ni rang grol dgongs pa yin// 'du 'byung sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor de// de ni sprul lu'i bzhugs gnas yin// yon tan rnam pasna tshogs pa// bzhug gnas chen po yin no// thams cad 'grub shAr bde// rtogs pa'i rtogs tshu chen po min//
368b6(rnying rgyud): nas rang sar grol bya de// grol ba'i dgongs pa zhes su brjod// de ni mchog gi sku ga sum phyin// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul rdo zlog pa'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu rangs bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon
368b7(rnying rgyud): tshig rdo rje chos kyi rdo thos khyod// 'bras bu thob par byed pa la// spod bya'i thabs kyi gnad dgos pas// spyod thabs khyod la bstan par bya// khyod ni dang ba'i med kyis nyon// dam med rnams la bstan gyur na// dum pa ri ba 'khor ba ltar// rang phreng nags tshal
369a1(rnying rgyud): b.rab par 'gyur// rdul btsas byed cing 'og byas byed// de dag khru la smra 'debs pa// de 'bru'i lag tu 'drebastan// rang ga 'byug nyis ka dmyal thogs 'chad// bran la bstan par mi bya'o// de la 'din nas rgya//
369a2(rnying rgyud): dayon tan rnam pa lnga// dri med dang grol smod pa de// sa sdang rkyen thub shin tu dka'// spyod pa'i ngo bo thabs dang shes rab yin// nges tshig 'khor 'dras rang grol yin// dbye ba spyod pa 'khrul pa dang // spyod pa gol dang yangs pa dang // spyod par 'grol/
369a3(rnying rgyud): shes pa'o// spyod pa'i dpe ni sman pa mkhas pa yin// gang la reg pas sman 'gyur 'dra// thun mo spyod pa rgyad bzhi yin// khyad par bdud rtsi ston pa yin// mchog gi spyod pa bstan pa ni// rdzogs pa chen po'i spyod pa'o// thabs su rang shang di ltar grol//
369a4(rnying rgyud): shes rab rang shar sprod byed grol// thabs su rang byung rang la rdzogs// shes rab dang byung rang shar rang la rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pas// gcig la gcig rdogs spyod pa'i mchog/ thabs dang shes rab zung 'dug dang // thabs dang shes ra
369a5(rnying rgyud): rang grol gnyis// ming tsam mthun te don la 'phags// 'phags pa'i spyod pa zhes smra bstan// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul bzlog gi rgyud las/ 'bras bu thob par byed pa la spyod pa bstan pa'i leng ste bcupa'o// / de nas yang dag
369a6(rnying rgyud): bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// kun spyod kun 'khor lhod pa'i mchog/ rang byung grogs su shes gyur na// shes rab thabs kyi spyod pa yin// rang grol radabyung gzhan sde min// de phyir khyad par 'di bstan 'o// lha ma yin gyi g.yul bzlog
369a7(rnying rgyud): phyir// rgyur spyod pa bstan par bya// de la 'byung / drug tu mo// spyod par snyoms gsum brtsonano// nga ga lnga'i gnyis bcwas/ nga nas nor 'dri sdu// de nas drug pa rkyed stan// rgya nga cung byin byed pa ngal// nyi /
369b1(rnying rgyud): las gnyis su 'khrul// dug lnga'i rtseb chags smang 'byung ba la// dngos po drug war snang ba dang // da yi rang snang 'byung ba lta// de rnams nyams su tsha sas// so so rang nge 'khrul ngas ma snyoms pas// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong sprin// 'khor ba'i g.yul du
369b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs pa yin// de la g.yul bsgrog rlung 'di bshad// 'brujug g.yangs gcong tsaman// b+hang drug 'dus pa'i phung po la// e yi cha byad bzang pos brgyad// 'bras bu 'gro drug rang la shar// i ma'o// bsang ba rma dubyung ba'i don// thams cadadang
369b3(rnying rgyud): drung ngo sprad pas// nyon mongs g.yul ro bzlog par 'gyur// nyon mongs bskyed pa'i rtsa ba ni// rang byung 'dres pa'i phung po la// drug lngar snyoms mya skyes nA// 'khor ba'i g.yul las grol bar dka'// rang skar sna tshogs rdo bro gcig/ gcig la ro snyoms ma shes
369b4(rnying rgyud): na// thams cad bsnyams pas snyoms par dka'// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// 'gro ba kun la rang chags gnas// sna tshogs snang yang ngo bo gcig/ chos rnams thams cad ngo bo gcig/ chos sku kun khyab spyod pa'i phyir// nyon mongs thams cad ngo bo gci
369b5(rnying rgyud): rang byung rang shar gsum// ngo bo gcig tu ro snyoms na// phyi nang snod bcu dgayul do bzlog/ d+harmah+mA tu bo d+hi satwA dz+nyA na d+ha tu bo d+hi tsit+ta a/ mA la mA la ma hA mA la/ a ka rI la/ kA ya ti la ma hA mu dra ma hA yA na/ a nu d+ha ra zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog gi
369b6(rnying rgyud): dang las/ drug lnga 'byung ga ba sbyor gyi snyoms pa rnam rtog ro snyoms kyi leng ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshang byu // nyin cig rdo rje blo gros khyod// chos dbyings dam pa yon tan mtsho// spyod por snyoms brtan par bya// kun 'khol kun
370a1(rnying rgyud): 'dul kun spyod pa// de ni ngadabyung spyod pa'i mchog/ nya ru brten pas 'dra byung // 'dre bdud du byung ban// bra' ba snyoms bstan par bya// dang po gnyis bstan pa dang // bar dun rkyen bstan pa dang // tham hA de 'dres bstan/
370a2(rnying rgyud): bar gcod ga/ don gyis 'ching bar byed// lha ru bsgrubs pas 'dre dra shad// de la lha min ga yul bzlog bstan// lhar yang mi 'jug 'drer mi 'jug/ thams cad rang las 'byung bar 'dug/ de las 'byung po kun 'dul bstan// 'drel bgegs rigs ste daphrag
370a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad cu bstan// de las bsdus pa sde brgyad yin// de bsdus 'dre lnga de yang gcig/ phur 'dreg cig la ro snyoms na// 'di yi g.yul ngo bzlog par 'gyur// lha ni til gyi gang bu bzhin// rdul snyed grangs las 'das pa'i rtsa// de yang bsdus pas yab sum badz+ra/
370a4(rnying rgyud): de yang bsdus pas rigs lnga dang // de yang bsdus pas rigs gsum yin// thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa ni// rnam par sngar mdzad kun tu zhal// lharnams thams cad dra ba'i tshe// thams cad rig pas kun rig rnams yin// thams cad kun la khyab pas
370a5(rnying rgyud): nas snang gAng men mtsho// lha yi ro snyoms phyogs med thams cad lha yis gang // gcig rngu rab tu 'dus pa'i rta kharang yin// zhes gsungs pa dang / skye nangs gzigs kyis zhus pa/ bya dag cag rnams la dgongs pa yi// so sor 'dul ba ji lta bu// bdag
370a6(rnying rgyud): gzon pas dris bya// de 'dus das/ kun tugal gyis dag skal pa/ ji gse tur mi gyu pas/ 'dagra pa'i nang na 'jam dpal yin// 'khor ba'i zug nu'ang srang zo'o// 'phabyas pa'ang ma dpa la dgongs pa yini// 'khor bar nga grol dris med// 'phags pa zu
370a7(rnying rgyud): nang na mchog/ ye nas yin pas shes nas gnas// ye shes sems dpal zhes brjod// mtshon pa dpe yi nong ni// rdo rje phal ma lta ru ni// thams cad 'joms shing 'jigs pas na// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yin// blta thabs gcig gis
370b1(rnying rgyud): byams cad mthod// za'og sum bris lta na// phu zhu rje'i dgongs pa yin// rdo rjes bur mi 'gyur bas// 'bras bu'i myug nan rje yin// 'phags pa can can 'das mchog/ gangs ma nyis shar bltar// phyag sbyong ldan stong bskal ba ba rdzu /
370b2(rnying rgyud): po'i sang rgyas// 'phags pa na nas rgyun ngas gzigs// thugs tshub sas dra ma ma/ rgyun ras gtogs kyi po ngas pa yin// 'angs cid rnam ga pam // 'a sa 'i su gzigs shing na// dachags panas
370b3(rnying rgyud): nang nas mchog/ thams cad nam mkha' byangs pa ltar// g.yo ba med pas mi g.yo ba// yul med rang grol dag dris pa yin// mi g.yo ba yi dgongs pa yin// 'gro drug ring grol ma bcos pa// mi g.yo ba yi 'bras bu yin// 'phags pa
370b4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi nang na mchog/ 'khor ba rang grol 'gro ba'i gnad med na// 'jam dpal 'bras bu thob par ga la 'gyur// rang rig 'gyur ba med pa'i gnad med na// phyug na rdo rje'i dgongs bsad pa dka'// stong gsum phyogs med lha thabs gnad med na// spyan
370b5(rnying rgyud): ras gzigs dbang dgongs pa thob pa dka'// thig le nyag gcig gnad med na// mi g.yo ba yi dgongs pa thob pa dka'// zhes gsung so// na mo man+ta shrI sa sa mArti/ badz+rarbANis sA d+hi/ Ar+tha ba lo ki te shA ra sam+b+had+hi/ tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na sa mA d+hi/ sam+ba d+hi/ e ka ti la ka ma hA
370b6(rnying rgyud): te zhes gsungs so// ha mA yi nA g.yul bzlog gi chud las/ A 'drekha rkyor g.yul zlog gi le dza nye bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byu ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// nAd dang dus min 'chi ba'i ro stoms bstan
370b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// de la dang po nad kyi gzhes dang // de las rgyu dang rkyen bstan pa// tha man dngos bstan pa'o// dngos nad bzhi pa rgya rtsa bzhi da// bsdus pa nyi shu rtsa lngar 'dus// de yang rnam pa lnga 'dus// 'dren rdzog
371a1(rnying rgyud): nad sems kyi nad// cha ba'i nad dang bzhi ru 'dus// da yar snyoms bstan par bya// thun mong san dang khyad par lta chud len dang // mchog gi ro spyoms gsum du bstan// 'dren 'brel ro snyoms bya// sems nad sems
371a2(rnying rgyud): laro snyoms bya// 'chi nad ye shes ro snyoms bya// rtog nad mnyam nyid ro snyoms bya// ro ni nyams su myong ba'o// myong ba rang byung ye shes so// ro ni Nags sngar yul snang ngo // snyoms pa gnyis med zang thal lo// phyi yi 'byung ba ro snyoms pas//
371a3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi nad las grol bar byed// nang gi phung po ro snyoms pas// 'chi ba'i nad las grol bar byed// gsang ba'i dug lnga ro snyoms pas// rnam rtog nad las grol bar byed// yang gsang 'grus tshad ro snyoms pas// gdon gyi nad las
371a4(rnying rgyud): grol bar byed// nad kyi ngo bo sdug bsngal te// nges pa'i tshig ni ma nor ba'o// dbye ba gong du shes par bya// 'bras bu khams gsum 'khor ba'o// nu t+pan+nat+ta ta hr-i da ya/ zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul bzlog gi rgyud las// nad dang 'chi bar ro
371a5(rnying rgyud): snyoms pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// chos rnams thams cad dngos gzhi gnyis su 'bus// 'khrul pa'i gzhi dang 'khrul pa dngos// gzhi yi mthun dpeg bur 'dra//
371a6(rnying rgyud): dngos po rnam pa gsum du snang // de yang nad kyi cha rkyen gyis// 'bras bu rnam pa gsum du smin// de la dpe yi ngo sprod do// de la ro snyoms dgos pa yin// bdud kyi ro snyoms bstan par bya// dang po lha yi bu yi bdud// de yang gzhi sa kun gzhi yin
371a7(rnying rgyud): bar du rgyu dang rkyen du byung // 'od la chag pas dngos su byung // dngos po lus sems yul gyis bslus// spu byed rtsad nas mchod na// lha yi bdud choms shin tu dka'// bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin// chags pa rang grol ma shes na/
371b1(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pas bdud kyis khyer ba yin// bsgom chags bdud dpung 'byung bar 'gyur// skyong nyid la dga' 'dod chags b+h+yo// sna tshogs gzugs can yid kyi yul// gnyis med ye shes zang thal la// bsgom pa'i bdud drug khyad par bzhi// ngo //
371b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi bdud rtsis su// thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa yin// e ma'o// gsang sngags don la gnas pa po// thig le chen po'i rtag pa'i sra// mu stegs rtag pa lta bu min// rtag par ma song stong zhing dngas// zad par ma song ngo bos gsal/
371b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su ma song rgya ma chad// blos brtags rtag pa ma yin te// chos sgra thig le rang byung rtag/ rtag pa chen po ye shes su// dus gsum sangs kyis yang mes po// de la bsgom du rang spang yin// rang snang thig le'i klong chen yin// rtsol bslabs
371b4(rnying rgyud): med par byung ba yin// dris na rang byung ye shes thig le yin// thig le brtsegs pa'i rtse mor phyin// ye shes zad za la rang spos de// thar pa'i lam chen 'bras bu thob// lha yi bu la bdud bzhi tshad// bdud bzhi'i rtswa yi dras thag bcang // sbas pa
371b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra ba de// de ni nyon mongs bdud yin no// 'dzin pa lcags kyu 'dra ba de// lha yi bu yi bdud yin no// 'dus nas nyams su myong ba de// 'dus byas phung po'i bdud yin no// phung po 'dus nas skyed byed pa// 'chi bdag bdud ces bya ba 'byugango
371b6(rnying rgyud): bo ma rig rang gis bskal// bskal ba'i bdud chen de yin pas// de la ngo sprod bstan par bya'o// e ma do mtshar 'di lta bu// dam med rnams la byin gyur na// bu ga dgu nas khrag zag nas// ngan 'gro gsum du lhung bar 'gyur// dam med rnams
371b7(rnying rgyud): la byin gyur na// tshel bar gcod byed pas na// thar pa'i sa bon stongs pa dang // byang chub myu gu bskam par 'gyur// dam la mi gnas tshul 'chos che// nga rgyal dregs pa khong du bcug/ slob dpon la yang mgo mchongs byed// mched

372b6(rnying rgyud): zlog gi rgyung las/ phung po'i bdu ga zhom pa dang ro snyoms pa'i leSh+Tha ke badz+ra drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag pa shang gyur// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi'o glos khyod// thams cad gzhi lim dngos po gsum du 'dus// gzhi sa'i don la ro spad pa/
372b7(rnying rgyud): drininor du ngon chen 'chang ba'ang // khyim gyi don pa spad pa// kyel chi chu drabs rang bya tra// 'bras bu dang sa mang srid pa// gapung sun dang nga rung ri shar 'dra// ches rnams thams ca dag zhi las 'bras bu gas pa// 'bras drag nadadas ma thebs na/
373a1(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu theg 'o chos min de// de yi gzhi lam 'byas bu gsum// gsang sngags pa dang sgro bstan phyir// gzhi nig pur lta bu'o// lam ni sran du shes pa'o// 'bras bu na du grub pa'o// de ni dpe yi ngo spong ngo // dani don
373a2(rnying rgyud): ci smod de// thams dadal shes kyang thal chos midag ni// tshogs med pan po lko gzhanas// denas bya gzhi sbyong men/ deyang rang la byung ba na// da dang nga po'i kyi spyod pa med// seMn po med pa tog pangs su rtogs pa
373a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas yin// 'bras bu'i yul la de yin no// gsang sngags rdul bstan de ltar yin// dz+wal bstan pas ni phyogs med rtogs// rdzogs chen sdong pa de phyin no// rdzogs chen gzhil ma dbyer med pa// gzung dpe dang bstan pa'o// de yang 'drin sa
373a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// mardzogs med dang ma 'bugs pa// de yang ma rdzogs par yang ma 'gags pas// phyogs su ma lung ma rdzogs pas// rgya mchad pas ma rdzogs pa yang min// thams cad grub pas ma grub pa yang rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs
373a5(rnying rgyud): pa chen po rang byung la// thams cad rdzogs par shes pa yis// spyad du mi 'dod lam chen yin// thams cad rang sar grol ba yis// thob tu med pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs// thams cad gzhi las grub pa yis// ye nas mya btsal lhun gyis grub//

374a1(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i rngubar byed// 'dir ni mi bde sna tshogs 'byung // tshe thung nad kyang mang bar 'gyur// shrI nas zhugs par gyur nas kyang // kyi sla yang me thugs la// grags kyang go byar mi 'byung bas// de la bstan

374a6(rnying rgyud): zhu bar byed// rab tu gces pa'i phyag rgya dang // nor drang 'bru dang glu la sogs// de yi dus su sbyin par bya// dbang rnams ma tho ba slob ma de// mtshol char babs 'dra bas gting go med// dpa' rtsal lus la yod kyang mtshon chas bdud du byung // rtsa rlung

375b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa thob// mkhyen pa ma 'gags mi mkhyen par yang shar// thams cad khongs su mi mkhyen pa yang chud// thams cad phyogs sum lhung thams cad rgya mched// thams cad mkhyen pa zhes ni de la bya// rdo rje chos kyi blo gros nyon// ze /
375b3(rnying rgyud): pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gis khyab pa'o// theg pa gcig pa'i rtsad chod na// chos rnams spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi// blo 'dogs dus gcig chod pa yin// rgyu drug sems can rgyu gcig gis// thams cad dag pa khyab pa yin//
