375b6(rnying rgyud): khyab pa gcig po'i rtsad chod na// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras// bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog/ kun rdzob snang ba bsam yas kyang // bsdus pas ngo bo gcig las med// gcig po don dam rang bzhin yin// 'on gyi dam pa
375b7(rnying rgyud): rnam dag dpal// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // bskal pa gcig gi sangs rgyas gcig/ 'jig rten gsum na bskal bzang gcig/ ces gsungs so// dag pa rtsad bcad pa dang 'khor brtsad bcad pa dang / mya ngan las
376a1(rnying rgyud): 'das pacad bcad pa dang / marig pa dang rig pa ldad brjod 'di// bcu cu bzang po'i zugs kyi brgyad// rdo rloms stod la gtad// sbrul mad rnams la srog chad pa bzhin rnams// zhes bka' ba rdzogs rnam gas/
376a2(rnying rgyud): so// lha ma yin g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i chud las/ smyo 'dogs cad gcong ngo sprod kyi le'u ste nye gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byab// rdo rje chos kyi sgro gros nyon// rlung drug grong khyer gzhom pa dang // khams gsum nas gcong pa dang //
376a3(rnying rgyud): sred gsum skye thun gcod pa bstan par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// de la dang po 'khor ba'i grong khyer la// bstan rnam pa gsum du 'dus// thun mong 'gro drug grong khyer yin// de yang gzhi dang dngos po gsum// dngos po gtan la 'bebs pa ni// theg
376a4(rnying rgyud): pa thun mong zhes su brjod// khyad par tshogs drug grong khyer ro// rnam par shes pa drug po 'khor// gsang ba 'gru ba rgyud drug yin// rgyud drug 'dus pa'i phung po yin// 'gyu ba'i snang ba mi 'gag pa'o// thun mong spyi yi rnam pa yin// khyad par rang gi mtshan
376a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ni// rgyud drug grong khyer gzhom pa'i phyir// phyi nang rgya yan do sprad pa la// snang ba'i grong khyed choms par 'gyur// snang ba'i grong khyer choms tsam na// rgud drug chu 'bul byas med// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// zhes
376a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rgyud drug grong khyer gzhom 'dod na// tshogs drug rang grol ngo sprad pas// nang gi grong khyer choms par 'gyur// dbang rten 'od gsal shar tsam na// dbang po lnga la rgya sa med// tshogs kyi dag pa rnam dag dpal// sangs rgyas gsung ni zab mo
376a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung // A li kA li zab mos brgyan// A ni skye ba med pa la// li ni 'gag pa med pa'o// rgyud drug grong khyer gzhom 'dod na// dug lnga khong khro'i ngo sprad pas// chud drug grong khyer choms par 'gyur// gsang ba'i grong khyer choms tsam na// 'byung
376b1(rnying rgyud): 'ong ba 'grus med// ye shes 'ba' zhig las byung ba// de la de bstan de yang thob// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul rlog gi rgyud las/ rgyud drug gi grong khyer gzhom pa'i le'u ste nye gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/
376b2(rnying rgyud): tshig chos kyi gro gros khyod// / khams gsum d+ha nas gcod pa brtan par bya// khams gsum khams gsu ma zhes bya ba// 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu dang // gzugs khams gnas ris bcu bdun dang // gzugs med bye mched chu zhin//
376b3(rnying rgyud): mo khams gsum yin// khyad par lus ngag yid gsum yin// mchog gi khams gsum par do la// rdo spong rnam gsum shes par bya// de la khams gsum rdo sprod ni// dang po khams gsum gzhis gces// khams gsum gzhi sa ma rtogs na//
376b4(rnying rgyud): khams gsum rtsa nas gcad thabs med// khams gsum rtsad nas gcod pa la// phra rags khams gsum 'khrul ba ni// gzhi dang dngos po 'khrul pa gsum// ldog thabs sa mtshams ma shes na// 'gro drug 'grol shin tu dka'// dge bathu dang sa gro
376b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// dngos po gtan la maphegs na// nges shes skye ba shin tu dka'// 'khrul pa gtan la ma phebs na// rang grolas mtshams shin tu dka'// 'bras bu gtan la maphebasan// rang gi tshad shes shin du dka'// ldog zabs man ngag ma shes na/
376b6(rnying rgyud): khams gsum byung nas chod pa dka'// kye rdo rje chos kyi blo thos nyon// khams gsum dus gsum khyad pa med// dmyal ba'i me kye 'bar du // shes rab ye shes me rkyen gyi// rang gyur ye shes 'ong ba che// dmyal bar lhung ba grogs su 'gyur/
376b7(rnying rgyud): grang la sogs med pal// sangs rgyas yon tan gang la bstan// 'gro ba rigs drug sgra ba // lus ngag yi gang ma 'khor bste// rang grol skrag sum de sangs byas// sangs rgyas yul med dgongs pa shar// sangs rgyas thugs rjes sra
377a1(rnying rgyud): // sa med// sangs rgyas rang la shar ba'i phyir// dmyal ba'i snang bas gnong ma nus// rang snang thig le shar ba'i phyir// dge ba bcus kyang bstod ma nus// dge bcu rang sa grol ba'i phyir// sdug pa cu yis gnong ma nus// rang grol gnyis sdang ma
377a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// 'khor bar 'khyams pas gnod ma nus// rang snang rnam drag yin pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pas phran ma thogs// log snang dgongs pa med pa'i phyir// phan gnod gnyis la rten mi 'cha'// gnyis med thig ler gcig pa'i phyir/
377a3(rnying rgyud): nang gnyis la ltos mi bya// rten med rang grol shar ba'i phyir// de ltar shes pas khams gsum rtsa ba chod// thig le nyag gcig shar/ dngo/ nges pa ra la snang / sangs rgyas rang la shar/ mtshan ma rang sa gro la/ mngal brgya yis thebs/
377a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor bdor nas spag/ gnyis med bde bshar// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog gi rgyud las/ khams gsum rtsed nas gcod pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rje rje cho
377a5(rnying rgyud): rdo gros khyod// snying gsum skye thun gcod pa bstan par bya// steng dang sa 'ogs bla gsum// de ni thun mo srid pa yin// srid dgasu me dga' ba'i chags pas bcings// chags parang byang e ma ho// gzugs dang gzugs med 'dod cing nga /
377a6(rnying rgyud): bag chags brtas pa'i srid pa yin// khyad par ring gi lus dang ngag/ sems dang gsum du srid pa yin// srid gsum sbyor ba'i dngos gzhi mtshams// mtshams stor srid pa'i skye rgyunas// thog ma par dang mthar sbyor ba// 'khor 'thog sa
377a7(rnying rgyud): gcad pa'i phyir// 'khrul gzhi thog mtha' gcad par bya// srid gsum bye rgyun gcod pa la// rang shar dang grol dgongs pa dgos// dbus bu phye rus mi 'debs te// rang grol nyag gcig yod pa'i phyir// lte gzung 'bang mi gtong ngo //
377b1(rnying rgyud): ye rgol rang grol yod pa'i phyir// bsgom pa nyams su mtshor te// mtshan ma rang grol yod pa'i min// spyod pa'i golas spangs kyang 'khrul// de sa bu ni mi 'char te// shes rab zang bral yod pa'i phyir// thams cad gzhis 'i spel te/
377b2(rnying rgyud): gzhis 'das pa yod pa'i phyir// de ltar shes na khams gsum skye rabs gcad// ces gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul klog gi rgyan las/ srid gsum gyi chun gcod pa'i le'u ste nye bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya /
377b3(rnying rgyud): nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// rgyud do cog gi rtsa pa 'di// thams cad tshang bas ljon shing 'dra// thams cad rdzogs pas nor bu 'dra// phyogs med rtog gas nam mkha' 'dra// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho// ma rig pa yi gdang sha
377b4(rnying rgyud): bcad// rang rig ye shes rang la shar// ye shes 'ba' zhig las byung ba// gapur lag len shes pa 'dra// 'grub dang grol gdams pa'i gzor// lha min g.yul bzlog dgongs pa yod// ye shes rang shang gdams pa'i gzer// byed rnams
377b5(rnying rgyud): rang grol dgongs pa yod// thig le rang blang dgongs pa'i gzer// kla zung 'dzin dngas sangs dgongs pa yod// snang sri nga 'gro la gnad kyi gzer// skye 'chi las grol dgongs pa yod// khams gsum rnam dag dgongs pa'i gzer//
377b6(rnying rgyud): sgrib spyod mi dgos dgongs pa yod// srid gsum dang grol dgongs pa'i gzer// lam sbyong mi dgos dgongs pa yod// dug lnga rang grol nyams kyi gzer// tshul khrims bsrung chu med pa yin// de ltar shes pas thams cad rdzogs/
377b7(rnying rgyud): dngos po med pas chad pa rdzogs// ngo bo mi 'brur rtag pa rdzogs// dug lnga khong khro'i 'bras bu ni// rgya ma chad pas 'gro drug rdzogs// 'od gsal rang gsal sems tsam rdzogs// bdag med shes pas nyan thos rdzogs// brjod du med pas dbu ma
378a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// mnyam pa nyid kyis sbyin pa rdzogs// nyes pas mgos tshul khrims rdzogs// gnod pas mgos bzod pa rdzogs// yengs pa med pas bsum gtan rdzogs// rgan mi chad pas brtson 'grus rdzogs// thams cad
378a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas shes rab rdzogs// bgrod du med pas sa rnams rdzogs// rnam dag byang chub lam chen rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog gi rgyud las// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rdzogs pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//
378a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// sngags kyi theg pa'i rdzogs lugs ni// 'das pa rnam gsum thi ya rdzogs// 'das pa lnga yis yo ga ma d+hA rdzogs// chos las 'das pas e nu rdzogs// khams gsum rnam dang
378a4(rnying rgyud): chen rdzogs// rang bzhin stong pas lha mtha' rdzogs// ngo bo gsal bas bsgom mtha' rdzogs// thugs rje gnyis med spyod mtha' rdzogs// chos min dang grol 'bras bu rdzogs// chos las 'das pas chos su rdzogs// khongs gsal ma 'gags ljongs su rdzos
378a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pas sprul sku rdzogs// 'dam pa rnam lnga ye shes rnam lnga rdzogs// mtshan nyid pa dang sngags kyi theg pa rdzogs// grub pa'i 'bras bu sku gsum mtha ba drug rdzogs// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs pa rdzogs// nyams su khyod pa'i ye shes
378a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs med rdzogs// lag tu len pa'i lha sgrom spyod pa rdzogs// mthar thug 'bras bu thig le nyag gcig rdzogs// thams cad ma lus rdzogs pa chen po yin// thams cad ma spad mar bas 'grol ba yin// rang grol rdzogs pa chen po yin// grol ba blo bur ma yin te//
378a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang grol thabs pa// 'dus na rgyam sa grol ba'o// thig le phyogs su ma lhung rgya ma chad// mtshan ma rang sar grol ba dgongs pa'i mchog/ thams cad ma 'dres rang sar rdzogs// rdzogs chen mchog tu de bshad do// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul zlog
378b1(rnying rgyud): gi rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i gnas lugs kyi lernga lce nyer drug pa'o// / de nas yang dang / bshad bya ba// nyan can du byang bya blo gros khyod// dbang dang dkyil 'khor gdams pa gsum// de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// khyod ni nus pa'i tshul
378b2(rnying rgyud): de la dbang gi gdams ngag bstan pa ni// bum pa thabs dang shes rab dbang // gsang ba'i dbang dang tshig gi dbang // snang ba dbyibs dang rang lus dang // gsang ba ye shes bum pa'i dbang // phyi nang gsang ba skyes pa'i dbang // sbas pa'i dbang ni bshad par bya/
378b3(rnying rgyud): la rig pa rtsal gyi dbang // tshig dbang rin po che las byung // lta ba rig pa rang rtsal dbang // sdug bsngal dbang du sdud par byed/ bsgom pa rig pa dang rtsal dbang // chags sdang rgyud la zhi bar byed// spyod pa rig pa rang rtsal dbang // kun stong du/ lnga zhe
378b4(rnying rgyud): byed// 'bras bu rig pa rang rtsal dbang // nyon mongs rang sar grol bar byed// yon tan rig pa rang rtsal dbang // 'phro drug rang sar grol bar byed// phrin las rig pa rang rtsal dbang // khams gsum 'khor ba rtsa ba gcod// dbang mchog brtsegs pa'i
378b5(rnying rgyud): yod na// byin rlabs nus pa sna tshogs 'char// dbang mchog gdams pa'i gnad chod nas// 'khor ba'i snang ba chos skur brda laM// phyi nad med pa'i byin chen phebs// A li kA li'i dbang thob na// gzung 'dzin dri ma dad mar dag/ d+hi sa'i A li kA li yi//
378b6(rnying rgyud): dngos gzhi gnyis kyi dbang bskur na// ye shes spyi blugs dbang chen thob// 'khrul pa A li kA li'i dbang // rang byung ye shes dbang bskur na// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa thob// dngos po A li kA li'i dbang // de bskur dga' rab rdo rje'i dgongs pa thob//
378b7(rnying rgyud): thabs A le pA li'i dbang thob na// rdo rje sems dpe'i dgongs pathob// thugs rje A li kA li'i dbang thob na// gzugs su gnyis kyi dgongs pa 'char// de yi byin brlabs sul skra 'byung // 'khrul lugs A li kA lo gnyis// zab pa dang shes rab ba
379a1(rnying rgyud): mchog thob// gzhi gnas A li kA li'i dbang bskur na// bum pa'i dbang mchog thob par 'gyur// dngos po A li kA li'i dbang bskur na// gsang ba ye shes dbang thob 'gyur// rang byung A li kA li'i dbang bskur na/
379a2(rnying rgyud): dbang rin chen dbang thob 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// A li kA li zab tu bstan// 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod pa la// sangs rgyas dgongs pa phyogs med 'char// dbang mchog rgyal po rig pa'i dbang // de yi dbang mchog thob pa yis// sangs rgyas sems can
379a3(rnying rgyud): sa su med// khams gsum sems can 'jig rten kun// dmyal ba'i gnas kyang thig ler brdal// ma bgrod pa ru rang sar slebs// ma bsgrubs ldan gyis grub pa'o// tha dad ma yin dbye ba med// dbang bskur bla ma sangs rgyas la// dbang snod slob mas
379a4(rnying rgyud): mnyes par bya// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sku// bde ba chen po chos las 'das// zang thal shar bas gnyen po grol// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul do bzlog pa'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur rgyal po'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// /
379a5(rnying rgyud): nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje chos kyi blo gros khyod// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// rnam pa gsum du gsungs pa yin// thun mong dkyil 'khor 'og min gnas// rgyal ba sras kyis bskyor ba'o// khyad par rang lus dkyil 'khor la// rgyal ba
379a6(rnying rgyud): sras kyis bskor ba'o// rtags kyi dkyil 'khor mig la'o// brda' yi dkyil 'khor man shel la'o// don gyi dkyil 'khor tsit+ta la'o// rang byung rgyal sras ma bskyed rdzogs// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// kun snad dkyil 'khor chen por shar// snang srid
379a7(rnying rgyud): rnam dag rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun la khyab// rang byung sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sku// spyan drang mchod phyogs bya mi dgos// ye mnyam thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang // 'gro ba rigs drug
379b1(rnying rgyud): rang sangs tshul// mkha' dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor du// sred gsum thams cad rang sangs rgyas// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor de// khams gsum sems can dang sangs rgyas// mnyam pa'i rgyal po thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byam po nga blang dpa ngas
379b2(rnying rgyud): num// dkyil 'khor chen po mkha' ltan khyab// mnyam par shes pas bskyed du med// med par shes pas thams cad rdzogs// rdzogs pa rang byung dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// lha ma yin g.yul glog gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gtan la dang
379b3(rnying rgyud): rang byung ba'o// / denapa yang dag pad rdzab// na gyi gros khyod// gangasas pa mthar chug pashad par // thog mis de me gnad men// khong bas ngo bakhrid pa dang // la la de ming kyi na mi//
379b4(rnying rgyud): dge/ spyod pa 'bras ngam nges pas// zlum ma'i blang ming btags pa // jir 'a la sto bye 'dra// rnams ca rdzogs pas rngon shing dra// thams cad byung bas // se/ ba ra nga sgra// snang ba mang gis na ba
379b5(rnying rgyud): dade smra ma byis// thabyas du gzhin du ma myong ba drardzun ngos// yang ma pa na nga minas sarjesartsub pa yang sgom ga/ gyu pa tha gas // snyom pa 'asapa gang thong/
379b6(rnying rgyud): gros stong snga ma spyod pas sgrib pa che// 'bras bu dus ltos shing tu gal// de ya tu sleb 'dos dang // sdod pas byab pa yin te// sprul smras 'gro ba 'drar phyir du// bsgo bsgom spyod pa bral burnam sa// rbang pa don gas ya
380a1(rnying rgyud): sa napa du du / napa sgrubs sa gnanamasanas 'du // ma sa
380a2(rnying rgyud): kAN+Di hU~M pa da medan// rdzogs nyos lta byas na mthog/ khengs pa'i de ba rlom pa'i gdang ma // yin pa nga pas sa/ / nga ba'i na myed// rdzogs la ma dbyas pas ga med// rang nas
380a3(rnying rgyud): bcu po 'grus bu'i gang medam// thab 'dod ma la smos pa sa srung pa men// gnang seM ni mtha pag cod ci // n+dam med pa zhid rjes ngag nam ngas ga byer// 'dod pa med pa 'do / gas // sgragasum ngal shar ba'i phyi
380a4(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pa ye nyams chen 'byung // rabyung shul med pa'i phyid// khrel pa 'i nas / pa parnye margyan pa pa byod/ sa the drin de phyimasem// sa par byed / bsgoms sasang/
380a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po de ltar mya brten no// rarang byung gi thun tu babang pos kyad / bsgoms su ma/ nom par byed ma/ rlom pa da dam/ dran pa brgyas pas sa sardza ma// ci rigs kyi nyon pa/ kyi thos nga / bsgoms sa ma sgom par
380a6(rnying rgyud): bsgoms zinanam/ bsgoms nas sang sa rgya ma// kyi rigs kyi bu rko cig/ mdzangs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams cing / brnams dam se ma/ nom brjod dpa/ bsgom ma ldan nam/ brnams pa yangs rgyang ma 'byung ngam/ 'i bye 'an/ las bgro dang gnas pa
380a7(rnying rgyud): s+yAng las 'gro ba mas pa gyir // pabacos ma sa das bsgrubs na/ 'bras ngas chen po yin/ mkhyes du ma byed// des gsu na ma rlon rgya las/ gdam ra gyu sta pa mnyer na/
380b1(rnying rgyud): ri nas yang dag pashad bya // byung ba tsho gros ton// nga yi gdams pa 'din sangs rgyas bcur/ 'khor ba'i g.yul bzlo// 'byung po ldan 'dra' zhes rgyu// dun rna ma na brtu la myed do// dus lam b+hi med/ thos pa lam zung meng / ma brgyad par thags cang /
380b2(rnying rgyud): dran dzA pa/ ma bltas pa'i s+ho/ mang sgoms pa'i nyams/ masmad par zagazod/ ma bslabs par grub pa/ ma spangs pa'i rang grol zhes bya'o// 'din ni rje rje gros kyi thugs kar rje'o// zhes s+ya btab po// ston pa kunaHbzung ngo // zhung rdo kyi gros
380b3(rnying rgyud): sdud pa ngo mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'od zer can gyis bsdus pa/ lha ma yin g.yul po zlog pa'i rgyud las/ 3rgyas btab pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // lha ma yin g.yul bzlog 'byung po kun 'dul chos las 'das pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / o D+yan skad
380b4(rnying rgyud): bong kar na sha ran taH/ rgya gang gu dang / bu go ta rdzi bA lngas rba mA rnas pa rdzam/ bod skad du/ ro sreg thal ba dge po thams cad rdzogs par 'dus pa'i klung gyi rgyang po zhes bya ba/ dang la kun tu zing ba lang kyi mngang bdag chen po'i phyag
380b5(rnying rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams chen po'i gnas/ rang bzhin thig le rtogs pa'i dus nyid na/ zer dang rtsal dang longs sku dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal spyan ras gzigs dpar mi
380b6(rnying rgyud): g.yo mgon po dang / chos sku'i zer dang rtsal dang ni/ longs su byang chub sems dpa' ste/ bsdun chos sku longs su byang chub sems dpa' dang / rgyu dang gzhi yis thams cad khyab pa yin/ dag dang ma dag snang ba gsum du 'dus pa yin// gzhi lam 'bras bu ma
380b7(rnying rgyud): lus 'dus par bstan// ngag dang ma dag 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin// zham byin gyi rlabs kyis gsungs so// no'i myo dang du nyid ni ngos sku'i kun tu bzang po yis/ byin rtsed bu tu bzang po'i dri sgos pa spyod pa dang // 'bram du do rnams gsung sasu
381a1(rnying rgyud): zhes rgyas so// thal ba nag pa'i chud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u sa da pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// longs sgra'i gzum na pa nyon// sangs rgyas rnam tha nacag byad tan cag/ nya ba'i don labs pa mi byab// bskrun rnam pa bzhi
381a2(rnying rgyud): 'dus// log lta dag dang thun mong dang // khyad par mchog dang rnam pa gsum// brtags na phyi ma med pa dang // brtags na chu 'bras brtags pa ni// log pa'i lta ba yin par shes// thun mong lhub sems nyid de// de dag gcig tu stong blta'o// khyad par lta ba bstan pa ni//
381a3(rnying rgyud): don dam skye ba med pa'o// mchog gi lta ba bstan pa ni// gzhi shes pas ni lta ba'i mchog/ sems nyid ma skyes dus nyid na// lta ba chen po'i gzhi ma yin// de yi gong na med pa'i phyir// lta ba'i gong gcod chen po yin// de bstan lha ba rnams 'dral bas// gcod 'dral
381a4(rnying rgyud): chen po zhes bya'o// de med pa yi sngon rol na// lta ba'i gnas lugs med pa yin// khas len lta ba yongs gcod mkhan// ni med yongs su gcod pa med// theg pa'i gzhi na chen po 'dis// grub mtha' cham la 'bebs par byed// lta ba'i rgyal po kun byab 'dis//
381a5(rnying rgyud): lta ba rnams la 'bebs par byed// phyimango ma gnyer bas// tshe 'di'i 'dod pa sgru bapral// ska ba'i rgyal po 'di bstanan// rdo rje sprul bar rlom med// bres gsungs so// thal ba nag pa'i d+had lus/ phya ba ro bsreg pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o//
381a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba// longs skya'i gtso bo khyod nyon cig/ bsgom pa'i don la rnam gsum ste// thun mod khyad par mchog dang gsum// thun mong sems nyid bsgom pa yin// khyad par bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa yin// de yi 'bras bu ring ba yin// skye bo rtags myur 'bras bu badz+rag
381a7(rnying rgyud): ma stegs rtags mur mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'o// nyan thos la sogs rtags myur 'bras bu ring // kri ya yo ga'i rtags myur 'bras bu ring // ma hA a nu rtags phul 'bras bu nye// a ta rtags med 'bras bu mar// de bas bsgoms na khyad par che// mchog gi dgongs pa bstan
381b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni// gzhi shes pa ni lba ba'i mchog/ lha badras thag gcod pa yin// de nyid lam shes dgongs pa yin// ye shes khong gsal dgongs pa'i mchog/ thig 'i zam la 'bebs pa yin// de nyid yul med dgongs pa'i mchog/ de rtsa bsgom pa tsam la 'bebs pa yin//
381b2(rnying rgyud): shes zang thal dgongs pa'i mchog/ blun bsgo mtsham la 'bebs pa yin// ye shes chos min dgongs pa'i mchog/ bskyed rim cham la 'bebs pa yin// kun mkhyen ye shes dgongs pa'i mchog/ sems bsgomacham la 'bebs pa yin// dpe yi ngo sprad bstan pa
381b3(rnying rgyud): nini// ngo bo ma dang 'phrad pa 'dra// rtags ni ye shes do sprad yin// don ni rang snang ye shes yin// tshig gi ngo spyod byin rlabs dgongs pa bshad pa yin// dgongs pa'i gdams pa rdo sprod 'dis// 'di rnyed mi la btsod snyam nas// slong ma med par slob dpon rings// dgongs pa ma ma
381b4(rnying rgyud): nyams myong ston// chu yi lba ba ma dkrogs par yang 'ong // bsam gtan rtog med ma bsgoms par yang skye// dgra chung spang btub ma bsad par yang 'chi// the tshom mchod blan/ ngos sgom pa slob// shes long med par yug pa ring // dam tshig rtsa ba chen po nyams pas/
381b5(rnying rgyud): 'chi yang mi gtor na kun// zhes gsungs so// thal ba nag po'i rgyud las/ bsgom pa'i ro bsreg pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya bo// longs su'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ smad bya'i zhabal la mar yod kyang // thad mong ldad par
381b6(rnying rgyud): mchog dang gsum// thun mong dug lnga spangs nas spyod pa dang // sbyangs nas dge bcu phyin drug spyod// grangs med bdun nam gsum spyod na// khyad par dug lnga la sogs gnas bsgyur nas// sbyor sgrol bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// mi tshe lo brjod gcig tu spyod pa'o// rtog pa
